Atire neles e transforme-os em montes de sucata, mas seja rápido, pois eles estão programados para não errar!

locale.title: Astérix
locale.synopsis: Getafix, the Druid whose potion has kept his village from falling in Caesar's hands, has been kidnapped! Join Asterix and Obelix as they try to rescue the druid and save the village!
Panoramix, el Druida, cuya poción mágica ha impedido que su aldea caiga en manos de César, ¡ha sido raptado! ¡Únase a Asterix y Obelix en su intento de rescatar al druida y salvar la aldea!

Astérix sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes inspiré de la célèbre bande dessinée d'Uderzo et Goscinny. Panoramix a été enlevé par les Romains. Astérix, Obélix et Idéfix partent donc le secourir au travers de sept niveaux où vous contrôlez tour à tour les deux compagnons, chacun possédant ses propres caractéristiques. Astérix est plus rapide alors qu'Obélix peut manipuler des objets.

Estamos na Idade Antiga, no ano 50 a.C. Toda a Gália foi ocupada pelos romanos... Toda? Não! Uma aldeia povoada por irredutíveis gauleses, entre eles Asterix e Obelix, ainda resiste ao invasor. De onde será que eles tiram toda essa força? O segredo está numa poção mágica, descoberta pelo venerável Druida Panoramix, que deixa os valentes gauleses simplesmente invencíveis! Mas agora todos correm um grande perigo. César seqüestrou Panoramix !! Sem ele, a vila será invadida e se tornará apenas mais uma insignificante parte do Império Romano. Abracurcix, o chefe da tribo, mandou Asterix e Obelix encontrarem Panoramix e trazê-lo de volta, custe o que custar! O que você está esperando? Mergulhe na poção mágica e ajude nossos heróis a salvar a vila!

locale.title: Astérix and the Great Rescue
locale.synopsis:
The game is based on the popular French comics series Astérix. It is 50 B.C., and the entire Gaul (today's France) is conquered by the Romans. Only one village still remains independent, thanks to the incredible powers of its two great warriors, Asterix and Obelix. In the game, they must first of all liberate the village Orvio and rescue their friend Dogmatix.
You can play as either Asterix or Obelix. You make your way through platform levels, fighting enemies by punching them, and jumping to access higher ares or to avoid falling down. There are also some items you can collect, such as bombs, with which you can overcome obstacles and advance in the game.

Panoramix el Druida e Idéfix han sido capturados por las malvadas fuerzas romanas. Utiliza tus pociones mágicas para ayudar a Astérix y Obélix luchar a través de 5 niveles para llegar hasta Roma y liberar a sus amiguetes de las garras del César.

Dans Astérix and the Great Rescue sur Master System, vous incarnerez au travers d'un jeu de plates-formes, le petit héros gaulois ainsi qu'Obelix, son fidèle compagnon "un peu enrobé". Baffez, martelez, lancez du Romain, afin de libérer Dogmatix et le village d'Orvio.

O ano é 50 a.C. e a Gália está ocupada pelos romanos, com exceção de uma aldeia que se mantém graças ao poder de uma poção mágica. Mas, os romanos não dão moleza, e sequestraram o druida Panoramix e o cão Idéiafix. Quem poderia resolver este caso? Dois grandes amigos, ou melhor, um grande e um pequeno: Asterix e Obelix! Por causa de suas estaturas diferenciadas, nossos heróis têm habilidades próprias, diferentes. A escolha é sua. Lute contra legiões de soldados romanos em uma aldeia gaulesa, numa galera romana em alto mar e, finalmente, em Roma! Para conseguir pontos, encontre sacos de dinheiro, moedas e muitos outros objetos. Você deverá passar por cinco fases e chegar até Roma, libertando Idéiafix e Panoramix das garras de César! O que você esta fazendo aí parado? Assuma o joystick! Um pouquinho de poção e... os romanos que se cuidem!

locale.title: Astérix and the Secret Mission
locale.synopsis:
The druid Getafix is out of magic potion, and Astérix and Obelix are set out on a secret mission: to find the necessary herbs, so he can brew the potion again.
In this side-scrolling action game, the player can choose to play either Astérix or Obelix at the start of each one of the six levels. Although the main setting of each level is the same to both characters (forests, caves, deserts, underwater stages, waterfalls and such) the level design for each one may vary. In two player mode (Master System version), players will take turns playing as Astérix and Obelix. Both characters jump (by pressing button 2), punch enemies and break blocks (by pressing button 1). Astérix can run can run (by pressing and holding button 1 while moving) and double jump (by pressing 2 in the middle of a jump). Obélix is stronger and can break several bricks in a row when jumping over them (pressing 1 while jumping), and can also slide down hills (by pressing down at them).
Astérix can get some potions (thrown by pressing up and 1), which can break rocks, kill or shrink enemies. Obelix can get miniature menhirs which can be thrown (by pressing up and 1) against enemies. Both characters can also get bones throughout the game, granting access to bonus stages where the player controls Dogmatix. Some levels also involve minor puzzle solving, like pushing switches or moving rock blocks.

Panoramix el druida se ha quedado sin poción mágica. Si se entera el César, la invasión estará asegurada. Asterix y Obelix parten para encontrar la hierbas necesarias. Una misión que les llevará por todo tipo de terrenos infectados de romanos, mares y rios, bosques y desiertos, templos y ruinas.

Astérix and the Secret Mission sur Master System vous propose d'incarner les deux irréductibles Gaulois, chargés par Panoramix, à court de potion magique, d'aller chercher les ingrédients nécessaires à sa confection. Vous pouvez aussi tenter l'aventure à deux joueurs simultanément.

Estamos no ano de 50 a.c. e a Gália, assim como metade do miando civilizado, está sob o domínio do grande César. O único foco de resistência é uma pequena vila onde Asterix, Obelix e seus amigos vivem. Seu segredo para enfrentar o Império Romano é uma poção medicinal feita pelo Druida Panoramix que lhes confere a força de 100 homens. Mas a poção está acabando, e Abracurcix, o chefe da tribo, mandou Asterix e Obelix percorrerem toda a Gália atrás das 6 plantas que compõem a poção. Se César souber que a vila enfraqueceu, ele certamente atacará. Você viverá essa aventura na pele de Asterix ou Obelix. Cada um seguirá um caminho diferente contando com o perigo permanente das tropas romanas - que não são fáceis de se enfrentar. E melhor você se apressar pois o tempo passa e as notícias correm. Nesse jogo, como César, você fatalmente vai entrar para a História: como um mísero conquistado ou como um grande conquistador!

locale.title: Astro Warrior
locale.synopsis:
Basic Sega shoot-em-up in which you must guide your ship through three zones while avoiding hazards. Your only weapon are bullets as your only defense, but if you shoot the flashing red pieces on the terrain, chances are that a green ship will approach you, and if you collect this ship, your weapons will be upgraded so that you shoot a laser beam instead. Keep collecting ships and you can shoot up to three laser beams at once.
At the end of each zone, you will come across a boss that takes multiple hits to kill. If you manage to conquer all three zones, you are back to where you started. The whole point of this game is to earn as many points you can without losing all of your lives.
Haga retroceder a los invasores y salve la galaxia con ASTRO WARRIOR.

Astro Warrior sur Master System est un shoot'em up entraînant le joueur dans des combats épiques, au coeur de trois environnements. Le canon, arme de base, peut être amélioré ce qui ne sera pas de trop pour affronter le boss à la fin de chaque niveau.

Astro Warrior leva você à imensidão do universo, numa batalha emocionante contra poderosas estações e naves inimigas. Atire rápido. Atire na hora certa. A precisão será sua maior aliada. Neste jogo de aventura espacial, as chances estão contra você, e a única saída é tornar sua nave mais forte e com mais armas. Mas para isso você precisa ser um verdadeiro campeão. Prepare-se para muita ação, pois qualquer descuido pode levá-lo ao fim do jogo.

locale.title: Ayrton Senna's Super Monaco GP II
locale.synopsis:
Ayrton Senna won the Monaco Grand Prix six times, as well as 3 Formula One world championships, so he was the perfect man to license a home sequel to the classic arcade racing game. As before, the action is viewed from within the cockpit, but depicted using sprites rather than polygons.
There are three main modes:
1. Senna GP: Features three non-championship circuits with a preliminary race followed by three laps.
2. World Championship: The full 16-race championship. There are two modes in the championship mode that affect how the game is played. Beginner is a regular season, with the same difficulty level as the remaining modes, and cars have roughly the same power. Each race has three laps. In Master things get a twist. There are five groups of cars, and the player starts on the lowly competitive SERGA team. To climb the ranks and get a chance of claim the title the player must challenge a driver from other team and beat him to the top spot. The winner of this particular race gets (or holds) the fastest car. Races are also longer in this mode, and pit-stops are activated, required if the player knocks on too many objects or other cars frequently.
3. Free Practice: This allows the player to drive on any race without caring for championship positions. There are two options in Free Practice: Free Run is just the player against the clock and Image Training is a race, but instead of having to quality and then run the three laps, the player can set the number of laps (between one and six), starting position and the condition of the track (dry or wet, only on some circuits).
While each mode presents it's own variations, the core of each race is the same: Along controller setup options, the player can choose between an Automatic or Manual with 4 or 7 speeds gearbox, and races against 16 drivers. The car can be instantly wrecked if it goes on top speed against a roadside object.

¡Experimente la emocionante acción de las carreras de F-1 en los circuitos más desafiadores del mundo! Usted se encuentra al control de una máquina de precisión, listo para probar su pericia y habilidad hasta el limite a fin de ganar el primer premio: ¡La copa del campeonato!

Défiez le sextuple vainqueur du GP de Monaco et triple champion du monde des pilotes dans Ayrton Senna's Super Monaco GP II sur Master System. Faites-vous un nom parmi les autres compétiteurs, sur les 16 circuits du championnat du monde FIA à travers le mode World Championship ou tentez votre chance en face-à-face contre Ayrton Senna lui-même, grâce au Senna GP.

Os treinos foram difíceis, mas você se classificou para a corrida. Ao seu lado no Grid, o brasileiro Ayrton Senna, tri-campeão mundial de Fórmula 1, consagrado como o mais ousado piloto dos últimos anos. Acendeu a luz vermelha, e sua adrenalina está no limite. Você sente aquele frio na barriga e se prepara para a largada. Luz verde... Agora é para valer. Você está correndo a mais de 300 Km/h na categoria máxima do automobilismo mundial. Curvas fechadas, reduções de marcha e todas as emoções da F-l nas suas mãos. Tudo com dicas exclusivas do nosso campeão, que atuou diretamente no desenvolvimento do jogo para que as imagens transmitissem com perfeição a realidade sentida pelos pilotos durante as 16 provas do campeonato.

locale.title: Aztec Adventure
locale.synopsis:
Aztec Adventure is a traditional action/labyrinth game in which the player assumes the role of Nino, an explorer whose aim is to find the Aztec Paradise.
The labyrinth is full of Aztec mythology creatures and other ancient Mexican references.
Although it is a maze game, the controls are very simple and easy to manage.
Bienvenido al país de los antiguos Aztecs, donde el dinero habla y puede comprar a sus enemigos. Su objetivo: alcanzar el paraíso Aztec, donde le esperan !a abundancia y la felicidad.

Aztec Adventure est un jeu d'action/réflexion sur Master System. Le joueur incarne Nino, un jeune explorateur dont l'objectif est de trouver le paradis des Aztèques. Ainsi vous parcourez un labyrinthe regorgeant de créatures mythologiques.

Em algum lugar da floresta dos antigos Astecas está escondido um paraíso. Para chegar até lá, você tem que atravessar um labirinto perigoso, cheio de criaturas misteriosas. Por isso, nunca alguém conseguiu alcançar este paraíso. Somente El Nino, o explorador, é corajoso o bastante para se aventurar no labirinto... e com chances de sobreviver. Nesta terra onde o dinheiro fala mais alto, cada um tem seu preço. Seus inimigos de hoje podem ser seus aliados de amanhã. A caminhada será arriscada, mas o Paraíso Asteca espera por você!

locale.title: Back to the Future Part II
locale.synopsis:
Back to the Future II is a collection of five arcade and puzzle games.
Based on the second installment of the popular Hollywood series Back to the Future, this movie conversion has Marty McFly and Doc Brown travel through time to stop their arch-rival Biff from changing the future. The game consists of five parts, each inspired by one of the movie's most memorable scenes:
1. Hoverboard Chase: A Paperboy clone without newspapers, but with isometric levels and lots of enemies to dodge. 2. Jennifer Rescue: Guide Marty's girlfriend Jennifer out of the house without her meeting one of the four family members. Open and close doors to make the persons go from one room to the next in this top-down puzzle sequence. 3. Beat Biff: A side-scrolling beat-em-up sequence in the tradition of Double Dragon. Fight your way through a grim 1985 by jumping, hitting and kicking at Biff's lackeys. 4. Band Puzzle: Rearrange the mixed-up parts of an animated picture of the school band in this sliding block puzzle. The clock is ticking. 5. Hoverboard Chase 2: Another hoverboard sequence, similar to the first one, only this time set in 1955.

Es hora de volver... ¡El Gran Scott! Regresando del ano 2015. Doc Emmet Brown tiene malas noticias para Marty McFly... Su futuro está en peligro a menos que arregle las cosas. Guie a Marty por los cinco niveles en esta apasionante interpretación del exitazo cinematográfico ¿Puede asegurar un futuro a salvo para Marty? ¿O asegurará Biff que no existe ningún futuro?

Retrouvez Marty McFly et Doc Brown dans ce jeu d'action sur Master System directement tiré du célèbre film hollywoodien. Le titre permet de revivre cinq scènes parmi les plus mémorables du long métrage. Sauvez la fiancée de Marty, défiez Biff et prenez les commandes du légendaire "HoverBoard".

"Marty McFly! É hora de voltar para o futuro!" Doutor Emmet Brown, o cientista super maluco, veio diretamente do ano 2015 para trazer notícias terríveis para o nosso herói: seus filhos estão em perigo! Passados trinta anos, o grande inimigo dos McFlys, Biff, ainda os persegue e agora vai levar o filho de Marty para trás das grades! Embarque nesta emocionante viagem pelo tempo ao lado de Marty e ajude-o a enfrentar os perigos que o aguardam. Mas cuidado! O pior ainda está por vir... Biff descobriu a máquina do tempo construída no antigo DeLorean, viajou para o passado e mudou todo o rumo da história! Será que você conseguirá garantir um final feliz para Marty e sua família? Ou deixará Biff traçar um futuro negro para todos nós?

locale.title: Back to the Future Part III
locale.synopsis:
Back to the Future III is a collection of four arcade games. Marty McFly and Doc Brown have traveled back through time to the year 1885 - and they're soon deep in trouble when they face "Mad Dog" Tannen's gang and have to find a way to return to the present. This game takes four scenes from the Hollywood movie Back to the Future III and turns them into arcade sequences:
1. Buckboard Chase: Doc Brown goes horseback in an attempt to save Hill Valley's lovely school teacher Clara. This game of quick ducking, jumping and shooting alternates between a side-scrolling and a top-down perspective.
2. Shooting Gallery: The name says it all. A classic game of aim-and-shoot, spiced up by hidden extras and bonus targets.
3. Pie Throwing: Meet the Mad Dog gang. They have guns, and you have... cream pies. It's an isometric version of the shooting gallery, only with ammo. And the targets shoot back.
4. The Train: Basically a side-scrolling beat-em-up on train wagons with some ducking and jumping. Get rid of the mechanics and collect speed logs to push the engine to a magic 88 mph.

¡1885 nunca fue así! Las aventuras de Marty McFly y Doc Brown en su viaje por el tiempo incrementan su ritmo vertiginoso para esta última y más excitante parte de la trilogía de Regreso al Futuro. Perdido en Hill Valley, en medio del Lejano Oeste, usted dirige a Marty Y Doc en una frenética carrera contra el tiempo, lo cual no resulta muy fácil con Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen y su banda de forajidos interponiéndose en su camino.

Inspiré du film du même nom, le jeu d'action Back to the Future Part III (Retour vers le Futur 3 en français) sur Master System comporte 4 niveaux retraçant les moments forts du scénario. Vous commencez à cheval pour rattraper le chariot de la maîtresse, puis passez à une séquence de tir à la foire. Vous devez ensuite lancer des plats à tartes sur la bande de Bufford et terminez en traversant le train tandis que celui-ci gagne en vitesse pour atteindre les fameux 88 miles par heure.

De volta ao futuro III é uma coleção de quatro jogos de arcade. Marty McFly e Doc Brown viajaram de volta no tempo até o ano de 1885 - e logo ficam em apuros quando enfrentam a gangue de "Mad Dog" Tannen e precisam encontrar uma maneira de retornar ao presente. Este jogo leva quatro cenas do filme de Hollywood Back to the Future III e as transforma em seqüências de arcade:nnnn1. Buckboard Chase: Doc Brown vai a cavalo em uma tentativa de salvar Clara linda professora de Hill Valley. Este jogo de ducking rápido, pulando e atirando alterna entre uma perspectiva de rolagem lateral e uma perspectiva de cima para baixo.nnnn2. Shooting Gallery: O nome diz tudo. Um clássico jogo de mira-e-atire, temperado por extras escondidos e alvos de bônus.nnnn3. Pie Throwing: Conheça a gangue Mad Dog. Eles têm armas, e você tem ... tortas de creme. É uma versão isométrica da galeria de tiro, apenas com munição. E os alvos atiram de volta.nnnn4. O trem: Basicamente um beat-em-up side-scrolling em vagões de trem com alguns abaixando e pulando. Livre-se da mecânica e colete troncos de velocidade para empurrar o motor a 88 km / h.

game.name: Baku Baku Animal

locale.title: Baku Baku Animal
locale.synopsis:
The Minister approaches the King to tell him that his only daughter, the Princess, wants a new pet. But the King says she already has too many, and she can't take care of so many animals. Thus the Minister purposes a contest of skill and daring to select the Royal Zookeeper. Master Piggy then sends his pupil, Polly, to participate in the contest.
Baku Baku Animal is a variation on the very often copied Tetris type of game. The game has three different play modes: practice, normal and hard. It also can be played by two players against each other (except for the Master System version).
The objective is to pair animal heads with their respective food. If a rabbit head comes falling, you must make it fall on a pile of carrot tiles, dog heads with bones, panda heads with bamboos and monkey heads with bananas. There is a bonus item, the "BB coin", which will appear from times to times, and remove piled tiles from the playfield. Removed tiles will be sent to the opponent's playfield all at once, increasing the difficulty of the task. Polly will face several contestants, and she'll win when her opponents get their playfield piled to the top.

Baku Baku Animal es una variación del tipo Tetris. El juego tiene tres modos de juego diferentes: la práctica, normal y difícil. nnnnEl objetivo es emparejar cabezas de animales con sus respectivos alimentos. Si una cabeza de conejo viene cayendo, debes hacerla caer sobre un montón de tejas de zanahoria, cabezas de perro con huesos, panda con bambúes y cabezas de mono con los plátanos.

L'objectif est de coupler les animaux avec leurs aliments respectifs. Si une tête de lapin tombe, vous devez la faire tomber sur un tas de carottes, des têtes de chiens avec des os, des têtes de panda avec des bambous et des têtes de singes avec des bananes.

O Zoológico Real está procurando um novo zelador para tornar conta dos animais. Para receber tal honra, você será posto à teste! Seu trabalho é distribuir aos diferentes animais seus alimentos prediletos: bananas aos macacos, cenouras aos coelhos e etc. Mas seja rápido... se os animais ficarem com fome. a refeição pode ser VOCÊ! Jogo de estratégia super divertido! Combine os alimentos com os animais certos e ganhe pontos abrindo caminho para o próximo estágio. Desafio para todas as idades. 3 níveis de dificuldade. Seja rápido e distribua os alimentos. 0 Rei decidirá o seu destino caso algum animal fique com fome.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Bank Panic
locale.synopsis:
Bandits are holding up a bank and have taken people hostage, and as a gunslinger, it's your job to shoot them. The bank has 12 doors, and the bandits are behind each one of them. When they pull a gun out at you when you open a door, you have only a few seconds to shoot them before they shoot you. If you shoot them too early (ie: before he sticks his gun out at you), it is considered unfair, and you won't score any points, but if you're too late, he'll shoot you and you lose one of your three lives.If you waste too much time, a bandit will come out from one of the doors and stick dynamite on it. You must then shoot the dynamite to get rid of it.
If you're lucky, either a man or a woman will throw you a bag of gold coins. If you shoot any of these people by accident, you also lose a life. More often than not, the person will throw his/her hands up, saying "I haven't got anything". That's when they will be replaced by bandits.
Some men will carry three to five pieces of gold on top of their heads, and shooting at all of the gold will award you with a bag of gold coins. Others will be tied up with rope. If you shoot the rope, there's more money for you, because not only will you receive one bag of gold coins, but you'll get three bags of gold coins.
There are more than ten rounds in Bank Panic, and each one ends when a person behind all 12 doors was able to throw you a bag of gold coins. The rounds get difficult the further you get. For example, in later rounds, a few bandits will block your shot, and you have to then shoot twice. Also, regardless of what round you're on, you can shoot so many bandits before time runs out.
Vuelva a los comienzos de la era de colonización americana. Usted es el héroe, y su misión es proteger a los clientes que vienen a depositar dinero al banco.

Bank Panic sur Master System est un jeu de tir se déroulant au temps du Far West. Des bandits attaquent la banque et prennent des civils innocents en otage. Affûtez vos colts, votre mission est de les mettre hors d'état de nuire. La banque a 12 portes. Chaque fois qu'un bandit ouvre une porte vous n'avez que quelques secondes pour ouvrir le feu avant de vous faire abattre.

Estamos no séc. XVIII, época da Colonização Americana, corrida do ouro, dinheiro fácil... É o paraíso, você deve estar pensando. Que nada. Enquanto uns trabalham arduamente dia-e-noite atrás de ouro, ladrões inescrupulosos arquitetam planos diabólicos para se apossarem dessa riqueza toda. Você não acha isto justo, acha? Então faça alguma coisa! Os bancos precisam muito de sua ajuda. Atrás de cada cliente há uma arma apontada, e elas não são de brincadeira! Isto sem falar nas lindas donzelas que estão nas mãos dos bandidos. Você precisa protegê-las! Ainda bem que você é um atirador de primeira, e consegue acertar 2 ou 3 pessoas em frações de segundos. Boa sorte, herói!

locale.title: Basketball Nightmare
locale.synopsis:
The captain of the home town basketball team is leading his team to win the All-American Championships. But then the captain had a strange dream, nightmare in fact, where he was playing basketball against all these strange creatures in exotic locations.
Basketball Nightmare is a basketball game where the player plays basketball against strange humanoid creatures on the court where the creature lives. The player must play and defeat each creature before moving onto a new place with a new harder opponent. The player starts of playing against Wolfs in the Forest and then, upon defeating that opponent, moves on to play Frogs at the Pond, One Eyed Aliens at the Waterfall, Vampires in the Skeleton Cave, Geishas in the Bamboo Forest, before finally playing against Samurais at the Shrine. If the player loses a match then that match can be replayed until won.
The player at the start of each match gets to pick how long the match duration is out of the options of 15, 30, or 45 minutes (not in real time) before being placed on the court. When on the court the player always plays towards the right of the court. First the player tries to get the ball from a throw by a well timed button press. When the player has the ball the player has the option to move, pass the ball, and jump. When jumping the player can shoot, with the accuracy of the shot depending on the timing, or just simply pass. When defending the player can cycle through the field or just simply run into the opponent to challenge for the ball. There are a few penalties that the player can get including but not limited to Travelling (not passing after jumping), Charging (Sometimes called when the player with the ball runs into an opponent), and Pushing (Sometimes called when the player without the ball runs into an opponent) with all the penalties resulting with the other team getting the ball on the side of the court.
Also there are two more modes called CPU vs CPU, where the player can get the CPU to play itself and Versus Play to play against a friend. In both modes the player or players pick one of the 8 nations that are USA, CBA, CHN, JPN, URS, DDR, CAN, and FRN all with a character representing a player of that nation. All the rules are the same as single player mode.

Eres el capitán del equipo de baloncesto de la escuela secundaria Hometown. Ya han ganado torneos e intentan conquistar el Campeonato Nacional Americano de Escuelas Secundarias. Pero una noche tuviste un sueño verdaderamente extraño...

Basketball Nightmare est un jeu de basket-ball sur Master System. Le capitaine de l'équipe de basket de la ville a fait un étrange cauchemar : il jouait contre des créatures très étranges dans des endroits exotiques. Vous incarnez les joueurs de cette équipe et vous devez affronter ces créatures humanoïdes dans un match de basket-ball sur leur propre terrain.

Se você curte um bom jogo de basquete, prepare-se para algo novo e diferente. Basketball Nightmare traz um desafio que você provavelmente nunca enfrentou: 1 jogar basquete contra times de alienígenas! Você será o capitão do time da escola, um dos melhores times da região. Só que depois de ganhar todos os torneios possíveis, seu time foi desafiado para participar do mais estranho e mais difícil torneio de sua vida. Você vai ter ? pela frente seis times alienígenas, muito bem entrosados e com sede de vitória. Não vai ser fácil para você e seu time. Se vocês não estiverem num bom dia para os passes e arremessos, a derrota será certa pois seus adversários não costumam perdoar erros. Mas nós confiamos em você. Sabemos que você tem condições de levar nosso time à vitória, não deixando que um bando de alienígenas venha para a Terra e derrote nosso melhor time. Use toda sua habilidade e inteligência. Vamos lá campeão, encare este desafio e vença o Basketball Nightmare.

locale.title: Batman Returns
locale.synopsis:
From Sega 8-bit specialists Aspect comes one of many adaptations of Tim Burton's 1992 superhero sequel Batman Returns. Like other versions, it is a side-scrolling platformer. While very similar to the Game Gear version, the Master System version has slightly different levels and gameplay mechanics.
Batman must move through five stages on his way to defeat the Penguin. These include the streets and rooftops of Gotham City, Max Shreck's department store, the sewers, and the Penguin's lair. For the first four levels, a route can be selected from two options, allowing for different paths through the game.
Enemies standing in Batman's way can be defeated by throwing the Batarang at them. At the beginning, the weapon's range is very limited, but it can be expanded by collecting powerups. Other tools Batman can use are a grappling hook to pull himself up to higher levels or swing across dangerous areas, and his cape, which can be used as a parachute, for more control during falls.
Unlike in the Game Gear version, there is no health bar: a single hit will kill Batman. To compensate, the game contains a generous amount of extra lives.

¡Batman ha encontrado esta vez un trabajo que le sienta como anillo al dedo! ¡Existen tres problemas en la ciudad de Gotham con el Circo del Triángulo Rojo, la mujer Gata y el Pingüino diabólico en la unión que quiere tomar la ciudad! ¡Prepárese a luchar por su vida!

Dans Batman Returns sur Master System, vous défendez Gotham City et tentez de faire échouer les plans du Pingouin et ses hommes. Vous évoluez sur terre ainsi que dans les airs grâce aux gadgets que vous assignez à la ceinture de Batman.

Gothan City... uma cidade dominada pelo medo. Pinguim... a dura vida nos esgotou fez dele um verdadeiro monstro. Mulher-Gato... a mais traiçoeira de todas as felinas. Batman... nossa única salvação! Ninguém melhor que o Cavaleiro da» Trevas, com seu Bat-móvel, sua Bat-corda e muitos outros Bat-acessórioa para livrar a sombria Gotham das garras dos vilões. E eles estão por toda parte! Tudo começou quando o Pinguim e a Mulher-Gato dominaram a cidade. Os pobres cidadãos de Gothan, iludidos pelos perversos vilões, entregaram o poder e ficaram contra nosso herói. Santa encrenca! Será que as Forças do Mal irão vencer? É claro que não, pois VOCÊ irá ajudar Batman a liquidar todos os inimigos, um a um. Somente assim acabará o reinado de terror do Pinguim e a paz voltará a reinar em Gothan City. Ao ver a luz do Bat-sinal, prepare-se: esta tarefa não será nada Bat-fácil!

locale.title: Battle OutRun
locale.synopsis: Battle Out Run is Sega's answer to Taito's Chase H.Q. You drive a red sports car and must apprehend eight target vehicles in selected cities across the USA, including Los Angeles, Chicago, Miami, and New York. You have to do this while avoiding yellow cars and other obstacles. Halfway through the eight stages, you enter a shop that allows you to upgrade your car and get some nitros, as long as you have money, and you will be rewarded if you apprehend the vehicles. This can be done by bumping into them to disable them.

¡PISE A FONDO!nnY acelere en una prueba de costa a costa de resistencia, ingenio, y coordinación en este emocionante juego Out Run?. Persiga y capture a ocho de los más rápidos y peligrosos jefes del Sindicato sobre ruedas. Siéntese y tome con firmeza el volante. Y prepárese para aplastar, chocar, y abrirse el camino hacia la gloria.

Battle OutRun sur Master System est un jeu de courses dont l'objectif est d'appréhender des véhicules suspects dans huit villes différentes (Los Angeles, Miami, New York, Chicago...). Neutralisez les fuyards en leur rentrant dedans et améliorez les caractéristiques de votre véhicule entre les missions grâce à l'argent gagné.

Você é um policial à bordo de uma Ferrari. Seu objetivo é percorrer 8 localidades dos Estados Unidos e capturar 8 corredores safados que estão assustando os motoristas. Eles apostam rachas e não preocupam-se com a vida alheia. E começa a captura, você percorre uma estrada cheia de curvas e obstáculos além de ter vários carros andando para lá e para cá. O nosso maior atraso são os carros que trafegam em zigue-zague e você precisa ficar esperto/esperta para guiar a Ferrari de um jeito estratégico para não levar esbarrões e chegar até o oponente no menor tempo possível para ter mais tempo na hora de detonar o corredor.

game.name: Battlemaniacs

locale.title: Battlemaniacs
locale.synopsis:
The three battletoads Zitz, Rash and Pimple are in Tibet to witness the presentation of the Psicone Gamescape, a virtual reality machine. All of a sudden a monster jumps out of the gameworld, captures both the Psicone CEO's daughter & Zitz and takes them back into the Gamescape. Of course Rash and Pimple will have to enter the Gamescape and rescue them.
Battletoads in Battlemaniacs is another game in the Battletoads series by Rare. Much like its predecessor, it blends fighting game elements (in the style of Double Dragon) with other kinds of gameplay, like racing levels, "snake riding" levels and such. There are some bonus levels between some of the regular ones, where the player can collect extra lives.
Buddies can team up and defeat the opposition together in the two coop-modes available. In mode A, players can hit each other while in mode B, they can't.

Difícil Beat'em Up creado por Rare en el que unas ranas mutantes hiper-desarrolladas usan exagerados golpes para avanzar por diversas localizaciones, con algunas fases intermedias en el que los protagonistas usan vehículos y la mecánica de juego cambia en consonsancia para convertirse en una prueba de habilidad, reflejos y mucha paciencia dada la dificultad.

Battletoads in Battlemaniacs est une nouvelle aventure des trois guerriers crapauds. Zitz, Rash et Pimple assistent à la démonstration d'un jeu vidéo créé par Psicone Gamescape lorsqu'un des monstres du jeu surgit et kidnappe Zitz et la fille du PDG de Psicone. Rash et Pimple sautent alors eux aussi dans le jeu à la rescousse de leur frère. En éliminant tous les ennemis sur leur passage, ils tenteront de les retrouver.

Pimple e Rash, dois sapos muito "figuras", foram convidados para a apresentação de um novo video game do Professor T-Bird, o Gamescape - capaz de criar um mundo artificial de tão poderoso! Tudo corria bem até que a vilão do jogo, a abominável Dark Queen (ou Rainha das Trevas), entrou em cena, mandando seu súdito Porco do Apocalipse sequestrar toda a galera presente no evento a fim de torná-los seu serviçais. Chegou a vez de nossos heróis, os únicos que escaparam do sequestro, resgatarem todo o pessoal e acabarem com a graça da Rainha das Trevas. Mas a missão não é tão simples quanto parece, já que uma infinidade de discípulos de Dark Queen estão preparados para atacar e impedir os sapos de qualquer maneira!

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Berlin no Kabe
locale.synopsis: Each level consists of ladders and platforms. Each platform can be broken with your hammer. The goal of each level is to try to get the enemies to fall into the holes. When an enemy falls into a hole, you have a limited time go to that enemy and hit it again to destroy it. The level ends when all enemies are destroyed recreates blocks you already destroyed, in case you get stuck. At the end of every level you can go to a shop to buy things, a quick bonus stage, and then a boss.

Cada nivel consta de escaleras y plataformas. Cada plataforma se puede romper con su martillo. El objetivo de cada nivel es intentar que los enemigos caigan en los agujeros. Cuando un enemigo cae en un agujero, usted tiene un tiempo limitado para ir a ese enemigo y golpearlo de nuevo para destruirlo. El nivel termina cuando todos los enemigos son eliminados. Al final de cada nivel podrá ir a la tienda donde podrá obtener mejoras, una fase de bonificación, y luego un jefe final.

Conversion Homebrew des la version Game gear du jeu.Chaque niveau se compose d'échelles et de plates-formes. Chaque plate-forme peut être rompue avec votre marteau. Le but de chaque niveau est d'essayer d'amener les ennemis à tomber dans les trous. Quand un ennemi tombe dans un trou, vous avez un temps limité pour aller à cet ennemi et le frapper à nouveau pour le détruire. Le niveau se termine lorsque tous les ennemis sont détruits.

locale.title: Black Belt
locale.synopsis:
In this game, you play Riki. Kyoko, your beautiful Japanese girlfriend, has been kidnapped, and in order to rescue her, you must get through a tireless army of enemies. These enemies come equipped with weapons that include whips, knives, swords, and flamethrowers, but Riki has to make do with his well-trained martial arts body.
Black Belt is a side-scrolling game that is split into seven chapters. During these chapters, you are fighting Chinese Kung Fu men, wrestlers, jujitsu men, eagles, ninjas, and black women. When you get halfway through the chapter, you will fight a different enemy than one that you encounter before. At the end of each chapter, you have to defeat several bosses before continuing on to the next round. Each type of these has their own personal strengths and weaknesses.
Once you touch an enemy or boss, you will lose energy. once you lose all energy, you lose a life, but more life can be restored by getting the cake when it comes across the screen in mid-air, or by defeating an enemy that will come at you halfway and you receive a bonus for doing so.
Black Belt is a modified version of the Japanese-exclusive Hokuto no Ken, with the licence removed and new level designs.
Usted es un maestro del CINTURON NEGRO-uno de los mejores-y tendrá numerosas ocasiones para probarlo.

Adaptation sur console du terrible Ken le Survivant, Black Belt sur Master System vous fait enchaîner les niveaux du titre en affrontant un large panel d'ennemis prêts à tout pour vous stopper. Comme dans la série, Ken possède également ses super-coups !

É o jogo de caratê mais real que você já viu em uma tela de TV. A história se passa após uma guerra nuclear, e os bandidos e suas gangs estão levando a melhor. Use sua perícia de faixa preta para restabelecer a ordem. São vários rounds, onde você deve vencer os inimigos, líderes malignos. Cada um deles possui diferentes pontos fracos e fortes. Toda a sabedoria aprendida com os grandes mestres será necessária para acabar com a violência e restaurar a paz.

locale.title: Blade Eagle 3-D
locale.synopsis: Blade Eagle 3-D is a vertical shoot-em-up which has no story involved. You just have to shoot your way on three planets (you have to travel through space first), blasting as many enemies as possible. Along the way, there are several bosses that you have to defeat. The later ones drop a power-up, which you can use to upgrade your ship. Some of the power-ups include double shots and laser beams. Another power-up gives you the ability to have an extra ship on your side and will join the fight, and will later serve as a backup. Blade Eagle is designed for play in conjunction with the Sega 3-D Glasses. If you play without the 3-D glasses, it will look like as if there are two of your ships, not just one. If there are four enemies approaching you, they will look like eight.

Es una lucha a vida o muerte ... itú contra cientos de robots guerreros equipados con armas de rayos de partículas!nnTu misión: Aplastar al enemigo a través de los 9 niveles del terreno más increíblemente traicionero imaginable.

Blade Eagle : 3-D sur Master System est un shoot'em up où vous devez tuer autant d'ennemis que possible à travers trois environnements différents. Comme son nom l'indique, Blade Eagle nécessite l'utilisation de lunettes spéciales (lentilles vertes et rouges) pour voir le jeu en trois dimensions.

Tudo começou quando os diabólicos Arvians, ajudados por robôs programados para destruir, atacaram sem aviso. Em alguns dias, os três planetas do sistema solar foram arrasados. Só restou uma nave ilesa: a sua. Agora você é o único que tem o poder de libertar o sistema solar, com a sua nave Blade Eagle, a mais avançada e a mais temida do universo. Você precisará usar todos os artifícios possíveis, em 9 níveis de dificuldade, com fantásticos efeitos tridimensionais. As chances de vencer esta batalha contra os mais terríveis e ambiciosos inimigos do universo são" de 1 em 1 milhão.

locale.title: Block Hole
locale.synopsis: Unlicensed adaptation of the Konami game "Quarth".
Juego no licenciado el cual es una adaptación del juego Quarth de Konami.
Jeu Homebrew.Conversion de la version MSX du jeu Quark.Quarth est une combinaison de jeu de style Tetris et un jeu de tir fixe dans la tradition Space Invaders.

locale.title: Blockhead
locale.synopsis: Homebrew game
Juego amateur, no licenciado ni oficial.
Jeu Homebrew

locale.title: Bobble Bobble [Clover]
locale.synopsis: Unlicensed clone of Bubble Bobble.
Clon sin licencia del juego Bubble Bobble
Clone sans licence de Bubble Bobble.

locale.title: Bolas e Cores
locale.synopsis: Collect 2 or more balls of the same color and gain points to pass the stage and gain more time. How much morennbubbles you join at once only more points will win.nnnnIf time runs out and you have not scored enough points to pass, you lose.

Recoge 2 o más burbujas del mismo color y gana puntos para pasar el escenario y ganar más tiempo. Cuánto másnnLas burbujas se unen a la vez, solo ganarán más puntos.nnnnSi el tiempo se agota y no has conseguido suficientes puntos para pasar, pierdes.

Junte 2 ou mais bolas da mesma cor e ganhe pontos para passar de fase e ganhar mais tempo. Quanto mais nnbolhas você juntar de uma vez só mais pontos irá ganhar.nnnnSe o tempo acabar e você não tiver conseguido pontos suficientes para passar de fase, você perde.

locale.title: Bolhas
locale.synopsis: Collect 3 or more bubbles of the same color to eliminate them. In normal mode your goal is to prevent bubbles from touching the launcher.nnIn challenge mode your goal is to clear the screen before time runs out.

Añada 3 o más burbujas del mismo color para eliminarlas. En el modo normal su objetivo es evitar que las burbujas se apoyen en el lanzador.nnEn el modo desafío tu objetivo es limpiar la pantalla antes de que el tiempo acabe.
Junte 3 ou mais bolhas da mesma cor para eliminá-las. No modo normal seu objetivo é evitar que as bolhas encostem no lançador.nnNo modo desafio seu objetivo é limpar a tela antes que o tempo acabe.

locale.title: Bombeiro
locale.synopsis: Move the firemen to rescue the kittens that are jumping from the building.
Mueve a los bomberos para rescatar a los gatitos que están saltando del edificio.
Mova os bombeiros para resgatar os gatinhos que estão pulando do prédio.

locale.title: Bomber Raid
locale.synopsis: Fly your plane through five levels, shooting enemy planes, submarines, helicopters, and other enemies along the way, and use your equipped cluster bombs if necessary. You need to destroy a target that is outlined in your mission briefing. You have three lives and limited cluster bombs. To help you along the way, you can shoot a power pod to score points, increase your firepower, and gain some help from fellow squadrons.

¿Quién dispone de una velocidad de 6 Match, un imponente arsenal y unas ganas inaguantables de destruir carros de combate? Usted es la persona que tiene todo eso. Despegue con todo ese poder en sus manos en este extraordinario juego de bombardero.

Bomber Raid sur Master System est un shoot'em up où vous pilotez un avion de chasse et affrontez des chasseurs aériens, sous-marins, ainsi que des hélicoptères. Chacune des cinq missions est ponctuée par l'affrontement avec l'objectif principal, indiqué lors du briefing.

locale.title: Bonanza Bros.
locale.synopsis:
Mobo and Robo Bonanza are enjoying their favorite television show when the picture crackles and a shadowy figure of a mysterious stranger appears on screen. This figure asks them to collect certain items that he has placed inside various buildings to test his security force. If they return the items successfully, Mobo and Robo will be rewarded. The two of them state that they will get the job done in just three minutes. However, little do they know that each building is packed with security guards who will raise the alarm if they are caught red-handed. Fortunately both Mobo and Robo are equipped with bullets that can knock the guards unconscious for a few seconds. An $100 reward will be given out if Mobo and Robo are apprehended.
As either Mobo or Robo, you must collect all the treasures before leaving the ten buildings and shoot any security guards that get in your way. Remember that you are under a time limit. An in-game map will help you locate the treasures. There is a bonus stage after three buildings, where the object is to collect the gold bars in a limited amount of time without one of the three spotlights shining on you. If it is possible, hide behind open doors. If you manage to get all the gold bars, 10,000 points is added to your score. There are three of these bonus stages, but each of them varies.
Robo y Mobo, los infames y torpes ladrones, están metidos en problemas hasta el cuello. El Jefe de Policía los ha reclutado para limpiar la ciudad. Si fallan, ¡terminarán en la cárcel!

Bonanza Bros. sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes. Vous dirigez successivement Mobo et Robo, les deux frères Bonanza dans des missions d'infiltration pour tester le système de sécurité d'une entreprise. Pour ce faire, collectez tous les trésors et mettez hors d'état de nuire les gardiens dans le temps imparti.

Badville uma cidade aparentemente calma, um lugar como tantos outros. No entanto atrás desta fachada se esconde um cassino fraudulento, uma gráfica que produz dinheiro falso, e várias outras operações ilegais. Cansado de tentar acabar com essa sujeira, mas sem conseguir por falta de provas, o Chefe de Polícia teve uma idéia muito louca: chamar Robo e Mobo, os ladrões mais trapalhões do Oeste, para ajudá-lo! Agora e com você: entre nesta divertida aventura, arrisque seu pescoço junto com Robo e Mobo e pegue todas as provas que puder! Se você falhar, os Bonanza Brothers vão para trás das grades!

locale.title: Bonkers : Wax Up !
locale.synopsis:
Madame Who-Said has been coating famous Toons in wax to make statues for her Wax Museum, and the next victim will be Bonkers! Now he needs to stop her, free his pal Lucky and find the Toon Toaster to un-wax the Toons.
In this platform game, the player controls Bonkers through several levels where he must find 7 pickle clues. By pressing the pause button, a compass is shown, with the number of remaining clues and the direction of the next one. Bonkers can run (by holding button 1), jump (button 2) , duck and slide (by running and pressing the opposite direction on the d-pad).
Bonkers will find several items to restore his health (like cups of coffee, donuts, slices of pizza and badges) as well as some bonus items. He'll also find some of his friends, like Marylin, who'll show him the way to bonus levels, where he must find pieces of the Toon Toaster. In these bonus levels, Bonkers will ride a mine cart in a rail course, trying to collect items.
After a row of sub-levels, Bonkers will have to fight a boss, usually villains from the TV show.

Bonkers : Wax Up ! Es un juego de plataformas en el que manejas al personaje de Disney Bonker. Los dibujos animados han sido convertidos en muñecos de cera, por lo que deberás encontrar las piezas necesarias para poder restablecer su apariencia normal con ayuda de la "Tostadora Toon".

Bonkers : Wax Up ! sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes où vous incarnez le personnage de Disney Bonker. Les Toons ont été changés en cire, retrouvez donc les pièces du Toaster à Toons qui permettra de leur redonner leur apparence normale. Il vous faudra collecter des indices à chaque niveau pour espérer accéder au suivant.

Terror no mundo dos quadrinhos! Bonkers está numa enrascada... e você vai ter de ajudá-lo a se safar desta. Os mais famosos personagens do mundo dos quadrinhos foram aprisionados dentro de estátuas de cera para o bel prazer da perversa Madame Quem-Disse. E a próxima vítima pode ser Bonkers' Bonkers terá que se abaixar, rastejar, escorregar, pular e explorar um museu de cera cheio de armadilhas e perigos. Ajude Bonkers a se infiltrar nas terríveis instalações de Madame Quem-Disse e sua gangue - sem sé tornar uma estátua de cera viva! Siga a pista de picles deixada peto seu amigo Lucky pelas muitas fases deste divertido jogo. Ache e monte as peças da Toon Toaster e a use para acabar com os planos malvados de Madame Quem-Disse. As peças estão espalhadas por toda o museu!

locale.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
locale.synopsis:
Bram Stroker's Dracula is a side-scroller platform game loosely based on the 1992 film of the same name. Players take the role of Jonathan Harker whose mission to to destroy Count Dracula by first heading to Transylvania and then London.
Jonathan Harker can move left and right, jump and attack with a weapon, the most basic of which is a knife. The status display on the screen shows Harker's health bar, countdown timer to complete the level and currently held weapon. Throughout the levels question mark boxes (similar to the Mario games) can be found, attacking these will reveal power ups which include health restoration, timer increase and new weapons. Among these new weapons are axes, daggers and a shotgun. Question mark boxes can also be used as platforms to reach other areas and enemies. Each stage is divided into two sections: the "Daytime" and the "Nighttime". These are entirely different levels comparable to stage 1-a and 1-b. Harker must jump to various platforms and obstacles and defeat minor enemies throughout the levels. The end of a Nighttime level is usually guarded by a boss creature who must be defeated to progress.

En la oscuridad de la noche acecha a sus víctimas inconscientes con la pasión de un príncipe y la elegancia de una fiera. Es el Príncipe de la Noche y ha hechizado hipnóticamente a tu encantadora Mina Murray. Tú, Jonathan Harker, tienes que clavarle una estaca a esa sanguijuela para salvar a Mina de una suerte peor que la muerte: ser una vampiresa para siempre.

Bram Stoker's Dracula suit la trame du film de Francis Ford Coppola, sorti en 1992. Essentiellement axé jeu de plates-formes, ce titre vous fait contrôler le jeune avocat Jonathan Harker qui doit se défaire du comte Vlad Drakul pour sauver son amour Mina.

locale.title: Bruce Lee
locale.synopsis:
An attempt at recreating the classic Atari800/C64/Spectrum game "Bruce Lee" for the Master System.
Collect the lamps and fight Green Yamo and the Ninja!

Ce jeu est un homebrew, une tentative de portage du classique "bruce lee" sur atari 800/ commodore 64 et spectrum pour la master system. Bruce Lee est un jeu de plates-formes / Beat 'em up hybride, dans lequel le joueur contrôle Bruce Lee. Pour progresser, le joueur doit collecter un certain nombre de lanternes suspendues à différents points dans le jeu. Chaque chambre est gardée par deux ennemis mobiles, The Ninja et le Yamo vert, qui attaquent à coups de poings et coups de pied. Un mode multijoueur permet à un deuxième joueur de contrôler le Yamo, ou permet à deux joueurs à tour de rôle de contrôler Bruce Lee. Le Ninja et le Yamo sont également vulnérables aux dangers de l'écran, mais ont une quantité infinie de vies.

locale.title: Bubble Bobble
locale.synopsis:
Bubble Bobble is the story of two humans, Bub and Bob who wander into the mysterious cave of monsters and magically turn into dinosaurs. The only way to transform back is to reach the end of the cave...
Bubble Bobble is a platform game, with each level being a single screen. The enemies must be cleared from a level to go to the next one. With one player controlling Bub and the other controlling Bob, the player can jump and collect items for points (such as fruit). The real power Bub and Bob have however is the ability to blow bubbles. These bubbles can be as platforms to leap on, or to trap enemies. Enemies trapped in a bubble must be popped by jumping into them, wherein they'll turn to fruit. Additionally, power-ups sometimes float by in bubbles. They include lightning, which flies out horizontally at enemies, and water, which drags the player and enemies straight down flowing over platforms. Taking too long to complete any level will summon Baron Von Blubba, who will float around the screen trying to destroy the player.

¡Bienvenidos al mundo de Bubble Bobble! Esos divertidos diablillos. Bubblen y Bobblen están haciendo finalmente su aparición en el sistema Sega Master. Juegue este juego y vea las alocadas aventuras de Bubblen y Bobblen.

Bubble Bobble sur Master System est un jeu d'action dans lequel on incarne Bub et Bob, deux enfants transformés en dinosaures qui vont devoir sauver leurs fiancées des griffes de Bubbla. Le jeu se déroule sur des tableaux dans lesquels apparaissent des ennemis qu'il faut emprisonner dans des bulles avant de les faire exploser pour récupérer des points, tout en prenant en compte les courants d'air susceptibles de faire dévier les bulles, le tout sur une centaine de niveaux.

locale.title: Buggy Run
locale.synopsis:
Buggy Run is a game that lets players race dune buggies in a championship over 15 possible tracks (plus 4 in 2 player mode) each winning money that can be used for dune buggy upgrades. There are 4 different modes that can be played in single player mode that includes Race, Vs Com, Freerun, and Battle.
In the main mode Race the player is given $20,000 starting cash that can be used to upgrade the buggy. The upgradable features of the buggy are Tyres (grip), Engine (speed), Suspension (limits bounce), Steering (cornering), Transmission (performance). All the upgrades cost $10,000 for level 2, $30,000 for level 3, and $50,000 for level 4 however the player doesnt need to get them in order. There are also special upgrades to buy that includes $5000 for a mine (drops behind and if another car hits then it is blown up until reset), $5000 for Nitoro (gives the players car a short speed boost), and $10,000 for extra capacity of special items (starts with 2 slots to a max of 6). Special Items must be used in the order they're placed in the slots.
Within the race the player will be racing 4 other cars to a race to the chequered flag on an isometric scrolling track. Some hazards on the track are lumps and jumps, bumps, rough road and mud. Appearing on the track are special power-ups that are red or white boost and extra money also a random that selects between the two. The prize money for winning is $30,000, 2nd gets $20,000, 3rd gets $10,000, and last gets $5000 to spend on the upgrades and power-ups between races. There are 3 stages of racing that is beginner, intermediate, and expert that have 5 races each. The player must qualify for the next stage or else it will be game over.
In Vs Com the player plays the computer one on one on any track of the player's choice. All the upgrades for the buggy for the player and the computer are done though allocating a set number of points to varies upgrades. All the item slots can by used for either the nitoro or mine.
Freerun is a time trial where the player races alone without upgrades on any track against the clock.
Battle mode is where the player picks 3 computer players to battle on a round arena with the objective to knock the opponents off with the last player on the arena winning.
There is also a two players mode that include Race, 1P vs 2P, and Battle.
In 2P Race there is $30,000 for both players to upgrade there cars before placing them on a track with a fixed overhead view where they play 2 computer opponents. There are 4 different themes to pick from.
1P vs 2P is just the two players battling it out on one of 4 tracks each with 4 different themes. Buggy upgrades are done though allocating a set number of points.
Battle is the same as single player battle only with 2 players and 2 computers.

Sus neumáticos se deslizan sobre la grava, costandole unos preciosos segundos. Un contrincante patina en el interior de la pista. Usted mete el turboalimentador y vuelve a ponerse en cabeza, ¿pero podrá mantenerse así? ¡Más de 25 diferentes pistas! ¡Minas y otros peligros hacen el doble de excitante! ¡Esta es la vez que mejor lo ha pasado sobre cuatro ruedas!

Buggy Run est un jeu de course de petites voitures téléguidées très bien réalisé et super fun ! Vos pneus dérapent sur le gravier, vous faisant perdre de précieuses secondes. Un concurrent est éjecté hors du circuit. Vous enclenchez votre turbocompresseur et reprenez enfin la tête... mais pourrez-vous la garder ? Il y a plus de 25 circuits différents, et le terrain miné et d'autres dangers rendent ces courses deux fois plus passionnantes. C'est le plus grand divertissement que vous puissiez avoir sur quatre roues... télécommandées !

Buggy Run é a maior aventura sobre rodas que você ira conhecer. Perto destes malucos carros de corrida, você verá que correr de Fórmula 1 ou de Fórmula Indy é moleza. Guarde seu fôlego, pois as opções são muitas: você pode entrar num campeonato de 14 circuitos contra 3 outros aventureiros; correr entre minas explosivas e pilotos extremamente arrojados e ainda lutar contra o tempo. É só? Claro que não! No início do campeonato você recebe $50.000 para mexer no seu buggy (após tantos estragos ele certamente vai precisar) trocando pneus, suspensão, transmissão, comprando minas para explodir os adversários ou óxido de nitrogênio para multiplicar a potência do seu motor. Mas a melhor parte ficou para o fim. No modo Batalha, você irá competir contra 3 outros pilotos suicidas numa área escolhida pelo Master System, completamente rodeada de lava. Seu objetivo? Jogá-los no magma antes que eles façam o mesmo com você! Aperte os cintos e tente sobreviver!

locale.title: California Games
locale.synopsis:
California Games was the original "Extreme Games"  what today's generation might call "X-Games in the sun". Players can select sponsors (absent in some versions) and compete in events such as skateboarding, footbag, surfing, roller skating, flying disc (frisbee) and BMX. The surfing event is ranked by judges, which give a score to help the players improve their routine.
The Atari versions (2600 and Lynx) of the game omit the flying disc and roller skating events, while the Genesis version omits only the flying disc event.

¡Corre a las playas y compite por el trofeo deportivo más radical en la costa! California Games? te llevará al lugar de competición para que participes en el torneo de seis juegos. Practica o compite en uno, en varios o en todas las pruebas. Toma las gafas de sol y las sandalias, y no te olvides de la tabla hawaiiana. ¡Llegó la hora de empezar!

Avec California Games sur Master System revivez les années 80 avec ce jeu de sport multi-épreuves (ou "jeu de sport à plusieurs séries d'épreuves"). Exercez-vous au surf, au skateboard, au roller, au lancer de disque et à bien d'autres activités, seul ou contre vos amis (sept maximum). De quoi vous amuser pendant un moment !

locale.title: Jogos de Verão
locale.synopsis: Prepare-se para a diversão no seu video game! Os jogos de verão trazem a você o sol das praias e desertos da costa californiana. Participe dos esportes mais radicais do planeta. Manobre seu skate na pista Half Pipe. Drope a onda e faça manobras emocionantes no surf. Deslize sobre patins no calçadão à beira-mar ou realize saltos espetaculares na pista de bicicross. Teste seu domínio de bola nas embaixadas e sua concentração no Frisbee. Entre no mundo incrível dos esportes radicais. E tem mais: você poderá jogar sozinho ou até com 8 (oito) jogadores diferentes. Consagre-se um super campeão californiano! Então, o que você está esperando? Pegue sua prancha e experimente grandes sensações.

locale.title: California Games II
locale.synopsis:
California Games II is the sequel to the smash hit 1988 game.
This time you compete in: hang-gliding, jetski, skateboarding, body boarding and snow boarding.

Ármese de valor y llegue al limite de sus posibilidades con estos innovadores deportes de acción originarios de California. Demuestre su habilidad precipitándose velozmente alrededor de la pista de skateboard. practique body boarding sobre espumosas olas, planee sobre el océano y descienda por pendientes peligrosas haciendo patinaje en nieve.

California Games II est la suite du jeu de sport de glisse sur Master System. Surf, skate, snowboard, deltaplane j'en passe et des meilleures, vous permettent de passer du bon temps en vacances au soleil, comme si vous y étiez. Pour les moins paresseux, les épreuves permettent de tester ses performances en allant le plus vite possible ou en réalisant de belles figures.

Misture altas ondas, Half Pipes de outro mundo, asa-delta e surf na neve. Tempere com sol, praia, músculos e lindas mulheres. Agite bem e sirva, para até mais 7 amigos, na tela da sua TV. Não tem nada melhor!! O nome da receita é Jogos de Verão II, a continuação do mais famoso jogo de esportes de todos os tempos. A brincadeira começa num Half Pipe cheio de curvas e emoções. Nele você vai se exibir com aéreos, hand plants, ollies, loopings e muito mais. Ah!! Tome cuidado com os túneis. Se você der de cara com um deles, vai ter que vender o skate para pagar a plástica. Depois vem o bodyboarding, onde você vai deslizar nas ondas fazendo 360°, spins, cuts, tubos e desviar de um bando de banhistas que só atrapalham. Depois de se secar, você vai pegar sua asa-delta e desafiar a gravidade com mergulhos, loopings e giros de até 540°. Se você cair no mar, pode até sair nadando... se os tubarões deixarem algum braço ou perna para isso! Para terminar, um helicóptero vai largar você no topo de uma montanha de neve. Aí é só surfar, saltando precipícios e desviando de buracos, montes de neve e árvores. Prepare sua cabeça para as alturas, seu coração para a velocidade, libere a adrenalina e divirta-se!

locale.title: Canyon Racer
locale.synopsis: Homebrew game where you pilot a small plane through a canyon
Juego Amateur en el que el jugador debe manejar un pequeño avión y pilotarlo a través de un desfiladero.
Jeu Homebrew ou le joueur doit diriger un petit avion au travers d'un cayon

locale.title: Captain Silver
locale.synopsis:
In Captain Silver, you play the role of Jim, a brave young lad with a taste of adventure. You embark on a journey to find Captain Silver's secret treasure hoard, which is rumored to be hidden on an island in the Eastern Seas.
There are six scenes in the game. During his travels, Jim will explore villages, fight his way on board ships, venture through caves, and wander around tropical islands. In each of these six scenes, Jim must use his sword to kill cats, rats, bats, witches, skeletons, and other creatures that are waiting for him. When Jim touches, or is shot at, by a creature, he loses one of his lives, but when he kills a creature, he can collect some gold that they leave behind, which can be used to buy items from shops. However, rather than getting gold, enemies leave behind some gold containing one of the letters that spell the word "CAPTAIN SILVER". If Jim manages to get all of these letters, he will be awarded an extra life.
Jim may only use his sword to start off with, but once he collects a fairy that floats toward him in every scene, Jim will be able to shoot stars at enemies, making his kills more efficient. The maximum number of stars that he can have is six. There are other power-ups that Jim can collect in the game. These include the "clock" power-up, which gives Jim extra time; the "boot" power-up which allows Jim to jump higher; and the "coffee?" power-up, which enables Jim to shield himself from creatures until he is hit by one.
There is a boss in each scene, which he must defeat in order to proceed to the next round. There is also a certain time limit, which Jim must complete the scene before it expires. If he does not, then he will lose a life.

En el juego Captain Silver?, usted es Jim, un valeroso joven con espíritu de aventura, a punto de emprender un viaje en pos del tesoro secreto del Capitán Silver. Se rumorea que el tesoro está oculto en una isla de los Mares Orientales. Pero el viaje es peligroso: acechan incontables monstruos y piratas. ¿Puede usted abrirse camino hasta una riqueza que supera sus más descabelladas esperanzas?

Dans Captain Silver sur Master System, incarnez Jim, un jeune homme ayant le goût de l'aventure qui embarque dans une expédition à la recherche d'un trésor secret. Durant son voyage, traversez villages, jungles et bateaux pour atteindre les mers de l'est dans un jeu de plates-formes où le fait de collecter toutes les lettres de Captain Silver donne une vie supplémentaire. En avant, moussaillon !

Jack Avery é um garoto fascinado por tesouros e aventuras. Ele está no rastro de Captain Silver, o mais temido dos piratas sanguinários, na procura por um tesouro de imenso valor. Captain Silver está morto, mas isto piora ainda mais a situação. Seu fantasma continua a procura do tesouro perdido e fica furioso com quem tenta fazer o mesmo. Muitos homens fortes e valentes já foram parar em covas profundas. Mas você não tem medo de fantasmas... ou tem? Com um velho mapa nas mãos, você deve farejar e seguir as pistas, enfrentando inimigos vivos e mortos. Lute bem e sua espada terá um maior poder. Uma força especial permitirá que você fique invisível por algum tempo. No final, o grande confronto: você e o fantasma de Captain Silver! Ou você desfrutará pelo resto de sua vida as riquezas do tesouro, ou se juntará a estes seres de outro mundo.

locale.title: Casino Games
locale.synopsis:
In Casino Games the player can visit a Casino with $500 in the pocket where they spend it on casino games. The games come in 3 different categories that include card game, slot machine, and pinball.
After the player picks there gender and their surname they are greeted by the woman at the information desk. The player can then pick if they want to enter an account number if the player has played before. If not the default $500 is given and the player is on there way to play some games.
The categories and games available are:
Card Games Poker  The player plays one of the four CPU players available ranging from the easy player, Nancy, to the hardest player, Charley. The player is presented with a one on one game using the five-card-draw poker where the player, after playing the ante, can Bet, Pass, or Fold for a round, before replacing unwanted cards for the 2nd and final round of betting. The more skilled the opponent the harder it is to bluff them and they will try to bluff more themselves.
Blackjack  The standard game against the dealer where the objective is to score higher then the dealer to but not exceed 21 points for the value of all the players cards. The player can Hit (get another card) or Stand (keep the cards) . It uses the casino rules like Double Down (if the score lower then 12 then the player can double the bet but have a maximum of one more card), Split (turn two matching cards into 2 separate hands), and Insurance (player wins if the dealer gets 21 with two cards after playing extra). Bets can be between $10 and $100.
Baccarat  Player tries to beat the dealers score by using only the last digit of the total of the cards (i.e 10+4 = 4) if the score is under six then the player gets dealt one more card. If the players score is over six or seven then the dealer may get an extra card based on complex rules. Eight and above then no one gets an extra card. Bets can be between $10 and $100.
Slot Machine There are old standard fruit slot machines with 3 lines each. The player picks a slot machine that come in $1, $5, $25, $50, or $100 per token. There is one token per line to a maximum of 3 lines after which the player will be increasing the payout per line up to 3 times (9 tokens max). The payouts range from 1 Cherry (2 tokens) to Lucky Sevens (50 tokens).
Pinball: After choosing the table slope of Gentle, Middle, or Steep (slow to fast) the player is presented with a standard 3 ball pinball table named CASINOGAMES with drop-targets, bumpers, rollovers, and 2 levels of flippers. The plunger strength is based on timing and flippers are controlled by left and B. There is only one table to play is no money to be won.
There is no amount to play to, however, if the player runs out of money then it is game over. When the player has won an amount then they can get an account number to password save the game.

¿Eres lo suficientemente valiente para jugarte una fortuna a una carta? ¿Estás de suerte o quizás la suerte te ha dado la espalda? Casino Games pondrá a prueba tu suerte, tu técnica y tu valentía mientras haces tus apuestas para ganar una fortuna.

Casino Games est un jeu de réflexion sur Master System. Vous démarrez avec 500 dollars en poche que vous pouvez dépenser dans plein de jeux de casino : black jack, poker et roulette. Mais attention, ne soyez pas trop dépensier et reposez-vous surtout sur de la stratégie.

game.name: Castelo Rá-tim-bum

locale.title: Castelo R-Tim-Bum
locale.synopsis:
Pedro, Biba and Zequinha went to play in the Castle as they always do. Once inside, Zequinha went to the kitchen and saw a jug with some kind of juice inside it. Not thinking twice, he drank it, only to discover it was one of Dr. Vitor potions, which turned him into a baby once again! Now Pedro and Biba must find 4 ingredients to make an antidote to the potion.
Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum (Ra-Tim-Bum Castle) is an action/adventure game based on a quite popular educative Brazilian TV series, produced during the mid 90's but aired as late as 2007. The player can chose to play either Pedro or Biba to search for the ingredients through five levels. The main difference between the two is that Biba is a little faster than Pedro.
Each level involves some platforming and minor puzzle solving elements, like jumping over the right sequence of platforms, or finding food inside the kitchen's drawers in the right order. To enter each level, the player must choose the right door, based on the doorkeeper's tips.
The player has three lives and a health bar, and continues are available. All the text in game is in Portuguese.

Pedro, Biba y Zequinha fueron a jugar en el castillo como siempre lo hacían. Una vez dentro, Zequinha fue a la cocina y vio una jarra con algún tipo de jugo en su interior. Sin pensarlo dos veces, se lo bebió, sólo para descubrir que era una de las pociones del Dr. Vitor, que lo ha convertido en un bebé una vez más! Ahora Pedro y Biba deben encontrar 4 ingredientes para hacer un antídoto para la poción.nnnn¨Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum¨ (Castillo Ra-Tim-Bum) es un juego de acción / aventura basado en una serie brasileña educativa muy popular de TV, producida durante mediados de los 90, pero se emitió en una fecha tan tardía como lo es 2007, El jugador puede elegir jugar ya sea Pedro o Biba para buscar los ingredientes a través de cinco niveles. La principal diferencia entre los dos es que Biba es un poco más rápida que Pedro.nnnnCada nivel implica algún plataformas y elementos menores de resolución de puzzles, como saltar sobre la secuencia correcta de plataformas, o la búsqueda de alimentos en el interior los cajones de la cocina en el orden correcto. Para entrar en cada nivel, el jugador debe elegir la puerta correcta, basándose en los consejos del portero.nnnnEl jugador tiene tres vidas y una barra de salud, y continues disponibles. Todo el texto en el juego está en portugués.

Edro, Biba et Zequinha sont allés jouer dans le château comme ils le font toujours. Une fois à l'intérieur, Zequinha est allée à la cuisine et a vu une cruche avec une sorte de jus dedans.Sans réflechir il la bu ,pour découvrir que c'était une des potions de Dr. Vitor, qui l'a transformé en bébé encore une fois! Maintenant, Pedro et Biba doivent trouver 4 ingrédients pour faire un antidote.

locale.title: Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum
locale.synopsis: Pedro, Biba e Zequinha chegam ao Castelo e vão até o porteiro decifrar a senha do dia, como sempre o fazem para entrar neste mundo alegre e repleto de surpresas... Lá dentro, Zequinha se afasta de seus companheiros, divertindo-se com as invenções do Dr. Vitor, que estão espalhadas por todos os cantos. Tantas brincadeiras e descobertas acabam deixando-o com muita sede: ele vai até a cozinha e encontra uma jarra de suco de uva em cima da mesa. Sem pensar duas vezes, enche um copo e bebe inteirinho... Só que o conteúdo da jarra não era suco de uva! Na verdade, era uma poção desenvolvida pelo Dr. Vitor que fez com que Zequinha voltasse a ser um bebê! Com a choradeira, Nino aparece e, imaginando o que aconteceu, convida você a resolver o problema imediatamente. E o informa que o antídoto para reverter os efeitos da poção é formado por quatro ingredientes raros, nada fáceis de achar. Agora, no papel de Biba ou Pedro, você terá que encontrar esses ingredientes e fazer Zequinha voltar ao normal antes que todos percam a paciência com tanto choro!!

game.developer: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.
game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

game.name: Castle Of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse

locale.title: Castle of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse
locale.synopsis:
Sega's 8-bit systems received their own version of the Genesis' popular Disney platformer. Story and themes remain the same, but the game has unique levels and slightly different gameplay mechanics.
To save his girlfriend Minnie from the evil witch Mizrabel, Mickey Mouse must venture into the Castle of Illusion. Crossing six levels (including a magical forest, a toy land and a candy world), he must collect the gems of the rainbow in order to confront and defeat the witch.
Each level features unique obstacles, enemies and a final boss. The enemies can be defeated by jumping on top of them. An alternative way is to pick up objects lying around (like rocks in the forest or blue balls in the toy level) and throwing them at the enemies. Mickey's ability to pick up things and carry them around also leads to puzzle-oriented gameplay. By placing objects in the right spot and jumping off of them, he can get to areas otherwise out of reach. In some levels, he also has to collect keys to open doors. A unique type of object is the treasure chest - by jumping on top of one or throwing it, Mickey gets access to its contents, which might include extra lives, a health power-up or coins to collect for points.

¡Ha empezado la búsqueda! Mickey está iras la pista de una malvada bruja'llamada Mizrabel, que ha raptado a Minnie. Mickey tendrá que encontrar siete joyas escondidas en las cámaras fantásticas del Castillo del Engaño de Mizrabel y emplearlas para salvar a Minnie. ¿Podrá Mickey encontrarlas? ¡Todo depende de usted!

Castle of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes où vous devez sauver Minnie des griffes de la sorcière Mizrabel. Incarnez Mickey dans cette aventure où chacune des portes du château renferme bien des surprises.

A busca começou! Mickey está perseguindo a bruxa malvada chamada Mirzabel, que raptou Minie. Mickey deve encontrar 7 gemas preciosas escondidas nas câmaras fantásticas do Castelo da Ilusão de Mirzabel e usá-las para salvar Minie. Poderá Mickey achá-las? Só depende de você!

locale.title: Cava Cava
locale.synopsis: You must collect all the money buried in your garden and catch the thieves using their traps!nnBut beware of dangerous objects!
Usted debe recoger todo el dinero enterrado en su jardín y coger a los ladrones usando sus trampas!nnPero cuidado con los objetos peligrosos!
Você deve recolher todo o dinheiro enterrado em seu jardim e apanhar os ladrões usando suas armadilhas!nnMas cuidado com os objetos perigosos!

locale.title: Champions of Europe
locale.synopsis: Titled as the official Game of UEFA 1992 this Game is an arcade Top Down Soccer Game in which the Player competes against the best European Soccer Teams to become the European Champion. The Game includes 4 different Game Modes for example Goalkeeping, Penalty Practice or the UEFA Tournament Mode. You can choose between 34 different Teams to play with. Before beginning a Match you can select and change many Pre-Play Options in the Main Menu. Examples are the Wind Speed, Weather or the Time per half. There are 8 Referees available, each one with individual Behaviour. The Game is controlled with 2 Buttons and the 8 directional D-Pad.

Ha llegado el momento de ser un Campeón!nnJuegue en contra de los mejores equipos de fútbol de Europa para 1992. Acción rápida, opciones variadas, controles por 'instinto' y superanimación hacen de CAMPEONES DE EUROPA. el juego oficial de la UEFA'92!

Champions of Europe sur Master System est un jeu de football où vous pouvez prendre les commandes d'une des équipes participant au championnat d'Europe des nations. En match amical ou lors des phases finales, emmenez votre équipe favorite vers la victoire.

Ir para o futebol europeu é o sonho de qualquer craque brasileiro. Agora, se para o Zico, o Sócrates e o Falcào já foi difícil, imagine para você, perna-de-pau. É por isso que o Master System trouxe Champions of Europe, a sua grande chance de ser um craque nos gramados da Europa. Champions of Europe é um retrato fiel da copa da UEFA, uma emocionante competição entre as melhores seleções europeias. E você pode ser qualquer uma delas. Quer jogar com o Van Basten? Seja a Holanda. Com o Baggio? Seja a Itália. Faça chuva ou faça sol as partidas vão rolar e você não vai poder fugir da raia. Estratégias de posicionamento em campo, faltas, escanteios, dribles, cruzamentos e pênaltis. São detalhes como esses que tornam o jogo tão emocionante. O craque do time já declarou à imprensa: "Nós treinamos bastante, estamos tranqüilos e, se tudo der certo, vamos sair daqui com os dois pontos". Brilhante, não? Depois dessa, só resta arrasar no campeonato. Parece tão legal quanto o futebol de verdade? Pode ser até mais, só depende de você!!

locale.title: Championship Hockey
locale.synopsis:
Championship Hockey is an Ice Hockey game where players can play International level matches between the 22 available nations in ether in one match or elimination playoffs.
The game is played from a birds eye view from over the top one side of the hockey rink's goals with a camera that scrolls up and down the length of the hockey rink. The player can play 5, 10, or 20 minute periods (3 in each game, not done in real time). There is a total of 6 players on the ice for each team, five that the player can take control of plus the CPU controlled goaltender. When the player hasn't got the puck the player can cycle though the available players or make the selected player move faster. To challenge the opponent for the puck, all the player has to do is be near the player with the puck. When the player is in control of the puck the player has the option of shooting for a goal or passing to another player. If the player has the penalties option turned on, penalties like Cross Check (pushing an opponent into the wall), Hooking (holding a player back), Roughing (striking another player) result in a player been sent of for 2 game minutes.
There are 3 game modes available been Regular Season, New Playoff, and Best Of 7. Regular season is one match between two countries of the player's choice. New Playoff is where 16 teams play in an elimination contest where the last team standing wins (4 games total). Best Of 7 is where 16 teams play and the first team to get 4 victories wins.

Compite en un partido de hockey súper realista, con toda la frenética acción de Championship Hockey: patinaje maestro, contundentes faltas de cuerpo y fulminantes slap shots.
