As Ecco, you are the only dolphin who managed to escape from a giant whirlpool which sucked down your entire pod. The five shining stars on your forehead show that you are the chosen one to save them. But that task will be not be an easy one, as you will have to travel through time and space with the Atlantean time machine, and meet the mystical Asterite in order to defeat the Vortex Queen.

Nuestro protagonista, Ecco (un joven delfín Mular) presencia el secuestro de su manada sin poder hacer nada. Comienza entonces una persecución a través del tiempo en su búsqueda, dando inicio así a la aventura.nn

Ecco the Dolphin sur Master System est un jeu d'action qui a l'originalité de mettre le joueur aux commandes d'un dauphin. L'histoire débute lorsque Ecco assiste impuissant à la disparition de tout l'écosystème, emporté par une mystérieuse tempête. 25 niveaux durant, explorez les abîmes et résolvez de nombreuses énigmes afin de ramener le calme au sein de la crique.

Ecco era um golfinho feliz e esperto, um líder entre seus semelhantes. Um dia, o céu ficou mais negro que a noite, o mar se enfureceu e os ventos misturaram tudo como se fosse um enorme liquidificador. Agora Ecco está quase só em seu reino. Cabe a ele descobrir o que houve e para onde foram todoa os seus amigos. Para isso ele viajará até as profundezas oceânicas, aventurando-se por cavernas submersas, enfrentando arraias, tubarões, águas-vivas e todos os perigos que surgirem em seu caminho. Suas armas serão seu bico e seu canto. Através do canto, Ecco irá se comunicar com baleias e golfinhos, decifrar os enigmas que os misteriosos cristais encerram e montar um mapa das regiões ao seu redor. O mar é a parte da Terra que o Homem menos conhece. Não tema o desconhecido e embarque com Ecco nessa grande aventura!

locale.title: Enduro Racer
locale.synopsis:
In this game you play the role of an endurance bike racer. The gameplay involves you racing against the clock to get to the finish line and jumping over ramps. At the end of each race you get points for how many cars or bikes you have overtaken with which you can upgrade your bike. There are various different terrain for you to race on including desert beach and dirt tracks plus a number of things to slow you down or even knock you off of your bike all together. The main idea is to find the best route through each level to shave off valuable seconds in order to over take more cars and bikes.
The Japanese version of the game has more Tracks than the European and US versions have. Among them is a snow track which is one of the hardest tracks in the game, because there is a lot of stones on the thin road.

Vuele sobre las barreras, vuélquese en las esquinas, en un una carrera contrar reloj. Por caminos desiertos, con barro y nieve... empleando técnicas de acceleración, saltos y caidas. Todo ello sobre un fondo moviéndose diagonalmente con efecto sorprendentemente tridimensional.

Enduro Racer sur Master System est un jeu de courses où vous prenez les commandes d'une moto tout terrain. Les courses se déroulent dans des environnements variés tels que la forêt, la montagne, une île ou le désert. A moto ou en voiture, les adversaires rencontrés ne vous font pas de cadeau et chaque véhicule doublé rapporte des points convertibles en amélioration de votre moto.

locale.title: Excellent Dizzy Collection
locale.synopsis:
Three complete games starring game superstar Dizzy! Enjoy the thrill of an arcade action game, a puzzle game and a complete adventure game all in one pack!
1. Dizzy the Adventurer - Adventure Game Here's Dizzy - in an amazing magical quest packed with action, mystery, surprises and lots of new interesting characters. Escape from an underground cave and wake Daisy from the endless sleep caused by pricking her finger on a cursed spinning wheel! The spell can only be broken by a kiss from a Prince! A great sense of humour and brilliant fun! A superbly crafted cartoon adventure set in a magical kingdom! Brilliant graphics, music and a magical quality that will enchant players. "A magical quest to wake Daisy from her endless sleep"
2. Panic Dizzy - Puzzle Game It's puzzling, challenging and mega playable! Play any of the Yolfolk and challenge friends to a choice of 3 brilliant, original puzzle games. There's shape shifter, dizzy dice and picture puzzler to boggle your mind and blow your brain. Push and shoot the descending shapes in a race against time! Fantastic fun! "Put your brain & reflexes in to top gear for 3 original puzzle games!"
3. Go Dizzy Go! - Action Game It's Dizzy and Daisy to the rescue in this zany arcade challenge. Zaks' treacherous worlds are jam packed with all sorts of nasties. Power-Ups and Special secrets! Take up the challenge in single mode or two player mode. Classic maze style game with 5 worlds each containing 5 levels. Superb graphics, funky music and exciting gameplay! "Dash around weird and wonderful worlds to free the yolkfolk!"

Nos encontramos con una compilación de tres juegos de diferentes género, pero todos protagonizados por Dizzy. En primer lugar nos encontramos con Dizzy the Adventurer, que es un juego que combina las plataformas y la aventura a partes iguales que viene a ser una versión mejorada de Dizzy Prince of the Yolkfolk, que salió un poco antes. Los que conozcan Fantastic Dizzy se encontrarán con unn juego similar. El segundo juego es Panic Dizzy, que es un juego tipo puzzle con la mecánica típica de un Tetris o un Columns, es decir, de agrupación de piezas. El último juego también es tipo puzzle y se titulo Go! Dizzy Go!, aunque es muy diferente, siendo un arcade donde tenemos que recorrer laberintos con un estilo muy similar a Adventures of Lolo.
Trois jeux complets avec la superstar Dizzy! Profitez du plaisir d'un jeu d'arcade, d'un jeu de puzzle et d'un jeu d'aventure complet en un seul pack!

game.name: F-1 Spirit - The Way To Formula-1

locale.title: F-1 Spirit - The Way to Formula-1
locale.synopsis: F-1 Spirit: The Way to Formula-1 is a racing video game by Konami, originally intended for the MSX range of computers. It was brought to the Sega Master System without a license by Zemina and released exclusively in South Korea. The Master System version runs in the graphics mode intended for SG-1000 games.
Juego de carreras con vista aérea donde podrás manejar diferentes tipos de coches (rally, Formula 3, F1, .....) a través de 16 circuitos diferentes.

Ce jeu de course vu d'en haut comporte différents types de voitures. Tout commence avec des voitures de séries puis le Rallye et formule 3. L'objectif principal est de terminer à la première place avec la formule 1, catégorie reine de la course. Il existe six types de courses : course, rallye,F3, F3000 , Endurance, et enfin les courses de F1 (16 pistes).

locale.title: F-16 Fighter
locale.synopsis:
In this game, you are flying the F-16 Fighting Falcon, the most advanced jet fighter in the world. In this carefully crafted simulation, your mission is to take down all enemy jets and remain airborne as possible.
You are equipped with your standard gun, plus some missiles that you can use to take them down. There are ten levels. The number of missiles you have vary between each level. Furthermore, each level is difficult than the last with more enemy jet fighters that you have to take down.

Usted se encuentra a punto de tomar el control del Halcón F16, el caza más moderno del mundo. En esta simulación cuidadosamente diseñada, su misión es descubrir y destruir aviones enemigos y permanecer en vuelo el mayor tiempo posible.

F-16 Fighter est une simulation de combats aériens où vous prenez les commandes de l'avion de chasse le plus sophistiqué au monde. 10 missions à difficulté progressive vous permettent de faire usage de votre canon et de vos missiles lors de duels aériens endiablés. L'erreur est proscrite si vous ne voulez pas piquer du nez les ailes en feu.

Prepare-se para tomar Os controles do F-16 Fighter, o mais avançado caça de combate do mundo, capaz de atingir velocidades superiorres a 1400 milhas por hora e altitudes de 59000 pés. Neste verdadeiro simulador de combate, você vai ter como missão localizar e destruir todos os inimigos que surgirem no seu rodar. Para isso, você estará armado com mísseis, uma metralhadora de 20mm e principalmente com sua habilidade. Seus inimigos pilotam caças do tipo MIG-25, aeronaves equivalentes á sua, e capazes de destruí-lo, com suas potentes armas, caso suas manobras evasivas não sejam perfeitas. Se você quiser chegar com vida ao final desta missão, não tire os olhos dos instrumentos de seu avião, pois é através deles que você vai controlar todos os seus movimentos. Será que você tem condições de derrotar seus hábeis inimigos? É o que vamos ver. Aperte os cintos e decole para a maior missão de sua vida. Prove que você é realmente um ás da aviação!!!

locale.title: F1
locale.synopsis:
F1 is an Official Formula One Racing Game. There are two modes of play available: "Arcade", "Grand Prix". In both of these modes you complete a certain number of laps (4, 8, or 12) and select which circuit that you want to race on. The circuits include San Marino, France, Britain, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Japan, and Australia. Some circuits are easy, while some are difficult.
There are slight differences between the two modes. For instance, "Arcade" allows you to select the circuit in any order that you like, whereas "Grand Prix" only allows you to fine-tune your car before starting a race. You also need to race a circuit in the order that they appear on the circuit selection screen, but you can skip a track if you want.
F1 is a 1-2 player game, meaning that if you have another player handy, you can compete against each other.

F1 es un Juego Oficial de Carreras de Fórmula Uno. También es el más rápido, reaslista y emocionante hecho para Master System en su género hasta el momento. Compite en los circuitos de Fórmula Uno reales contra los equipos de verdad y los auténticos pilotos del Campeonato de Fórmula Uno de la FIA.

F1 sur Master System dispose des circuits officiels du championnat du monde de l'époque, chacun avec ses difficultés inhérentes. Vous pouvez choisir d'effectuer, seul ou à deux, de 4 à 18 tours. Le mode Arcade vous permet de choisir le circuit sur lequel vous souhaitez tester vos talents de pilote tandis que le mode Grand Prix suivra l'ordre des courses du championnat du monde FIA.

Prepare-se para entrar no mais seleto grupo de pilotos de corrida: o circo da Fórmula 1. Aqui você vai ganhar milhões de dólares para fazer o que mais gosta - pilotar estas máquinas incríveis - mas vai ter que tomar muito cuidado para não se esborrachar numa curva. Fórmula 1 traz 2 modalidades incríveis de corrida: No Arcade cada nova pista é uma luta para melhorar sua posição no grid - igual ao fliperama! Já em Grand Prix até dois jogadores podem participar do Campeonato Mundial de Fórmula 1. Fórmula 1 oferece a você os autódromos de Imola, Magny Cours, Silverstone, Hockenheim, Monza, Estoril, Suzuka e Adelaide. Em cada um destes circuitos você poderá fazer modificações nas asas, câmbio, motor e pneus do carro, adaptando-o melhor ao traçado. Para vencer na Fórmula 1 você terá de sentir o efeito que cada freada, reduzida ou acelerada provoca no carro; fazer cada curva com a naturalidade de quem já a conhece desde pequeno. Vista seu macacão, coloque o capacete, aperte o cinto e pise fundo nesse acelerador!

locale.title: FA Tetris
locale.synopsis: Released only in South Korea. It is unknown whether the publishers had a license to do so. The game runs in the graphical mode reserved for SG-1000 compatibility
Juego de salida exclusiva al mercado coreano, el cual es una versión no oficial del Tetris.
Version non officielle de Tetris sortie uniquement en Corée.

locale.title: Fabrica de Chocolate
locale.synopsis: You are a visitor to this crazy factory and must eat all the chocolates to win the game,nnBut be careful! Some chocolates are spoiled.
Usted es un visitante de esta fábrica loca y debe comer todos los chocolates para vencer el juego.nnPero cuidado! Algunos chocolates están estropeados.
Você é um visitante desta fábrica maluca e deve comer todos os chocolates para vencer o jogo,nnMas cuidado! Alguns chocolates estão estragados.

locale.title: Fantastic Dizzy
locale.synopsis:
The evil wizard Zaks has cast a spell on the peaceful Yolkfolk, and while many fell under his spell, others have other problems to deal with, including Dizzy, who saw his girlfriend Daisy kidnapped and taken hostage by Zaks, and it's up to him to restore the Yolkfolk to normal and rescue Daisy from the top of the Cloud Castle's tower.
The most technically-advanced of Dizzy's adventure games in many ways, it was the only one to feature actual scrolling rather than a flick-screen system, the only one not to be released for the 8 bit computers the character originated on, the only one to originate on a console, as well as featuring many mini-games, such as Bubble Dizzy and an Operation Wolf clone.
Gameplay involves walking Dizzy through the levels, picking up objects and using them to solve simple puzzles. There are plenty of tests of arcade skill along the way as well, as gaps must be jumped and baddies avoided - starting with a limited number of lives, the player can earn more by completing Theodore's puzzle. Before rescuing Daisy the player must capture all stars that unlock the gates of the tower.

Esta es la aventura animada de Dizzy en Zakeria. Explora las misteriosas minas de diamantes, las fabulosas cavernas, la guarida del dragón y el castillo en las nubes. Te encontrarás con extraños magos, brujos, trolls, piratas, duendes y muchas otras criaturas extraordinarias.

Fantastic Dizzy est un jeu de plates-formes/aventure sur Master System. Le méchant magicien Zaks a jeté un sort à tous les habitants du village et a kidnappé la fiancée de Dizzy. Le but du joueur sera bien évidemment de la récupérer mais également de sauver les villageois. La jouabilité repose sur un mélange de plates-formes et d'énigmes à résoudre (en ramassant différents objets et en les utilisant au bon endroit).

locale.title: Fantasy Zone
locale.synopsis:
The Fantasy Zone is a solar system consisting of eight brightly colored, fantastic planets. The evil Menons are trying to take over all of the planets in the Fantasy Zone by using misappropriated foreign currency to build their forces. It is the player's job to recover all of the coins and save the solar system!
Fantasy Zone is an arcade style shooter for one or two players. The goal is to destroy all of the creatures on each planet and collect as many of the lost coins as possible. At the end of each level is a large enemy that will have to be defeated before moving on to the next world. At various points in the game, the player will be able to find a parts shop, which allows purchasing improvements for his spaceship, including better weapons and faster engines.

En el año espacial 6216 el Fantasy Zone fue lanzado en pánico ante el colapso del sistema monetario interplanetario. El Gremio Espacial saca a la luz los planes del planeta Menon, cuyas fuerzas están robando monedas de los otros planetas para financiar una enorme fortaleza en el Fantasy Zone. Opa-Opa es enviado para detener al ejército invasor y descubrir quién está detrás de él.
Fantasy Zone es un shooter para uno o dos jugadores. El objetivo es destruir todas las criaturas de cada planeta y recoger tantas monedas como sea posible. En algunas ocasiones el jugador encontrará tiendas donde poder comprar mejoras para su nave, incluyendo mejores armas y motores más rápidos.

Fantasy Zone est un shoot'em up sur Master System. Vous incarnez un vaisseau spatial, assailli par de nombreux ennemis volants non identifiés. Le jeu n'est pas linéaire et vous permet de vous déplacer vers la droite ou la gauche pour aller traquer de l'alien. Le design est coloré et les monstres originaux.

locale.title: Fantasy Zone : The Maze
locale.synopsis:
Sega decided to make their last game in the Fantasy Zone series different. You see, the gameplay now involves you going around mazes, collecting all the dots while avoiding enemies. You are awarded points for each dot collected, but they vary depending on their size. For example, small dots award ten points each, while you get 200 points for each larger dot you collect. Once you have collected all the dots in the maze, the enemies will turn into coins, which you must quickly get in a strict time limit and you move on to the next maze. Just before this, though, you get a statistics screen that shows the amount of time that you spent in the maze. Points are also awarded, but sadly, if you spent over sixty seconds in a maze, you won't get any.
Every world you travel to consist of three mazes, and after you complete all three, a bonus round appears where the object is to collect all coins before time expires. While you are collecting the dots in the normal mazes, you must touch the enemy's energy, a flashing red spot within each maze to avoid 2nd-generation enemies from entering the mazes. Some power-ups can be collected, which consist of weapons and speed boosters (big wings), which can be collected by landing on the circle which it is in. However, you need money in form of the amount outlined just before each maze. If you land on a circle while you are short of cash, a 'NO SELLING' sign will appear above it, and you have to collect some more dots and try again.
Also you can die by touching an enemy. When you die, a coin will take you place, and when you get resurrected, you can grab the coin. The game can be played with two players, but the same rule applies in a 2-player game.

Los malditos Menons han regresado. Y ahora son más inteligentes, rápidos y fuertes que antes. ¿Podrá Opa-Opa junto con su hermano pequeño Upa-Upa derrotarlos esta vez? Conduzca a nuestros amigos a través de docenas de complicaos laberintos. Recupere las monedas robadas y compre con ellas nuevas armas de las que dependerá su vida. . .o su muerte. La Zona Fantástica depende de usted. No les defraude.

Fantasy Zone : The Maze sur Master System est un jeu d'action. Vous pilotez un vaisseau dans des labyrinthes et devez collecter autant de billes que possible tout en évitant les ennemis qui rôdent. L'objectif est de terminer rapidement le niveau, si possible en moins de 60 secondes. Chaque monde est constitué de trois niveaux classiques auxquels s'ajoute un niveau bonus.

Junte-se ao Opa-Opa neste Fantasy Zone! Você encontrará toda ação e aventura que fazem de Fantasy Zone um sucesso... Os terríveis Menons retornaram em naves de vários níveis e estão escondidos em sete planetas diferentes! O corajoso Opa-Opa foi chamado para combater a ameaça. E junto está seu irmão, o Upa-Upa. Sua missão: guiar o time dos valentes irmãos, nível após nível, através de labirintos traiçoeiros. Pegue as moedas de ouro roubadas pelo mercador Menon e use-as para adquirir armas super poderosas. Fantasy Zone conta com você para esta missão. Não o decepcione.

locale.title: Fantasy Zone II
locale.synopsis:
Fantasy Zone II: The Tears of Opa-Opa is the sequel to Fantasy Zone, in which you control Opa-Opa, a pretty colored ship with wings on its side. You must destroy the large creatures in each world before moving on to the next. Your task becomes difficult by other small creatures that happen to pass by. If you destroy a large creature, they will drop a dollar bill, which you can pick up and use at the shop to buy items and powerful weapons such as laser beams, x-way shots, and big wings. Another way to get money is to shoot certain kinds of enemies all in a row.
More often than not, some large creatures will reveal a warp gate rather than a dollar bill. You can go through the warp gate to get to another part of the land, and destroy more large creatures. Only one of them will have a warp gate in the form of a 'stop' sign - that is your ticket to the round boss, but you must defeat all large creatures in order to pass through it. Also like in the original can you walk on the ground to avoid approaching enemies, and spend money in the shop to get new weapons (but they only last for a limited time).

Fantasy Zone II: The Tears of Opa-Opa es la secuela de Fantasy Zone donde tu controlas a Opa-Opa, una pequeña nave coloreada con alas y armada con bombas y misiles que deberá evitar a los enemigos o aplastarlos para mantenerse con vida y terminar el nivel.

Fantasy Zone II sur Master System est un jeu de tir dans lequel vous contrôlez un vaisseau spatial. Muni de différentes armes telles que des bombes ou des missiles, évitez ou anéantissez les ennemis pour rester en vie et finir le niveau.

locale.title: Fantasy Zone II - The Tears of Opa-Opa
locale.synopsis: Opa-Opa, o grande herói, está de volta, só que desta vez numa missão ainda mais perigosa. Bem-vindos ao Fantasy Zone II, onde o perigo é grande, mas a recompensa é maior. A paz está ameaçada e os inimigos, os Blackhearts, são muito mais terríveis. Tome cuidado com criaturas inocentes que se aproximam de você. Na verdade, estão do lado do inimigo, e farão tudo para impedí-lo de cumprir a sua missão. Fantasy Zone II: uma grande emoção.

locale.title: Fantasy Zone II : Opa-Opa no Namida

locale.synopsis: Port del juego Teddy Boy.
Le portage d un jeu d'arcade mettant en vedette un garçon nommé Felipe tuant tout ce qui ose l approcher.

locale.title: FIFA International Soccer
locale.synopsis:
The game that started the best-selling series licensed by football's world governing body, this first installment in the long running series used a dimetric (colloquially known as "isometric") viewpoint, previously unusual in football games but quickly imitated by several titles. The televisual presentation, one of the unique points of the early EA Sports titles, with hosts introducing the matches, was another thing making the game stand out from a market dominated by Sensible Soccer and Kick Off games.
Based on international teams (with fictional player names), their abilities in each skill area rated out of 10 to give the player an overall impression of how good they are. The options available follow the standard set: fouls and offsides can be toggled on and off, the match length can be set, and if the timer operates continuously, or only while the ball is in play. Gameplay privileges quick runs, short passes and blistering shots outside the penalty box, and set pieces are controlled by moving a box into the target area for the ball, and then passed, lobbed or kicked directly. On the tactical side, formations can be selected, with 5 different strategies also available (although not all of these combinations make sense) as can the team Coverage - the areas which defenders, midfielders and strikers cover.

¡Lo mejor del fútbol internacional! ¿Quién podría participar en la creación de un cartucho realmente fiel al deporte más practicado del mundo? Con certeza, quien entiende mucho de fútbol y dicta las reglas del juego para todos los países: la FIFA! Ahora usted podrá sentir las emociones del campeonato mundial, con más de 50 selecciones jugando entre sí en estadios llenos y con la hinchada gritando para valer!

FIFA International Soccer sur Master System est une simulation de football. Premier titre de la série la plus vendue au monde, FIFA donne la possibilité à 1 ou 2 joueurs de prendre le contrôle d'équipes nationales et internationales lors de matches amicaux, de tournois ou de championnats. Privilégiant les courses et passes courtes, le jeu permet d'adopter une stratégie parmi 5 au choix afin de mieux contrer le jeu de l'adversaire.

O melhor do futebol internacional! Quem poderia participar da criação de um cartucho realmente fiel ao esporte mais praticado do mundo? Com certeza quem entende muito de futebol e dita as regras do jogo para todos os países: a FIFA! Agora você poderá sentir as emoções do campeonato mundial, com mais de 50 seleções jogando entre si em estádios lotados e com a torcida gritando para valer!

locale.title: Fire & Forget II
locale.synopsis:
Part two in the Fire and Forget series, best described as Crazy Cars (also by Titus) with weapons in a futuristic setting. This game combines the genres action and driving.
In each of the five levels you need to blow your way to the front of the death convoy and shot down the leader of a group of terrorists, who plans to blow up a city. Your machine of destruction is a car with the ability to fly.

¡Con FIRE & FORGET 2, usted va a tener que prepararse a vivir lo más extraordinario de los juegos de arcada nunca antes concebido para una consola! Usted deberá pilotear el THUNDER MASTER II, que desarrolla 850 caballos en carretera y que puede transformarse en un verdadera nave de ataque aeroportada; y todo armado de sincronizadores de fase iónicos y de lanza misiles!

Fire & Forget II est un shoot'em up sur Master System. Dans chacun des cinq niveaux vous devez tout exploser sur votre passage pour vous frayer un chemin jusqu'au chef des terroristes avant de l'abattre. Vous conduisez une machine de destruction qui est une voiture avec la capacité de voler.

game.name: Fire And Ice

locale.title: Fire & Ice
locale.synopsis:
The background story of Fire & Ice is quick to tell: A coyote (you) runs, throwing ice cubes, through various worlds. In the levels you must jump on platforms and kill your enemies. The enemies (for example, birds and penguins) can be shot with your ice cubes; they become frozen, so you smash them. Sometimes they leave part of a key behind after they're destroyed. The complete key, assembled from all the pieces, opens the door to the next world.
In this "jump & run" you can also get some power-ups. You can find some coyote puppies; these puppies follow you, are invulnerable, and also shoot enemies. In higher regions you find some snow-flakes; enough of these and you get a great snowball for freezing more enemies on the screen.

Wolf, un lobo aventurero - que no tiene parentesco alguno con el Lobo malo de Caperucita Roja - no contaba con este super embrollo: el despiadado dios Montezuma, furioso por no tener poder suficiente para dominar el mundo, despejó toda su ira sobre las más diversas civilizaciones, transformando varios seres de cada una de ellas en perversos discípulos. Ahora, nuestro pequeño héroe será el encargado de destruir el hechizo del maligno dios y restaurar la paz en cada civilización. Combate a los discípulos de Montezuma, tendrás que encontrar todos los pedazos de llave mágica para liberar cada pueblo, uno a uno.¿Cuál será el destino de la Civilización del Hielo, de la Selva, de los Incas y de los Egipcios? Bueno, sólo Wolf podrá saberlo...

Un coyote (vous) court, en jetant des glaçons, à travers différents mondes. Dans les niveaux, vous devez sauter sur les plates-formes et tuer vos ennemis. Les ennemis (par exemple, les oiseaux et les pingouins) peuvent être élimines avec vos glaçons; Ils deviennent gelés, alors vous pouvez les détruire. Parfois, ils laissent derrière eux une partie de clé. La clé complète, assemblée à partir de toutes les pièces, ouvre la porte au prochain monde.

Wolf, um lobo aventureiro - que não tem grau de parentesco algum com o Lobo Mau de Chapeuzinho Vermelho - não contava com esta super enrascada: o impiedoso deus Montezuma, revoltado por não possuir poder suficiente para dominar o mundo, despejou toda a sua ira sobre as mais diversas civilizações, transformando vários seres de cada uma delas em perversos discípulos. Agora, nosso pequeno herói está encarregado de destruir o feitiço do maligno deus e restaurar a paz em cada civilização. Combatendo os discípulos de Montezuma, ele terá que encontrar todos os pedaços de chave mágica para libertar cada povoado, um a um. Qual será o destino da Civilização do Gelo, da Selva, dos Incas e dos Egípcios? Bem, só Wolf poderá determinar...

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.synopsis: Juego amateur el cuañl es un Shoot them Up vertical
Jeu homebrew. Shoot them Up vertical

locale.title: Flashpoint
locale.synopsis: Zemina made an unlicensed port to the MSX and Sega Master System of this arcade puzzle game based on Tetris. The player is given a pre-designed Tetris puzzle where the goal is to clear a set of specified, highlighted blocks off the screen. The game ends if the player's blocks reach the top of the screen, similar to traditional Tetris rules.

Port no oficial de la versión arcade de este clon de Tetris. El juego comienza con un rompecabezas Tetris rellenado en el que el objetivo es limpiar un conjunto de bloques especificos, resaltados en la pantalla. El juego termina si los bloques del jugador llegar a la parte superior de la pantalla.

Portage non officiel de la version arcade de ce clone de Tetris.Le joueur commence avec un puzzle Tetris pré-rempli où le but est d'effacer un ensemble de blocs spécifiés, mis en évidence sur l'écran. Le jeu se termine si les blocs du joueur atteignent le haut de l'écran.

locale.title: Forgotten Worlds
locale.synopsis:
Forgotten Worlds features two characters known as The Nameless Ones, who both look like Arnold Schwarzenegger, one even has a mohawk. It's their job to rid the planet of the attacking aliens.
Guiding your character around the screen as they fly with jet-packs, guns on full auto, you control a satellite which you rotate around your character for the direction in which your gun is firing. At the end of each level is a boss which needs to be killed to progress.
Enemies that have been killed drop money. At the end of every level is a shop where you can buy weapons, armour, items and first-aid packs.

Ruinas, destrucción, tierra baldía ? esto es todo lo que puede verse. Los diabólicos extraterrestres han infectado su planeta. Como buen guerrero, usted jura devolver el Planeta Polvoriento a sus propietarios, los seres humanos. En la batalla que se avecina, arriesgará su vida al enfrentarse a tan malvados seres. Su principal misión consiste en mantenerse vivo el tiempo suficiente hasta destruir a su más potente enemigo, el Tirano de la Guerra.

Forgotten Worlds sur Master System est un jeu d'action où l'on incarne deux héros anonymes partant en croisade contre des envahisseurs extraterrestres. Le joueur peut faire voler son avatar grâce à un jetpack et améliorer son arsenal entre les missions en fonction du nombre d'ennemis tués.

Terra: século XXIX. O planeta que já foi o berço da humanidade foi transformado em uma grande lixeira. Os Aliens invadiram e transformaram as cidades em ruínas, fazendo dos homens seus escravos. Somente um homem tem a coragem e a força de lutar contra eles: o Guerreiro Sem Nome. A grande batalha está prestes a começar e você é o companheiro ideal por quem nosso guerreiro estava esperando. Sua missão será guiá-lo até o líder dos alienígenas. Não o desaponte! Ajude-o a combater os inúmeros monstros, homens e máquinas que surgirão pelo caminho. Compre armas melhores, medicamentos e todos os equipamentos necessários. Muito sangue frio, pois não haverá "cessar fogo"! Alguém precisa salvar o nosso planeta!

game.name: Férias Frustradas Do Pica-pau

locale.title: Frias Frustradas do Pica-Pau
locale.synopsis:
While Pica-Pau (Woody Woodpecker in English) and his friends were having a vacation, Zeca Urubu (Buzz Buzzard) kidnapped Woody's pals as he was ready to take a photo and gave out a letter which the woodpecker has to free his friends.
This game is a licensed platforming game which the text is in Portuguese. Pica-Pau is able to jump, run by pressing forward twice and peck (up, down, left or right depending where you are and what direction is pressed) to defeat enemies that can be combined with the jump button if the player is out of reach. There are items to help during the adventure such as rocket pack to guide you, a horn to wake Leôncio (Wally Walrus) and a paintbrush and also he is able to ski down a slope as well.

Al final de año, las pruebas terminaron, las clases también. El clima era perfecto para un gran y divertido viaje de vacaciones. Las cosas ya estaban todas en las maletas: la televisión, el equipo de sonido, las comidas ... Toda la clase estaba lista para lo que parecía ser un largo, pero sin embargo placentero, viaje a las montañas. En medio del recorrido, una parada para una fotografía de recuerdo: ¡qué pésima idea !!! Después del "click" y del "flash" de la cámara, todos habían desaparecido, dejando a Pica Pau desesperado con la desaparición de sus colegas. Esto sólo podría ser otro truco sucio del Zeca Urubu. Ayuda al personaje más travieso e irónico de los dibujos animados a rescatar a sus amigos en una aventura digna de los mejores dibujos de la televisión. Con una diferencia, ahora tu estarás al mando.

Alors que Pica-Pau (Woody Woodpecker en anglais) et ses amis etaient en vacances, Zeca Urubu (Buzz Buzzard) a enlevé les copains de Woody.Woody est capable de sauter, de courir en appuyant vers l'avant deux fois et de picorer pour vaincre les ennemis. Il y a des éléments qui aident pendant l'aventure tels que le pack de roquettes, un klaxon pour réveiller Leôncio (Wally Walrus).

locale.title: Férias Frustradas do Pica-Pau
locale.synopsis: Final de ano, as provas acabaram, as aulas também. O clima era perfeito para uma grande e divertida viagem de férias. As coisas já estavam todas nas malas: a TV, o som, as comidas... Toda a turma estava pronta para o que parecia ser uma longa, porém, prazerosa viagem às montanhas. No meio do percurso, uma parada para uma fotografia de recordação: que péssima idéia!!! Depois do "click" e do "flash" da câmera, todos haviam sumido, deixando o Pica Pau desesperado com o desaparecimento de seus colegas. Isto só poderia ser mais um truque sujo do Zeca Urubu. Ajude o personagem mais travesso e irônico dos desenhos animados a resgatar seus amigos numa aventura digna dos melhores desenhos da TV. Com uma diferença, agora você é que estará no comando.

game.developer: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.
game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.synopsis: Port pirata para Master System de la versión del juego de Game Gear del clásico Frogger.
Conversion pirate de la version Game gear de Frogger. Le but est de faire traverser l'écran à une grenouille (Frogger) tout en évitant toutes sortes de menaces.

locale.title: Fushigi no Oshiro Pit Pot
locale.synopsis:
The princess has been kidnapped and held captive inside the castle, and your job is to navigate each room by collecting all the goodies, and killing monsters using the hammer that a witch gave you. Once you have done that, you must get through one of the open doorways. To navigate the room, you can walk either on the gray tiles, or the yellow ones that surround them. Monsters also can walk on these gray tiles, but you can make them fall down if you smash a tile that they're on. The monsters will regenerate in the room after five seconds.
Be careful of dragons that will throw fireballs at you. If you get hit by a dragon, its fireball, or one of the monsters, you will lose a life. You can collect keys that will open locked doorways, so that you can exit through them. Some power-ups can also be collected. Collecting hearts, for example, will freeze all monsters on screen for a limited amount of time, giving you the opportunity of killing them.

Pit Pot: El Castillo Mágico La princesa ha sido secuestrada. Para rescatarla, debes navegar a través de cada habitación, evitando sus habitantes como dragones y guardias. Si es necesario, puedes usar tu martillo mágico para eliminarlos de la pantalla. También puedes golpear una baldosa gris para hacer que se caigan y mueran. Para salir de cada habitación hay que pasar a través de puertas, pero tienes que encontrar una llave de oro que abrirá algunas de ellas.

Pit Pot est un titre aux graphismes sobres mais à l'intérêt diabolique. Un chevalier équipé d'un maillet s'enfonce dans des donjons mal fréquentés à la recherche d'objets magiques. En frappant certaines dalles avec son maillet, je joueur met à jour un parcours qui me mène vers d'autres salles. En revanche, un coup de maillet expédié au mauvais endroit referme les passages ou les détruit complètement (il faut sortir de la salle et y revenir pour recommencer). Entre casse-tête et mémory, Pit Pot est un titre frais et agréable très bien réalisé pour l'époque.

locale.title: G-Loc Air Battle
locale.synopsis:
The Citizens Defence Force does not trust the United Nations to keep a troubled 21st century world at peace. It confiscates a horde of planes and warships, and as a UN loyalist, it is your job to shoot them down. Solving starvation and disease can wait, apparently.
The game is split into 8 stages, which are split into sub-stages over land and sea, each of which has a strict time limit, and a target number of planes to shoot down. They take place from behind your plane, which can be controlled with up referring to climb or dive, depending on player preference. You are armed with 10 missiles as well as standard weapons. The plane can survive a few hits, so watch the damage report as it goes from red to black.
Fail to complete a section in the time limit and you use up a continue, but the amount of planes previously shot down is not reset, making the second attempt easier Chase HQ style. As you destroy enemies you gain access to better planes, and the rank reported at the end of the game improves  this is also dependent on the skill level you play at.
Las fuerzas del vigilante han arrasado las instalaciones militares y han "confiscado" tanques, aviones, y hasta barcos de guerra. ¡Comanda a tu G-LOC a luchar hasta la victoria contra las guerrillas!

Des groupes de surveillance ont attaqué des installations militaires gouvernementales et "confisqué" des tanks, des avions et même des navires de guerre ! On vous a donc engagé pour combattre ces chapardeurs et récupérer tout le matos volé !
G-Loc Air Battle vous met aux commandes d'un avion de guerre et vous embarque pour des combats aériens d'une force incroyable.
Les graphismes sont bons, la bande son colle bien à l'action, la jouabilité est excellente, mais le gros point fort de ce jeu, c'est sans conteste sa vitesse ; la 3D est époustouflante pour une console 8 bits !
Un superbe shoot'em up tout en 3D !

No século XXI, grupos terroristas armados e extremamente organizados estão atacando várias instalações militares em todo o mundo e tomando posse de tanques de guerra, armas e até aviões de combate. As Nações Unidas enviaram pacificadores para os quatro cantos do mundo, que conseguiram controlar uma boa parte dos terroristas. Mas um dos grupos, o mais determinado, continuava na ativa. A solução encontrada pelos dirigentes mundiais para pôr um fim nesta destruição, era o uso do A8M "Thunder fox", um avião de caça de potência máxima, jamais testado pelo Homem. O problema agora é saber quem será o piloto desta missão. Que tal você? Será que você está preparado para acabar com a destruição e assegurar o futuro do mundo? Decida-se rapidamente, pois sua missão está para começar. Boa sorte, piloto!

locale.title: Gaegujangi Ggachi
locale.synopsis:
Licensed to the Lee Hyunse manhwa and animated series, Gaegujangi Kkachi is a stock "character" platformer. All it really shares with the cartoon are the main characters, and even they don't look quite the same.
The game resembles Alex Kidd in Miracle World quite a bit. Kkachi has to retrieve six keys from six stages that are selectable from the beginning. Enemies are either beaten by slapping them or by using limited special moves. There are random items (garlic, fruit, etc.) lying or floating around throughout the levels that amount to money, which can be used in stores to buy items. After each (mostly uninspired) bossfight, Kkachi gets also a special weapon only usable against bosses. Unfortunately the mechanic is broken and only the first weapon ever gained can be used, and even that only once throughout the entire game.
Clon no oficial del juego "Alex Kidd in Miracle World" el cual fue lanzado al mercado en Corea exclusivamente.
Clone non officiel de Alex Kidd in Miracle World sorti exclusivement en Corée.

locale.title: Gain Ground
locale.synopsis:
Gain Ground is an arcade style action game with a bit of strategy thrown in. The goal is get all of the soldiers to the opposite side of the screen or to kill all of the enemies. Each soldier in the army has a unique specialization, from among 20 types. Each soldier can attack in two different ways, using either a normal weapon or a special weapon. The strategy comes from deciding which soldier would do best in which situation. Some weapons are better at dealing with certain enemies and obstacles than other weapons.
Players start with only three soldiers but can encounter other soldiers that can be rescued, by touching them. If the new solider survives long enough to reach the exit, they can be added to the soldier inventory. The number of possible soldier in a player's army is over 30 soldiers. There are 50 stages total, divided into rounds of 10. At the end of each round, players encounter an enemy boss.

Gain Ground se había convertido en una gran sensación nocturna como la más reciente competición entre humanos y androides. Un día, el Ordenador Central que controlaba los androides ¡se volvió loco y atrapó a los espectadores del Coliseo! Únase al grupo de hábiles luchadores que están tratando de derrotar al sistema, y ¡salve esa gente inocente de un destino peor que la muerte!

Gain Ground sur Master System est un jeu alliant action et stratégie. Les missions proposent deux types d'objectifs, traverser une zone sans mourir ou tuer l'intégralité des ennemis. Pour ce faire, vous disposez de différentes unités possédant leurs propres caractéristiques et la stratégie consiste à choisir judicieusement quel soldat serait le plus efficace dans une situation donnée.

Em uma época muito distante da nossa, todo mundo só falava do Gain Ground, a competição entre homens e andróides. 0 objetivo da competição era que os homens, todos eles hábeis lutadores, encontrassem a saída de um labirinto cheio de andróides perigosos. Um dia, quando a competição já estava para começar e já não havia espaço para nem mais um único espectador no estádio, o inesperado aconteceu! 0 Computador Central que controlava os andróides entrou em pane! Os inocentes espectadores que não conseguiram fugir a tempo viram-se de repente dentro da terrível destruição! Vendo que isto não poderia continuar, os três lutadores de Gain Ground se uniram para atravessar o labirinto e destruir o Computador Central. Eles precisam de toda a ajuda possível! Que tal contribuir para que estas vidas inocentes sejam salvas e a paz volte a reinar na Terra?

locale.title: Galactic Protector
locale.synopsis: As a ship that looks like the one in the Fantasy Zone series you must protect three planets from floating space debris by using your built-in laser shots to destroy them. If you fail to shoot at them quickly, the debris will eventually come in contact with it. If this happens, 10% of the planet's life will be lost. Once you have destroyed enough debris, you receive a bonus for how much planet life that remains and move on to the next round. Later in the game, you will receive a 3-way shot as well as protection that will greatly help you in further rounds. The game ends when you lose all your lives or the planet blows up. 25 rounds.

Galactic Protector es un shoot-'em-up desarrollado y publicado por Sega. Tenemos a la famosa nave Opa Opa de la saga Fantasy Zone y Zillion, que debe salvar varios planetas de los enemigos y de los escombros que se lanzan hacia ellos.El juego está construido específicamente para el Paddle Control y, por lo tanto, no se puede jugar en un PAD estándar.

Galactic Protector est un shoot 'em up à l'univers cartoon sur Sega Master System. Le joueur y incarne un vaisseau spatial en rotation autours d'une planète qu'il doit protéger des vagues de météorites, comètes et débris qui viennent s'y écraser au cours des 25 levels qui constituent le soft. Le jeu propose initialement une mitrailleuse énergétique à tir simple, pour finir par devenir triple au bout de quelques levels. Le type de planète change à chaque level. La partie prend fin lorsque soit la planète soit le vaisseau sont détruits.

locale.title: Galaxian
locale.synopsis: Battle space aliens and avoid their suicidal attacks to survive in the world of Galaxian.

Port no oficial que salió al mercado en Corea del juego arcade "Galaxian", en el cual deberás combatir contra alienígenas y tratar de evitar sus ataques suicidas para sobrevivir en el mundo de Galaxian.
Portage non officiel de la version arcade sorti exclusivement en Corée.Combattez les aliens et éviter leurs attaques suicidaires pour survivre dans le monde de Galaxian.

locale.title: Galaxy Force
locale.synopsis:
Made in the hey-day of SEGA's sprite scaling hardware (After Burner, Out Run) in the arcades, Galaxy Force is a combination of After Burner and G-Loc R-360 set in space.
The game is divided into four "scenes", or planets: the A world is a green planet, world B is a fire-ridden lava planet, world C is a green water planet and world D is barren ice planet. You must fly your spaceship above the planet's surface, facing not only Space Harrier-style enemy attack waves, but also natural phenomena such as meteorites, lava eruptions and tornadoes. To fight them, you have a vulcan as well as an undepletable stock of missiles.
Once you have fought your way across the planet, you enter a tunnel system in the inner confines of the planet. As the tunnel turns, you are given directions as to which way you must manoeuvre, but the narrow tunnel gives you little space to take evasive action. Once you escape the tunnel, the entire planet is destroyed, leading you towards the ultimate boss encounter.

El futuro de la Galaxia Junos pende de un hilo. El maligno Cuarto Imperio busca la dominación total, invadiendo y conquistando todos los planetas que se interpongan en su camino. Usted es la última esperanza de la galaxia.

Galaxy Force sur Master System est un shoot'em up où l'on dirige un vaisseau spatial en vue à la 3ème personne. Sur 4 planètes différentes, évitez les nombreux obstacles naturels (éruptions, tornades, pluies de météorites) et réduisez en poussière les vaisseaux ennemis.

O futuro da Galáxia Junos está por um fio. O maligno 4º Império está determinado a dominar tudo, invadindo e conquistando todos os planetas que encontrar em seu caminho. Você é a última esperança que resta, e como comandante de elite deve se infiltrar e destruir as 4 fortalezas inimigas espalhadas pela Galáxia. A batalha final será contra a Morte-Verde, a nave mãe do 4º Império. Os inimigos estarão em maior número, mas você não pode falhar. O futuro está em suas mãos.

game.name: Game Box Série Corridas

locale.title: Game Box Srie Corridas
locale.synopsis:
Game Box Série Corridas (which means Game Box Racing Series) is a compilation of the three following games in a single cartridge:
1. Super Cross 2. Super Monaco GP 3. World Grand Prix
Cartucho recopilación el cual incluye 3 juegos:nn- Super Cross (Enduro Racer)nn- Super Monaco GPnn- World Grand Prix
Game Box Série Corridas est une compilation des trois jeux suivants dans une seule cartouche: nn1. Super Cross nn2. Super Monaco GP nn3. Grand Prix du Monde

locale.title: Game Box Série Corridas
locale.synopsis: SUPER CROSS: Você vai dar de cara com árvores, pedras, colinas, rochedos e as pistas de terra mais perigosas do mundo. Seja mais forte que tudo isso e alcance a vitória! SUPER MONACO GP: Prepare-se! Você vai queimar os pneus do seu carro tentando ser o melhor entre os melhores pilotos de Fórmula l quebrar a cabeça tentando montar o melhor carro e encarar o perigo nos circuitos mais famosos da Terra. WORLD GRAND PRIX Encare as mais empolgantes corridas do mundo, ganhe milhões de dólares em prêmios - mas não gaste tudo em cartuchos. Compre novas peças para seu carro e se torne o mais rápido piloto que o mundo já viu!

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

game.name: Game Box Srie Esportes Radicais

locale.title: Game Box Srie Esportes Radicais
locale.synopsis:
Game Box Série Esportes Radicais (which means Game Box Radical Sports Series) is a modified version of California Games. Four of its six events were removed and now the player can only compete in the Surfing and BMX events. The team selection (sponsorship) was also removed, as well as the ability of naming your players. Each player will get a default name (PLAY1, for instance), and the game will select teams in order (player 1 gets Maxx-Out, player 2 gets Costa del Mar, and so on). The trophy screens were also removed, so the player don't see the team logo on it. He only knows in which team he is during the event competition, when his name and team appears on the top of the screen.
Up to eight players can take turns competing in either one of the two events, or both. They can also choose to practice in one single event.
In the Surfing event, the player must perform maneuvers on the wave as trying to keep as much time as he can inside the tube, or jumping off and on the wave. He can speed up his board by climbing and descending the wave, and can slow it down by holding button 2 while maneuvering. When his time runs out, the judges will tell him his score.
In the BMX event, the player must perform jumps and maneuvers while trying to complete the course. He can speed up his bike by pressing button 1 repeatedly and jump by pressing button two. While in the middle of a jump, pressing different directions on the d-pad will make the biker perform different kinds of jumps. The more dangerous the maneuver, the more points he gets. If he crashes three times, he's eliminated.
Versión modificada del juego California Games, en la cual se han eliminado diferentes pruebas y opciones como la de escoger patrocinador, elegir nombre, ....nnnnSolo incluye las pruebas de Surf y BMX
Version de "California Games" ne comprenant plus que l'épreuve de surf et de BMX. Ce titre est une "exclusivité" brésilienne.

locale.title: Game Box Série Esportes Radicais
locale.synopsis: Bem vindo à Califórnia, o centro dos mais radicais, ferozes e agressivos esportes de todo o mundo! Você está prestes a invadir as praias e os terrenos mais acidentados deste "paraíso" e conquistar troféus incríveis. SURF: O surf começou como o esporte dos reis do Havaí. Agora, está espalhado pelo mundo inteiro, dominando, inclusive, toda a costa da Califórnia. De Santa Cruz a Rincon Point, surfistas e suas pranchas coloridas frequentam quilômetros e quilômetros de praias ensolaradas, recheadas de garotas bonitas... Será que você está preparado para juntar-se a eles? BMX: Atenção! BMX quer dizer "Bycicle Motocross", isto é, uma bicicleta para correr em pistas difíceis, cheias de obstáculos. Nesta prova, os competidores avançam com suas bicicletas pelo deserto da Califórnia, onde muita areia, saltos, batidas e mergulhos estão esperando por você! DE 1 A 8 JOGADORES

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

game.name: Game Box Série Lutas

locale.title: Game Box Srie Lutas
locale.synopsis:
Game Box Série Lutas (which means Game Box Fighting Series) is a compilation of the three following games in a single cartridge:
1. Shinobi 2. The Ninja 3. Kung Fu Kid
Cartucho recopilación el cual incluye 3 juegos:nn- Shinobinn- The Ninjann- Kung Fu Kid
Game Box Série Lutas est une compilation des 3 jeux suivant:Shinobi ,The Ninja,Kung Fu Kid.

locale.title: Game Box Série Lutas
locale.synopsis: SHINOBI: Terroristas armados até os dentes raptaram os filhos dos Líderes do Universo (uma espécie de ONU intergaláctica) e a desordem é total. Aprenda a magia ninja e encare essa aventura, afinal não e todo dia que o universo depende de você. THE NINJA: Entre na pele do ninja Kazamaru e use todos os golpes aprendidos nos seus anos de treinamento para destruir os soldados do poderosos Gyokuro. Enfrentando 13 desafios e muitos ninjas inimigos, The Ninja e a prova final para qualquer lutador. KUNG FU KID: Você terá que vingar a morte do mestre, cruelmente assassinado pelo temível Mandana. Inúmeros perigos cruzarão seu caminho e vários talismãs estarão lá para protegê-lo, mas só o real domínio da arte do Kung Fu irá fazer de você um vencedor.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Gangcheol RoboCop
locale.synopsis: Port Only Released on Korea
Versión no oficial de RoboCop lanzada en Corea del Sur .Es completamente diferente a otras entregas de la franquicia, porque una parte de este código es diseñado por otros equipos.

Version non-officielle de RoboCop .Il est complètement différent des autres épisodes de la franchise car d'une part a été codé et « dessiné » par d'autres gens, d'autre part car est tout simplement mauvais que ce soit au niveau du gameplay, du réalisme (les mouvements réalisés avec 2 images) ou des graphismes.

locale.title: Gangster Town
locale.synopsis: In Gangster Town, you must use the Light Phaser to shoot unruly mobsters from the town, starting with a car chase, a walk through downtown, shootouts in a bar and nightclub and more. Bonus games, such as finding a key in a brick wall, are included as you complete the game.

En la década de los 1929, trabajando como agente del FBI, se encuentra persiguiendo a unos contrabandists. Después de practicar su excelente punteria, liese a tiros con los enemigos en las escenas de persecución en automóvil, barrios bajos, bar, y cabaret.

Gangster Town est un jeu de tir qui nécessite l'utilisation d'un pistolet laser en lieu et place de la traditionnelle manette. L'objectif est de tuer un maximum de bandits dans des scènes allant de la poursuite en voitures à la bataille rangée dans un bar sans oublier les affrontement dans les ruelles coupe-gorge.

Durante os anos 20, você é um agente especial do FBI, perseguindo uma gang de contrabandistas. Após praticar sua pontaria, você ficará frente a frente com os bandidos nas mais diversas situações, tais como: perseguições de carro, no centro da cidade, no salão do bar, no cabaret e finalmente nas docas do porto. Utilize a Pistola Light Phaser para jogar Gangster Town® e acabar com o poderoso chefe. Mas, lembre-se: eles são muitos e maus.

locale.title: Gauntlet
locale.synopsis:
Gauntlet, the original arcade smash hit, is a fighting game where you choose a character and let rip into the hordes of enemies that assault you on you way to the end of the level. One or two players must make their way through 100 levels of mayhem and magic.
It featured a choice of four characters to play with, each with different weapons. Thor the Warrior, has a bludgeoning battle axe, Thyra the Valkyrie, has a close range sword, Questor the Elf has his long range bow, and Merlin the Wizard has magical bolts.
Ghosts, goblins and even the life draining Death are your enemies. Enemies stream out of generators, so destroy these before tackling the rest.
Keys are needed to open the many doors within the levels, and in some situations a door will contain only bonus items, not a progressive route. Scattered magic potions act like smart bombs and clear the screen of all enemies. Beware of poison though, this reduces your energy level. Treasure is abundant throughout the levels and adds to your score.

Invoque la poderosa hacha de Thor, la guadaña de Thyra, la magia mítica de Merlin o las veloces flechas de Questor en su conquista del Calabozo de las Tinieblas. Abrase camino por las hordas de monstruos y legiones de demonios en este sorprendente juego electrónico de combate.

Gauntlet sur Master System est un jeu d'action hack and slash dont l'objectif est de tuer tous ses assaillants dans un labyrinthe et d'atteindre le niveau suivant. Pour ce faire, le joueur a le choix entre quatre personnages différents. Chacun possède ses propres caractéristiques et correspond à un style de combat particulier. Gauntlet peut être joué à deux simultanément en coopératif.

Prepare-se para mergulhar nos subterrâneos escuros e frios das masmorras, um mundo de magia e mistério, povoado pelas criaturas mais estranhas e malignas que você pode imaginar. Fantasmas, Demônios, Feiticeiras e (acredite se quiser) a própria face da Morte estarão à sua espera. E com um único objetivo: a sua destruição! Todo o cuidado é pouco! Mas (ainda bem) você não estará sozinho nesta jornada. Há alguns amigos, dispostos a arriscar a vida por você: Thor, o valente guerreiro; Thyra, a valquíria; Merlin, o poderoso mago, e Questor, o duende. Cada um deles terá ensinamentos valiosos para lhe dar. Em algumas horas, o machado de Thor será a sua salvação, mas em outras, sem magia você não terá a mínima chance! Lute como nunca, e não se esqueça: nessa terra de ninguém, conseguir sobreviver é um prêmio!

locale.title: Gekioko PunPun Maru
locale.synopsis:
From the creator of Fix-It Felix Jr for the Sega Mega Drive and the bizarre adaptation of Pringles in video game form comes an all new homebrew hit for the Sega Master System. This frantic arcade style platformer known as Geki Oko PunPun Maru is based upon the imaginary NES game of the same named meme, offering a vibrant visual style and addictive gameplay to boot.
If anything, Geki Oko PunPun Maru features very similar action to that of the original arcade title Mario Bros. Instead of spiny shells spawning and heading down to attack, ninjas come flying from above and it's up to you to tackle them with your vertical shooting huffs and puffs over 12 stages. This strange projectile is a play on the game's title which according to the origin of the meme roughly translates to 'being angry, in a cute way'.

locale.title: George Foreman's KO Boxing
locale.synopsis:
The Master System and Game Gear versions of George Foreman's KO Boxing are fairly identical to the other versions in concept, but there are a few notable changes. The game is a reworking of the Master System title James 'Buster' Douglas Knockout Boxing, not to be confused with the Genesis title with the same name, which is entirely different.
Just like the other versions players are cast as George Foreman to go through a series of boxing matches against different opponents to win the championship title belt. Compared to the other titles, these versions have new opponents and show the boxers from the side. Players can move left or right in the ring to avoid punches. Other moves including blocking, and left and right punches that can be varied into jabs and crosses. Matches can last up to ten rounds and when no regular or technical knock-out occurs, the winner is based on the jury's points, provided between the rounds. During knock-out phases, no buttons need to be pressed to get the boxer back to his feet. At the start of the game, a slow or fast speed for the gameplay can be selected.
Each match the player's boxer can use three super punches. These need to be charged and then unleashed when near an opponent. It sends them straight to the back of the ring, a dangerous area as it is easy to keep punching them into the ropes. Health is slightly restored during the intermission and after each won match the player is awarded skill points to be distributed over three characteristics. Matches for two players are supported.

Salta al cuadrilátero con George Foreman ? el Campeón Popular ? con la acción de boxeo ¡más realista que nunca! Compite por el título de Campeón mundial con los famosos contrincantes de los pesos pesados. Abrete camino hacia el título con uno de los extraordinarios Super Golpes del "Gran George".

Vous incarnez le champion George Foreman dans ce jeu de boxe où vous devez battre des boxeurs fictifs pour remporter la ceinture dorée. George Foreman's KO Boxing propose une vue de côté et des matchs pouvant durer jusqu'à 10 rounds. A noter la possibilité de pouvoir effectuer des "super punches" pour envoyer l'adversaire dans les cordes et ainsi le bloquer tout en lui infligeant de sérieux coups.

Seu peso? 114 kg de puro músculo. Sua coragem e habilidade? Simplesmente imbatíveis. Este é George Foreman, o super herói dos ringues que derrotou nada mais, nada menos que 25 lutadores em três anos, 23 deles por nocaute!! O que você diz a respeito? Vai encarar? Socos violentos e precisos, ganchos rápidos e uma defesa indestrutível, tudo isto e muito mais está em G.F. Boxing. Mas o melhor de tudo é que você poderá se colocar no lugar do próprio George na arena e lutar como um verdadeiro campeão! TIIIIIMMMMMM! O primeiro round vai começar, o que você está fazendo aí parado??? Coloque logo suas luvas e vá à luta, pois esta é sua chance de demonstrar sua coragem, força e habilidade; caso contrário, sua fama de franguinho irá se espalhar...

game.name: Geraldinho

locale.title: Geraldinho
locale.synopsis:
Geraldinho was playing his videogame when his friend Cachorrão kicked him inside the TV screen! Now the player must help Geraldinho to get out of the game.
Geraldinho is a modified version of Teddy Boy, with Teddy Boy replaced by Geraldinho, a famous Brazilian comic character. Geraldinho is an infantile version of another comic character, Geraldão (both drawn by the Brazilian cartoonist Glauco). He is a boy addicted to soft drinks, ice cream and TV, and he's always with his friends, the dog Cachorrão and the cat Tufinho.
In this platform game, Geraldinho must defeat enemies using his ray gun. The enemies will come out of dice-faced boxes, and there will be as much enemies as shown at the box face. Once they are shot, they are turned into little balls, which must be quickly collected. If they're are not collected in a short period of time, they will turn into little creatures which will steal away time. Once all enemies are defeated, Geraldinho will proceed to the next level.
If Geraldinho stands for too long on a platform, it will disintegrate, causing him to fall to the platform below. Sometimes this is the only way to get out of some closed places.
From time to time Geraldinho will also play a bonus game, in which he must shoot boxes to get objects inside them. He must also avoid boxes with those little stealing time creatures.

Versión lanzada en el mercado brasileño de la mano de Tectoy del juego "Teddy Boy" en el cual el sprite del protagonista ha sido cambiado por el de Geraldinho, un famoso personaje de programas infantiles en Brasil.
Ce jeu n'est autre que l'adaptation de "Teddy Boy" pour le marché brésilien.

Sorvete nas mãos, as calças caindo... Adivinhe quem é? Claro, é Geraldinho, o travesso moleque das histórias em quadrinhos que vive aprontando e deixando sua mãe maluca!! Só que ele acaba de se meter em uma grande confusão: jogava tranqüilamente seu video game quando... CHUT!! VLUPT!! Bastou apenas um chute de seu amigo Cachorrão para que ele fosse parar na tela da televisão, mais precisamente dentro do jogo!! E ainda dizem que o cachorro é o melhor amigo do homem... Agora só depende de você para que o Geraldinho saia dessa... Assuma o joystick e mostre a sua habilidade!! São muitos monstros a combater: o Blue Masked Monster, o Denden e o Pyon, entre outros. Sua arma? Uma pistola de raios, que mais parece um lança-minhocas, mas capaz de transformar qualquer inimigo em um tatu-bola inofensivo... Vamos lá!! Não espere mais para entrar nesta nova e inusitada aventura!!

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Ghost House
locale.synopsis:
You're about to inherit the family jewels. If you can get to them, that is.
They're hidden inside the haunted mansion, which wouldn't be such a big deal if it weren't infested with Draculas, Bats, Fire Blowers, Mummies, and other deadly weirdos. You'll have to ward off or destroy everything that gets in your way -- no matter how grotesque it appears. Furthermore, you'll have to keep punching your way through the mansion until you find the secret key. You then have to use it to open one of the five coffins, defeat Dracula, capture the jewel he drops, and make your way out of the mansion.
You play the role of Mick, and everything is going to stop you from completing these tasks and making you way out of the mansion. You just have to punch, or jump on, your enemies to defeat them. And arrows will be flying from either direction and will attempt to hit you on the head, and you must either duck or jump on them for extra points. You can jump or touch lights to freeze everything on screen for a few seconds. Rather than punching, you can collect a sword on the lower level by jumping on it as it flies past you. The sword is useful when you fight Dracula or getting rid of Fire Blowers.
You start the game with three lives, and receive an additional life every 50,000 and 150,000 points. You also have an energy meter. You lose energy when you touch one of the monsters. When you run out of energy, you lose a life. You gain energy by collecting treasures scattered throughout the mansion, and it is restored when you kill a Dracula.
Trate de encontrar el tesoro escondido en este juego fantasmal a través del castillo encantado del Conde Drácula.

Ghost House sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes qui se déroule, comme son nom l'indique, dans une maison hantée. Le héros prénommé Nick est sur le point d'hériter de bijoux ayant une valeur inestimable, encore faut-il qu'il les trouve. En effet, ils sont cachés dans une maison abritant toutes sortes de créatures plus effrayantes les unes que les autres.

locale.title: Ghostbusters
locale.synopsis:
Based on the movie of the same name, the Ghostbusters are the ones to call who will "bust" any ghost hauntings. It does this through the use of nuclear accelerated "proton packs" and traps, whereby the ghosts can be captured and transferred to a secure storage facility. However New York City has suddenly become a very haunted place, and the number of ghosts has suddenly increased. The Ghostbusters must reduce the paranormal (PK) level in the city, representing ghost power, before the Temple of Zuul awakens and ressurects an evil goddess, Gozer.
Ghostbusters is an action game that combines an overhead view and a side-view. From Ghostbusters HQ, the player must monitor the map of New York City for "ghost alarms" as well as casual spirits, and plot a route to the alarmed area. The player then controls the Ghostbuster vehicle as it drives through traffic. Here, the player is able to capture casual ghosts on the way if they are en route. Once at the location, the game switches to a side-view. Two of the ghostbusters will take position and activate their proton beams and toss a trap to the ground. The player will attempt to maneuver the ghost(s) over the placed trap. Once activated, the trap attempts to capture any ghosts directly above it. Successful capture will earn the player money, which can then be used to purchase new Ghostbusters vehicles and new modifications for the vehicle. Unsuccessful capture will see the ghost fly away.
As the game progresses, the PK energy of the city increases. Ghostbusters must keep it under critical levels by being constantly successful at ghost captures. Eventually the Temple of Zuul will activate, and if the PK levels are still manageable, the Ghostbusters can venture there for a final showdown with Gozer.
Fantasmas, fantasmas, y más fantasmas. Se han propuesto salir con mucho coraje. Han elejido tu ciudad. para hacer de las suyas. ¿A quién llamarás?

GhostBusters sur Master System est un jeu d'action basé sur le film S.O.S. Fantômes. Vous incarnez la fine équipe de chasseurs de fantômes et vous vous attaquez à toutes formes d'activités paranormales. Armé de votre fusil à protons, capturez tous les revenants indésirables de New York et mettez Guzer, le dieu summérien, hors d'état de nuire.
Fantasmas, fantasmas e mais fantasmas. Eles decidiram aparecer com força total e tomar conta da cidade para mostrar do que são capazes! E agora, a quem você vai recorrer?

locale.title: Ghouls'n Ghosts
locale.synopsis:
Three years have passed since Arthur defeated the Demon King Astaroth and rescued his beloved Princess Prin-Prin (see Ghosts 'N Goblins). A new villain, the Great Demon King Lucifer (Loki in some versions) has become the new leader of Ghoul Realm. While returning from a journey, Arthur sees the Princess' castle and her village under attack by Lucifer's forces. While rushing towards her beloved knight, the Princess is struck by one of Lucifer's laser beams.
Now, Arthur must venture back to the Lucifer's palace and destroy the demon in order to rescue the Princess' soul and bring her back to life! And it won't matter whether he fights in his shining armor or in his underwear alone...the bravest Knight in the land isn't going to be stopped by some monsters! Although the game starts with graveyard and marsh territory familiar from the first game, later levels are set in a tower, a mass of skeletons, and a castle.
Players progress from left to right (from bottom to top in level 3), and have to hack down the aforementioned monsters with a sword. The journey includes ledges, ladders, lava pits and slippery slopes. Different weapons can be collected, by finding suits of armor inside chests. Each of the five stages has its own setting and a final boss.

El malvado y escurridizo Loki ha saqueado de nuevo el hermoso y pacifico reino de Lexet aterrorizando a todos sus habitantes. El caballero Arthur, es decir usted, debe vengar a su pueblo y rescatar a la hermosísima princesa Tamara. ¡Póngase su armadura, tome sus armas y extermine a Loki y a sus repugnantes esbirros!

Ghouls'n Ghost sur Master system est un jeu d'action se déroulant dans un univers médiéval. L'histoire débute lorsque des revenants attaquent le royaume et capturent la petite amie du chevalier Arthur. Incarnez ce dernier et partez en croisade contre les envahisseurs avant qu'ils ne sacrifient sa dulcinée pour ressusciter un démon terrifiant.

Tudo começou no passado, quando os cavaleiros percorreram o país em busca de Holy Grail, defendendo a honra das donzelas e travando uma luta contra as forças diabólicas. O corajoso guerreiro Sir Arthur está participando desta destruição, e só ele pode adentrar no Castelo do Demônio para aniquilar o Príncipe da Escuridão. Você viajará pelas mais inóspitas regiões do planeta, tendo um verdadeiro arsenal ao seu lado. Quando sua sorte estiver diminuindo, você contará com a ajuda de armas mágicas, mas tome cuidado. Se não souber usá-las poderá ser transformado num pato! Não há tempo a perder... Vidas dependem de você. Branda sua espada e transforme seus inimigos em picadinho!

locale.title: Global Defense
locale.synopsis: Arcade translation of Sega's SDI. You pilot a satellite in outer space. Your job: To destroy alien attackers who are waging a nuclear war against planets in the solar system, including Earth and even the moon! What's unique about this title, is the satellite and your primary weapon move independently of each other. Position your satellite too far away from the action and the bullets take too long to hit your target. It's a good balance between dodging objects crucial to your survival and shooting down the enemy targets. If the planet takes too much damage, you lose. There are both Offensive and Defensive battle modes. There is also a 2-player mode where you and a friend can team up, one controlling the satellite and the other controlling the weapon making this a multiplayer game as well.
¡Están atacando el planeta Tierra! Mortíferos misiles han sido disparados desde los confines del universo contra nuestro planeta.nnMerece usted el titulo de "Defensor Mundial"?

Global Defense sur Master System est un shoot'em up se déroulant dans l'espace. Les extraterrestres attaquent tout le système solaire et il vous incombe la tâche de le défendre. En solo ou à 2 joueurs, pilotez un satellite d'attaque et tirez sur tout ce qui bouge dans des modes de jeu alternant les phases offensives et défensives.

A Terra está sendo atacada! Mísseis mortais são disparados de bases secretas, escondidas na Galáxia para destruir nosso planeta. Ele precisa de um campeão com coragem para operar o Satélite Global Defense. Alguém bastante forte para vencer esta batalha espacial. Ao seu lado estão apenas o Satélite Global Defense e um super canhão a laser. Nas 10 telas cheias de ação, use toda a sua perícia e destrua tudo que vier em sua direção. Mas, lembre-se, a cada tela os riscos aumentam! Será que você está preparado para o Global Defense?

locale.title: Golden Axe
locale.synopsis:
Sega's classic arcade beat-'em-up game, Golden Axe puts in the shoes of one of three heroes, each with his own reason for trying to overthrow the evil rule of Death-Adder, who - along with his forces of darkness - kidnapped and imprisoned the King and his daughter and stole the legendary Golden Axe.
This is a horizontal fighting game, where you basically take one of the three characters (a warrior, a dwarf or an amazon) and bash everything which stands between you and Death Adder himself.

El valiente guerrero Tarik ha emprendido un viaje de aventuras acompañado por su poderosa espada y un poder mágico a fin de recuperar el Hacha Dorada que ha sido robada por el titán Death-Adder. El viaje que acaba de emprender está lleno de peligros y trampas y Tarik tendrá que pelear con muchos bandidos y criaturas extrañas que esperan al acecho.

Sorti en 1989 sur borne d'arcade, Golden Axe revient sur Master System. Ce beat'em all vous propose d'incarner trois personnages différents (Ax Battler, Tyris Flare, Gilius Thunderhead) qui doivent retrouver le roi Yuria et sa fille, enlevés par le vilain Death Adder. Il est possible de lancer des sorts grâce aux potions trouvées tout au long de l'aventure.

O bravo guerreiro Tarik saiu para uma jornada de grandes aventuras, equipado com sua poderosa espada mágica... Titan, o sanguinário, roubou o escudo dourado e sua missão é trazê-lo de volta. Esta viagem é cheia de perigos e armadilhas e Tarik terá que mostrar toda sua força para vencer as estranhas criaturas que estão à sua espera.

locale.title: Golden Axe Warrior
locale.synopsis:
Golden Axe Warrior is a spin-off of the Golden Axe games, a series of side-scrolling Beat'Em Ups from Sega.
In ancient times a horde of giants rebelled against the elders and a brutal war ensued. Things looked grave until finally a hero, carrying the Golden Axe, appeared and drove back the giants. Since then, the kingdom of Firewood has been ruled by a family that had mastered the power of the nine crystals to ward off all evil from Firewood. Everyone lived in peace until one of Firewood's ministers betrayed his king and sold the nine crystals to Death Adder, one of the evil giants. Death Adder has hidden the nine crystals in nine dungeons, has unleashed hordes of monsters and is threatening to take over the world. Will there be another hero who can find the Golden Axe and defeat Death Adder?
Gameplay in Golden Axe Warrior is very similar to The Legend Of Zelda, meaning you will spend most of your time exploring the large overworld fighting against lots of enemies and looking for the dungeons in which the crystals are hidden. Inside the dungeons you have to fight more enemies, find treasures and keys, solve simple puzzles and defeat the dungeon's boss to get one of the crystals. In order to survive against the large number of enemies, you will be able to find many different weapons and three different spells.

En la antigüedad una horda de gigantes se rebeló contra los ancianos y se produjo una guerra brutal. Las cosas parecían serias hasta que finalmente un héroe, que llevaba el Hacha Dorada, apareció y derrotó a los gigantes. Desde entonces, el reino de Firewood ha sido gobernado por una familia que había dominado el poder de los nueve cristales para alejar todo el mal de Firewood. Todos vivían en paz hasta que uno de los ministros de Firewood traicionó a su rey y vendió los nueve cristales a Death Adder, uno de los gigantes malvados. Death Adder ha ocultado los nueve cristales en nueve mazmorras, ha desatado hordas de monstruos y está amenazando con dominar el mundo. ¿Habrá otro héroe que pueda encontrar el Hacha Dorada y derrotar al Death Adder?

Golden Axe Warrior est un beat'em up sur Master System se déroulant des années après les événements du premier opus. L'histoire débute lorsqu'un proche du roi le trahit en volant les 9 cristaux pour les donner à Death Adder, un géant maléfique. Votre mission consiste à récupérer les cristaux cachés dans 9 donjons, pour éviter que le royaume ne sombre.

A paz mundial está seriamente ameaçada. Death Adder, um abominável gigante, roubou os 9 cristais mágicos do Reino de Firewood e os escondeu em incríveis labirintos. Estes cristais protegiam o povo de Firewood do domínio do Mal. Mas agora que eles se foram, o mundo corre um grande perigo ! Inúmeras cidades e vilas já foram destruídas, o número de mortos aumenta a cada dia... Um valente guerreiro já tentou acabar com este pesadelo, mas o desafio foi grande demais para ele... O quê ? Você é capaz de enfrentar Death Adder ? Então não perca tempo ! Mas lembre-se: será uma longa jornada, e somente quem estiver disposto a arriscar tudo conseguirá achar os cristais e ganhar o Golden Axe, a única arma capaz de aniquilar Death Adder.

locale.title: Golfamania
locale.synopsis:
Golfamania is a golfing simulation game where players play on an 18 hole golf course with all the rules and scoring like in the real game.
Within the game there are 4 different modes to play on that includes Practice, Match Play, Stroke Play, and Pro Tournament. In Practice a single player can play any of the 18 holes available. Match Play is 2 player mode against human or computer. Stroke Play is the player can play up to 4 others that can include 1 computer player. In this mode the character skill can increase in 3 different areas that are power, accuracy, and luck with the 6 different characters available. The main mode is the Pro Tournament and it is where the player plays against over 30 computer players (all playing different holes) with the objective to score lower than the other players (as per the rules of golf). Based on performance the player can earn experience points (XP) that they can use to upgrade the power, accuracy, and luck of the character for future tournaments. Some of the holes have awards like longest drive and hole in one awards that can earn bonus XP.
Regardless of the mode the game is played in the same sort of way. The player selects a character (the selection depends on the mode) and then sets up the character by naming and picking their style. In all modes but Practice the player must pick 3 golf clubs that they must remove from their selection of 17 different clubs (1-5 wood, 1-9 Iron, Pitching Wedge, Sand Wedge, and Putter). When playing the player is presented with a top down view where the player lines up the shot and the location on the golf ball they want to hit (for spin). Then the player selects the club they want to use (all go varying distances). When that is all done the player must play the skill part of the game, where they are presented with a power bar that has a marker that going is up and down along it. The player must stop the marker on the red area in the centre of the power bar to get a good hit (with the center been a perfect hit)and if this area is missed the ball will only travel about 20 yards (compared to about 100+ yards of a good hit). The amount of red that is on the power bar depends on the golf club used. To help the player the distance of the shot can be lowered in exchange for a lower marker speed and can be used for shots closer to the hole (very helpful for putter shots). The game uses battery backed RAM save to continue play later.
