Traversez 6 missions et sauvez un maximum de gens avec votre mitrailleuse et vos grenades pour obtenir la meilleure fin possible et la plus grosse prime remise par le Président des États-Unis himself !

locale.title: Os 12 Trabalhos de Jongo
locale.synopsis: Your goal is to help Jongo collect the lotus flowers in their sacred places, but beware, they can only be pushed, never pulled
Su objetivo es ayudar a Jongo a recoger las flores de loto en sus lugares sagrados, pero cuidado, sólo pueden ser empujados, nunca tirados
Seu objetivo é ajudar Jongo a coletar as flores de lótus em seus lugares sagrados, mas cuidado, elas só podem ser empurradas, nunca puxadas.

locale.title: OutRun
locale.synopsis:
Race across varied terrain in this conversion of one of the most famous arcade racing games. Your Ferrari is at the ready, complete with female passenger, over a series of short tracks.
Gameplay is viewed form just above and behind the car, so you can see it. The roads are full of sharp bends and hazards, contact with which can cause the car to roll and lose you time. On each section of track there is a fork in the road, allowing you to choose which direction you go in. You have to complete 5 track sections in total, out of the 15 in the game.

Circuito automovilístico de gran acción. Probará su habilidad como piloto, mostrando la velocidad y distancia recorrida en una rica variedad de pistas. Acelere a fondo hacia la meta. Disfrute de las sensaciones realistas de aceleración, cambio de via, terreno accidentado, curvas cerradas, y mucho más.

OutRun sur Master System est l'adaptation de la célébrissime version arcade. Vous êtes au volant d'une rutilante Ferrari Testarossa, avec à vos côtés une jolie blonde que vous tenterez d'épater grâce à vos talents de pilote.

Uma emocionante aventura em altíssima velocidade. Teste toda sua técnica e perícia para dirigir como um piloto de verdade. Acelere tudo que puder até a linha final, mas, cuidado com as curvas. Elas são fechadas e você deve descobrir o melhor modo de transpô-las. Nos terrenos acidentados é melhor dirigir com cuidado. Seja o grande vencedor e tente colocar o seu nome na lista dos recordistas. Out Run, para os grandes pilotos.

locale.title: OutRun 3-D
locale.synopsis: This edition of the classic driving game takes the original and adds a 3D view, using the Master System's 3D glasses. Little else is modified. You still drive a red Ferrari on a road which forks into more and more levels. The main differences are the levels, which look slightly different, the fact that your Ferrari is slightly smaller than the original Master System conversion, and that there are three new sound tracks to choose from; Midnight Highway, Color Ocean and Shining Wind. The original Magical Sound Shower is still left for the traditionalists.

Abróchese el cinturón de seguridad y dése una vuelta tridimensional por el mundo de la aventura. El Gran Premio 3-D? de Sega es tan real que le dejará sin aliento. Mientras su coche latiguea por procelosas curvas y por montañas, casi podrá sentir el gemir de los motores y el restallar del viento por su cara.

OutRun 3-D sur Master System est l'adaptation de la célébrissime version arcade. Vous êtes au volant d'une rutilante Ferrari Testarossa, avec à vos côtés une jolie blonde que vous tenterez d'épater grâce à vos talents de pilote. Votre objectif est de passer la ligne d'arrivée en ayant au préalable franchi tous les points de contrôle dans le temps imparti.

Esta edição do clássico jogo de condução leva o original e adiciona uma vista 3D, usando os óculos 3D do Master System. Pouco mais é modificado. Você ainda dirige uma Ferrari vermelha em uma estrada que se bifurca em mais e mais níveis. As principais diferenças são os níveis, que parecem um pouco diferentes, o fato de que sua Ferrari é um pouco menor que a conversão original do Master System, e que há três novas trilhas sonoras para escolher; Rodovia da meia-noite, cor do oceano e vento brilhante. O original Magical Sound Shower ainda é deixado para os tradicionalistas.

locale.title: OutRun Europa
locale.synopsis: The third game in the OutRun series, which revolutionised the third-person perspective style of racing games. The levels are set across Europe, as you bid to escape from the police. Unlike in the predecessors, you use a different vehicle on each level, with motorbikes and jet-skis adding variety and taking different skill to use. You must complete each level within the strict time limits, and the roads are dogged with other cars to avoid and overtake. You can choose between sound effects or music.

Prepárese una travesía entre la vida y la muerte. En la persecucion de agentes enemigos deje une estela humeante a través de toda Europa en los vehículos más poderosos. Sólo su pericia y determinación le permitirán llegar hasta su destino: Berlin!

OutRun Europa sur Master System reprend la recette qui a fait le succès du précédent volet. Les courses se déroulent en Europe et vous pouvez désormais piloter d'autres véhicules que la Ferrari pour boucler le parcours dans le temps qui vous est imparti.
Port no oficial de la version Pacman de Game Gear
Portage non officiel de la version Game gear de Pacman

locale.title: Pac-Mania
locale.synopsis: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board in order to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now in 3-D and is larger than screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man now has the ability to jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid air collision!

Pac-Mania es una variante del juego Pac-Man. Necesitas guiar a Pac-Man alrededor de un laberinto y comer todos los puntos en el tablero para proceder a la siguiente ronda. Numerosos fantasmas multicolores también recorren el laberinto tratando de detenerte. Si comes una de las bolas de energía en el laberinto, los fantasmas temporalmente se volverán de color azul y escaparán de ti. Pac-man puede ganar puntos de bonificación por comer los fantasmas cuando están en este estado. El laberinto ahora está en 3-D y es más grande, ya que la pantalla se desplazará para seguir la acción. Para ayudar a salir del laberinto, Pac-Man ahora tiene la capacidad de saltar. Pero tenga cuidado, porque algunos de los fantasmas han aprendido este truco también y podrías terminar patas arriba en una colisión en medio del aire!

Pac-Mania est un jeu d'action sur Master System. Disposant d'une nouvelle vue isométrique, cet épisode de la série des Pac-Man vous propose toujours de guider le petit personnage à travers des puzzles variés tout en dévorant les boules jaunes. Il vaut éviter les fantômes qui vous pourchassent à moins d'avoir avalé un bonus qui vous permet de les manger. Au rang des nouveautés, Pac-Man et les fantômes peuvent désormais sauter.

locale.title: Palhacos
locale.synopsis: Capture all the monkeys before time runs out to pass the stage.nnMove the seesaw sideways by going left and rightnnTo control the throwing angle of the clown on the seesaw, use the directional pad up and down.nnnnWatch out! If the clown falls off the seesaw he will get hurt.

Captura todos los monos antes de que el tiempo se agote para pasar de fase.nnMueva la gancho hacia los lados yendo a la derecha e izquierdannPara controlar el ángulo de lanzamiento del payaso que está en la gancho, utilice la direccional hacia arriba y hacia abajo.nnnnPrecaución! Si el payaso cae fuera de la ganga, él se lastimar.

Capture todos os macacos antes que o tempo se esgote para passar de fase.nnMova a gangorra para os lados indo para direita e esquerda nnPara controlar o ângulo de lançamento do palhaço que está na gangorra, use a direcional para cima e para baixo.nnnnCuidado! Se o palhaço cair fora da gangorra ele irá se machucar.

locale.title: Paperboy
locale.synopsis: Based on the arcade game, the object of Paperboy is to deliver papers to your customers while inflicting as much damage as possible to the houses of your non-customers. To make things more difficult, numerous obstacles get in your way including construction workers, rogue tires, skateboarders, dogs and cats, cars, and even the occasional tornado.

Monte su bicicleta y ¡a las calles! Solamente su magnifica destreza como ciclista y un brazo que puede tirar fuertemente le pueden ayudar a sobrevivir una semana de acción divertida. Evite coches, trabajadores, borrachos y cortacespedes mientras trata de entregar todos sus periódicos.

Paperboy sur Master System est l'adaptation du succès arcade du même nom. Vous incarnez un jeune livreur de journaux à vélo et devez effectuer votre tâche le plus rapidement possible. Prenez garde tout de même aux divers obstacles, à savoir les automobilistes, chiens, skaters et autres trous dans la chaussée.

Auf Dein Rad und los auf die Straße! Nur durch geschicktes Radeln und zielsicheres Werfen wirst Du diese Woche voller witziger Acfion überleben! Bestrafe die Leute, die nicht deine Kunden sind, aber vermeide Autos, Arbeiter, Besoffene und Rasenmäher, die Dir den Weg blockieren wollen.

O Sol começa a brilhar... É hora de você acordar para ajudar Paper Boy a entregar os jornais para seus leais clientes. Isto pode parecer um trabalho simples, mas você precisará de toda sua perícia para sobreviver aos obstáculos que encontrar pela frente. Ao final de cada dia, seu chefe mal encarado supervisionará seu trabalho. Se tiver sido bem feito, terá que acordar bem cedo no dia seguinte. Caso contrário terá que arrumar outro emprego...

locale.title: Parlour Games
locale.synopsis: Includes 3 titles: Billiards, Darts & World Bingo. Billiards, allows you to play different variations of the game, such as nine ball and five ball. Darts includes variations and well, including 301, 501, Around The Clock & Double Down. World Bingo combines slot machines and bingo.
Elije el excitante juego de billar, los dardos o el bingo. En el billar, elije bola nueve o rotación. En los dardos, juega a 301 o 501. O prueba tu suerte en el bingo.

Parlour Games est ce qu'il convient d'appeler un bon vieux jeu des familles. C'est du moins dans cette catégorie que Sega l'avait classé, en affichant fièrement un « Family » dans le coin de cette boîte Master System au design on ne peut plus particulier. Et s'il est un jeu familial au sens propre, Parlour Games est un des seuls à pouvoir se jouer à quatre. Il s'agit en fait d'une simulation de billard, de fléchettes et de bingo, genre que l'on trouve habituellement plus souvent sur PC que sur consoles de salon.

locale.title: Pat Riley Basketball
locale.synopsis: Pat Riley Basketball is a Basketball game, developed and published by Sega, which was cancelled before it was released.
Pat Riley Basketball es un juego de baloncesto, desarrollado y publicado por Sega, que fue cancelado antes de su estreno.
Pat Riley Basketball est un jeu de basket-ball, développé et publié par Sega, qui a été annulé avant sa sortie.

locale.title: Penguin Adventure
locale.synopsis: Konami's 1986 Penguin Adventure for the MSX ported to the Master System by Zemina. Sequel to epic jumping game Antarctic Adventure, Penguin Adventure adds plentiful levels, secrets, items and even boss fights. Video games featuring penguins are generally as cool as penguins themselves, and Penguin Adventure isn't an exception.

El Reino de los pingüinos está en declive y su Princesa sufre una enfermedad terminal que solamente la Manzana Dorada puede curar. Pero hay un problema: esta manzana sólo se puede encontrar en el Continente de los Sueños, de donde los pingüinos fueron expulsados por terribles dragones. Un pingüino, un joven pingüino, enamorado de la Princesa Penko, con devoción buscará la Manzana Dorada, enfrentándose a muchos peligros intentando traerla a tiempo para la Princesa.

Le joueur doit orienter le personnage pour qu'il perde le moins de temps possible (le manchot courant en continu), les obstacles allant des ennemis de base aux bombes, crevasses, rondins et autres.L'action se déroule sur un scrolling vertical, le manchot est situé en bas de l'écran et peut se déplacer de gauche à droite et sauter; Toute la difficulté du jeu est basée sur l'anticipation des sauts pour éviter les obstacles ou entrer dans les "crevasses à bonus". L'action du jeu est une succession de courses avec des décors qui changent en fonction des niveaux.nnLe héros peut amasser une sorte de pécule, et certaines crevasses sur la route sont en fait des boutiques, des raccourcis, des épreuves ou autres. Les qualités de ce jeu sont sa durée de vie assez longue et son concept novateur.

locale.title: Penguin Land
locale.synopsis:
Welcome to Penguin Land, where you're going underground to plan more than your next move. Because now with the help of a super advanced battery, you can actually design each game maze as you play and save your maze for more fun later.
Here's the setting. You're aboard a cosmic expedition that's full of action and adventure. And guess who's in command?
That's right, you're Overbite, commander of a special Penguin Task Force.Your mission: bring fragile eggs back safely to home from a foreign land.Your journey will take you deep into mysterious caverns where dangerous animals await to attack and destroy your eggs.
But remember, your space ship and crew need you too. So be careful not to "crack-up" because you, can't be a hero with "egg on your face."

Bienvenido al País de los Pingüinos. Su misión: devolver a casa, desde un país lejano los ágiles huevos, sanos y salvos. Su viaje le llevarà por misteriosas cavernas, donde le esperan animales peligrosos para atacarle y destruir los huevos.

Penguin Land sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous commandez un pingouin. L'objectif est de transporter son oeuf vers le bas de l'écran en évitant soigneusement d'entrer en contact rapproché avec les ours polaires ou de se prendre un rocher en pleine tête.

locale.title: Doki Doki Penguin Land : Uchuu Daibouken

game.name: Pga Tour Golf

locale.title: PGA Tour Golf
locale.synopsis:
PGA Tour Golf introduced many of the conventions commonly seen in the genre since. The three-click control method (the first to start the swing, the second setting power and over-swing, the third setting draw or fade) allowed for a multitude of different shots, and required a sense of timing.
Four courses are included, one of them a fantasy 'links' course designed by the programmers. Some of the holes are fiendish, with bunkers, water hazards and trees, and the need to plan strategies to get the best approach to the green.
When playing a tournament there are 60 opponents, each representing top US golfers - ten of these appear with tactical advice for each hole.

La multitud que rodea el hoyo número 18 enmudece. Después de 27.032 yardas, 71 hoyos y cuatro penosas vueltas, un golpe de 23 pies te dará el birdie que te separa de tu primera victoria en el torneo. Este es el gran momento. ¡PGA TOUR Golf pone en tus manos toda la emocitón, diversión, desafío y recompensas del auténtico PGA TOUR!

PGA Tour Golf sur Master System est un classique parmi les jeux de golf de l'époque. Le système de frappe en trois temps (démarrer, puissance et effet) vous offre une palette de coups très variés. Dans le mode Tournoi, vous serez opposé à 60 adversaires, représentant les meilleurs golfeurs US de l'époque.

game.publisher: Electronic Arts - Sterling Silver Software - Tengen

locale.title: Phantasy Star
locale.synopsis:
Alis is a young girl whose brother Nero was brutally killed by a mysterious man known as Lassic. Nero's last words were: "Sister, find a warrior named Odin, he can help you to defeat Lassic!" Now Alis' dangerous adventure begins. Her first task is to find Odin. Then, with help and support from her friends, Alis will have to stop the evil Lassic and save the world...
This game is the very first installment in the long-lived Phantasy Star series. It is a futuristic RPG that uses a turn-based combat system (viewed from first-person perspective). An unusual feature of this game is that some locations are also viewed from first-person perspective. You can explore those locations by moving forward or backward, and the environments are in pseudo-3D.

Phantasy Star para Master System es un juego de rol en el que juegas como una chica llamada Alis. La historia comienza cuando su hermano es asesinado por Lassic. Alis se embarca en una búsqueda para detener Lassic y, al mismo tiempo, salvar el mundo. Las batallas tienen lugar en turnos y algunos entornos son visibles en 3D.

Phantasy Star sur Master System est un jeu de rôle dans lequel vous incarnez une jeune fille nommée Alis. L'histoire débute lorsque son frère est assassiné par Lassic. Alis se lance alors dans une quête pour stopper Lassic et, par la même occasion, sauver le monde. Les combats se déroulent en tour par tour et certains environnements sont visibles en 3 dimensions.

PHANTASY STAR leva você a um mundo eletrizante, diferente de tudo que você já experimentou. O objetivo é derrotar Lassic, o perverso tirano da Galáxia. Para conseguir cumprir sua missão, enfrentará um grande desafio através das estrelas, tentando achar amigos, itens mágicos, armas e armaduras. Neste jogo você aprenderá muito, não só sobre o Sistema Estelar Algol, como também a verdadeira herança de Alis e seus amigos. Você terá muitas horas de divertimento e aventura, com viagens espaciais e batalhas travadas no solo e no subsolo. Lógica e estratégia são as chaves para vencer Phantasy Star.
Algol é um sistema estelar que consiste em três planetas: o verdejante Palma, o árido Motavia, e o gelado Dezolis. Recentemente, o antigo benevolente rei Lassic converteu-se em uma nova religião e começou a governar Algol com um punho de ferro. Nero, o líder de um grupo rebelde, é brutalmente morto pelos policiais robóticos de Lassic. Suas últimas palavras foram dirigidas a sua irmã Alis: ele implora que ela encontre um guerreiro chamado Odin. Alis jura vingança contra Lassic e embarca em uma viagem para encontrar Odin e outros companheiros que irão ajudá-la a derrotar o tirano.
Phantasy Star é comumente considerado um dos progenitores do estilo japonês de RPGs. Ao contrário de Dragon Quest, ele tem uma estética visual de estilo anime, e contém muitos elementos característicos do gênero. Ao invés de ser lançado como um aventureiro ou guerreiro em uma missão impessoal, o jogador controla um personagem com sua própria história de fundo, motivações e desejos. O jogo introduz o modelo típico do gênero de personagens não-jogadores específicos que se juntam ao grupo por motivos relacionados a um enredo. O jogo também é notável por ser um dos primeiros RPGs com um protagonista feminino pré-determinado. É definido em um ambiente de sci-fi em que a tecnologia avançada e mágica co-existem, um pouco reminiscente de Star Wars.
O núcleo de jogabilidade é influenciado por jogos como Ultima, com combate por turno mais simples contra inimigos aparecendo aleatoriamente, que é semelhante a Wizardry. O jogador controla Alis pelo mapa-mundi, visitando cidades e dungeons que são representadas por ícones. As dungeons têm gráficos pseudo-3D e são labirínticas.
O jogador pode comprar novas armas, armaduras, escudos, bem como curar e restaurar itens nas cidades, ou encontrá-los em cofres de tesouro nas masmorras. Cada personagem utiliza tipos de arma únicos (por exemplo, Myau usa garras ou presas, Odin manipula armas e machados, etc.). Pontos de experiência são concedidos por derrotar inimigos; Depois de um personagem ter acumulado uma quantidade suficiente deles, ele ou ela ganha um nível, ganhando pontos adicionais de vida máxima (HP) e maiores parâmetros de combate. Alguns personagens podem lançar feitiços mágicos, exigindo pontos mágicos (MP), que também aumentam ao upar. Os personagens podem visitar médicos nas cidades, recuperando HP e MP. O progresso do jogo pode ser salvo em qualquer lugar.
Juego amateur de reflexión y lógica estilo buscaminas.

jeu Homebrew de reflexion.Un picross, logigraphe, hanjie, griddler, nonogram ou encore logimage est un jeu de réflexion solitaire, qui consiste à découvrir un dessin sur une grille en noircissant des cases, d'après des indices logiques laissés sur le bord de la grille.

locale.title: Pit Pot + Astro Warrior
locale.synopsis: Two super hits in one! Turn back the invaders and save the galaxy in ASTRO WARRIOR. Can you find your way safely through the magical mazes in PIT POT?
¡2 Super éxitos en un solo juego! nnHaz rendirse a los invasores y salva la galaxia en ASTRO WARRIOR.nn¿Podrás encontrar un camino seguro a través de los mágicos laberintos en PIT POT?nn
Deux super hits en un seul! Renvoyez les envahisseurs et sauvez la galaxie dans ASTRO WARRIOR. Pourrez-vous trouver votre chemin en toute sécurité à travers les labyrinthes magiques dans PIT POT?

locale.title: Pit-Fighter
locale.synopsis: Pit-Fighter is a 3rd-person fight game that features digitized graphics of real fighters and zooming effects. Players select one of three fighters (Buzz, Ty or Kato) to take on anyone who dares. At the conclusion of a match, players are individually awarded a Knockout Bonus, Brutality Bonus, and a Fight Purse. Every third match is a Grudge Match where players test the skills of each other. The last man standing is the winner of this three-knockdown match. Players fight their way to the Elimination Match to decide who wins the opportunity to dethrone the champion, the Masked Warrior.

¡En el foso, va en serio, es duro y no hay fugar para los que sufren palpitaciones! Se aceptan todos los contendientes - la lucha es por debajo del cinturón y las reglas de juego no existen. Sobrevivir y el premio en metálico es todo lo que importa ¡Bienvenido al mundo de Pitfighter!

Choisissez parmi les trois personnages disponibles (Buzz, Ty ou Kato) et lancez-vous dans les combats de rue de Pit-Fighter sur Master System. Le combattant qui reste debout l'emporte et il faut vaincre tous ses adversaires pour arriver à détrôner le grand champion : the Masked Warrior.

Pit-Fighter é um jogo de luta de terceira pessoa com personagens digitalizados. Escolha um dos três lutadores disponíveis (Buzz, Ty, ou Kato) e entre na arena. O lutador que permanece em pé ganha e deve derrotar todos os seus adversários para destronar o grande campeão: o Guerreiro Mascarado.
Hack brasileño del juego Psycho Fox, en el que el protagonista ha sido reemplazado por Pikachu.
Version Hack brésilienne de Psycho Fox ou le personnage principal est remplacé par pikachou.

locale.title: Pokemon Versao Amarela
locale.synopsis: This game is a hack of Teddy Boy.
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, en el que el protagonista ha sido reemplazado por un Pokemon.
Hack brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy ou le personnage principal est remplacé par un Pokemon.

locale.title: Pokemon Versao Azul
locale.synopsis: This game is a hack of Teddy Boy.
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, en el que el protagonista ha sido reemplazado por un Pokemon.
Hack brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy ou le personnage principal est remplacé poursuivit par des Pokemon.

locale.title: Pokemon Versao Secreta
locale.synopsis: Brazilian Hack of the game Teddy Boy, but the characters (both the protagonist and the enemies) have been replaced by several Pokemon. It's a video dream. Or nightmare. Depending on how well you're doing. Scramble from maze to maze - each more magnificent than the one before it - bumping off various Pokemon as you go. Grab points objects. The colors are fantastic. Even the music is wild!
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, en el que el protagonista y los enemigos han sido reemplazados por varios Pokemon.
Hack brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy ou le personnage principal et les ennemis sont remplacés par des Pokemons.

locale.title: Pokemon Versao Vermelha
locale.synopsis: This game is a hack of Teddy Boy.
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, en el que el protagonista y los enemigos han sido reemplazados por varios Pokemon.
Hack brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy ou le personnage principal et les ennemis sont remplacés par des Pokemons.
Juego amateur el cual es un clon del famoso Pong.
Jeu Homebrew clone du célèbre Pong.
Jogo homebrew clone do famoso Pong.

locale.title: Pong Master 4k
locale.synopsis: An implementation of the classic game of Pong for the Sega Master System. Probably the first game for this console to ever be coded in C.
Versión amateur del famoso juego Pong.
Un version Homebrew du célèbre Pong

Este foi um jogo para o Sega Master System programado para o 2006 Minigame Compo. É basicamente um clone do Pong, mas também com a possibilidade de colocar "giro" na bola, com resultados muito estranhos.

locale.title: Pooyan
locale.synopsis: Help Mama Pig protect and save her piglets from the foxes. The foxes come and steal the piglets, take them away and lock them in a cage. Mama pig sits in a basket armed with a bow and arrow. The basket is mounted on a tree on a pulley system and she can move up and down the treetrunk.nn

Ayude a Mamá Cerda a proteger y salvar a sus cerditos de los malvados zorros, los cuales intentarán robar los cerditos y enjaularlos. Mamá Cerda se encuentra sentada y armada con un arco y flechas para tratar de salvar a sus cerditos.

Aidez Mama Pig a protéger et sauver ses porcelets des renards. Les renards viennent voler les porcelets, les emmener et les enfermer dans une cage. Mama pig se trouve dans un panier armé d'un arc et une flèche. Le panier monte dans un arbre grâce à un système de poulie et elle peut se déplacer vers le haut et le bas du tronc.
Port no oficial del juego "Pop Breaker" de Game Gear
Portage non officiel du jeux pop breaker sur GameGear.

locale.title: Populous
locale.synopsis:
You play a god, gaming against other gods in a celestial game of conquest. To win, you must help your chosen people take over the world and wipe out the vermin who worship that other god.
Each god starts out with a single human, dumped into the middle of the wilderness. Sometimes there is inhabitable land in sight, sometimes not. To get win, you must change the landscape, creating flat land for your followers to build on. The more followers you have you have, the more powerful you will be, so take care of them. Build as fast as you can, because the other god is doing the same.
When you have enough followers, you can make the leader of your people into a hero. He will then go around the land you have built, literally taking strength from the people into himself, and working his way toward the enemy. When he gets there, he will engage in holy warfare upon your enemy's people. He will burn; he will kill. And he won't stop until they're all dead... or he is.
But you don't have to let your people have all the fun; the god's have other tools as well. You can drown your enemies one at a time with your land lowering powers. Submerge their towns in swamps. Raise a volcano in the middle of their best farmland. Even better, you can flood the land and drain all the people who didn't build on high-ground.
And when you win, you'll have 500 more worlds to conquer. A god's play is just never done.

¡Ahora tiene la oportunidad de jugar a ser Dios!nn¡Haga el mundo en una semana y destruyalo en un santiamén!nnConquiste 5000 mundos hostiles nn¡Controle diluvios torrenciales,volcanes,patanos y terremotos! nn

Populous sur Master System est un jeu de stratégie qui vous propose de vous mettre dans la peau du Créateur. Commandez une civilisation et venez à bout des populations sous la joute de dieux adverses. En tant que Dieu, vous pouvez modeler les reliefs à votre aise, jeter des sorts, commander vos troupes et fabriquer des héros pour influencer les masses, et ce, dans plus de 500 mondes.

Você joga com um deus, jogando contra outros deuses em um jogo celestial de conquista. Para vencer, você deve ajudar seu povo escolhido a dominar o mundo e acabar com os vermes que adoram esse outro deus.nnnnCada deus começa com um único humano, jogado no meio do deserto. Às vezes há terra habitável à vista, às vezes não. Para ganhar, você deve mudar a paisagem, criando um terreno plano para seus seguidores. Quanto mais seguidores você tiver, mais poderoso você será, então cuide deles. Construa o mais rápido que puder, porque o outro deus está fazendo o mesmo.nnnnQuando você tem seguidores suficientes, você pode transformar o líder do seu povo em um herói. Ele então contornará a terra que você construiu, literalmente tomando força do povo para dentro de si mesmo, e indo em direção ao inimigo. Quando ele chegar lá, ele se envolverá em guerra santa contra o povo de seu inimigo. Ele vai queimar; ele vai matar. E ele não vai parar até que estejam todos mortos ... ou ele está.nnnnMas você não precisa deixar que seu pessoal tenha toda a diversão; o deus também tem outras ferramentas. Você pode afogar seus inimigos um de cada vez com seus poderes de terra. Mergulhe suas cidades em pântanos. Levante um vulcão no meio de suas melhores terras agrícolas. Melhor ainda, você pode inundar a terra e drenar todas as pessoas que não construíram em terreno alto.

locale.title: Poseidon Wars 3-D
locale.synopsis: In Poseidon Wars 3-D, you have just entered the navy as a cadet and you must make your way up to Admiral. To do this, you must go out at sea with a submarine and destroy several enemy targets. Once you have defeated each enemy target, the mission is completed, and, upon completing some of them, your rank increases. Before defeating each target, however, you also need to destroy enemy jets, choppers, and submarines who will launch missiles or rockets at you. If you are hit by any of these, damage is inflicted to the submarine, but you can shoot down any of the missiles or rockets. You will need to keep an eye on the built-in radar and sonar to find out where enemies will hit next. Your fuel is limited, and can be increased by destroying certain enemies. The game ends when your submarine is destroyed or you run out of fuel.

Mantenga su vista fija en el horizonte y el dedo en el gatillo listo para disparar en esta exptosiva batalla naval tridimensional de Sega.nnCon bombarderos en picado, misiles y torpedos que tratan de enviarle al fondo de los mares, necesitará de toda su habilidad y suerte para mantener su crucero de ataque a flote y destruír al enemigo.

Poseidon Wars 3-D sur Master System est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez un jeune cadet de la marine aspirant à passer au grade d'amiral. Pour ce faire, vous devez faire vos preuves sur le terrain, notamment aux commandes d'un sous-marin de guerre. Détruisez les navires, avions et hélicoptères en évitant les tirs ennemis et en prenant garde à ne pas épuiser vos réserves de carburant.

locale.title: Power Boggle Boggle
locale.synopsis: Unlicensed clone of Bubble Bobble.
Clon no oficial del juego Bubble Bobble
Clone Non officiel de Bubble Bobble

locale.title: Power Strike
locale.synopsis:
The Earth is threatened by mutant plant life and their brainwashed human followers. Only one force can stop the evil vegetables from taking root: Power Strike, the most versatile jet fighter in the world. Blast the enemy in the air and and on the ground and save the planet from the creeping green menace.
There are six rounds to complete (three in the mobile version). In each round, numbers (from 1 to 8) can be found on the ground either enclosed by a ring, or in the air carried by a ship. Getting these numbers will upgrade your firepower. Get more of the same number for a maximum upgrade. Unfortunately, whatever the type of firepower you get, you will have a limited supply of ammo, so you need to stock up on the same type of firepower if you get too low.
At the end of each round, there is an end-of-round boss which involves shooting parts of its base in order to destroy it. Intermediate bosses can be found in the last three rounds (console version only).

La Tierra está amenazada por vida vegetal mutante y sus seguidores humanos zombies. Una fuerza puede detener el arraigo de los malvados vegetales: Power Strike, el caza de combate más versátil del mundo. Destruya al enemigo en el aire y en tierra, y salve al planeta de la reptante amenaza verde.

Power Strike sur Master System est un shoot'em up dans lequel vous prenez les commandes d'un avion de chasse futuriste. Six niveaux durant, vous partez en croisade contre les envahisseurs extraterrestres. Sur terre ou dans les airs, détruisez tout ce qui bouge et renvoyez les aliens sur leur planète originelle.

locale.title: Power Strike II
locale.synopsis:
In the early 1930s, people have lived in poverty since the great depression in 1929. Being laid off from their job, a great amount of pilots became the sky pirates in order to survive. The sea and the sky near Italy have been plundered by them. You earn a living by shooting down these pirates.
Power Strike II is a top-down shooter where you must select which weapon you want to use during the game, and then fight your way through various stages, destroying both air- and ground-based enemies along the way. You can upgrade your weapons by collecting power-ups that can only be found by shooting specific ships. You will need to defeat the end-of-level boss (by destroying parts of it) in order to proceed to the next level.

Un piloto solitario se coloca los arneses de vuelo y se prepara para la batalla. Su vida lo ho llevado hasta este momento, él sabe que ha llegado la hora de ¡eliminar a las fuerzas piratas de los cielos!

Power Strike II sur Master System est un shoot'em up dans lequel vous prenez les commandes d'un avion de chasse futuriste. Six niveaux durant, vous partez en croisade contre les envahisseurs extraterrestres. Sur terre ou dans les airs, détruisez tout ce qui bouge et renvoyez les aliens sur leur planète originelle.

No início da década de 1930, as pessoas viviam na pobreza desde a grande depressão de 1929. Sendo demitidas do trabalho, uma grande quantidade de pilotos tornou-se os piratas do céu para sobreviver. O mar e o céu perto da Itália foram saqueados por eles. Você ganha a vida abatendo esses piratas.nnnnO Power Strike II é um jogo de tiro de cima para baixo no qual você deve selecionar qual arma você quer usar durante o jogo, e depois lutar em vários estágios, destruindo tanto inimigos aéreos quanto terrestres ao longo do caminho. Você pode atualizar suas armas coletando power-ups que só podem ser encontrados atirando em naves específicas. Você precisará derrotar o chefe do final do nível (destruindo partes dele) para prosseguir para o próximo nível.

locale.title: Predator 2
locale.synopsis:
Predator 2 is similar to its 16-bit counterpart. The player controls Lt. Mike Harrigan in a side scrolling view (instead of an isometric one) through 7 levels.
Mike has to fight drug dealers and must rescue a certain number of hostages at each level. The Predator's three-dotted laser aim is a menace to avoid, which can kill either the hostages or Mike himself. Gang members killed drop drugs which can be picked up for points (and sent to the drugs squad). At the end of each level a boss must be defeated.
Mike can move and shoot in all 8 directions, but can only stop and shoot up, down, left and right. Besides his pistol, Mike can also collect new weapons such as grenades, shotguns, machine-guns and rifles. Body armor can be collected for health and med kits for extra lives.

¡¡¡El Predator está en la ciudad pasando unos días asesinos!!! Viene de un mundo lejano...es invisible y está armado con poderosas armas totalmente desconocidas para nosotros. Está al acecho de humanos para cazarlos despiadadamente...por diversión. Como el Teniente Harrigan, tu tarea es rescatar gente inocente de las garras de las malvadas bandas de traficantes de drogas ? antes de que se conviertan en trofeos del Predator. Búscale en las calles, tejados y subterráneos hasta que le hagas frente. ¡El Predator ha comenzado su caza...encuéntralo antes de que él te encuentre!

Predator 2 sur Master System est un jeu d'action se déroulant en plein coeur des années 90. Vous incarnez le lieutenant Mike Harrington en pleine opération contre la guerre des gangs lorsqu'il découvre une nouvelle menace, le Prédator. Il s'agit d'une entité alien qui tue tout sur son passage. Votre job est de mettre un terme à cette menace extraterrestre.

locale.title: Prince of Persia
locale.synopsis:
The Grand Vizier Jaffar has thrown you into a dark dungeon and plans to marry the girl of your dreams in an hour. You're not going to let that happen are you? Try to escape from the dungeon, take out Jaffar's guards, find your way through the Sultan's palace and defeat Jaffar himself. Now go, you've got 60 minutes!
Prince of Persia is a 2D platformer with run and jump gameplay. Your hero must avoid deadly traps, solve some simple puzzles and engage in sword fights with the guards. The player has an infinite amount of lives, but has to restart at the beginning of a level each time he dies, and must complete the game within an hour. An especially noteworthy aspect of the game is the very fluent animation of your character.
The Game Boy Color and SNES versions of the game feature additional levels and new enemies. The Genesis version has a new intro and an altered set of graphics but the level layout remains almost identical to that of the original.

Tomadas a partir de cientos de clips cinematográficos, las secuencias animadas parecen tan increíblemente humanas que en pocos segundos te transformarás en un adicto de este juego. Tu habilidad para luchar con la espada será puesta a toda prueba mientras haces frente al reto que te impone el resolver este fascinante enigma. Gran cantidad de pasajes secretos, salones fantásticos, violentos oponentes y pociones mágicas estarán a tu espera cuando trates de frustrar los planes del malvado Gran Visir Jaffar y rescatar a la hermosa princesa, para así transformarte en el PRINCIPE DE PERSIA.

Prince of Persia sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes se déroulant dans le Moyen-Orient. Le joueur contrôle le Prince de Perse qui peut marcher, courir, se baisser, sauter, s'accrocher et combattre à l'épée. Le but est de terminer tous les niveaux pour libérer la princesse dans le temps imparti, c'est-à-dire une heure. Chaque niveau consiste en un donjon de plus en plus grand et parsemé d'embûches (précipices, dalles se dérobant sous les pieds, pics sortant du sol).

locale.title: Pro Wrestling
locale.synopsis: Pro Wrestling is a tag team professional wrestling game where one can choose from four tag teams to compete. These tag teams are the Mad Soldiers, the Orient Express, the Great Maskmen and the Crush Brothers and they all have something to prove. Each wrestler has his own special moves ranging anywhere from knee butts and body slams to flying head butts and pile drivers. The Mad Soldiers and the Great Maskmen can also use metal chairs to hit their opponents outside the ring while the Orient Express and the Crush Brothers have the capability of climbing onto the turnbuckle and releasing damaging blows to their opponents. Each wrestler can also bounce off the ropes to release a running attack. When a wrestler is low on health, he can tag his teammate in to carry on in the match. Compete in three sets of ten fall matches to complete the game. The matches are the Mexican League, the Pacific League and finally the World League. Pin the opponent ten times in a league to move on to the next.

¡Salte al cuadrilátero!nnAhora podrá formar parte del loco y duro mundo de la lucha litre. Usted dará cabezazos, codazos, y golpes con el cuerpo, y expulsar del cuadrilátero a su contrincante. Es posible que incluso le salve la campana.

Pro Wrestling sur Master System est un jeu de catch dans lequel vous incarnez les catcheurs de l'une des équipes suivantes : Mad Soldiers, Orient Express, Great Maskmen et les Crush Brothers. Chaque combattant possède ses propres spécificités, par exemple le fait de pouvoir utiliser des objets du décor. Pour finir le jeu, il faut compléter les ligues mexicaines, pacifiques et mondiales.

locale.title: Pro Yakyuu Pennant Race, The
locale.synopsis:
The Pro Yakyuu Pennant Race is a baseball game for the Sega Master System. The game was an upgrade of Great Baseball, a title that was not released in Japan.
The game underwent significant changes, such as localization of players and teams for the Japanese market along with adding new game modes, a more detailed interface and featuring a bird's-eye view when fielding as opposed to Great Baseball's isometric view.

locale.title: Psychic World
locale.synopsis:
A scientist and his two female assistants work on ESP research in a remote science laboratory. One day, a section of the lab blows up. It turned out that the monsters kept for experiments escaped and took one of the assistants with them. The scientist gives an "ESP booster" to the remaining assistant so she can go rescue her.
Your character possesses psychic power which she uses to blast away her enemies. You start the game with few powers and eventually gain more as items dropped by monsters are picked up. You control powers such as fire, ice, sonic waves, temporary invincibility, levitation, and more. Press Down + Button 2 to access your arsenal of powers.

El Dr. Knavik necesita que usted emplee su "Sobrealimentador EPS" para rescatar a la joven Cecile. Ella y su hermana, Lucia, eran sus ayudantes, y los monstruos que el Dr. Knavik tenía para sus experimentos ¡escaparon con ella! Aventúrese en este mundo espantoso, místico, y a veces hermoso, esquive las numerosas criaturas y peligros, y ¡salve a la pobre Cecile!

Psychic World sur Master System vous met dans la peau de l'assistante d'un scientifique, dotée de pouvoirs télékinétiques. Vous avez échappé à l'explosion d'une partie du laboratoire d'expériences, duquel des monstres se sont échappés. Votre mission est de retrouver la deuxième assistante du professeur.

locale.title: Psycho Fox
locale.synopsis:
Psycho Fox is a platform game where you play a fox and you must get through seven worlds, consisting of three areas each. At the end of each world, there are one of seven bosses waiting to destroy you, but some of the later bosses are exactly the same as the earlier ones. The title is a bit misleading because you can also play as three other characters including Hippo, Leopard, and Monkey Boy. Each character has their own disadvantages. For example, Hippo is much slower than the other three. However, all the characters share one thing in common: they can use their fists and punch enemies as they approach them. They can also jump on them and keep knocking them in the ground until they disappear off the face of the earth. If they don't make them disappear, they will pop back out again and set out for revenge. Obstacles are scattered through each area, including spikes, cannonballs, esculators, fireballs, and steam.
You start the game with three lives. Once you touch an enemy, you lose a life. Lose any of your lives, and the game is over. If the game is over, you can continue where you left off. There are several items to find, and these can help you on your quest, and one of these items are eggs. If you break any of these eggs, either the "switch" item or the invincibility item is revealed. If you're lucky enough, a white bag is also revealed, but more often than not, one of your enemies can pop out from inside the egg. One egg will reveal a bird which you can carry for the rest of the game. This bird may be nothing but a pest, as it hinders your progress, but you can throw it at enemies to knock them out. It can also be used as a backup, meaning that you can have enemies touching you, but it is the bird that is killed, not you.
There is little chance that you'll find a white bag inside an egg, unless you go up into a secret area, which can often be found if you jump on springs that are scattered throughout the level. These white bags are useless, until you get to the bonus areas, which are at the end of each area. In these bonus stages, you can place a number of foxes on a path depending on how much white bags you've collected throughout each area.
When you complete Psycho Fox, you are treated to a funny ending.

Psycho Fox es un juego de aventura centrado alrededor de entretenidas y emocionantes escapadas de un zorro muy especial. Psycho Fox se aventura en muchos mundos inesperados para conbatir con las bestias y los monstruos extraños que encuentra en su paso.

Psycho Fox sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes rempli d'humour se déroulant dans un univers cartoon et coloré. Le jeu comporte 7 mondes constitués de 3 niveaux chacun. En plus du renard, le joueur peut incarner 3 animaux, à savoir un hippopotame, un singe ainsi qu'un léopard, chacun possédant ses propres forces et faiblesses.

Psycho Fox é a raposa escolhida para uma super missão: salvar o mundo da maldição de Madfox. Para isso terá que penetrar num mundo estranho, derrotar monstros e criaturas bizarras. Mas Psycho Fox é especial, tem uma poderosa técnica de golpes e uma extraordinária capacidade de se transformar em outros animais, como hipopótamo, macaco e até tigre, cada um com poderes sobrenaturais. Nesta missão, nossa raposa só tem dois aliados: o seu grande e forte amigo, o Bird Fly, e você!

locale.title: Putt & Putter
locale.synopsis: Putt & Putter is an isometric mini-golf game for 1-2 players. The game has different height levels. Because there are even bumpers, the game is like a mixture of a classic minigolf game, a pinball game and the classic game "Marble Madness".
Las olas chocan contra la costa mientras pones la pelota en el tee. A la distancia...¿paragolpes de pinball? Una extraña combinación de minigolf y pinball. ¡Es el Putt & Putter!
Putt & Putter est un jeu de mini-golf que l'on peut pratiquer seul ou à deux. La présence de nombreux ressorts sur les parcours en fait un mélange entre le jeu de flipper et le jeu de golf classique.

Putt & Putter é um jogo de minigolfe isométrico para 1-2 jogadores. O jogo tem diferentes níveis de altura. Porque há até bumpers, o jogo é como uma mistura de um clássico jogo de minigolfe, um jogo de pinball e o clássico jogo "Marble Madness"

locale.title: Puznic
locale.synopsis: Puznic, sometimes called Puzzle is an unlicensed Sega Master System port of Taito's Puzznic.nn
Puznic, también conocido como "Puzzle" es un juego no licenciado el cual es un port del clásico Puzznic de Taito.
Puznic, parfois appelé Puzzle est un portage non officiel de Puzznic de Taito.

locale.title: Quartet
locale.synopsis: Your job is to basically find the end-of-level boss, and then defeat it to obtain the key that will open the level exit, but your task is made difficult by the planet's inhabitants. Get the jet-pack to make it easier to navigate the level and shoot any inhabitants that get in the way. These inhabitants will leave behind something that you can get to increase your score, and the inhabitants will eventually regenerate. If any one of them touches you while you have the jet-pack, you land on the ground or the nearest platform, and have to get it again; and the same rule applies to the key.
La colonia espacial numero nueve está siendo amenazada por una invasión muy peligrosa. Los extraños atacan. Sólo tú tienes el poder de detener a este grupo y salvar a la colonia.

Dans le jeu d'action Quartet sur Master System vous devez récupérer des clés sur les boss de fin de niveau afin d'aller au prochain niveau. Seulement c'est sans compter sur les autochtones locaux qui feront tout pour vous empêcher d'y arriver. Enfournez votre jetpack, armez votre pistolet et en route vers l'aventure.

game.name: Quest For The Shaven Yak Starring Ren Hoek And Stimpy

locale.title: Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoek & Stimp
locale.synopsis:
Ren and Stimpy just found a pair of hooves which belong to the great Shaven Yak, who lost them in the last Yak shaving day. Now they must find the Shaven Yak and return him his hooves, or there won't be any more Yak shaving days!
In this platform game the player is prompted to choose playing either as Ren or Stimpy at the start of new life or some stages. Both can jump and shoot (Ren shoots toothbrushes, Stimpy spits), but each one has his own special ability: Ren can perform high jumps, Stimpy can smash things jumping over them. Each character starts the game with three lives.
Throughout levels such as "The Blacker Than Black Forest", "The Stinking Dry Desert" or "The Stinking Wet Bayou", Ren and Stimpy will face most animal enemies, such as birds, frogs, vultures, woodpeckers, snakes, etc. The levels are divided in few or several sub-level, and at the end of each level, they'll face a boss.
They'll also find some unusual weapons, as a slice of bread (which flies in circles), a remote controller (which casts electric waves) and a soap bar (which casts bubbles). If they get hit when using a weapon, they'll lose it, but won't lose health. They'll gain health by picking items like TVs, cash bags, bottles and boots.

Ren y Stimpy acaban de encontrar un par de pezuñas que pertenecen a la gran Shaven Yak, las cuales perdió en el último día del afeitado del Yak. Ahora deben encontrar a Shaven Yak y devolverle sus pezuñas, o no habrá más días del afeitado del Yak!nnnnEn este juego de plataformas el jugador puede escoger entre ser Ren o Stimpy al inicio de algunas de las pantallas. Ambos pueden saltar y disparar (Ren dispara cepillos de dientes, Stimpy escupe), y cada uno de ellos tiene su propia habilidad especial: Ren puede realizar saltos de altura de mayor alcance, Stimpy puede aplastar cosas saltando sobre ellas. Cada personaje empieza el juego con tres vidas.nnnnA lo largo de los niveles tales como "El bosque que Blacker Negro", "El hediondo desierto seco" o "La Hedionda Wet Bayou" Ren y Stimpy se enfrentarán a otros animales enemigos, tales como pájaros, ranas, pájaros carpinteros, buitres, serpientes, etc. Los niveles se dividen en varios sub-niveles, y al final de cada nivel, se enfrentarán a un jefe final.nnnnTambién van a encontrar algunas armas inusuales, como una rebanada de pan (que vuela en círculos), un mando a distancia (que emite ondas eléctricas) y una pastilla de jabón (que emite burbujas). Si son golpeados mientras utilizan un arma, perderán dicho arma, pero su salud no se verá afectada. Ellos podrán recuperar la salud al recoger artículos como televisores, bolsas de dinero en efectivo, botellas y botas.

Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoek & Stimpy sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel le joueur peut incarner Ren ou Stimpy dans leur quête pour ramener les sabots du tondeur de Yak. Vous pourrez choisir au début de chaque niveau quel personnage vous souhaitez incarner. Sachant que Ren saute haut et que Stimpy peut briser des obstacles. Vous devrez donc faire preuve de clairvoyance pour vous défaire de ces obstacles et éviter les embuches.

Você é mau-humorado e cabeça-dura? Sim? Então você é bem parecido com Ren. Se a resposta é não, certamente você vai se entender melhor com Stimpy, que é dócil, alegre e ingênuo demais. Mas ambos têm muito em comum, por mais incrível que isto possa parecer: são extremamente engraçados e juntos formam a sensacional dupla da famosa da série animada americana "The Ren & Stimpy Show"!nnnnDivirta-se com estes personagens nesta aventura, através de uma tortuosa caminhada pelo mais estranhos lugares, para recuperar os cascos do Grande Shaven Yak. Esta espécie de boi do Tibete - que é o símbolo do feriado favorito de Ren - está descalço e neste estado, jamais reaparecerá! Imagine o desespero de nossos amigos!nnnnMas é claro que esta missão não será fácil. Criaturas repugnantes como: cobras assassinas, pássaros bagunceiros, exército de lagostas e muito mais tentarão detê-los! Para se defender dos perigos mais inusitados que os esperam por toda a parte, Stimpy tosse bolas de cabelo, enquanto Ren arremessa escovas de dentes.nnnnO que você está esperando? Dê muitas gargalhadas com estas duas peças raras! Com certeza você vai virar fã!!

locale.title: R-Type
locale.synopsis:
R-Type is a side scrolling shoot 'em up best known for its extremely tough and strategic gameplay. You control the R-9 spaceship as it launches a last-ditch effort to repel the evil Bydo empire.
The R-9 comes equipped as standard with a small gun which can only take down the smallest of enemies without firing several shots. By holding down the fire button, it can be loaded up so as to release a large burst of energy, eliminating all but the strongest enemies in its path. From time to time, pods will come flying in your direction. Upon being shot, they release an upgrade. The first one will invariably be the one called "The Force", which is a weapons pod that clings either to the front or the back of your ship, absorbing any enemy bullets or acting as a bumper with which you can fly head-on into them. You can also use it as an offensive weapon by firing it and pulling it back in. Mastering the Force is vital to surviving in R-Type, since it must be used both as protection against bullet clusters, as a remote controlled cannon, and in order to clear the screen from obstacles. Other upgrades give you target-seeking missiles or a bigger main gun. Different gun types, differentiated by their colour, serve different purposes. The blue one sends laser beams bouncing across the screen (good for tunnels), the red one fires straight ahead, and the yellow one follows any walls it may encounter (good for artillery emplacements).
The stages of R-Type are made in an organic style, certainly inspired by H. R. Giger's artwork for the Alien movies. When it came out, it was considered trend-setting since it broke off from the stereotypical sci-fi mould of other shoot'em'ups. In part, the levels themselves are your enemy, which is exemplified by the fourth, where spider-like creatures weave webs that cover the screen and block your path, or levels with intricate tunnel systems. Still, the levels are best handled with a combination of strategy and reflexes, without the memorisation that is required of R-Type's contemporary rival, Gradius.
¡Se trata de usted contra las criaturas del malvado Imperio Bydo! Pilote la cosmonave supersecreta R-9 a través de oleadas de alienígenas y sus mortíferas máquinas de guerra.

R-Type sur Master System est un shoot'em up retraçant les guerres intersidérales entre les terriens et l'empire Bydo. Vous contrôlez un vaisseau spatial, le R 9 et débutez armé d'un simple canon apte pour détruire les ennemis les plus fragiles. Par la suite, vous installez différents canons sur votre vaisseau, chacun étant recommandé pour un type de structure particulière.

locale.title: R.C. Grand Prix
locale.synopsis: Get ready to rev up your motors, hit the dirt, and become "World Champion Remote Control Racer". But first, you'll have to prove you're the quickest, most radical, maneuver-maniac on the high-speed circuit today. How? By zooming through 10 different courses that get harder and trickier with each turn. Beware of dangerous track cross-overs, and of course, the rest of the field of expert R.C. Racers. During the tournament you'll get a bonus head-to-head Drag Race, too. So you can race your buddies to see who's the fastest on the track!

¡ Acaba de empezar una carrera de automóviles controlada por rad o dentro de tu casa! Con este juego tú puedes gozar de la excitación de una carrera de automóviles real controlada por radio. Goza de la emoción de cambiar un número de diferentes circuitos de carreras, donde cuatro automóviles controlados por radio se adelantan chocando contra otros. Hay también una carrera de velocidad esperándote.

R.C. Grand Prix sur Master System est un jeu de courses original car vous prenez les commandes de véhicules miniaturisés sur tout type de terrain. Au fur et à mesure des courses, customisez votre engin en changeant les suspensions, les pneus ainsi que le moteur.

locale.title: R.h.w. 2000
locale.synopsis: psycho fox brazilian hack
Hack brasileño del juego Psycho Fox.
Hack brésilien du jeu Psycho Fox.

locale.title: Rainbow Islands : Story of the Bubble Bobble 2
locale.synopsis:
Sequel to Bubble Bobble, Rainbow Islands sees Bub and Bob (in 2 player mode), who are now curiously small boys rather than dinosaurs, attempting to rid the Rainbow Islands of bad guys.
Using the power to cast rainbows, trapping anything underneath, the boys must ascend vertically 4 levels each island, with a big, bad boss at the end of each.
By trapping beasts under your rainbows, then jumping on them to break them you can collect seven different colored gems, and there are also power-ups for extra speed and rainbows.

¡La historia de Bubble Bobble continúa! Bubbly ha emprendido un viaje mágico y misterioso. Los ejemplares ciudadanos de las islas Rainbow han sido tomados prisioneros, y sólo el poder del arco iris de Bubby podrá salvarlos.

Rainbow Islands est un jeu de plates-formes. Bub et Bob, les deux héros de Bubble Bobble, sont redevenus humains au terme de leur précédente aventure et ils doivent désormais sauver les îles arc-en-ciel d'une bande de monstres. Il faudra sauter et utiliser votre pouvoir pour créer des arcs-en-ciel au cours des sept mondes du jeu, divisés en quatre niveaux chacun.

locale.title: Rambo III
locale.synopsis:
Play as Rambo in this light phaser friendly game. Battle your way through Afghanistan in a solo rescue mission. You are fighting alone for two reasons. One being the C.I.A. doesn't want to stir up a war, two being your Rambo! Your mission is to rescue your comrade Colonel Trautman from the Soviets. He was taken in as prisoner while he was delivering weapons to the Mujahedin freedom fighters. He is being held captive in a prison camp.
For weapons you have an AK-47 and grenades. You can pick up grenades by blasting open containers such as pots and crates. Use your fire-power to destroy all enemies and you will continue to the next stage.
The first stage is a Soviet army base packed with plenty soldiers. The next stage is a village where the soviets are hiding. Then the rest of the levels are Mountain, Prison Camp, Soviet camp (escape during night), Cave attack, then the final stage where you fight the Mil Hind Helicopter.

John Rambo, el soldado más popular de América, emprende un valeroso intento de rescate en una base militar soviética en el corazón de Afganistán devastado por la guerra. Un juego que pone a prueba hasta el límite su capacidad de combate.

Rambo III sur Master System est un jeu d'action directement adapté du film du même nom. L'histoire débute lorsque le colonel Trautman se fait kidnapper par les soviets. Lorsque John Rambo l'apprend, il prend le premier vol direction l'Afghanistan pour lui venir en aide. Armé de votre AK-47 et de grenades, tirez sur tout ce qui bouge jusqu'à l'affrontement final avec Mil Hind.

locale.title: Rampage
locale.synopsis:
George, Lizzy and Ralph were just ordinary Americans, until an experiment went wrong, turning them into a Gorilla, Lizard and Werewolf respectively. Following this, the three of them plan to go round destroying buildings, and up to 3 human players can join in.
Smashing at the edges of the buildings for long enough will make them collapse. The police and military are after you, and will shoot at you, so try to destroy them (failing that, you can avoid the bullets). You will need to eat regularly, with things like plants on offer, to avoid shrinking back to being human

La destrucción en masa nunca ha sido tan divertida. Todo un equipo de héroes, Ralph el lobo, George el gorila y Lizzie el lagarto. Destruirán todo lo que se les ponga delante. Rompa el hormigón, aplaste tranvías, cómase a un soldado de aperitivo. O una oficina de almuerzo. ¡Diviértase con RAMPAGE!

Rampage sur Master System est un jeu d'action ou à proprement parler un véritable défouloir. Le joueur incarne l'une des trois créatures géantes au choix (gorille, lézard ou loup garou). L'objectif est de mettre une ville à sac en rasant les immeubles et en piétinant les forces de l'ordre qui osent se mettre sur votre chemin. Bon carnage.

locale.title: Rampart
locale.synopsis: Tetris meets shoot-'em-up, Rampart was originally a one or two-player arcade game combining strategy and artillery action. Build your castle from Tetris-style pieces, place your cannons, bombard the enemy, try to repair, do it all over again. Later arcade revisions incorporated 3-player, and the PC conversion does as well, making it a faithful, entertaining classic for multiple players on the same PC.

Rampart combina el mejor de los juegos de estrategia para resolver un enigma, con una acción dinámica y destrucción medieval. Rampart permite que un máximo de dos jugadores viaje en el tiempo hasta la Edad Media para construir fortificaciones y ubicar cañones, tal como los poderosos Señores y Barones solían hacerlo.......... ¡Prepárese! Que la batalla está por comenzar.

Rampart est l'adaptation sur Master System du jeu de stratégie sorti sur borne d'arcade en 1990. Après avoir choisi un emplacement pour votre château parmi les quatre possibilités, vous placez des canons pour vous défendre contre les bateaux qui vous bombardent. Après chaque bataille, vous disposez de quelques secondes pour reconstruire vos remparts avant une nouvelle attaque. Pour cela, des blocs de plusieurs formes apparaissent, façon Tetris, et vous devez les combiner sans laisser de vide.

locale.title: Rastan
locale.synopsis:
Rastan features five levels or hacking and slashing gameplay with a boss at the end of each level. Numerous enemies assault you on your journey such as flying demons, chimeras, valkyries, piranhas, skeleton undead and more. Fight through to the end and save the land of Lograth from certain doom.
The game features different weapons such axes, maces and fire swords, each with its own attributes like extended range or attack power. Armour can also be picked up in the forms shields, cloaks and armour, reducing the damage from enemy attacks. Other items include rings (increase the speed of your weapon) and jewelery for bonus points.

Viaje a las procelosas tierras de Semia, que nadie se atreve a hollar. Una princesa está cautiva. Si la rescata, recibirá riquezas sin cuento como recompensa. ¡Pero Vd. es un bárbaro. un señor del frío acero! Y, ¿quién controla realmente su destino?

Rastan sur Master System est un jeu d'action où le combat prédomine. Vous devez sauver les Terres de Lograth d'une fin obscure en combattant à l'aide de haches et d'épées, chimères et autres démons menaçants. Vous aurez la possibilité d'améliorer la puissance de vos armes et de votre bouclier grâce aux bonus disséminés dans les niveaux.

locale.title: Reggie Jackson Baseball
locale.synopsis:
Reggie Jackson Baseball (American Baseball in Japan and PAL countries) is, as the name implies, a simulation of USA's most beloved sports: baseball. There are four modes in the game: Exhibition, Tournament, Watch Mode, and finally a Home Run Contest. In the Watch Mode the computer just plays against itself, and in Tournament Mode you compete against the computer. The other two modes can be played against computer or a human opponent as well.
You can choose Major League Baseball teams in all of those modes. During the game, the player controls the pitcher and the batter from a third-person view; the view changes to top-down after a strike by a batter, so that the player can view a large part of the field. Events such as injuries or cheerleader performances are graphically shown in the game.

Reggie Jackson Baseball (American Baseball en Japón y países PAL) es, como su nombre lo indica, una simulación de uno de los deportes más queridos de Estados Unidos: el béisbol. Hay cuatro modos en el juego: Exhibición, Torneo, Watch Mode, y, finalmente, un Concurso de Home Run . En el modo Watch la computadora sólo juega contra sí misma, y en el modo Torneo tendrás que competir contra el ordenador. Los otros dos modos se puede jugar contra la computadora o un oponente humano también.

Il ya quatre modes dans le jeu: exhibition, tournoi, spectateur, et enfin un concours Home Run. En mode spectateur, l'ordinateur joue contre lui-même, et en mode Tournoi, vous jouez contre l'ordinateur. Les deux autres modes peuvent être joués contre l' ordinateur ou contre un autre joueur.

locale.title: Renegade
locale.synopsis: This is the conversion of Taito's scrolling beat 'em up, which later produced unofficial sequels Target: Renegade and Renegade III: The Final Chapter. The game is set on the mean streets of Brooklyn, which you must venture through to meet your girlfriend, and then rescue her from her kidnappers. This is split into five levels, taking you through the subway and the docks as well as some inhospitable streets. A wide range of aggressive moves are on offer, including headbutts, kicks, punches and flying kicks. Much of the game's violence is depicted in a fairly tongue-in-cheek style, with an element of attempted humour along the way.

Eres un vigilante de puños de acero que te has propuesto salvar a tu cíudad de la mafia malvada. Armarás follón y camorra por las Calles. Retarás a las pandillas de motoristas a peligrosas batallas por la autopista. Aplastarás a gamberros armados a medida que te abres camino a la mansión de la mafia para llevar a cabo la útima lucha.

Renegade est un beat'em all sur Master System. Au cours d'une balade avec votre petite amie dans les rues de Brooklyn, celle-ci se fait kidnapper par une bande de rebelles. Votre objectif est donc de la sauver des griffes de ses ravisseurs. Le jeu est composé de 5 niveaux différents et vous disposez d'une large palette d'attaques.

locale.title: Rescue Mission
locale.synopsis: Your comrades are wounded and stranded on the battlefield. The only way to get to them, is via a handcart on a railroad track. Your job is to protect the medics, who are riding the rails to get to the wounded. In their path, are hordes of enemies on the ground and in the air shooting everything from fireballs to rockets. In addition to the chaos, there are land-mines lying on the track just waiting to be run over.
Sus amigos se encuentran atrapados detrás de las líneas enemigas. Están heridos y necesitan su ayuda para escapar. Usted envía a los médicos...a una peligrosa misión de rescate.

Rescue Mission sur Master System est un jeu de tir qui vous plonge au coeur d'un champ de bataille et qui nécessite le pistolet laser de la console pour fonctionner. L'objectif est de protéger des médecins afin qu'ils puissent atteindre les soldats blessés. Sur son chariot, le joueur doit donc éradiquer toute forme de menace : tuer les soldats ennemis, détruire les roquettes avant qu'elles ne vous atteignent et prendre garde aux mines placées sur les rails.
Shoot them up amateur en el cual manejas un pequeño avión.
Jeu Homebrew. Shot them Up ou votre Véhicule est un petit avion

locale.title: Road Fighter
locale.synopsis: Apparently a licensed port of Road Fighter, published by Samsung in South Korea.

juego de carreras visto desde arriba. Tienes que llegar a la meta antes de que acabe el tiempo. No chocar contra las paredes, coches o camiones. Porque si lo haces perderás gasolina. Puedes obtener gasolina adicional por recoger objetos combustibles. Evite especialmente los coches de color púrpura, que te hacen cambiar de carril! Y recuerda ...el aceite hace el camino resbaladizo ...

Vous voyez votre voiture du dessus, ce qui renforce encore un peu plus le côté arcade du jeu. Ici, pas question de pilotage mais de vitesse. D'ailleurs, le seul bouton disponible ne vous permet que d'accélérer...Le but est simple : aller le plus vite possible et arriver au check point (la fin de niveau) avant que votre jauge d'essence soit à sec. Bien entendu, il faudra éviter les bords de la route - le moindre contact et c'est l'accident assuré, coûtant cher en carburant - et tâcher de zig-zaguer au mieux entre les véhicules. Chacun a une couleur qui défini ses réactions. Les verts sont basiques et ne bougent pas. Les bleus sont les challengers et vont donc beaucoup plus vite. Les roses sont les plus à craindre, puisqu'ils se déplacent en largeur.

locale.title: Road Rash
locale.synopsis:
Road Rash is an aggressive motorcycle racing game where the player assumes the role of a biker who takes part in a series of illegal races across the U.S.A. Starting at the back of the pack the objective is always to finish first on a linear course, overtaking the other bikers. This is achieved by driving very well or by playing it dirty, knocking opponents of their bikes using clubs, crowbars or your bare hands. The other racers fight back in a similar fashion and there are also hazards. All the races take place on the regular road with normal traffic (in both directions) and the cops, as well as occasional oil slicks and stray cows.
By winning races you can get promoted to a stronger division and earn cash with which you can buy a better bike. Whenever you're knocked off your bike or hit something you will have to run back to your bike and lose valuable time, plus your bike will suffer some damage. When the player crashes with cops nearby, it is possible to get busted and then you have to forfeit the race.
Like the whole Road Rash lineage, the game has arcade-like gameplay with no intention to be a motorcycle simulation. While the game has a two-player mode, this is not simultaneous.

El Desafio:- "La competencia por su vida" - No existen reglamentos, Ni velocidad limite, Tampoco existe regreso! Mire con atencion las carreteras bloqueadas, grasientas y a los policias! Alcance velocidades de 240 km/h mientras golpea, empuja y apporrea a su oponente antes de que él llege de primero!

Road Rash sur Master System est un jeu de motos qui sort des sentiers battus. Vous disputez des courses sur le continent américain, le plus souvent sur route, où vous avez la possibilité d'infliger les pires crasses à vos opposants. Les victoires vous rapporteront de l'argent qui vous permettra de vous payer une moto plus puissante.

locale.title: Robbyie
locale.synopsis: This is a homebrew game.
Juego amateur de plataformas bastante básico y sencillo
Jeu de plateforme très basique.

locale.title: RoboCop 3
locale.synopsis: RoboCop 3 is a side-scrolling platform shooter. You get missions (such as rescuing your colleagues who are being kept hostages), which are divided into several smaller levels. The levels usually consist of several platforms, and are heavily populated by enemies who shoot at you. You can gather special repair kits, which will be used to restore your health after you've completed a level. "RoboCop 3" is more of a shooter than its predecessors, having more and tougher enemies.

El viejo Detroit. Las calles son un peligro. Sólo un hombre puede enfrentarse a tales individuos. ROBOCOP?! Con la tecnologia de las armas, piel y nervios de acero acecha a sus victimas... ¡malhechores por cualquier esquina!
¡ACABA CON LOS DROIDES VOLADORES DEL OCP! ¡ALIATE CON TU VIEJO ENEMIGO, EL GIGANTE ED-209! ¡ENFRENTAMIENTO EN MOTOR CITY!

RoboCop 3 sur Master System est un jeu mêlant plates-formes et tir. Vos missions consistent pour la plupart à porter secours à des collègues ou des civils en mauvaise posture. Vous trouverez en chemin des kits de réparation qui vous permettront de récupérer l'énergie que vous auront enlevée vos nombreux assaillants.

locale.title: RoboCop Versus The Terminator
locale.synopsis:
In the future, human soldiers of John Conner's resistance force against the machines are fighting a losing war against Skynet and it's robot forces. Discovering that one of the foundation technologies for Skynet is the cybernetics technology used in the creation of Robocop. One of the resistances' soldiers, Flo is sent back in time before the Rise of the Machines to destroy Robocop and stop Skynet from being built. However Skynet learns of the time travel attempt and sends Terminators to stop Flo.
In the game you control Robocop who may move across the screen, jump, fire and exchange weapons. Robocop starts with the Auto-9 which has unlimited ammunition... other weapons may be more powerful but contain limited ammo. Beginning the game on a mission of law enforcement, you soon meet up with Flo and must engage in battle against Terminators, the forces of OCP and several obstacles

En un futuro próximo, los mundos de RoboCop y Terminator se funden en una única realidad. Tú eres Robocop y debes salvar a la Humanidad destruyendo al Super-Ordenador Skynet en un posible futuro en el que las máquinas gobiernan la Tierra y Skynet es el Jefe Supremo.

Robocop vs Terminator sur Master System est un jeu d'action combinant les univers des deux longs métrages éponymes. L'histoire débute lorsque les soldats de John Connor découvrent que Skynet est issu de la technologie cybernétique utilisée pour fabriquer Robocop. Incarnez ce dernier, entrez dans la résistance et venez en aide à Connor pour sauver l'humanité des machines.

locale.title: Rocky
locale.synopsis:
Play as Rocky Balboa, the "Italian Stallion" in this action packed boxing game. This game reflects the Rocky series quite well. Only in this game you go one guy to the next. From Apollo the remaining champion, to Lang an aggressive contender, to Drago the Soviet boxer who trains constantly. Before you have a fight just like in the "Rocky" movies you have to train. Practice your timing and punching strength with some sandbag punching before fighting Apollo. Warm up punching a punching ball to become more faster and smarter to get ready for Lang. Then you will do some punching mitts training before fighting Drago where you watch the mitts and punch at the as they move. All of these trainings have qualifications such as punches per second, qualify and your combinations get better for the following fight.
During a fight you only have one meter under your name, that is the power meter. Your opponent has one likewise. Watching your power bar can tell you a lot about which way the fight is headed, either it's full and you can take more punches and punch more powerfully or it's low and you're in trouble. Watching the opponents power bar will tell you when to take him down or when to block.
Between rounds you get a chance to freshen up and get some last minute coaching. During the one minute interval, your power will go up only half of what has been drained.
If you do happen to take a fall the controls are similar to Nintendos "Punch out", basically you just press the 1 and 2 buttons as fast as possible. Hopefully Rocky stands up and is ready for more.
Usted se encuentra en un sueño. Atrayendo las miradas de todos, porque es el mejor. ¡El campeón mundial de pesos pesados! Una adaptación de la peliculas clásica de boxeo.

Rocky sur Master System est un jeu de boxe directement inspiré des quatre premiers films de la saga. D'Appollo à Drago sans oublier Lang, affrontez sur le ring les ennemis historiques du héros. Chaque combat est précédé d'un entraînement spécifique au style de l'adversaire. Durant les affrontements, gardez un oeil sur la barre de puissance qui détermine quand parer et quand attaquer.
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy.
hack brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy.

game.name: Rodrigo 2 Em Mate O Papai Noel-versao De Natal

locale.title: Rodrigo 2 Em Mate O Papai Noel-versao De Natal

locale.synopsis: Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, donde eres atacado por "Papás Noeles"
Hack Brésilien du jeu Teddy Boy ou vous êtes attaqué par des père noël.

locale.title: Rodrigo O Resgate
locale.synopsis: This game is a hack of Wonder Boy.
Hack brasileño de wonderboy en donde el personaje principal es sustituido
Hack brésilien de Wonderboy dans lequel le personnage principal a été remplacé par Rodrigo, un personnage extrêmement connu là-bas.

locale.title: Running Battle
locale.synopsis: A neighboring city has fallen into the hands of the sinister "M" and his "Soldiers of the Darkness." Get inside the "Dark Zone" and punch, kick and blast your way through to the final conflict!

Una ciudad vecina ha caído en manos del siniestro "M" y de sus "soldados de la oscuridad." Entra en la "zona oscura" y ábrete camino con golpes y patadas, hasta llegar al lugar de la confrontación final!

Running Battle est un beat them up tout basique comme la Master System savait en offrir depuis le milieu des années 80. Le personnage évolue à travers une succession de zones urbaines sur un unique et malheureux plan, et de méchants voyous arrivent par la gauche et par la droite. Grâce à sa connaissance unique des arts martiaux, qui lui permet de maîtriser des techniques aussi complexes que le pain dans la gueule et le coup de pied en sautant, Gray doit les tuer pour pouvoir progresser. Histoire que le joueur ne s'endorme pas sur son pad, Gray peut également utiliser une arme à feu s'il déniche le bonus ad hoc, et devra aussi sauter par dessus quelques gouffres au cours de sa progression dans les stages.

game.name: Sagaia

locale.title: Sagaia
locale.synopsis:
Long time ago, the planet of Darius went into ruin but Proco and Tiat of Darius gave birth to a new planet and named it Orga. After the passing of many centuries, Proco Jr. and Tiat Young receive a strange radio broadcast from the galaxy. They discover the radio broadcast is a mayday signal from another descendent of Darius. They board the Silverhawk, preparing to defeat an evil force and journey to the galaxy.
Darius II, or Sagaia as it is known in the West, is the second installment in Taito's premier shoot 'em up series. Its main distinguishing features are the non-linear level system and the enemies, which are different kinds of seafood.

Darius, un pacífico planeta muy parecido a la Tierra, fue completamente destruido no hace mucho por un enemigo desconocido. Dos jóvenes pilotos lograron escapar y, siguiendo una débil señal de las ruinas de su planeta, se han propuesto volver.

Sagaia est un shoot them up (shmup) à scrolling horizontal de la Master System .Il dispose d'une bonne durée de vie (pour un shmup et pour l'époque) et des boss de plus en plus difficiles. Vous avez le choix entre deux vaisseaux aux pouvoirs différents. Ce shmup est quasiment incontournable pour les fans de la Master System ainsi que pour les fans de shoot à scrolling horizontal.
A noter que pour l'époque (et le support), les graphismes sont bons.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Sangokushi 3
locale.synopsis:
THE FATE OF THE HAN DYNASTY IS IN YOUR HANDS!
In the final years of the Eastern Han Dynasty, under the reign of Emperor Ling, ten eunuchs in the imperial palace abused their power. The country was in a dreadful state of affairs; bandits began an uprising, and the people were in turmoil.
The emperor asked the lords of the land to crush the rebellion, but this only resulted in a race for power. After Dong Zhuo usurped the throne only to be quickly defeated, civil war erupted.
Finally, it was Cao Cao who took control of the emperor, commanding the lords in his name. After years of harsh fighting, Cao Cao united the north and prepared to conquer the south in an attempt to unite all of China.
Liu Bei, the fate of the Han Dynasty is in your hands! Will you linger in fear, waiting for death to find you? Or will you take a stand against the evil forces of Cao Cao? Don't hesitate; take your five tiger generals and rush to destroy the enemy!
