Juego de lucha licenciado en Corea que lleva el nombre de una de las sagas más famosas de juegos de estrategia. Arcade inspirado en la serie de ?Romance Of The Three Kingdoms?, estilo Street Fighter.

Dans les dernières années de la dynastie Han orientale, sous le règne de l'empereur Ling, dix eunuques du palais impérial ont abusé de leur pouvoir. Le pays était dans un état affreux; Des bandits ont initié la révolte et et le peuple était agité.L'empereur a demandé aux seigneurs de la terre d'écraser la rébellion, mais cela n'a abouti qu'à une course au pouvoir. Après que Dong Zhuo ait usurpé le trône pour être rapidement vaincu, la guerre civile éclata.Enfin, c'est Cao Cao qui a pris le contrôle, commandant les seigneurs en son nom. Après des années de combats acharnés, Cao Cao a uni le nord et s'est préparé à conquérir le sud dans une tentative d'unir toute la Chine. Liu Bei, le sort de la dynastie des Han est entre vos mains!Prenez vos cinq généraux de tigre et précipitez-vous pour détruire l'ennemi!

game.name: Sapo Xule - O Mestre do Kung Fu

locale.title: Sapo Xul: O Mestre do Kung Fu
locale.synopsis:
A kung fu gang, following the lead of the mighty sorcerer Naja (who's called that way for its hypnosis skills) wants to take over the Japanese country. Naja hypnotized an army of fighters, witches, zombies and even toads to fight for him. But he didn't know that among the toads he hypnotized was Sapo Chi-Ling, a great kung fu fighter, Sapo Xulé's master. Once Sapo Xulé knew it, he left the swamp and went to Japan to fight Naja and his gang, and free his master.
Sapo Xulé: O Mestre do Kung Fu (which means Sapo Xulé: the Master of Kung Fu) is a modified version of Kung Fu Kid, with its main character replaced by Sapo Xulé, a character based on a popular toy in Brazil back in the 80's: a toad with shoes which, when taken off, release a really bad smell.
In this side-scrolling/platform game, Sapo Xulé will fight his enemies kicking (button 1) and jumping (button 2) along seven rounds, fighting a boss at the end of each round, except for round six, which has several bosses to fight. From time to time shurikens will appear; by shooting them (pressing up and button 1), Sapo Xulé can clear the way in front of him. Some enemies will try to hold Sapo Xulé: to release himself he'll have to move fast.
All rounds have a 99 seconds time limit. Sapo Xulé starts with 3 lives and no continues.

Una pandilla de kung fu, siguiendo el ejemplo del poderoso hechicero Naja (que se llama así por sus habilidades de hipnosis) quiere hacerse cargo del país nipón. Naja hipnotiza un ejército de combatientes, brujas, zombis y hasta sapos para luchar por él. Pero él no sabía que entre los sapos que hipnotizó se encontraba Sapo Chi-Ling, un gran luchador de kung fu, maestro del Sapo Xulé. Una vez que Sapo Xulé descubrió esto, él dejó el pantano y se fue a Japón para luchar contra Naja y su pandilla, y liberar a su maestro.nnnn¨Sapo Xulé: O Mestre do Kung Fu¨ (que significa ¨Sapo Xulé: El Maestro de Kung Fu¨) es una versión modificada de ¨Kung Fu Kid¨, con su personaje principal reemplazado por el Sapo Xulé, un personaje basado en un popular juguete en el Brasil de los 80: un sapo con zapatos que, cuando son sacados, liberan un desagradable olor.nnnnEn este plataformas de desplazamiento lateral el Sapo Xulé deberá enfrentarse contra sus enemigos a patadas (botón 1) y saltando (botón 2) a lo largo de siete rondas, para terminar luchando contra un jefe al final de cada ronda, a excepción de la sexta ronda, que cuenta con varios jefes a luchar. De vez en cuando aparecerán shurikens; lanzándolos (presionando arriba y el botón 1), el Sapo Xulé puede despejar el camino delante de él. Algunos enemigos tratarán de coger al Sapo Xulé: para liberarse tendrá que moverse rápido.nnnnTodas las rondas tienen un límite de tiempo de 99 segundos. El Sapo Xulé inicia con 3 vidas y ningun continue.

Une bande de kung fu, sous les ordres du puissant sorcier Naja (qui est appelé de cette façon pour ses compétences d'hypnose) veut prendre le contrôle du japon. Naja a hypnotisé une armée de combattants, sorcières, zombies et même des crapauds pour se battre pour lui. Mais il ne savait pas que parmi les crapauds qu'il hypnotisait il y avait Sapo Chi-Ling, un grand combattant de kung-fu, le maître de Sapo Xulé. Une fois que Sapo Xulé l'a appris, il a quitté le marais et est allé au Japon pour combattre Naja et son gang, et libérer son maître. Sapo Xulé: O Mestre du Kung Fu (qui signifie Sapo Xulé: le Maître du Kung Fu) est une version modifiée de Kung Fu Kid, avec le personnage principal remplacé par Sapo Xulé, personnage basé sur un jouet populaire au Brésil dans les années 80: un crapaud avec des chaussures qui, lorsqu'ils sont retirés, libèrent une très mauvaise odeur.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

game.name: Sapo Xule - S.O.S. Lagoa Poluida

locale.title: Sapo Xul: S.O.S. Lagoa Poluda
locale.synopsis:
Three scientists built a underwater trash processing complex in order to produce cheap energy, at the expense of the ecosystem. The lagoon animals became desperate and sought the wise Cágado Adão for help. He quickly found the solution: to build a heavily armored submarine, to destroy the facilities and send the invaders back home. Sapo Xulé was asked to perform this mission and destroy the powerful scientists' submarine ships.
Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Lagoa Poluída (which means Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Polluted Lagoon) is a modified version of Astro Warrior, with its space ship replaced by a submarine ship driven by Sapo Xulé, a character based on a popular toy in Brazil back in the 80's: a toad with shoes which, when taken off, release a really bad smell.
This game is a basic shoot-em-up, but instead of destroying space ships and aliens, the player must destroy the scientists' facilities and clean up the lagoon, by destroying the trash in it  the lagoon is filled with matches, eaten apples, cotton swabs, boots and other kinds of junk.
Sapo Xulé's ship can be upgraded by collecting leaves (which will make it faster) and flies inside bubbles (which will improve its fire power). There are also satellite weapons that can be attached to the ship.
The game consists in three levels, at the end of which Sapo Xulé must destroy one scientist's submarine. Once all the three scientists are defeated, they are revived and Sapo Xulé is sent back where he started, in a never-ending circle.

Tres científicos construyeron un complejo de procesamiento de basura bajo el agua con el fin de producir energía barata, a expensas del ecosistema. Los animales de la laguna se desesperaron y buscaron al sabio Cágado Adão para que les ayudará. Rápidamente encontraron la solución: construir un submarino fuertemente blindado, para destruir las instalaciones y enviar a los invasores de vuelta a casa. Le dieron al Sapo Xulé el encargo de realizar esta misión y destruir las poderosas naves de los científicos.nnnn¨Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Lagoa Poluída¨ (que significa ¨Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Laguna Contaminada) es una versión modificada de ¨Astro Warrior¨, con tu nave espacial siendo reemplazada por un submarino controlado por el Sapo Xulé, un personaje basado en un popular juguete del Brasil de los años 80: un sapo con zapatos que, cuando se quitan, liberan un olor bastante desagradable.nnnnEste juego es un shootem up básico, pero en lugar de destruir las naves y extraterrestres, el jugador debe destruir las instalaciones de los científicos y limpiar la laguna, al destruir la basura en ella - la laguna está llena de cerrillas, manzanas comida, hisopos de algodón, botas y otros tipos de basura.nnnnLa nave del Sapo Xulé puede actualizarse mediante la recopilación de hojas (lo que hará que sea más rápida) y volar dentro de las burbujas (que mejorará su poder de fuego). También hay armas de satélite que se pueden conectar a la nave.nnnnEl juego consiste en tres niveles, al final de los cuales Sapo Xulé debe destruir el submarino de un científico. Una vez que todos los tres científicos hayan sido derrotados, ellos son revividos y Sapo Xulé es enviado de vuelta donde empezó, siendo el juego en si un bucle.

Trois scientifiques ont construit un complexe de traitement des ordures sous-marines afin de produire de l'énergie bon marché, aux dépens de l'écosystème. Les animaux de la lagune sont devenus désespérés et ont sollicité le sage Cágado Adão. Il a rapidement trouvé la solution: construire un sous-marin fortement blindé, détruire les installations et envoyer les envahisseurs à la maison. On a demandé à Sapo Xulé d'accomplir cette mission et de détruire les puissants navires sous-marins des scientifiques.
Sapo Xulé: SOS Lagoa Poluída (qui signifie Sapo Xulé: SOS Polluted Lagoon) est une version modifiée d'Astro Warrior, avec son vaisseau spatial remplacé par un navire sous-marin piloté par Sapo Xulé, personnage basé sur un jouet populaire au Brésil Dans les années 80: un crapaud avec des chaussures qui, lorsqu'ils sont retirés, libèrent une très mauvaise odeur.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

game.name: Sapo Xule Vs Os Invasores do Brejo

locale.title: Sapo Xule Vs Os Invasores do Brejo
locale.synopsis:
The merciless Sapo Boi, with the help of the evil Lagartão and Sibila, the sorceress snake, recruited an army of monsters to take over the swamp and enslave its inhabitants. He also kidnapped Rãzinha, Sapo Xulé's girlfriend, to make her his princess. Now, Sapo Xulé, along with his three friends (Ratopulga, Porcopum and Tartafede) must to stop the cruel tyrant.
Sapo Xulé vs. Os Invasores do Brejo (which translates Sapo Xulé vs. The Swamp Invaders) is a modified version of Psycho Fox, with its main character replaced by Sapo Xulé, a character based on a popular toy in Brazil back in the '80s; a toad with shoes which, when taken off, release a really bad smell.
In Psycho Fox, the player could also play as three other characters during the game: Hippo, Monkey Boy and Leopard. In Sapo Xulé vs. Os Invasores do Brejo, they were replaced by Porcopum (a pig), Ratopulga (a mouse) and Tartafede (a turtle).
Each character has its own special ability: Porcopum can break rock walls (but he's considerably slower than the others). Ratopulga can jump higher than any other character, while Tartafede is the fastest one. Sapo Xulé is the most balanced of them.
In this side-scrolling/platform game, all characters can kill their enemies by punching or jumping on top of them, until they are completely buried. If they are not buried completely, the enemies will pop out of the ground and come after the character again. Besides the monsters, other common obstacles are spikes, cannonballs, fireballs, pits and more.
The characters can also find Sapo Xulé's stinky shoes, which can be used as a boomerang-like weapon. If they are hit when carrying the shoe, they'll just lose it instead of dying.
To switch among the characters, the player must find green potions, usually hidden inside eggs, or carried by enemies. Other special items can be collected, such as "invincibility flies", Sapo Xulé's stinky socks (which kill every enemy on the screen) and some white bags, which are meant to be used at the bonus stages.
The bonus stages consist of labyrinths with several paths, each leading to prizes or nothing at all. Each white bag collected at the main stages give the player an extra character to set up for a different path at the labyrinth, raising the chances of reaching a prize in the end.
Apart from changes in the main characters, some enemy sprites were replaced, such as the first boss - which came to be Sibila, the sorceress snake - and obviously the last one - which came to be Sapo Boi.

El despiadado Sapo Boi, con la ayuda del malvado Lagartão y Sibila, la serpiente hechicera, reclutó un ejército de monstruos para hacerse cargo de la ciénaga y esclavizar a sus habitantes. También secuestró a Rãzinha, la novia del Sapo Xulé, para hacerla su princesa. Ahora, Sapo Xulé, junto con sus tres amigos (Ratopulga, Porcopum y Tartafede) debe detener al cruel tirano.nnnn¨Sapo Xulé vs. Os Invasores do Brejo¨ (que se traduce como ¨Sapo Xulé contra Los Invasores del Pantano) es una versión modificada de ¨Psycho Fox¨, con su personaje principal reemplazado por Sapo Xulé, un personaje basado en un popular juguete en Brasil allá por los años 80; un sapo con zapatos que, cuando se los quita, liberan un olor muy malo.nnnnEn ¨Psycho Fox¨, el jugador también puede jugar como otros tres personajes durante el juego: Hippo, Monkey Boy y Leopard. En ¨Sapo Xulé vs. Os Invasores do Brejo¨, fueron reemplazados por Porcopum (un cerdo), Ratopulga (un ratón) y Tartafede (una tortuga).nnnnCada personaje tiene su propia habilidad especial: Porcopum puede romper paredes de roca (pero es considerablemente más lento que los otros). Ratopulga puede saltar más alto que cualquier otro personaje, mientras que Tartafede es el más rápido. Sapo Xulé es el más equilibrado de ellos.nnnnEn este plataformas de desplazamiento lateral, todos los personajes pueden matar a sus enemigos dándoles puñetazos o saltando encima de ellos, hasta que estén completamente enterrados. Si no están enterrados completamente, los enemigos saldrán de la tierra e irán tras el personaje de nuevo. Además de los monstruos, otros obstáculos comunes son picos, balas de cañón, bolas de fuego, pozos y más.nnnnLos personajes también pueden encontrar los zapatos apestosos del Sapo Xulé, que pueden ser utilizados como armas similares a un boomerang. Si son afectados cuando se lleva el zapato, ellos sólo lo pierden en lugar de morir.nnnnPara cambiar entre los personajes, el jugador debe encontrar pociones verdes, generalmente ocultas dentro de los huevos, o llevadas por los enemigos. Otros artículos especiales pueden ser recogidos, como ¨moscas de invencibilidad¨, los calcetines apestosos del Sapo Xulé (que matan a todos los enemigos en la pantalla) y algunas bolsas blancas, que están destinadas a ser utilizadas en las fases de bonus.nnnnLas fases de bonus consisten en laberintos con varios caminos, cada uno que lleva a premios o a nada en absoluto. Cada bolsa blanca recogida en las principales etapas dan al jugador un personaje adicional al que poner en un camino diferente en el laberinto, aumentando las posibilidades de alcanzar un premio al final.nnnnAparte de los cambios en los personajes principales, se sustituyeron algunos sprites enemigos, como el primer jefe - que llega a ser Sibila, la serpiente hechicera - y, obviamente, el último - que llega a ser Sapo Boi.

L'impitoyable Sapo Boi, avec l'aide du maléfique Lagartão et Sibila la sorcière, a recruté une armée de monstres pour prendre le marais et asservir ses habitants. Il a également kidnappé Rãzinha, la petite amie de Sapo Xulé, pour en faire sa princesse. Maintenant, Sapo Xulé, avec ses trois amis (Ratopulga, Porcopum et Tartafede) doit arrêter le tyran. Sapo Xulé vs Os Invasores do Brejo est une version modifiée de Psycho Fox, avec son personnage principal remplacé par Sapo Xulé, un personnage basé sur un jouet populaire au Brésil dans le passé Années 80; Un crapaud avec des chaussures qui, lorsqu'ils sont retirés, libèrent une odeur vraiment mauvaise.

Algo cheira mal no BREJO, além do chulé do sapo. O impiedoso SAPO BOI, com a ajuda do malvado LAGARTÃO e de SIBILA, a cobrinha feiticeira, recrutou um terrível exército de girinos, moscas gigantes e outros monstros, com a intenção de dominar a lagoa e escravizar os seus habitantes. Não satisfeito com suas perversidades, o vilão resolveu raptar RÃZINHA, a perfumada namorada do SAPO XULÉ, para transformá-la em sua princesa. Desta vez, o SAPO BOI mexeu mesmo com fogo! Para salvar sua amada e deter o tirano cruel, o SAPO XULÉ pediu a ajuda de PORCOPUM, RATOPULGA e TARTAFEDE, amigos inseparáveis que possuem fantásticas habilidades. Nesta batalha, o SAPO XULÉ conta ainda com uma incrível arma, o tênis-bumerangue, capaz de derrubar qualquer inimigo com seu chulé. Prepare-se você também para ajudar o SAPO XULÉ neste sensacional desafio. Tape o nariz e mergulhe nessa aventura.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Satellite 7
locale.synopsis: Satellite 7 is a shoot-'em-up game developed and published by Sega. It was released for the Sega Master System exclusively in Japan on Sega Card in 1985.nnnnThe game is a fairly standard shooter and is very similar to Namco's Xevious. 1 launches bombs at ground targets, and 2 shoots forward at airborne targets.nnnnThough the game did not officially leave Japan in card form, the game has appeared in several compilations in Brazil, including the Tectoy DVD Karaoke Game DVT-G100.
Satellite 7 es un juego del estilo "shoot-'em-up" desarrollado y publicado por SEGA. nnFue lanzado al mercado en exclusiva para Master System en Japón en 1985 en el formato Sega Card.nn
Un jeu de tir assez standard et est très semblable à Xevious de Namco. Vous pouvez soit larguer des bombes sur les ennemis au sol , soit tirer sur les ennemis arrivant face à vous.

locale.title: Scramble Spirits
locale.synopsis: Sega's take on the 1943 style of vertically scrolling shoot 'em ups was set in the future. Your fighter plane is aged and under-powered, yet you must face down large planes, tanks and ground targets to achieve victory. Each level ends with a close-viewed section of particular intensity before finally facing a boss. Smart bombs are occasionally found lying around, and can destroy everything on the screen, although you can't use them on the bosses. A simultaneous 2-player mode is provided.

La Tierra ha sido atacada por fuerzas extraterrestres. Sus armas son poderosas y su número es inestimable. Se necesitará un par de pilotos de caza audaces para denotarlos. ¿Te sientes apto para esta misión?

Votre avion de chasse est âgé et peu puissant, mais vous devez détruire de grands avions, des réservoirs et des cibles au sol pour atteindre la victoire. Chaque niveau se termine par un un boss. Des bombes intelligentes sont parfois trouvées à proximité, et peuvent détruire tout sur l'écran, bien que vous ne pouvez pas les utiliser sur les boss. Un mode 2 joueurs est également possible.

locale.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
locale.synopsis: In this game you play the role of a lone soldier much like Rambo. Your main objectives are to free prisoners of war whilst fighting of enemy soldiers. The gameplay involves you viewing the action from a top down perspective and battling your way up the screen. You have 2 weapons at your disposal. A machine gun which has unlimited ammunition and a bow which fires explosive warheads. The enemies re spawn so you have to keep battling upwards as staying in the same place for to long means you get surrounded by the enemy. Freeing prisoners involves you blowing up the huts they are in with your bow and you are awarded with more arrows for doing this. The game also offers 2 players to fight alongside one another for twice the fire power.

En la búsqueda de sus amigos capturados, usted como ASHURA. o junto con sus compañeros de armas, BISHAMON. deberá infiltrarse en la amplia fortaleza enemiga. Emplee el rifle automátioo y flechas con granada contra enemigos tales como los fusileros, los bazookas, los artilleros, y muchos mas.

locale.title: Secret Command
locale.synopsis: Rambo : First Blood Part II sur Master System (également connu sous le nom de Secret Commando) est un jeu d'action où vous incarnez le célèbre guerrier sans peur ni reproches, John Rambo. Seul ou à 2 joueurs, attaquez des camps ennemis au Vietnam et libérez vos compatriotes faits prisonniers.

locale.title: Sega Chess
locale.synopsis:
Sega Chess is a chess game for one or two players.
The game follows the standard chess rules. There are 11 difficulty modes: beginner, novice, amateur, intermediate, professional, chess champion, grand chess champion, chess master, grand chess master, adaptive (which tries to adapt to the player's skill and infinite think mode. The game also offers a problem solving mode.
Gameplay consists in moving a hand icon across the board selecting the piece to move and the target location. The player can ask for hint moves and when it is the computer's turn, he can force the opponent to move. The table side can also be flipped during the gameplay. The plays are recorded and the players can see it in the main menu screen.
Players can also set up a game with a given set of pieces, provided there is at least one king to each side. Two players mode can be played with one or two controllers. The table can be viewed in a 2D or 3D view.
Paciencia, ingenio, y el deseo de ser el mejor son las claves para convertirse en un maestro del ajedrez. ¡Sega Chess ofrece incluso al jugador más experimentado el juego de toda una vida!
Pour les amateurs d'échecs, ce jeu peut permettre de s'entrainer. Les graphismes correspondent au potentiel de la console et sont soignés. Avis aux amateurs...

locale.title: Sega World Tournament Golf
locale.synopsis: Challenging courses, a variety of modes and realistic gameplay - Sega World Tournament Golf has it all!
Desafiantes campos de golf, una variedad de modos y un juego auténtico, Sega World Tournament Golf lo tiene todo.
Des parcours exigeants, toute une gamme de modes passionnants et un jeu réaliste - C'est ce que SEGA vous offre avec ce "Tournoi Mondial de Golf".

locale.title: Senha
locale.synopsis: The purpose of this game is to unravel the right sequence of symbols. Move the cursor with the directional buttons and select the desired symbols, in an attempt.
El propósito de este juego es unir la secuencia de símbolos de símbolos. Mueve el cursor con los botones de dirección y seleccione los símbolos deseados en un intento.
O Objetivo deste jogo é desvendar a sequência certa de símbolos. Mova o cursor com os botões direcionais e selecione os síbolos desejados, formando um tentativa.

locale.title: Sensible Soccer : European Champions
locale.synopsis:
With the original Sensible Soccer having sold hugely, this updated version was released some months later (and then used as the basis for the later console versions). The teams are updated, with the sides present in the 92-93 European tournaments included, and the player names updated to take transfers into account.
The game was tidied up and changed in a number of areas. The most significant change is the addition of red and yellow cards for discipline (2 yellow card offenses or one professional foul (denying your opponent a clear goal-scoring opportunity) results in that player being sent off). The goalkeepers have been improved in skill, and the 1994 World Cup Qualifying tournament was added.

Póngase al mando de su selección nacional o club europeo preferido y participe en las diversas competiciones de copa y liga.nnCon todo el ambiente del fútbol europeo del más alto nivel, usted puede llevar a un equipo de 15 jugadores al podio de la victoria.nn¡El juego de fútbol sin igual!

La mouture European Champions de Sensible Soccer sur Master System inclut les noms des joueurs présents en clubs européens lors de la saison 92/93. Vous pouvez aussi participer aux qualifications pour la Coupe du Monde 94. L'un des arguments majeurs du jeu à l'époque était la prise en compte des cartons.

game.name: Shadow Dancer - The Secret Of Shinobi

locale.title: Shadow Dancer : The Secret of Shinobi
locale.synopsis:
Shadow Dancer is a one-player game in which you control Shinobi. With the help of your dog, you must kill your enemies while you venture through locations such as airports, railroads, waterfalls, sewers, and more. Furthermore, you must find and disarm several bombs along the way before you leave each. You also have the option of using magic against enemies, which may consist of tornadoes or fireballs.
There are five missions you must complete; and each one has different objectives such as obstructing the enemies deadly mission, disrupting the enemy's supply route, raiding the enemy's industrial units, attacking the enemy's underground forces, and liberating and securing the shuttle's base. Each mission consists of three stages and there is a boss on each of the mission's final stages.
What's good about the dog, you say? Well, if you tell it to, the dog will maul enemies (provided that the dog barks at them when you face them) and distract them long enough so that you can shoot at them. Remember that you have a limited time to do this, as the enemy will eventually kick the dog off him. This causes the dog to yelp and shrink, making him powerless against them.

Un violento grupo terrorista está tratando de hacer fracasar una misión espacial crucial. ¡Usted, como Takashi, el noble guerrero Ninja, tendrá que tratar de aniquilar los terroristas empleando sus mortíferas estrellas, su temible espada, y sus poderes mágicos de Ninjutsu!

Shadow Dancer : The Secret of Shinobi est un beat'em all sur Master System. L'histoire se déroule à New York en 1997 et le Maître Ninja Shinobi doit faire face à une nouvelle menace. La discrétion et la rapidité sont des armes redoutables mais Shinobi peut aussi utiliser la magie tandis que son chien le protège contre de nombreux assaillants. Chaque niveau se termine par l'affrontement d'un boss et plusieurs bonus peuvent être ramassés en cours de route.

locale.title: Shadow of the Beast
locale.synopsis:
While very young, Aarbron was kidnapped and enslaved by the Priests of the Beast Lord. He grew up on drugs made to destroy his own will and turn him into the Beast Messenger, a powerful creature serving Maletoth, The Beast Lord himself. He did his job, until one day he noticed a man about to be sacrificed in a ritual, his face triggering ancient memories... and as the sacrificial knife descended into the man's body, Aarbron recognizes the face. Of his father. As his father dies in the altar, memories of his childhood and tormented past at the hands of the Beast Lord emerged, and as feelings of hate over his captors took over him, he swore revenge and fled the temple, knowing the road to avenge his father and redemption would be hard.
Shadow of the Beast, one of Psygnosis most popular titles during the 16-bit computer era is a side-scrolling platformer best known for the use of parallax scrolling along lush graphics, a musical score by David Whittaker, a iconic cover by Roger Dean and what many consider to be unforgiving gameplay, balancing between the "very challenging" and the "impossible". The player has to navigate through several areas filled with enemies and traps, collecting keys and activating triggers than open new areas or give Aarbron the means to overcome a sub-boss. The number of moves the player has at disposal is limited: duck, jump and only two attacks: punch and a flying kick. While most enemies die with just one hit, the player must time each attack accurately. However, there are also traps of objects that cannot be destroyed, and these require the player to jump, duck or move according the sequence. The player has only one life with 12 hit points that can be replenished by collecting some objects hidden in the level (like an off-route location or a under a megalith), which also contributes to the difficulty level.

Desde el más allá de las tinieblas el guerrero clama venganza.nnLa Sombra de la Bestia? anda suelta por el Master System en una aventura extraordinaria. Incesante combate mientras la Bestia lucha contra 100 formas extrañas en 8 regiones hostiles de un Mundo sobrenatural. ¡Tan real que casi puedes sentir los puños!

Shadow of the Beast sur Master System est un jeu mélangeant beat'em all, plates-formes et exploration. Le joueur incarne Aarbron, un personnage mi-homme, mi-bête qui se rend à Maletoh pour se venger du Beast Lord. Réflexes et précision sont de mise pour éviter ou détruire les ennemis provenant de toute part. Soyez sur vos gardes, le joueur ne dispose que d'une seule vie.

Embora muito jovem, Aarbron foi sequestrado e escravizado pelos Sacerdotes do Senhor da Besta. Ele cresceu com drogas feitas para destruir sua própria vontade e transformá-lo no Mensageiro da Besta, uma criatura poderosa servindo Maletoth, o próprio Senhor da Besta. Ele fez o seu trabalho, até que um dia ele notou um homem prestes a ser sacrificado em um ritual, seu rosto provocando memórias antigas ... e quando a faca de sacrifício desceu no corpo do homem, Aarbron reconheceu o rosto. Do pai dele.nnEnquanto seu pai morre no altar, lembranças de sua infância e passado atormentado nas mãos do Senhor das Feras surgiram, e como sentimentos de ódio sobre seus captores tomaram conta dele, ele jurou vingança e fugiu do templo, conhecendo a estrada para vingar sua pai e redenção seria difícil.nnnnShadow of the Beast, um dos títulos mais populares do Psygnosis durante a era do computador de 16 bits, é um jogo de plataforma de rolagem lateral mais conhecido pelo uso de paralaxe rolando ao longo de gráficos exuberantes, uma partitura de David Whittaker, uma capa icônica de Roger Dean e o que muitos consideram ser jogabilidade implacável, equilibrando entre o "muito desafiador" e o "impossível". O jogador tem que navegar por várias áreas cheias de inimigos e armadilhas, colecionar chaves e ativar gatilhos do que abrir novas áreas ou dar a Aarbron os meios para superar um sub-chefe. O número de movimentos que o jogador tem à disposição é limitado: pato, salto e apenas dois ataques: soco e chute voador. Enquanto a maioria dos inimigos morre com apenas um golpe, o jogador deve cronometrar cada ataque com precisão. No entanto, existem também armadilhas de objetos que não podem ser destruídas, e estas exigem que o jogador salte, se agasque ou mova de acordo com a sequência. O jogador tem apenas uma vida com 12 pontos de vida que podem ser repostos coletando alguns objetos escondidos no nível (como um local fora da rota ou sob um megálito), o que também contribui para o nível de dificuldade.

locale.title: Shanghai
locale.synopsis:
Shanghai is a tile-based game based on the ancient Chinese game of Mah-Jong - this was the first of many computer versions.
The gameplay involves 144 tiles, each depicting different images, which have to be removed by matching them into pairs. The tiles are arranged in a gridded pattern, which is higher near the centre. A tile can only be removed if it has no tile next to it on at least one side.
This computer implementation can generate a random board layout to take on, as well as featuring 5 preset challenges, some of which have time limits of 5 or 10 minutes, as well as a multiplayer mode.

La finalidad de Shanghai consiste en quitar las fichas en pares que concuerden. La dificultad está en seleccionar las fichas que deben quitarse, porque el juego sólo puede completarse en 72 movientos consecutivos.

Shanghai sur Master System est un jeu de patience utilisant les tuiles du mahjong, jeu de plateau d'origine chinoise. Le joueur dispose de 144 tuiles spéciales regroupées par ordre hiérarchique (Honneurs suprêmes, Honneurs supérieurs, Honneurs simples, Cercles, Bambous, Caractères). L'objectif est de faire un maximum de points grâce à des combinaisons spécifiques.

locale.title: Shinobi
locale.synopsis:
You control a ninja, Shinobi, who must battle his way through each level in search of hostages which must be rescued. You have shurikens, kicks and punches to defend yourself with. As well as the powerful ninja magic which can clear the screen of enemies in one go.
Each level is broken down into smaller scenes and hostages are guarded by big blokes who throw swords. Watch out for gun-toting enemy henchmen and ninjas.
Reaching the end of each level will find you battling it out with a boss. These range from 8ft giants to helicopter gunships.
Usted es un Gran Maesto Ninja. Ante usted, el grupo más desalmado de terroristas que nunca empuñara armas de fuegos y de artes marciales. Pero usted cuenta con un arma secreta ... ¡La Magia Ninja!

Shinobi sur Master System est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez un guerrier ninja. L'objectif est de libérer des otages qui deviennent jouables par la suite. Chaque guerrier possédant son propre style de combat, le joueur peut donc diversifier sa stratégie à son aise en fonction des spécificités du niveau à accomplir.

Você é um mestre Ninja. A sua frente está um grupo de terroristas armados, exímios lutadores das artes marciais. Eles raptaram os filhos dos Líderes do Universo e os mantêm como reféns em vários lugares diferentes. Eles não têm nenhum escrúpulo... Mas você conta com uma arma secreta: a magia Ninja!

locale.title: Shooting Gallery
locale.synopsis: Using your Sega Light Phaser, you are given a specified length of time to shoot as many targets as you can before the music fades out. The targets include birds, balloons, blimps, balls, and spaceships; some difficult, some not so difficult. As you progress through the rounds, the game gets difficult. For example, in Levels 3 & 4, you have to shoot balls that pass through a set of pipes and come out the other end, and on Level 5, you can't shoot the spaceships if they are protected by a shield, and have to wait until the shield disappears, but not for long. The game ends when you don't shoot enough targets.
¿ Podras resistir la intensidad de estos 4 juegos ?nn¿ Ojos de lince ? ¿ Buena punteria ? ¿ Precisión contra el tiempo ?nnEsperemos, porque es la unica manera de sobrevivir en SHOOTING GALLERY.

Vous êtes en forme ? Alors, allez-y et rassemblez vos forces! Vous en aurez besoin. Ces quatre jeux de massacre vont vous mettre à l'épreuve. Vous êtes le meilleur!nnDe l'adresse. De la précision. De la rapidité.nnC'est à vous et n'oubliez pas que c'est à ce prix que l'on survit dans la SHOOTING GALLERY.

locale.title: Sky Fighter
locale.synopsis: Sky Fighter is an unlicensed Sega Master System game released exclusively in South Korea.
Shoot them up que apareció exclusivamente en Corea del Sur
Shoot them up exclusivement sorti en Corée du sud

locale.title: Sky Jaguar
locale.synopsis: Sky Jaguar is a vertical scrolling shoot-'em-up released by Konami for MSX computers in 1984. It was brought to the Sega Master System without a license in South Korea.
Port no oficial de la versión del juego de MSX, cuyo lanzamiento fue exclusivo en Corea.
Portage non officiel de la version MSX du jeu sorti uniquement en Corée.

locale.title: Slap Shot
locale.synopsis: Get all of the hard-hitting excitement of real ice hockey with "Slap Shot"! Shooting, passing, and teamwork on offense, and lots of checking, blocking and general chaos on defense. Play an Exhibition game, or enter the Tournament and play against the top teams in the world! Watch out for the other team's goons, though - they like to fight. If you get in a brawl and come out on the losing end, you'll have 2 minutes in the penalty box to lick your wounds. Accept the challenge - take on and defeat the best in hockey. Once you start, you'll be "hooked"!

¡Corte este tiro!nnnnSienta todo el entusiasmo de un juego tan rudo que e veces se denomina combate cuerpo a cuerpo sobre hielo. Este juego le presentará veinticuatro de los mejores equipos del mundo para disfrutar a placer.

Slap Shot sur Master System est un jeu de Hockey comportant 32 équipes internationales jouables en championnat ou en match d'exhibition. Les matchs alternent entre différents types de phases de jeu et se ponctuent par des petits combats entre joueurs.
Clon del clásico de todos los tiempos Tetris.

SMS Tetris Release 4 est tout simplement un clone de Tetris, un des plus grand succès de l'industrie du jeu vidéo ! Cette version est bien réalisée mais n'est sûrement pas la meilleure de ce grand classique !.

locale.title: Snail Maze
locale.synopsis:
Snail Maze was a hidden game built into Sega Master System's BIOS. It was accessible by pressing together 1, 2 and up during the SEGA logo screen. The only Sega Master System versions which featured it were the original one (with no built in game), the one with Hang On built in and the one with Hang On & Safari Hunt built in.
The gameplay consists of guiding an orange snail with a yellow shell through a blue maze. The goal is marked with an arrow and there's a time limit to get to it. As the levels progress, the time limit is reduced.

Juego oculto integrado en la BIOS de algunas de las primeras Master System al cual se accedía pulsando simultáneamente los botones 1 y 2 durante la pantalla con el logo de SEGA.nnnnEn el juego debes guiar a un caracol naranja a través de un laberinto azul.nnnnA medida que vas avanzando, el tiempo para superar los niveles va decreciendo.
Snail Maze était un jeu caché intégré au BIOS du Sega Master System. Il était accessible en appuyant simultanément sur 1, 2 et vers le haut pendant l'écran du logo SEGA.
Juego amateur el cual es un clon del famoso comecocos o Pacman.
Jeu Homebrew clone de Pacman.nn

game.name: Solomon No Kagi - Oujo Rihita No Namida

locale.title: Solomon's Key
locale.synopsis: Solomon's Key is a platform game with both action and strategy elements. On each level your goal is to retrieve a key which can then be used to unlock the exit. To help out, you have a magic wand which can be used to create and destroy blocks (though some blocks can't be destroyed). In order to reach the key you will need carefully to arrange the blocks on the screen so you can jump your way around safely. Wandering around each level are a variety of enemies which will cause you to lose a life if you're caught. Some creatures can be killed by destroying the block they are standing on, others must be dodged. Hidden bonuses and magic can be found on many of the levels, sometimes even hidden in blocks. Some treasures give you bonus points, others can form magic spells to help deal with the enemies. To make the game more difficult, each level has a time limit in which it must be completed.

Para salvar al mundo de los demonios, Dana se embarca en la búsqueda de la Llave de Salomón capaz de sellar el paso creado por los monstruos. Audaz mezcla entre un juego de acción y un rompecabezas gigante, Salomon's Key no solo es uno de los retos más difíciles en Master System, sino también uno de los más adictivos. El jugador debe usar su lógica y los reflejos para descubrir los misterios de cada pieza.

Pour sauver le monde des démons, Dana se lance dans une quête à la recherche de la clé de Salomon capable de sceller le passage emprunté par les monstres. Mélange audacieux entre un jeu d'action et un puzzle géant, Solomon's Key est un des défis les plus difficiles à relever sur Master System, mais également un des plus prenants. Le joueur doit utiliser sa logique et ses réflexes pour découvrir tous les mystères de chaque pièce.

locale.title: Solomon no Kagi : Oujo Rihita no Namida
Sonic Blast
locale.synopsis: Sonic Blast was released for Game Gear in conjunction with Sonic 3D Blast (aka Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island) for Genesis/MD and Saturn. It boasted similarly rendered character sprites and colorful backgrounds. The game was yet another addition to the series, plus Sega had hoped it would be a boost to the dying Game Gear's title selection at the time. Brazilian based TecToy re-released the game for Sega Master System in 1997, a year after the initial release (while many may think this is a pirated title, TecToy is indeed licensed to produce and release games under the Sega name).
Conversión del juego de mismo nombre de Sega Game Gear, llevado a Master System de la mano de Tectoy en 1997.nnnnJuego de plataformas del erizo azul más veloz del mundo.

Le jeu de plates-formes Sonic Blast sorti sur Master System est le dernier épisode des aventures de la mascotte Sega sur sa console portable. Vous pouvez y jouer Sonic, et Knuckles, qui a la capacité de planer et d'escalader les parois, donnant un nouveau souffle au jeu.

O OURIÇO MAIS FAMOSO DO MUNDO ESTÁ DE VOLTA!! Sonic, Knuckles, e todo o universo destes personagens estão retratados com perfeição neste cartucho de 8 mega de memória para o Master System! O perverso Dr. Robotnik roubou as Chaos Emeralds e somente Sonic e Knuckles poderão detê-lo. Só que desta vez, para sua sorte, Sonic conta com alguns truques escondidos em suas mangas: novos movimentos e power-ups especiais para derrotar o malvado cientista! Assuma o controle de Sonic ou Knuckles para encarar este desafio. São 14 níveis ao todo, repletos de itens escondidos. Gráficos reproduzidos com riqueza de detalhes - afinal, são 8 mega de memória disponíveis! Você vai se sentir dentro do jogo!! Use e abuse dos movimentos especiais de Sonic e dê um baile no diabólico doutor.

locale.title: Sonic Chaos
locale.synopsis: The inhabitants of South Island are in danger! Dr. Robotnik has stolen all the Chaos Emeralds which kept the power balance. Robotnik has thrown the Emeralds in a parallel universe and is keeping the red one. Sonic and Tail must retreive all the Chaos Emeralds before the destruction of South Island. This is the first Game Gear game where you can play either Sonic or Tail.

El Dr. Robotnik ha robado la Esmeralda roja del Caos; ahora sólo depende de Sonic, el erizo, el poder recuperarla. En el papel de Sonic o de "Tails", el zorro de dos colas, tú deberás atravesar las Zonas, usando tus rápidos movimientos y gran astucia para recolectar anillos y evadir a los malvados aliados del Dr. Robotnik.

Sonic Chaos sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes se déroulant dans l'univers coloré et décalé du petit hérisson bleu. Le docteur Robotnik fait encore des siennes. Cette fois-ci, il a dérobé les émeraudes du chaos et, par la même occasion, mis en péril la paix sur South Island. Contrôlez Sonic ou Tail, le renard à deux queues et retrouvez les émeraudes avant que l'île ne disparaisse.

Os habitantes de South Island estão em perigo! O Dr. Robotnik roubou todas as Chaos Emeralds que mantinham o equilíbrio de poder. Robotnik jogou as esmeraldas em um universo paralelo e está guardando a vermelha. Sonic e Tails devem recuperar todas as Chaos Emeralds antes da destruição de South Island. Este é o primeiro jogo de Master System onde você pode jogar com Sonic ou Tails.

locale.title: Sonic Spinball
locale.synopsis:
The evil doctor Robotnik has a new plan to take over the world. He has built a new weapon, the Veg-O-Fortress on Mount Mobius and with it, he is transforming all creatures into robots. Sonic sneaks into the fortress and tries to stop Robotnik.
Use Sonic as a pinball in 4 dangerous levels. Score points, get rings, collect Chaos Emeralds and destroy the boss at the end of each level.

Desde cenagosas alcantarillas hasta la monstruosa sala de máquinas, la fortaleza más reciente del Dr. Robotnik es una gigantesca máquina de jugar con bolas. ¿Soportará ésta una invasión rotante de Sonic? Bote desde gigantescas aletas y silbantes salidas de vapor. Acelere a través de vertiginosas vueltas y elévese por rampas que desafian a la muerte.

Accompagné de son ami Tails, Sonic le hérisson bleu le plus rapide de la galaxie doit à nouveau affronter le Dr Robotnik dans Sonic Spinball sur Master System. Le quartier général ennemi est installé en haut d'un volcan, et le mécanisme qui le protège est similaire à celui d'un flipper. Mettez-vous en boule et escaladez le Mont Mobius pour libérer les animaux transformés en robots par votre pire ennemi.

Se você gosta mesmo de aventura e de muita ação, então você escolheu o jogo certo!! Cada vez mais biruta, o Dr. Robotnik inventou outra máquina com o intuito de conquistar definitivamente o planeta Mobius. Dentro de um vulcão ativo, ele construiu uma fortaleza capaz de transformar todos os animais do planeta em maldosos robôs de ataque. E muitos deles já foram capturados! Para defender-se de eventuais invasores, ele criou um sistema de defesa chamado SSP - Sistema de Segurança Pinball - um avançado equipamento em forma de Pinball, aquelas famosas máquinas de fliperama que todos conhecem, que elimina qualquer visitante indesejado de uma maneira não muito educada. Mas é claro que Sonic não vai deixar este perverso vilão levar a melhor. São pulos, ataques, batidas e muita ação em quatro fases de arrasar. É adrenalina pura!! Seja rápido para entrar no esquema do jogo. E não bobeie... o Robotnik não terá a menor pena de você antes de mandá-lo para o espaço!!

locale.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
locale.synopsis:
SEGA's mascot Sonic the Hedgehog made his debut in a famous Genesis title, but Sega's 8-bit systems got their own version of the platformer, featuring the same story and gameplay style, but different levels.
To stop the evil Dr. Robotnik, Sonic must traverse six zones consisting of three levels each. Most of the zones are based on those in the original game, but some are entirely new. Enemies (mechanized animals, defeated by Sonic's spikes when jumping or rolling) and power-ups (speed-ups, shields, extra lives) are mostly the same as well. Sonic can pick up golden rings for protection (when hit, he simply loses all of his rings instead of a life) and bonuses: 100 rings gain Sonic an extra life, and 50 remaining rings at the end of a level allow access to pinball-themed special stages full of bumpers and springs. The final level of a zone is always a boss fight against Robotnik.
Sonic should also collect the six Chaos Emeralds to keep them from falling into Robotnik's hands. In a departure from the original game, these are not hidden in the special stages but somewhere in the regular levels.

Rompe la barrera de velocidad del juego de video con Sonic, el erizo. Desplázate a toda velocidad usando el ataque giratorio supersónico. Déjate caer por túneles y gira a través del espacio. Rebota hasta quedar mareado en una máquina de bola loca. ¡De seguro que nunca antes habías visto algo como esto!

Sonic the Hedgehog sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes dont la principale caractéristique est l'incroyable vitesse de pointe de son héros, un hérisson bleu. L'histoire débute lorsque le docteur Robotnik capture les animaux de l'île et les enferme dans des robots. Le but du jeu est de libérer les animaux de l'île et de mettre à mal les plans de conquête du terrible Robotnik.

O mascote da SEGA Sonic the Hedgehog fez sua estréia no Mega Drive, mas os sistemas de 8-bits da SEGA tiveram sua própria versão do jogo de plataforma, apresentando a mesma história e estilo de jogo, mas níveis diferentes.
Para impedir o maligno Dr. Robotnik, Sonic deve atravessar seis zonas que consistem em três fases cada. A maioria das zonas se baseia nas do jogo original, mas algumas são inteiramente novas. Inimigos (animais mecanizados, derrotados pelos espinhos de Sonic ao saltar ou rolar) e power-ups (speed-ups, escudos, vidas extras) são na maior parte os mesmos. Sonic pode pegar anéis dourados para se proteger (quando leva dano, ele simplesmente perde todos os seus anéis em vez de perder uma vida) e bônus: 100 anéis de garantem a Sonic uma vida extra, e 50 anéis restantes no final de uma fase permitem o acesso as fases especiais com temática de pinball cheias de rebatedores e molas. A fase final de uma zona é sempre uma luta de chefão contra Robotnik.
Sonic também deve coletar as seis Chaos Emeralds para impedi-las de cair nas mãos de Robotnik. Em contra partida ao jogo original, estas não estão escondidas nas fases especiais mas em algum lugar nas fases comuns.

locale.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
locale.synopsis:
Coming back from the vacation Sonic took after foiling the plans of Dr Robotnik, he finds that Tails and all his other animal friends are missing. Sonic finds a letter waiting for him, that reads:
"Dear Sonic,
Robotnik is back, and he's captured all the animals on the island! He is holding me in a place called the Crystal Egg. In order to free me, you have to find and bring the six Chaos Emeralds.
Robotnik made me write this. He says he's waiting for you, and he's created six really nasty robots in order to 'get rid of you once and for all.' I don't know what he has planned, but Sonic, please be careful!
Sincerely, Tails."
That being more that enough motivation for him, Sonic races out to defeat Robotnik again.
The master system version is totally different than the Sonic 2 for Genesis. Tails obviously doesn't accompany you, like he can in the Genesis release. Sonic can also not do his infamous buzzsaw roll by simply ducking and pressing jump.

Monte en un automotor, vuele en un ala delta atravesando una furiosa tormenta, y pase a través de un intrincado laberinto de tubos retorcidos en la carrera en la que participarán usted y Sonic The Hedgehog? para salvar a Tails y sus amigos del demoníaco Dr. Robotnik?. ¡Es la acción en 8 bits mas movida que nunca!

Sonic The Hedgehog 2 sur Game Gear reprend la recette qui a fait le succès du précédent volet et ajoute la possibilité d'utiliser un deltaplane dans certaines phases de jeu. Collectez les anneaux pour gagner des vies supplémentaires et libérez les animaux condamnés à la robotisation ...

Voltando das férias que Sonic teve após frustrar os planos do Dr. Robotnik, ele descobre que Tails e todos os seus outros amigos animais estão desaparecidos. Sonic encontra uma carta esperando por ele que diz:
"Caro Sonic,
Robotnik está de volta, e ele capturou todos os animais na ilha! Ele está me prendendo em um lugar chamado Crystal Egg. Para libertar-me, você terá que encontrar e trazer as seis Chaos Emeralds.
Robotnik me fez escrever isso. Ele diz que está esperando por você e que criou seis robôs realmente desagradáveis para se livrar de você de uma vez por todas. Eu não sei o que ele planejou, mas Sonic, por favor tenha cuidado!
Atenciosamente, Tails".
Sendo motivação mais do que suficiente pra ele, Sonic corre para derrotar Robotnik novamente.
A versão de Master System é totalmente diferente do Sonic 2 para Mega Drive. Tails obviamente não o acompanha, como ele no lançamento para Mega Drive e Sonic também não pode fazer o seu rolo "Spin Dash" se abaixando e apertando pulo.
Hack brasileño del juego Psycho Fox, en el que el protagonista ha sido reemplazado por Sonic.
Hack brésilien de Pyscho Fox ou le personnage principal est remplacé par Sonic.

locale.title: Sonic's Edusoft
locale.synopsis: Sonic's Edusoft is an unreleased educational game for the Sega Master System developed in 1991 by Tiertex. The unofficially licensed game had been unknown until a Wikipedia page was created in September 2006. This page has since been removed from Wikipedia.nn

El juego fue desarrollado por Tiertex Design Studios en 1991. nnEl desarrollo comenzó poco después del Sonic the Hedgehog (16-bit). nnNo se sabe porque se dejo de desarollar el juego, pero si se hubiera lanzado sería el primer juego educativo de Sonic. Pero en 1996 se lanzo Sonic's Schoolhouse para PC, siendo el primer juego educativo de Sonic.

Sonic's Edusoft est un jeu éducatif inédit.Plus de 15 niveaux dans le jeu. Tous impliquent la résolution de problèmes et pour chaque problème résolu votre personnage avancera en atteignant finalement la fin de l'écran et la récompense.

Sonic's Edusoft foi um jogo educacional inédito estrelando Sonic the Hedgehog e desenvolvido para o Sega Master System. Com mais de 15 níveis no jogo. Todos envolvem a resolução de problemas e para cada problema resolvido seu personagem progride eventualmente para chegar a recompensa e ao final do jogo.
Hack brasileño del juego Teddy Boy, en el que el protagonista ha sido reemplazado por Sonic.
Hack brésilien de Teddy Boy ou le personnage principal est remplacé par Sonic.
Hack brasileño del juego "Wonder Boy in Monster Land" en el que el personaje principal (Wonderboy) es reemplazado por Sonic.
Hack Brésilien de Wonder Boy in monster land ou le personnage principal est remplacé par Sonic.

locale.title: Space Gun
locale.synopsis:
2039 A.D. Man begins deep space exploration in search of new life forms and usable fuel sources. What he discovers is trouble.
Until now, the success of past explorations was causing the space effort to grow by leaps and bounds. Until now, the explorers had found little more than fungus and small insects as alternative lifeforms. Until now, the chief dangers had been those posed by the hostile environment of space. Until now, the aliens had not known about THEM.
On the ragged edge of the galaxy, other creatures that roam the stars discover humans and spaceships to be excellent sources of food and other resources. Prepared at the worst for clashes with rival exploration teams, the human crews can do little to defend themselves as wave upon wave of nightmare creatures descend upon their ships and bases.
In response to their distress calls, the Federation has assembled a series of rescue teams, lead by their best military sharpshooters, to deal with the alien menace. As the leader of one of these teams, you must gun down the intruders and pick up the human survivors. Brave the maze of dark corridors that may lead to a deadly shootout between you and legions of monsters. Pick up survivors and extra ammo on the way.

Desde un nave espacial averiada en el extremo de la galaxia llega un grito de socorro. Monstruos horribles se han apoderado de ella y usted ha sido designado para salvar a lo que quede de su tripulación humana. Elija su camino por pasillos oscuros y lugares mortales donde la acción no cesa.

Space Gun sur Master System est un jeu d'action se déroulant dans l'espace, en 2039. Les premières rencontres avec les extraterrestres n'ont pas été spécialement pacifiques, les aliens attaquant sans vergogne les humains venus en paix à leur rencontre. Vous dirigez une équipe de sauvetage et devez venir en aide aux survivants, tout en éradiquant toute forme de menace extraterrestre.

locale.title: Space Harrier
locale.synopsis: Run fly dodge those obstacles, but return fire on wave after wave of attacking aliens. Armed with a really big gun, you have to defend yourself against the alien hordes using your wits to navigate around the screen. But watch out for those end of level bosses!
Hace mucho tiempo existio una tierra lejana donde los dragones vi vian en paz. Pero un día sufrieron un terrible ataque. Tu eres su última esperanza.

Space Harrier sur Master System est un shoot'em up. Le personnage dirigé à la troisième personne peut courir ou voler, et doit éviter les obstacles et tirs ennemis. Faites preuve d'adresse pour arriver au terme des 18 niveaux, chacun se terminant par un affrontement avec un boss.

locale.title: Space Harrier 3D
locale.synopsis: Space Harrier 3-D is more like Space Harrier 1 1/2. While it's not a direct sequel to Space Harrier, it was designed to take advantage of the 3-D glasses available at the time. This game is considerably darker than the original and the sequel in both look and feel. Even the digitized voices are deeper in tone, creating a sense of urgency about it. Things are obviously not right in Space Harrier's world. But if you're familiar with the original, the premise is the same; blow everything up and fight the boss at the end.

La tierra de los dragons está siendo atacada. El legítimo príncipe de los dragons, Euria, ha sido raptabo.nnSólo una persona tiene el coraje suficiente para adentrarse en los confines de la tierra de los dragons. Ese es usted...Space Harrier.nn¡Pero cuidado? El enemigo sabe que se acerca y le está esperando.

Space Harrier 3D sur Master System est un shoot'em up. Le personnage dirigé à la troisième personne peut courir ou voler et doit éviter les obstacles et tirs ennemis. Faites preuve d'adresse pour arriver au terme des 18 niveaux, chacun se terminant par un affrontement avec un boss. Ce volet se distingue par une fonction permettant de donner un effet de profondeur aux graphismes.
Shoot them up de origen amateur.
Shoot them up Homebrew.nn

locale.title: Speedball
locale.synopsis:
The original future sport game, Speedball is played out on a small court with five players on each team, making it more frantic than the more famous sequel. The ball must be thrown into the goal at your opponent's end. Any amount of physical contact can be made, and there are no illegal ways to get the ball or the goal.
Before each match you can bribe the referee into awarding you a head-start or strengthening the abilities of your players. You compete in a simple knockout cup tournament, or in individual 2-player games.

Speedball es el deporte de acción del siglo XXI. Con armadura claveteada, casco y guantes, se encontrará cara a cara con algunos de los terroristas más peligrosos y malvados del mundo. Esquive ataques que parten cuellos y golpes rompehuesos para pasar un balón solido de acero hacia la porteria del contrario. Golpee a su enemigo lo bastante y gritará piedad.

Speedball sur Master System est un jeu de sport futuriste mettant aux prises 2 équipes de 5 joueurs. Au coeur d'une arène métallique, tous les coups sont permis pour mettre la balle dans les buts adverses. Il existe deux modes de jeu : Match d'Exhibition ou un Mode Tournoi pour se frotter aux meilleurs.

locale.title: Speedball 2
locale.synopsis:
Brutal Deluxe doesn't live up to their name - in fact they're the worst team Speedball has ever seen. As their manager, it is your job to transform their fortunes. As well as the league system, which consists of 2 8-team divisions and challenges you to advance to the top, there are also 2 cup tournaments, one of which is played out over 2 'legs' with the aggregate score deciding who progresses.
You can play the matches as well, which is the real meat of the game. They consist of 2 90-second periods, and the gameplay is futuristic, fast and frantic, with heavy tackling encouraged to retrieve the ball. Power-ups and tokens appear on the pitch, including ones to make your players extra-tough or freeze the opponents.
The sides of the pitch each include a score multiplier, which you can run the ball through to increase the value of your scoring - the opposition can sometimes immediately grab the ball and nullify this. There are also 5 stars which are worth 2 points each if you hit them (more if you have the multiplier activated), but these can also be cancelled out by the opposition hitting the same star, and their points values only become set after the half. Next to the stars there are 'portals' which throw the ball out the opposite side of the pitch, in the direction it was going.
You get money for the results, and by collecting the silver tokens which appear on the pitch at random intervals. Between each match you can spend these either on improving your existing players as far as they can go, or on buying better ones and fitting them into the team. Your original players can only be improved to a certain extent, so remembering where your signed players are and making use of them is important.
A variety of tokens also appear during the match, some of which boost your team's power for a short period of time, and one freezes the opposition.

Speedball 2:Un deporte del futuro, violento y casi legal con una única regla: meter la sólida pelota de acero en las redes de la portería enemiga.nnLo único más violento que este deporte sangriento son los brutos que lo juegan.nnY no los hay más brutos que los Brutal Deluxe, caras nuevas a la cola de la liga, sedientos de sangre y hambrientos de fama.

Speedball 2 sur Master System est un titre qui oppose deux équipes dans un sport futuriste mélangeant football américain et handball. Les joueurs doivent faire entrer une boule en fer dans le but adverse par tous les moyens. Il est autorisé de frapper les adversaires pour se saisir de la balle, et les faire sortir sur blessure rapporte autant de points qu'un but.

locale.title: SpellCaster
locale.synopsis:
Kujakuo is based on the comic by the same name, published in Young Jump in the late eighties and drawn by Makoto Ogino. It is a tale of the occult, centred around the buddhist monk Kujaku.
In this game, Kujaku is sent out by his master, Ajari, to find out what has happened at the nearby temple of Hieizan. Upon arriving, after having fought his way through magical creatures and deadly warriors, he find his comrades slain. One of them, Kubira, is still holding on to his life, and before drawing his last breath, he utters the word "Izumo". Ajuri then sends Kujaku to the town of Izumo, where he encounters a deadly enemy of unknown origin.
Kujakuo is part adventure game à la Déjà vu (or, since this is a Sega game, Hoshi o sagashite), part platform action. To get between the adventure parts, you must pass an action level, as well as a boss fight or two, just as in Cosmic Spacehead.
The adventure part has you looking at a scenery, with a text box for descriptions and lines, and a set of verbs on the right. Use a cursor to point out specific objects for your verbs.
In the platform levels, Kujaku can jump and shoot magic bolts. While the usual bolt is small, he can load up before releasing them, R-Type style. Pressing the pause button opens up the spell menu, for accessing more powerful magical spells. New spells can be learned throughout the game. Most spells are offensive, but some grant additional powers such as levitation. Each time a spell is activated, you use up your limited spirit energy. Enemies will, when killed, sometimes drop spheres that will raise your spirit energy, though.
This game was remade into Spellcaster upon its release in the West.

Tu eres el guerrero Kane y llegas al templo Summit asistiendo la llamada del maestro Daikak. Este ultimo te informa que el templo Enriku fue atacado por un enemigo desconocido... Daikak envió a diez soldados a proteger el templo pero hace tiempo que no sabe nada de ellos... Tu destino es detener los ataques y revelar la identidad del enemigo.

Vous incarnez Kane, le jeune apprenti de Daikak, le moine du temple de la montagne. Ce dernier vous a initié aux arcanes du combat et de la magie en ce Moyen Age japonais. Un jour, il vous demande d'aller enquêter sur une attaque qui a eu lieu dans un temple voisin. Vous découvrirez qu'il n'y a aucun survivant. C'est là que commence l'aventure, vous serez par la suite confronté à un vaste complot qu'il va vous falloir élucider sous peine de voir le monde courir à sa perte.

locale.title: Spider-Man vs. the Kingpin
locale.synopsis:
The city of New York is certainly a great place to be, but not when there's the criminal element running about. Lucky for the NYPD, there's also the heroic Spider-Man on their side!
But now one of the biggest criminals in the city, Wilson Fisk, a.k.a. The Kingpin, has pulled of the ultimate plot! He announces to New York that a bomb has been planted somewhere in the city, and that it'll go off in 24 hours! What's worse, he lays the blame on Spider-Man, and now the webslinger is on his own, and on the run from the police. Spidey smells a rat, and he knows what he must do.
Spidey has 24 hours to find and disarm that bomb. And he must also clear his name, so he takes his camera to take convincing photos for his Spider-Man hating boss, J. Jonah Jameson, and the police, to prove his innocence. Along the way, he just may run into a few of his *AHEM* "old friends", including Dr. Octopus, Electro, Mysterio, and ultimately Kingpin himself!

Kingpin ha vuelto a la ciudad con su ultimo plan para destruir al Hombre Araña. Ha puesto una bomba en Nueva York y piensa culpar a Arañita. ¿Puede usted ayudar a nuestro héroe a salir con éxito de esta desesperada situación?

Spider-Man vs. The Kingpin sur Master System est un jeu d'action/plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez l'homme-araignée. Wilson Fisk alias The Kingpin déclare à la presse qu'une bombe placée quelque part dans New York va exploser d'ici 24 heures. Il accuse directement Spider-Man, qui se retrouve avec la police sur le dos. Vous devez trouver la bombe et redorer votre blason, mais Octopus, Electro et Mysterio tenteront de vous barrer la route.

game.name: Spider-man - Return Of The Sinister Six

locale.title: Spider-Man: Return of the Sinister Six
locale.synopsis:
From the ingame intro:
"Doctor Octopus is plotting the crowning caper of his criminal career... to rule the world. He has reunited the Sinister Six and with these super-villains together again, nothing stands in their way - except Spider-Man!"
Spider-Man: Return of the Sinister Six is a side-scrolling game which puts you in the role of Spidey throughout six levels against Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, Vulture, Hobgoblin and Doctor Octopus respectively. Some puzzle solving (like finding a key) is necessary to beat some levels. Spidey can duck jump, climb walls, punch, shoot webs to swing (by pressing punch and jump together) and perform a jump kick (by pressing the punch button twice). Collecting web cartridges allows Spidey to shoot limited web projectiles.
Although hard to die, Spidey has only one life, there are no items to recharge life (but killing some guys will do so) and only one continue.

El Dr Octopus está planeando el número cumbre de su carrera criminal para... ¡DOMINAR EL MUNDO! Ha reunido a The SinisterSix?: Electro?, Sandman?, Mysterio?, The Vulture? y Hobgoblin? ¡Los Seis Siniestros! Nada puede detener el avance de estos súper villanos reunidos... ¡excepto tu simpático vecino Spider-Man®! ¿Podrá, nuestro amigo Spidey?, salvar el mundo?. ¿Bastarán sus súper poderes para derrotar a los seis siniestros o es demasiado incluso para Spider-man? Sólo tú conoces la respuesta, porque ¡TU eres Spider-man®, balanceándote en la más emocionante de las aventuras del momento para Master System?¡

Spider-Man : Return of the Sinister Six vous propose de revêtir la combinaison bleue et rouge de l'homme-araignée dans un jeu d'action où vous serez opposé aux Sinister Six (Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, Vulture, Hobgoblin et le docteur Octopus). Vous aurez parfois à résoudre des petites énigmes. Prenez garde, notre héros ne possède qu'une seule vie...

locale.title: Sports Pad Football
locale.synopsis: Playoff fever grips you. And no wonder. You're the driving force that can take your football team to the top in this rough and tumble contest between the leagues. The outcome of the game is in your hands. As the quarterback, you select the plays. Line up the formation. Call the signals and carry the ball. Cut down your opponent with deadly blocking. Intercept a pass. Make a flying tackle. All you need is skill. Strategy. Cunning. And nerve. For non-stop action that charges across the screen. You decide to pass. It looks good. Touchdown!
Juego de futbol americano para el cual es necesario el mando "SportPad" para poder jugar.
Jeu de football américain qui nécessite l'accessoire SportPad.

locale.title: Spy vs Spy
locale.synopsis:
M.A.D. magazines comic strip of the same name comes to life in this game which was designed for one or two players. The innovative split-screen shows both spies at the same time. Play with a friend or against the machine.
The black crow and the white crow are out to beat each other before the time bell rings. Find the needed objects by digging through drawers, closets and furniture in the house. Foil your opponent by setting creative booby traps in the various rooms (a bomb in a dresser drawer, for instance).
Fights ensue when both spies enter the same room. Find hidden weapons in the rooms to help with those fights, since one of you will die if you run into each other.
Dos espías tras 5 puntos compiten entre sí tratando de conseguirlos. Utilizando potentes patadas y puñetazos, trate de capturar al contrincante empleando los puntos de trampa, y evite ser atrapado.

Spy vs Spy sur Master System est un jeu tiré du comics américain du même nom. L'écran divisé met 2 espions en scène, l'objectif étant pour chacun de remplir sa mission plus vite que le second. Seul contre l'ordinateur ou à deux joueurs, faites preuve de rapidité mais aussi de malice, en plaçant judicieusement des pièges de manière à faire perdre du temps à votre adversaire.

game.name: Star Wars

locale.title: Star Wars
locale.synopsis:
This game is based closely on Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope. It combines a number of gameplay styles, but primarily it is a side scrolling run-and-jump platformer.
The game begins on Tatooine, where you, as Luke Skywalker, must travel around and meet up with R2D2, C3PO, Obi-Wan, and so on. Eventually, you travel through Mos Eisley and the Death Star as well. While most of the game has you controlling Luke, Han or Leia directly, some of the various game styles include a first-person Millennium Falcon asteroid belt sequence, and an overhead view Death Star trench run.

La misión: Rescatar a la Princesa Leia de las MALVADAS garras de Darth Vader!nnnnAcudir en busca de ayuda a Obi-Wan Kenobi y Han Solo; pero, para eso primero habrás de encontrarlos.nnnnPor último, te corresponde detonar el mortífero misil final que acabará para siempre con el cuartel general del lado oscuro y ... QUE LA FUERZA TE ACOMPAÑE!

Star Wars sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes inspiré du célèbre univers de Georges Lucas. Basé sur la trame de l'épisode IV, le scénario place le joueur aux côtés de Luke, Leila et Han Solo. De Tatooine à l'étoile de la mort, vivez les scènes les plus mémorables du premier long métrage de la saga Star Wars.

Este jogo baseia-se estreitamente no Star Wars Episódio IV: Uma Nova Esperança. Ele combina vários estilos de jogo, mas basicamente é um jogo de plataformas de rolagem lateral e corrida.nnnnO jogo começa em Tatooine, onde você, como Luke Skywalker, deve viajar e encontrar R2D2, C3PO, Obi-Wan e assim por diante. Eventualmente, você viaja através de Mos Eisley e da Estrela da Morte também. Enquanto a maior parte do jogo tem você controlando Luke, Han ou Leia diretamente, alguns dos vários estilos de jogo incluem uma sequência de cinturão de asteroides em primeira pessoa do Millennium Falcon, e uma visão geral de Death Star

game.publisher: LucasArts - Tiertex Design Studio - U.S. Gold

game.name: Sítio Do Picapau Amarelo

locale.title: Stio do Picapau Amarelo
locale.synopsis:
Tia Nastácia (Aunt Anastacia) is sick, and Dr. Caramujo (Dr. Snails) is called to examine her. And he's got some good and bad news. Good news is that she can be cured. Bad news is that, to prepare the medicine, he'll need five rare ingredients: bat's blood, Saci's hat, Curupira's salsaparrilha bat, Iara's hair and a tear from Cuca. To make things even worse, next night will be a full moon, and if Tia Nastácia doesn't get cured until then, she'll sleep for 100 years! So, Pedrinho (Pete) and Emília (Emily) are sent to bring the ingredients and cure Tia Nastácia.
Sítio do Picapau Amarelo (Yellow Woodpecker Ranch in English) is based on the works of Monteiro Lobato, a Brazilian writer. One or two players (in hot-seat mode) can choose to play either the boy Pedrinho (or Pete, in the English version of the books) or the rag doll Emília (Emily in the English version). The items they must gather are based on Brazilian folklore.
Gameplay consists in basic side-scrolling/platforming. Either characters can jump (button 2), run (either pressing the D-pad twice to a direction, or holding a button and the D-pad to a direction), shoot (button 1), and duck. The game has four levels (one for each ingredient, the last one with two of them), all set in the ranch, with indoor levels, underwater levels, caves and such.
Each character starts with 3 lives. They have a health bar, which can be replenished by gathering items such as nests with eggs, or by freeing birds from cages. The enemies faced are most animals, such as bats, bugs, spiders, snakes, piranhas, jaguars and monkeys.
All in game text is in Portuguese.

La Tia Nastácia se enferma de "Hechizos Acumulatus", para curarla sería necesario crear una poción encontrando 5 difíciles ingredientes: plantas mágicas, sangre de murciélago gigante, el caparazón de Saci, el bastón de Curupira y un mechón de pelo de Iara. Pedrito y Emilia deciden aventurarse para conseguir esos ingredientes. Pero si no lo logran antes de la noche siguiente, ella pasará a quedarse durmida durante 100 años!

Dans Sítio do Picapau Amarelo vous contrôlez soit Pedrinho ou Emilia et deux joueurs peuvent jouer en alternance, mais ils doivent partager le contrôleur connecté au port 1.Un jeu de plateforme très simple sur lequel les attaques et les sauts; appui une ou deux fois sur le bouton, puis en le maintenant le personnage cours. Certains ennemis ne peuvent pas être détruits, comme les guêpes , tandis que d'autres peuvent être détruits en sautant dessus. Curieusement la deuxième étape est complètement différent en fonction du personnage choisi.

A Tia Nastácia fica doente de "Feitiçus Acumulatus" sendo que para curá-la seria necessário criar uma poção para anular encontrando 5 difíceis ingredientes: plantas mágicas, sangue de morcego gigante, a carapuça do Saci, o bastão do Curupira e um fio de cabelo da Iara. Nisso Pedrinho e Emília decidem se aventurar atrás desses ingredientes caso o contrário não consigam até a noite seguinte ela passará a ficar dormindo por 100 anos! Assim, Pedrinho e Emília são enviados para trazer os ingredientes e curar Tia Nastácia.
Sítio do Picapau Amarelo é baseado nas obras de Monteiro Lobato. Tem modo para 1 ou 2 jogadores podem escolher entre Pedrinho ou a boneca de pano Emília. Os itens que eles devem reunir são baseados no folclore brasileiro.
Jogabilidade consiste em plataforma. Os dois personagens podem pular (botão 2), executar (pressionando o D-pad duas vezes para uma direção, ou segurando um botão e o D-pad em uma direção), atirar (botão 1). O jogo tem quatro níveis (um para cada ingrediente, o último com dois deles).
Cada personagem começa com 3 vidas. Eles têm uma barra de saúde, que pode ser reabastecida através da recolha de itens como ninhos de ovos, ou libertando aves de gaiolas. Os inimigos enfrentados são na maioria, animais, como: morcegos, insetos, aranhas, cobras, piranhas, onças e macacos.
Tudo no texto do jogo está em português.

game.developer: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.
game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Street Fighter II'
locale.synopsis:
Most everyone familiar with electronic games has heard of Street Fighter II - the most famous beat-em-up series ever. Basically you get a bunch of fighters together (12 in this case) and get them to punch, kick, bite and thump the bejesus out of each other then you're close.
Here yet another slightly different version of the game turns up - this time on the Genesis. Special Champion Edition is similar in most respects to the original Street Fighter II (which never turned up on the Genesis anyway) except that all 12 characters are selectable from the get-go (the boss characters were originally locked) and the game engine has been revamped.
Conversión del famoso arcade de lucha para Master System llevada a cabo en exclusiva por la distribuidora brasileña Tectoy.nnnnLucha y compite por ser el mejor luchador y ganar el torneo.

Street Fighter II' sur Master System vous lance dans l'arène pour cette nouvelle déclinaison de la saga de Capcom. Dans ce jeu de baston, vous retrouvez huit combattants de légende ainsi que les quatre boss qui sont débloqués dès le début du jeu (Balrog, Sagat, Vega et M. Bison). Maîtrisez chacune des techniques propres aux personnages dans ce titre à la jouabilité nerveuse et aux coups ravageurs.

FIGHT!nnOito lutadores de rua. Oito estilos diferentes. Oito campeões com um único objetivo. Sobreviver ao mais perigoso torneio já criado pelo Homem: o Street Fighter!!nnRyu, M. Bison, Ken, Guile, Chun-Li, Blanka, Sagat e Balrog estarão lado a lado em violentos combates, onde o prazer maior não está apenas em derrotar o oponente, e sim em fazê-lo sofre o máximo possível!!nnJunte-se a eles nessa incrível batalha, e mostre que você é mais que um simples jogador de video game. Mostre que você é um mestre nas lutas e que não tem medo de caras feias e montes de músculos.

locale.title: Street Master
locale.synopsis: Street Master is an unlicensed port of Street Fighter I. It also sports a few challengers from Street Fighter II. The five enemies are Joe, Chun Li, "Ninja" (for some reason they dropped Geki's name), Bison (the boxer, in his SFII-attire) and Gen. The player always takes the role of Ken, Ryu isn't available (although the sprite is actually colored like him). In 2-player mode the second player, who fights on the left side in this game, gets to chose between the 5 enemies. Player one is denied that privilege, though.
Juego de peleas sin licencia oficial que apareció en exclusiva en Corea del Sur.
Jeu de combat sorti sans licence exclusivement en Corée du sud.

O Street Master é um port sem licença do Street Fighter I. Ele também tem alguns adversários do Street Fighter II. Os cinco inimigos são Joe, Chun Li, "Ninja" (por algum motivo eles deixaram cair o nome de Geki), Bison (o boxeador, em seu traje SFII) e Gen. O jogador sempre assume o papel de Ken, Ryu não está disponível (embora o sprite seja realmente colorido como ele). No modo para 2 jogadores, o segundo jogador, que luta no lado esquerdo neste jogo, escolhe entre os 5 inimigos. O jogador um é negado esse privilégio, no entanto.

locale.title: Streets of Rage
locale.synopsis:
Streets of Rage, Sega's answer to Final Fight, follows the story of three young police officers (Adam Hunter, Axel Stone and Blaze Fielding) in a city controlled by a criminal syndicate led by a "Mr. X" where crime is rampant, which leads the three heroes to make a pact to leave the force and topple the syndicate by themselves.
Gameplay is straightforward and simple. Three buttons are used, one to jump, other to attack and another to perform a range attack from a support police car. Each character has a limited set of moves that include punching and kicking or performing a back attack (if in the open), two grapple moves (depending if holding the opponent in front or by the back), a flying attack, and if playing with another player two additional tag attacks, and different abilities: Adam is slow, but a good jumper and a hard hitter, Axel fast and also a hard hitter, but a lousy jumper and Blaze fast and a good jumper, but weak hitter. Levels are in typical arcade side-scroller fashion: move from left to right (with two exceptions), clearing screens from enemies one after another as fast as possible while avoid taking damage with a boss in the end. Some levels feature "death drops" where the player must avoid falling, while throwing enemies there at the same time, including a typical elevator level. Several items are scattered on the ground, from melee weapons and bonus points (and lives or additional police cars) to apples and turkeys (to restore health).

Adam Hunter, Axel Stone y Blaze Fielding son tres ex-policías que intentan salvar a su ciudad del sindicato maléfico del crimen que se ha apoderado de ella. ¡Elija a uno de ellos y luche con las manos limpias o con cualquier tipo de arma que pueda encontrar... mientras cruza las Calles de la Rabia!

Streets of Rage sur Master System vous propose de suivre l'histoire de trois jeunes agents de police aux prises avec une organisation criminelle, ménée de main de fer par un certain Mr.X. Le jeu consiste à éliminer tous vos opposants grâce à divers coups, pour progresser dans le niveau et défier le boss. Chaque combattant dispose de ses propres qualités et désavantages.

Peacetown era um lugar tranquilo, onde as crianças podiam brincar em segurança, os velhos passeavam sem serem assaltados, enfim, a vida era calma, boa e gostosa. É, só que para estragar tudo, um grupo criminoso tomou a cidade com tamanha violência que todas as autoridades passaram a temê-los. Seu nome? Os Guerreiros de Mr. X - um ser desumano, de quem só se sabe o nome. Todos que o viram não sobreviveram para contar a história. Mas para três heróis isso não importa.
