Adam Hunter, Axel Stone e Blaze Fielding são ex-policiais que, mesmo desarmados, resolveram expulsar os bandidos da cidade. A força! Eles lutam tanto que, ae usassem armas, seria muita covardia. Arremessar o adversário pelas costas, dar voadoras, joelhadas no estômago, socos, chutes, rasteiras... os golpes são inúmeros! No shopping, na praia, no Q.G. da cangue e até mesmo num elevador, a luta pela paz continua e ninguém pode ficar parado. Principalmente você! Descubra porque Streets of Rage é um dos mais famosos jogos de lutas marciais de todos os tempos!

locale.title: Streets of Rage 2
locale.synopsis:
After Axel Stone, Blaze Fielding and Adam Hunter destroyed the evil Syndicate leader, Mr. X, the city became a peaceful place to live, and each one of them followed their own paths. One year later, after their reunion, Adam's brother Sammy returned from school to find their apartment in a mess, and Adam nowhere to be seen, and after calling his two friends, one of them notices a photo of Adam chained to a wall, next to someone they knew very well - Mr. X, who returned to turn the peaceful city once again into a war zone. Now, Axel, Blaze, Sammy, and Axel's good friend Max, a pro wrestler, must head out to stop Mr. X once again...hopefully for good...
Streets of Rage 2 differs from the previous title in several ways. There are changes in both graphics (characters now are bigger, more detailed and with more animation frames, and scenarios are less grainy) and gameplay (the rocket move was replaced by a special move that doubles in offense and defense along several new moves), along other new features such as life bars (and names) for all enemies and the radically different new characters.

Skate Hunter se une a los ex policías Axel Stone y Blaze Fielding en una lucha sin cuartel en las calles contra pandillas de "punks", motociclistas, ninjas y luchadores profesionales, ¡todos ellos equipados con armas de alta tecnología! Usa tus puños, o coge un cuchillo o un tubo, ¡y participa en la acción!

Un an après avoir défait Mr. X, les policiers Axel, Blaze et Adam ont repris le cours normal de leur existence, jusqu'à ce que ce dernier ne soit enlevé. Tel est le point de départ de Streets of Rage 2 sur Master System. Le jeu demeure un beat'em all classique, mais s'enrichit grandement en termes de jouabilité par rapport à son prédécesseur, ainsi qu'en termes d'interactivité des environnements.

Dizem que um raio não cai duas vezes no m es mo lugar. Desta vez caiu! Estamos de volta a Peacetown. a cidade que há apenas um ano tinha testemunhado uma das maiores pancadarias de todos os tempos, onde Adam, Blaze e Axel conseguiram banir os Guerreiros de Mr.X. De uma vez por todas? Não! Mr.X esta de volta e desta vez o malvadão espalhou seus comparsas pela cidade arrepiando com os pobres cidadãos e raptou Adam para atrair seus amigos para uma terrível armadilha. Sabendo que era uma armadilha, Axel e Blaze escalaram mais um para o time do Bem: Eddie - um mestre na luta sob patins! Você escolherá um entro esses incríveis lutadores e atravessará 6 fases do ação incessante usando seus pés, punhos o uma série de super poderes que transformarão os bandidos em geléia! Entre você também para o time do Bem e divirta-se com a continuação de um dos melhores jogos de luta de todos os tempos!

locale.title: Strider
locale.synopsis:
The year is 2089AD. In Russia, the evil Grand Master Meio has begun his insane plot to take over the universe. A lone figure drops from a stealth glider into Meio's base. He is Hiryu, Super A-Class Strider. His mission is to defeat the Grand Master and put an end to his plotting once and for all.
Converted from the classic arcade game, Strider lets you run, jump, perform acrobatics and climb walls and overhangs. You wield a plasma sword, called a Cypher, through 5 levels fighting robots and guards, with mid- and end-level bosses.

La tierra está siendo arrasada; el Gran Maestro Meio ha liberado a sus criaturas diabólicas sin que nadie se lo hubiese esperado. El Strider Hiryu se enfrenta solo a la ola de terror y necesita que le ayudes para acabar con esta pesadilla. ¡El Maestro os espera!

Strider est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Mster System. En l'an 2089, le Grand Maître Meio a mis au point un plan diabolique pour conquérir l'univers tout entier. Vous incarnez Hiryu, un Strider de premier ordre avec pour mission de mettre un terme aux agissements de Meio. Il faudra courir, sauter et tuer vos ennemis grâce à votre épée plasma au cours des cinq niveaux que compte le jeu.

locale.title: Strider II
locale.synopsis:
Strider has been called into action to save the people of the planet Magenta, armed with a Gyro laser and matter converter. He must fight his way through a forest, a ruined city, underground colonies, a roof-top battle, and finally the prison ship in which the Megantan leader is held.
The gameplay is similar to the original, consisting of running, jumping and attacking, with a very dynamic central character. The laser gun can be used while standing still; moving attacks with the sword are still possible, with the two weapons combining similarly to the Switchblade games. Tokens can be collected, which will turn you into a robot to face the end-of-level enemies if enough are collected.

¡Regresa Strider, fabuloso atleta y el mejor de los guerreros! Su misión consiste en superar 5 niveles llenos de peligro con el fin de llegar a la guarida del malvado Gran Maestro y salvar al planeta de una muerte segura. En esta ocasión ¡NO HABRA LIMITE..., PIEDAD...NI RENDICIÓN!

Strider II sur Master System place le joueur dans la peau de Strider, guerrier émérite, appelé à la rescousse par le peuple de la planète Magenta. Vous devez progresser à travers forêts, bâtiments désaffectés et autres prisons. Vif et agile, Strider vous permet de vous accrocher et de grimper aux parois, tout en faisant usage de votre laser-gun.

locale.title: Submarine Attack
locale.synopsis: In Submarine Attack, the player controls a submarine in an underwater-based environment. Shoot down enemies that are coming toward you using your missiles either at the front or rear of the sub. There are six stages in the game, and at the end of each one, you have to defeat a boss who requires multiple shots to kill. When you defeat one, you proceed to the next, difficult stage.

La Criatura Metamór?ca ha vuelto a capturar ciudadanos de Balderia. ¡que todavia no se habia recuperado de su último encuentro con el monstruo 4 años atrás! ¡Guíe al almirante Mikan a través de los peligros de las aguas profundas hasta el complejo enemigo, y ayúdele a destruir al monstruo!

Submarine Attack sur Master System est un shoot'em up dans lequel vous devez protéger votre sous-marin des attaques ennemies provenant de toutes parts. Pour ce faire, usez à bon escient, 6 niveaux durant, de vos tourelles à missiles situées à l'avant et à l'arrière de votre insubmersible.

Em Submarine Attack, o jogador controla um submarino em um ambiente subaquático. Abater inimigos que estão vindo em sua direção usando seus mísseis na parte frontal ou traseira do submarino. Existem seis etapas no jogo e, no final de cada uma, você precisa derrotar um chefe que precisa de vários tiros para matar. Quando você derrota um, você prossegue para o próximo estágio difícil.

locale.title: Sudoku
locale.synopsis: Fill in the blank spaces with numbers from 1 to 9 without repetition, in the row, column or square.
Rellene con los espacios vacíos con números de 1 a 9 sin repetición, en la fila, columna o cuadrado.
Preencha com os espaços vazios com números de 1 a 9 sem repetição, na linha, coluna ou quadrado.

locale.title: Suho Cheonsa
locale.synopsis: Suho Cheonsa is an unclicensed game with gameplay similiar to Krakout and Arkanoid.
Juego aparecido al mercado sin licencia. Una versión de este juego fue incluída en el recopilatorio '4 Pak All Action' publicado por HES en Australia.
Jeu original sorti sans licence. Une version de ce jeu est incluse dans la compilation '4 Pak All Action' publiée par HES en Australie.

locale.title: Sukeban Deka II - Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu
locale.synopsis: Sukeban Deka II: Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu ("Delinquent Girl Cop: Legend of the Maiden's Iron Mask") is a game based on the Sukeban Deka license, specifically that of the TV show remake in the 80s which was named Sukeban Deka II (which is why this game has no predecessor despite being a "II"). The series follows a Japanese schoolgirl who has chosen to fight crime after flaunting the law herself one too many times. Her only notable characteristic, as far as this game is concerned, is the use of a weaponized metal yo-yo to pummel her foes.

Un juego basado en la licencia Deke de Sukeban. La serie sigue a una colegiala japonesa que eligió luchar contra el crimen. Su única característica notable, con respecto a este juego, un yo-yo reforzado en metal que usa para golpear a sus enemigos.

Un jeu basé sur la licence de Deke de Sukeban. La série suit une écolière japonaise qui a choisi de lutter contre le crime . Sa seule caractéristique notable, en ce qui concerne ce jeu, est l'utilisation d'un yo-yo en métal armé pour bourrer de coups ses ennemis.

Sukeban Deka II: Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu é um jogo baseado na licença de Sukeban Deka, especificamente no remake do programa de TV dos anos 80, chamado Sukeban Deka II. porque este jogo não tem antecessor apesar de ser um "II"). A série segue uma colegial japonesa que optou por combater o crime depois de exibir a lei muitas vezes. Sua única característica notável, no que diz respeito a este jogo, é o uso de um ioiô de metal armado para espancar seus inimigos.

locale.title: Sukeban Deka II : Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu
Summer Games
locale.synopsis:
Summer Games allows up to eight players to compete in a series of summer themed Olympic events. The gameplay is similar to the other entries in Epyx "games" series. Each player can choose a country to represent, and then takes turns competing in various events to see who will win the gold medal! The game allows you to compete in all of the events sequentially, choose a few events, choose just one event, or practice an event. The events available vary slightly depending on the platform, and may include:
1. Pole vault 2. Platform diving 3. 4x400 meter relay 4. 100 meter dash 5. Gymnastics 6. Freestyle swimming 7. Skeet shooting 8. 100 meter freestyle 9. Rowing

La antorcha ceremonial está encendida, las palomas vuelan en plena libertad... Los Juegos de Verano han sido inaugurados oficialmente. Atletas de ocho países se han reunido para mostrar su talento. Usted tiene ahora la oportunidad de vencerlos a todos. Natación, salto de trampolín y atletismo. Elija la nación que desea representar y vaya a por la medalla de oro, o quizá un nuevo récord del mundo.

Summer Games sur Master System est un jeu de sport dans lequel vous jouez un membre de l'équipe nationale américaine pendant les Jeux Olympiques d'été. Huit disciplines sont accessibles comme le sprint en vélo, le lancer de poids, les barres parallèles, les anneaux, ou encore le tir à l'arc. Un mode multijoueur est disponible rendant les parties plus intéressantes.

Rom hack Koreano de Arkanoid. El jugador controla una pequeña plataforma, conocida como "Nave Espacial Vaus", que impide que una bola salga de la zona de juego, haciéndola rebotar. En la parte superior hay "ladrillos" o "bloques", que desaparecen al ser tocados por la bola.

locale.title: Super Basketball
locale.synopsis: Rolling non-interactive demonstration of unreleased game. The cartridge includes hidden FM music that can be only activated with a patch
Demo no jugable de un juego no lanzado al mercado. El cartucho contiene sonidos y música FM que solo pueden ser activados con un patch.
Démon non-interactive. La cartouche contient de la musique FM cachée qui ne peut être activée que par un patch.

locale.title: Super Bioman 1
locale.synopsis: This is an unlicensed Sega Master System game released in South Korea in 1992. It is essentially a Super Mario Bros. 3 clone
Clon del Super Mario Bros 3 de Nintendo. Se trata de un juego que no fue licenciado oficialmente el cual apareció en Corea del Sur en 1992.
Jeu non officiel sorti exclusivement en Corée du sud.Clone de super Mario Bros.3

locale.title: Super Boy 3
locale.synopsis: Super Boy is a Super Mario Bros. clone, however offers a brand new set of levels not seen in any official Mario game. Due to its MSX roots the graphics are simpler, scrolling is choppy and several gameplay aspects are missing (such as the ability to kick koopa shells).

Clon de Super Mario Bros, aunque contiene nuevos niveles nunca vistos en ningún juego oficial de Mario. nnJuego de gráficos simples, pobre scroll y algunas características del juego original de Nintendo han sido omitidas, como la habilidad de lanzar conchas de Koopa).

Super Boy est un clone Super Mario Bros., mais offre un tout nouveau ensemble de niveaux que l'on ne voit pas dans un jeu officiel de Mario. En raison de ses racines MSX, les graphismes sont plus simples, le scrolling est haché et plusieurs aspects de gameplay sont manquants (comme la possibilité de lancer des coquilles koopa).

Super Boy é um clone de Super Mario Bros., no entanto oferece um novo conjunto de níveis não vistos em qualquer jogo oficial de Mario. Devido às suas raízes de MSX, os gráficos são mais simples, a rolagem é instável e vários aspectos de jogabilidade estão faltando (como a capacidade de chutar os shells koopa).

locale.title: Super Boy 4
locale.synopsis: Super Boy is a Super Mario Bros. clone, however offers a brand new set of levels not seen in any official Mario game. Due to its MSX roots the graphics are simpler, scrolling is choppy and several gameplay aspects are missing (such as the ability to kick koopa shells).

Clon de Super Mario Bros, aunque contiene nuevos niveles nunca vistos en ningún juego oficial de Mario.nnJuego de gráficos simples, pobre scroll y algunas características del juego original de Nintendo han sido omitidas, como la habilidad de lanzar conchas de Koopa).

Jeu sans licence Officielle.Super Boy est un clone Super Mario Bros., mais offre un tout nouveau ensemble de niveaux que l'on ne voit pas dans un jeu officiel de Mario. En raison de ses racines MSX, les graphismes sont plus simples, le défilement est haché et plusieurs aspects de gameplay sont manquants (comme la possibilité de lancer des coquilles koopa).

locale.title: Super Boy I
locale.synopsis: Super Boy is a Super Mario Bros. clone, however offers a brand new set of levels not seen in any official Mario game. Due to its MSX roots the graphics are simpler, scrolling is choppy and several gameplay aspects are missing (such as the ability to kick koopa shells).

Clon de Super Mario Bros, aunque contiene nuevos niveles nunca vistos en ningún juego oficial de Mario.nnJuego de gráficos simples, pobre scroll y algunas características del juego original de Nintendo han sido omitidas, como la habilidad de lanzar conchas de Koopa).

Jeu sans licence officielle.Super Boy est un clone Super Mario Bros., mais offre un tout nouveau ensemble de niveaux que l'on ne voit pas dans un jeu officiel de Mario. En raison de ses racines MSX, les graphismes sont plus simples, le défilement est haché et plusieurs aspects de gameplay sont manquants (comme la possibilité de lancer des coquilles koopa).

locale.title: Super Boy II
locale.synopsis: Super Boy is a Super Mario Bros. clone, however offers a brand new set of levels not seen in any official Mario game. Due to its MSX roots the graphics are simpler, scrolling is choppy and several gameplay aspects are missing (such as the ability to kick koopa shells).

Clon de Super Mario Bros, aunque contiene nuevos niveles nunca vistos en ningún juego oficial de Mario.nnJuego de gráficos simples, pobre scroll y algunas características del juego original de Nintendo han sido omitidas, como la habilidad de lanzar conchas de Koopa).
Super Boy II est la suite de Super Boy I. Comme son prédécesseur, il s'agit d'un clone de Super Mario Bros dans lequel vous incarnez le célèbre plombier italien dans de tout nouveaux niveaux.

locale.title: Super Bubble Bobble
locale.synopsis: bubble bobble clone (korea only)nnstarring the twin Bubble Dragons Bub and Bob, tasks players with travelling through one hundred stages, blowing and bursting bubbles, jumping on and off blown bubbles to navigate level obstacles, dodging and eliminating enemies, and collecting a variety of items including some that carry power-ups and significant bonuses.
Clon no oficial del juego Bubble Bobble que salió en exclusiva para el mercado coreano.
Clone non officiel de Bublle Bobble sorti exclusivement en Corée.

locale.title: Super Columns And Tetris
locale.synopsis: A rare Korean release from 1990 with the luxury of not one but two clones in the same cartridges. And they both have a 2 players mode!
Un lanzamiento coreano raro de 1990 con el lujo de tener no uno sino de dos clones (tetris y columns) en los mismos cartuchos. Y ambos tienen un modo de 2 jugadores!
Une release Coréenne rare de 1990 avec pas seulement un, mais deux clones dans la même cartouche. Et les deux possèdent un mode 2 joueurs !
Um raro lançamento coreano de 1990 com o luxo de não um, mas dois clones nos mesmos cartuchos. E ambos têm um modo de 2 jogadores!

locale.title: Super Kick Off
locale.synopsis:
Super Kick Off is an enhanced developed version of the popular football game developed by Dino Dini for consoles. It includes 40 teams (16 national and 24 club), along the ability to edit club team names and shirts and player names and looks. Game modes include friendlies, Domestic League and Cup (composed by eight English teams), European League (16 European teams) and International cup (eight team tournament). Training allows to practice free kicks, penalties or to pass, shoot and dribble without opposition. Players can compete head to head, or play cooperatively against the computer in the same team. Other game options include player speed, wind and grass cut, along the typical half length, offside rules, extra time and difficulty setting. All changes, from team edits to options, are stored in the cartridge internal memory.
About the game itself, it was one of the most popular of the time, featuring a top-down view with the ball not sticking to the players' feet being the most prominent gameplay feature.
Super Kick Off captura todo el ritmo vertiginoso, destreza y precisión del más renombrado titulo mundial de fútbol!

Kick Off ! Ce nom à lui seul fait frissonner quelques joueurs quand la 3D ne régnait pas en maitresse sur les jeux de foot. Cette conversion des jeux Amiga et Atari est un peu moins bien mais tient quand même la route. A essayer.

locale.title: Super Monaco GP
locale.synopsis:
Super Monaco GP is a modified conversion of the arcade game, a first-person perspective racing game. As well as the famous Monaco course, others from around the world have been added, to give the game a longer shelf life. You must complete qualification sessions and the races as fast as possible.
The Genesis version of Super Monaco adds a complete career mode, however. In the career mode, your goal is to win a season of races. Unfortunately, you start with a relatively slow car. By challenging other drivers, you can move to a better team and car, and ultimately win the F1 World Title.

El campeonato mundial de Super Monaco GP, le llevará a usted y a su equipo a an circuito internacional de 16 carreras. ¡Queme neumáticos con los mejores pilotos del momento en una prueba de velocidad, conocimiento de la carretera, y resistencia!

Super Monaco GP sur Master System est l'adaptation du jeu arcade du même nom. Le jeu inclut les séances de qualifications, dans lesquelles il vous faut briller pour prendre le départ de la course en bonne position. Seul ou à 2 joueurs en écran partagé, testez vos réflexes sur les circuits officiels du championnat du monde FIA de l'époque.

Prepare-se para a mais veloz e emocionante disputa de fórmula 1. Você poderá competir nos principais circuitos do mundo, Monza, Silverstone, e até em Suzuka no Japão. Entre no cockpit de seu carro e regule a sua máquina. Antes de começar a corrida você deverá participar dos treinos, a pole position é difícil e os seus adversários também a querem. Luz verde!!! Largada para a corrida: acelere ao máximo, troque as marchas no momento certo, fique de olho no espelho retrovisor e não deixe os retardatários ultrapassá-lo. Vá para a curva da vitória fritando os pneus e subindo em cima das zebras. Será que você conseguirá ser o campeão do mundo? Suba no pódio e estoure a champagne.

locale.title: Super Off Road
locale.synopsis: Super Off-Road is the ultimate off-road racing event. Four tough trucks speed around rough and ready tracks packed with pitfalls, power-boosters and prizes. No one knows the meaning of sportsmanship here. Have you got the skill and determination to come out on top?

SUPER OFF-ROAD es lo ùltimo en carreras a campo través. Cuatro vehículos todo terreno circulan a toda velocidad por las peligrosas pistas de montaña llenas de barrancos, bonus de energía y otros premios. Nadie entiende de deportividad en este juego. ¿Crees que posees la habilidad y la determinación necesaria para llegar en cabeza?

Super Off Road est un jeu de rallye tout terrain reprenant la licence du pilote légendaire Ivan Stewart dit "Ironman". Vous disputez des courses à quatre, dans des 4x4 spécialement construits pour les bosses et les sauts qui vous attendent sur les circuits. Vous avez la possibilité d'améliorer votre véhicule, à condition de remporter assez d'argent en gagnant des courses.

locale.title: Super Racing
locale.synopsis: F1 game that only was released in Japan.
Juego de simulación de Formula 1 con vista aérea. Licenciado en exclusiva solo para Japón.
Jeu de simulation de Formule 1 en vue du haut.Sortie exclusive au Japon.

locale.title: Super Smash T.V.
locale.synopsis:
The year is 1999. The world's most popular television show is Smash T.V., an ultra-violent contest between two armed-to-the-teeth combatants, set loose in a series of deadly arenas that are filled to bursting with hordes of mindless beasts and killer robots. The aim of the game is to blast everything in sight and try to grab more cash and prizes than the other guy. Toaster ovens, VCRs, fancy cars and luxury holidays are there for the taking... for anyone who can survive long enough to enjoy them.
Smash T.V. is an insane shoot-em-up from the brain of Eugene Jarvis, creator of Robotron: 2084. It retains that game's frantic style of play and two-joystick control method, but adds plenty of gore, violence, a hint of satire and that all-important two player mode.

¡Felicidades! Eres el próximo concursante afortunado en el juegoespectáculo con lo último en premios....¡TU VIDA! Elige 6 armas futuristas y derrota a las hordas de mutantes ciborg, las poderosas esferas, los tanques de asalto y ¡a los hombres mutoides de 30 toneladas! Características: 1 ó 2 jugadores con acción simultánea, 2 controladores de acción con un poder de disparo de 360°° Basado en el éxito arcade Williams/Bally®

Smash T.V. sur Master System vous place dans un morbide, mais heureusement fictif, jeu télévisé, où deux combattants armés jusqu'aux dents s'affrontent à travers diverses arènes remplies d'individus mortellement dangereux. Le but est de faire plus de dégâts que votre adversaire, tout en récoltant un maximum de cadeaux.

locale.title: Super Space Invaders
locale.synopsis: Space Invaders is the most famous video game ever! Now SUPER SPACE INVADERS has arrived with a host of amazing new features - wave after wave of weird and hostile aliens, fantastic multiway scrolling playfields, huge end of level mega monsters and secret levels for only the best to find! It'll drive you crazy, but you won't be able to leave it alone!

¡Space Invaders es el más famoso videojuego de todos los tiempos!nnAhora llega SUPER SPACE INVADERS con una increíble variedad de novedades: oleadas de hostiles seres extraterrestres, fantásticos campos da acción donde la imagen puede trasladarse en dirección múltiple, enormes supermonstruos para finalizar cada nivel, y niveles secretos que sólo los mejores serán capaces de hallar. Te hará perder la razón, ¡pero no podrás resistir la tantación de seguir jugando!

Super Space Invaders reprend la recette ayant fait le succès de la version arcade. Vous dirigez latéralement un vaisseau doté d'un simple tir et vous devez vous débarrasser des vagues d'assauts aliens qui planent au-dessus de vous et se rapprochent au fur et à mesure que le temps passe.

locale.title: Super Tennis
locale.synopsis: Super Tennis offers to control an unknown tennis player against a AI opponent, in various tennis courts, competing to win matches. The tennis players can be moved around freely on the court and the regular rules are followed. A third-person camera perspective is used, from a fixed perspective. The two buttons on the controllers are use to hit straight and fast, and to lob. When close to the net, volleys and smashes are also possible. Multiplayer is supported for two players, head to head or in a doubles game with or against AI opponents.

Lob!, Volea!, smash! Está a cuarenta iguales y usted tiene que conseguir un set para ganar el partido. Todos los detalles están ahi, ofreciendo una acción y estrategia realistas en la cancha de su casa.

Super Tennis sur Master System est un jeu de tennis proposant 3 vitesses et 5 niveaux de difficulté. Seul ou à deux joueurs, vous pouvez disputer des matchs en simple et en double. Il existe différents mots de passe pour sauvegarder votre partie.

locale.title: Super Tetris
locale.synopsis: Super Tetris is an unlicensed version of Tetris, released for the Sega Master System in South Korea.
Super Tetris es una versión sin licencia de Tetris lanzado solo en Corea del Sur para la Master System.
Super Tetris est une version non licenciée de Tetris sortie uniquement en Corée du Sud pour la Master System.

locale.title: Superman : The Man of Steel
locale.synopsis:
Superman: The Man of Steel is a side-scrolling platform game in which the player takes on the role of Superman.
A lot is wrong in the game: Lois Lane has been kidnapped by Brainiac, the Doom Star is orbiting the Earth and many deadly adversaries are roaming about. It's up to Superman to set everything right again.
As Superman the player has limited energy which is depleted when Superman comes in contact with enemies or their projectiles. Superman can jump, and attack. When Superman almost drops from a building he automatically starts flying. There's three different difficulty settings.

"Brainiac? ha secuestrado a Lois Lane?. La estrella de la suerte gira alrededor de la Tierra. Los más peligrosos adversarios que jamás ha tenido que enfrentar Superman? se han desbocado ¡Qué reto más grande para The Man of Steel?, su Termovisión y el poderío de su Súper Puñetazo!"

Superman : The Man of Steel est un jeu d'action sur Master System dans lequel vous incarnez le super héros Superman. Le jeu est tiré des comics originaux, vous retrouvez donc de nombreuses connaissances comme par exemple Lex Luthor, Byzaro et Brainiac. Participez à des combats au sol ou aériens dans Metropolis, la zone fantôme, l'hyper-espace ou encore beaucoup d'autres environnements.

locale.title: T2 : The Arcade Game
locale.synopsis:
As the title states, this is the home conversion of the arcade rail-shooter based on the film Terminator 2: Judgement Day. Up to two players shoot through future and present levels as robotic killers reprogrammed to serve the human resistance.
Both players wield a machine gun with infinite ammo that lowers its firing rate (overheats) as it is continuously fired. A secondary weapon (missile launchers in the future, shotguns in the present) has limited ammo but deals heavy damage. Powerups inside the game world include secondary weapon ammo and coolant for the machine guns, and are shot to be collected.
T2: The Arcade Game features seven levels based on specific scenes or general concepts in the film. The first four levels act as a prelude, as the player guns down waves of metal Terminators across a post-apocalyptic Battlefield, a besieged Human Hideout, and through the security checkpoints of the enemy supercomputer SkyNet. After destroying the computer, players travel back in time to protect John and Sarah Connor, while also destroying every scrap of SkyNet research at the headquarters of its manufacturer. From there, players must fend off the indestructible T-1000 until the final showdown in the Steel Mill.
Assets from the movie are used when possible, such as voice clips from Arnold Schwarzenegger, and close-up digital stills of Robert Patrick for the final battle against the T-1000. The Genesis and SNES versions also support lightguns (the Menacer and Super Scope, respectively).

El numero uno entre los juegos de arcade 'a la caza de...' hace una incursion en Master System?'. Eres un Terminator T-800 con un arsenal impresionante: ametralladoras de repetición, pistolas, misiles y un lanzagranadas M-79. ¡Destroza endoesqueletos y Helicópteros HK! ¡Acaba con el metal líquido del T-1000... o estás acabado!

T2 : The Arcade Game sur Master System est un jeu de tir basé sur l'univers de la saga Terminator. Seul ou à deux joueurs, tirez sur les cyborgs et autres créatures jusqu'à l'affrontement final face au redoutable T-1000.

locale.title: Tangram
locale.synopsis: Use the parts available to assemble the figures.
Utilice las piezas disponibles para montar las figuras.
Utilize as peças disponíveis para montar as figuras.

game.name: Taz In Escape From Mars

locale.title: Taz in Escape from Mars
locale.synopsis:
You play as Taz, the famous cartoon-character. Taz is captured by Marvin the Martian and transfered to his intergalactic Zoo! Now it is your job to aid Taz in his great escape from the Zoo-prison and also find a way back home to Earth. To make the escape a little easier, there are items placed here and there, such as cakes which make regain your health. You also find gas tanks, which you can eat and then breath fire.
You will travel trough the Zoo, and a big wasteland and many other hostile zones with lots of weird enemies and bizarre bosses.

Marvin el Marciano visita el Marvin zoo, lleno de especies encerradas en jaulas. Mira su libro de criaturas de la Tierra y divisa una especie rara, el Demonio de Tasmania. Al secuestrarlo lo deja en el Marvin zoo, donde nuestro enjaulado amigo deberá escapar. El juego se divide en 6 mundos, los cuales se dividen en 2 partes donde se debe recorrer el mundo buscando la salida y 1 nivel de lucha. En ellos hay enemigos que lanzan rayos lasers, saltan, flotan, etc. También hay comida y objetos que pueden quitar energía.

Taz in Escape From Mars vous permet d'incarner le célèbre tigre de Tasmanie, capturé par Marvin le Martien, puis exposé dans un zoo. Dans ce jeu de plates-formes aux créatures loufoques, vous devez aider Taz à s'échapper du zoo extraterrestre, et surtout, trouver un moyen de rentrer sur Terre.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Taz-Mania
locale.synopsis:
One evening, Taz's father is telling an intriguing tale. Somewhere on Tazmania is a Lost Valley, and in that valley nests a huge seabird, so huge that one of it's eggs could feed a family for a year! Just think of the omelette one of those could make!
Thus Taz becomes fascinated and leaves in search of one of those eggs before his Dad has even finished the story...
Taz can Jump, perform a Spinning Jump and a Spin Attack. Munch roast chickens to replenish life. Gain extra points by moving quickly through the levels - there are six stages and each stage has two rounds.
There are a few other items and pickups such as:
1. Spring: boings Taz up to high ledges. 2. Blocks: destructible. 3. 1-UP: extra life. 4. Star: invulnerability. Unless you run into a bomb. 5. Bomb: does what it says on the tin.

Únase a TAZ, el Diablo de Tazmania, a medida que se lanza a le búsqueda de la tortilla más grande del mundo. Nada podrá oponerse a su paso cuando avance a través de un isla llena de altiplanos precarios, junglas hostiles, cavernas misteriosas, y ruinas desmoronándose.

Taz-Mania sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes tiré de l'univers franchement coloré des Looney Tunes. Dans cet opus, Taz est à la recherche d'un oeuf géant, caché dans une vallée perdue. Selon la légende, cet oeuf serait assez gros pour nourrir une famille pendant une année... Composé de 12 niveaux, le jeu restitue entre autres la fameuse attaque tornade de Taz pour se défendre.

locale.title: Tecmo World Cup '93
locale.synopsis:
The World Cup rolls around once every 4 years for a chance for countries to show the world how good they are at this single sport, football (also known as soccer). Even though there was no World Cup held in 1993 the game Tecmo World Cup 93 has the main teams and rules the World Cup is famous for.
Tecmo World Cup 93 is a football game that simulates the World Cup from the Pools to the elimination rounds that end with the finals. It has the option to play the 24 most known countries to have played in the World Cup, each with players having there own skill levels based on the real teams. There are 3 more modes to chose from that includes Versus where the player can play against a friend, Exhibition where one the player picks a opponent to play a single match, and Watch where the player picks two CPU players to battle it out alone.
When playing a game the player first picks the team they want to play (and there opponents team if in Exhibition mode) and the color of there jersey before the CPU picks a random jersey color for their team. Before the match starts the player can set up the formation of the team and can also set up who plays and their position, this menu can also be accessed when a goal is scored or the ball goes out. The players (that are all abbreviated to there initials) have stats for Power, Speed, and Technique. When the game starts the player is presented with a side on birds eye view of the field. The player, when in control of the ball can pass the ball to the closest team mate or attempt for a goal. When defending the player can change the controlling player or do a slide tackle (slide tackle is the only tackle the player can do). There is no penalties in the game other then kicking the ball out. The game is fast paced as it is played in sped up mode to get a full game in a reduced time. There are 3 levels of difficulty and the default game length can be changed in the configuration. Password save after each match is available.

Veinticuatro equipos de todo el mundo son los que participan en el Campeonato del Mundo de Fútbol. Elija un equipo y trate de ganar a la computadora en un partido de exhibición, enfréntese a un amigo o métase de lleno en el Campeonato del Mundo. La acción nunca cesa.

Vingt-quatre équipes du monde entier sont venues participer à ce spectacle de football. Sélectionnez une équipe et attribuez-lui des aptitudes particulières pour jouer un match d'essai contre l'ordinateur. Faites participer un ami ou lancez-vous immédiatement dans le tournoi de la Coupe Mondiale! Voici de l'action sans interruption!

A Copa do Mundo acontece uma vez a cada quatro anos, para que os países mostrem ao mundo o quanto são bons neste esporte único, o futebol (também conhecido como futebol). Embora não tenha havido uma Copa do Mundo em 1993, o jogo "Tecmo World Cup" 93 tem as principais equipes e regras pelas quais a Copa do Mundo é famosa.nnnnA Copa do Mundo da Tecmo 93 é um jogo de futebol que simula a Copa do Mundo desde as Piscinas até as eliminatórias que terminam com as finais. Tem a opção de jogar os 24 países mais conhecidos que disputaram a Copa do Mundo, cada um com jogadores com níveis de habilidade próprios baseados nas equipes reais. Existem mais 3 modos para escolher, incluindo Versus, onde o jogador pode jogar contra um amigo, Exposição onde o jogador escolhe um adversário para jogar uma única partida e Assista onde o jogador escolhe dois jogadores da CPU para lutar sozinho.

locale.title: Teddy Boy
locale.synopsis: As Teddy Boy, you must use your gun to shoot at enemies that come out of the boxes that are scattered around the level. You have limited time to do this. The number of enemies that come out of these boxes depends on the number being shown on the face. When you shoot enemies, they turn into little balls which you quickly need to collect. If you do not, the balls will be transformed into little creatures that eat away time. Once you have destroyed all enemies, you advance to the next level. when you stand in the same spot for too long, the floor will disintegrate, causing you to fall down to the below platform. From time to time, you will play a bonus game, where the object is to shoot boxes that contain a toy. In these rounds, you also must avoid shooting a box that contains a little creature or you lose time.

Pase de un laberinto de pesadilla a otro cargándose bichos, peces malignos, caracoles, gusanos, etc. a medida que avance. Pero tenga cuidado. Usted tendrá que eludir a la horrible Den Den, cabeza de dragón mordedora. O se verá forzado a darse cuenta de la realidad.

Teddy Boy est un jeu d'action sorti dans un premier temps sur bornes d'arcade, puis adapté sur Master System. Le joueur incarne un jeune garçon nommé Teddy qui doit survivre à des labyrinthes remplis de monstres. Pour se défendre, Teddy peut faire usage de son pistolet. Lorsque les monstres sont touchés, ils se transforment en boules qu'il faut collecter le plus rapidement possible.

locale.title: Tennis Ace
locale.synopsis:
Using a top-down view, Tennis Ace lets you play single or double games with computer players. Two human players can either duel or work cooperatively in a doubles game. By working your way to one of the six grand slam finals, with practice games and exhibition matches, you gain experience, which improves your playing style.
All the basic strokes are available: serves (either flat or a lob - fast-low, slow-high and curved), smashes, drop shots, lobs, flat forehands and backhands. Upon serving, the screen switches to a side-view and you have to time the throw and the hit to perform a succesful serve.
The in-game progress can be saved with a password function.

En tu primer saque, la pelota es lanzada por tu raqueta como un ardiente misil. Institivamente avanzas hacia la red. Tu adversario te devuelve el saque, pero ya estás listo para responder. Con la velocidad de un rayo levantas la raqueta, interceptas la pelota por encima de la cabeza y la devuelves "smash". EI no tuvo oportunidad alguna. ¡Tú estás en Tennis Ace!

Tennis Ace sur Master System est un jeu de tennis. De nombreux modes sont disponibles comme l'Entraînement ou encore les Tournois. Au fil des matchs, le joueur gagne de l'expérience, améliorant son style de jeu. On y retrouve également les coups classiques comme le lift, la volley, ou encore le lobe. Un mode Duel est disponible afin de défier ses amis ou jouer en double avec eux.

locale.title: Tensai Bakabon
locale.synopsis: Action platformer that came out in Japan exclusively. It is based on an adaptation of the manga "Tensai Bakabon".
Juego de acción y plataformas que salió en Japón en exclusiva el cual está basado en una adaptación del manga "Tensai Bakabon".
Jeu d'action /plateforme adapté du manga Tensai Bakabon.Sorti exclusivement au Japon.

locale.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
locale.synopsis:
Terminator 2: Judgment Day is based on the movie of the same name. The player takes the role of the T-800 Terminator and has to protect John Connor from being terminated by the T-1000 Terminator.
The game is set over five levels with the following goals:
1. Level 1: Acquire a weapon. Level 2: An isometric racing course on a motorcycle in which the player needs to out-run a tanker truck that is chasing them. This stage was omitted from the Game Gear version. Level 3: Locate and rescue Sarah Connor from the Pescadero asylum. Level 4: Plant explosive charges to destroy the Cyberdyne building. Level 5: Defeat the T-1000 within the steel mill.

Con toda la acción explosiva del éxito cinematográfico. Eres un Terminator enviado del futuro, equipado con un objetivo en pantalla y un impresionante arsenal de armas. ¿Estás preparado para enfrentarte al T-1000 de metal líquido en la fábrica de acero? Salva el futuro o serás EXTERMINADO.

Terminator 2 : Judgment Day reprend l'intrigue du film culte. Vous incarnez donc le T-800, en charge de protéger John Connor, menacé de mort par le T-1000. Éliminez tout opposant par les poings ou par les armes dans les différentes niveaux de jeu.
Juego amateur el cual es un clon del Tetris
Jeu Homebrew clone de Tétris.
Juego inédito basado en la serie de TV del mismo nombre. Esta versión es un prototipo el cual solo incluye la música.

Jeu inédit basé sur la série télévisée " L agence tous risques". La musique a été créée à la fin de 1992), mais on ne sait pas si d'autres parties ont été développées. Ce prototype ne comporte que la musiquenn

locale.title: The Addams Family
locale.synopsis:
The Addams Family is a side-scrolling platformer based on the movie of the same name. The player takes the role of Gomez who searches for his missing family members. To find them he has to explore six different parts of the mansion, e.g. the woods, which are basic platform levels: the player moves from left to right while jumping a lot and avoiding enemies. Some of them can be dispatched of by a jump on their heads.
The main difference to the other versions of this game is a unique level design. There is also a life meter which allows to get hit more often before dying.

¡Han raptado a Morticia! El tio Fester ha perdido la memoria y está bajo el hechizo de Abigail Craven. Sólo Gómez puede levantar el dia y enfretarse al malvado Juez en un cimax de lo más grillado y fantasmal.

The Addams Family est un jeu de plates-formes sur Master System. L'histoire se situe vers la fin du film La Famille Addams alors que la famille est expulsée de son manoir par un avocat zélé. Comme si cela ne suffisait pas, on apprend que Morticia, Pugsley, Mercredi et les autres ont disparu ! Vous incarnez donc Gomez, seul rescapé, qui partira à la recherche de sa famille et affrontera tous ses ennemis jusqu'au dernier : l'avocat !

Morticia foi raptada! Tio Fester perdeu a memória e caiu sob o feitiço de Abigail Craven - só Gomez pode salvar o dia, finalmente confrontando o mal Judge! Você se atreve a enfrentar essa assustadora aventura?

locale.title: The Cyber Shinobi
locale.synopsis:
In the previous game, an evil army of villains, known simply as "Zeed" , but some of them escaped, however.
Time has passed and it is the year 2XXX where atomic power plants in countries around the world are attacked, and plutonium, which was the equivalent of 100,000 megatons of explosive power, was stolen from these plants. The words "Cyber Zeed" was always written at the scene of the crime. Later, the world realized what Cyber Zeed had planned to do: use their nuclear capabilities to terrorize the world. Every nation sent their best forces to stop this threat, but all of them failed.
Joe Musashi came forward to this great evil, and he is required to fight those who rose from the ashes and put an end to this threat.
Cyber Shinobi is a one-player game that consists of six rounds. You need to fight ninjas that get in your way using your fists and legs. You can also defeat them using special attacks and ninjitsu. Power-ups can be collected along the way, which will give you more shots, ninjitsu, power, and life. A boss needs to be defeated at the end of the round.

¡Cyber Shinobi ha vuelto! ¡Y están robando plutonio de todas las plantas de energía atómica del mundo! Todas las naciones enviaron sus mejores fuerzas para tratar de poner fin a esta desastrosa situación, pero ninguna lo logró. El único que puedo enfrentarse al desafío es un bravo guerrero ? Joe Musashi. ¡Conviértase en Joe Musashi y salve nuestro hermoso planeta de la destrucción!

Cyber Shinobi sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez un guerrier ninja nommé Joe Musashi. Vous êtes chargé de neutraliser Cyber Zeed avant qu'il n'utilise les tonnes d'uranium subtilisées dans des centrales nucléaires. Six niveaux durant, utilisez vos poings, vos pieds, votre nunjitsu et vos attaques spéciales contre les nombreux ninjas qui vous barrent la route.

locale.title: The Dinosaur Dooley
locale.synopsis: The Dinosaur Dooley, also known as is a Sega Master System shoot-'em-up game released exclusively in South Korea. It is based on Dooly the Little Dinosaur, a Korean cartoon. Two versions exist - a Korean text version from 1991, and an English text version from 1993 that was cancelled.
Shoot 'em up lanzado exclusivamente en Corea del sur. Adaptación de los dibujos animados Dooly el pequeño dinosaurio. Una versión en Inglés fue planeada, pero se canceló.
Shoot them up sorti exclusivement en Corée du sud.Adapté du dessin animé Dooly the Little Dinosaur. Une version en anglais était prévue mais à été annulée.

locale.title: The Flash
locale.synopsis:
The Flash is a side-scrolling platformer starring the eponymous D.C. comics hero. The game is divided into six rounds, each round has two stages and a boss fight. Within each stage, Flash must get to the exit before the time limit runs out, though the exit must first be unlocked by activating a switch.
Apart from a speedy protagonist, the game has some similarities to Sonic the Hedgehog, as the levels have a similarly complex structure with different passages and many optional areas.

El mago electrónico Trachmann? y el consumado villano Trickster? so han unido para hacerse con el control de Central City?, y todo dependerá ahora de The Flash? para que las cosas vuelvan a la normalidad. ¡Utilice su ingenio y la supervelocidad de The Flash para localizar a esos villanos antes de que se acabe el tiempo!

Tiré de la série télévisée des années 90, The Flash narre les aventures du super-héros éponyme, l'homme le plus rapide du monde. Composé de 13 niveaux, ce jeu de plates-formes propose d'incarner le super-héros pour tenter de contrer Trickster avant qu'il ne mette la ville à sac.

locale.title: The Flintstones
locale.synopsis:
The Flintstones is a game based on the popular cartoon series The Flintstones by Hanna-Barbera Productions Inc.
It's weekend! Fred Flintstone thinks of only one thing: bowling with his friend and neighbor Barney. Unfortunately, his wife Wilma got other plans for him. Fred has to paint the living room and Wilma is not going to help him with it. No, she goes shopping. And if that's not enough, Wilma also tells Fred that his mother-in-law is coming over.
The Flintstones game is divided in four parts.
Part 1: Painting the walls of your living room. To go to the bowling alley before it is closed Fred has to paint the walls as quickly as possible. To paint the walls Fred uses the tail of a living squirrel. Pebbles tries to leap out her playpen and starts crawling around and starts scribbling on the walls. If Fred wants to put Pebbles back in the playpen then he has to drop the squirrel, that immediately starts wandering off. When Pebbles is back in the playpen Fred has to chase the squirrel and dip its tail in the paint again.
Part 2: Driving your car on the way to the bowling center. Finally, when all walls are painted Fred can go to the bowling alley! Fred has to drive to the bowling alley but unfortunately the roads are in a very bad condition. The road surface is dire and covered with rocks! And if one of the wheels hit a bump it will break off the car and disappear into the distance.
Part 3: A bowling competition between Fred and Barney. At the bowling alley the following bowling parameters can be set: the spin and speed of the ball and the starting position of the player. Each turn gives two throws (except he gets a strike). A game takes ten turns. while a match takes three games.
Part 4: Saving Pebbles at a construction site. On his way home Fred discovers that Pebbles has disappeared! Don't let Wilma find that out! Fred finds Pebbles at a construction site on top of some scaffolding. He has to climb the scaffolding to rescue her. If Fred fails to rescue his daughter then Barney rescues her and Fred will be branded as a failure!

¡YABA DABA DU! Comienza el fin de semana y Pedro Picapiedra regresa del trabajo a casa lleno de entusiasmo para jugar por la noche la Super Final de boliche de Piedra Dura. Al llegar a casa Vilma le recuerda su promesa de pintar la sala antes de que su madre los visite el Domingo.nnVilma insiste en que Pedro solo puede ir a jugar boliche si pinta la sala como corresponde. Pedro acepta a regañadientes pero no se queja de tener que cuidar a Pebles al mismo tiempo de tener que pintar.nn¡Confusión, diversión y el mefor buen humor de Los Picapiedra!

The Flintstones sur Master System est un jeu d'action tiré de la série éponyme, intitulée en France Les Pierrafeu. L'histoire débute lorsque Fred décide de passer son week-end au bowling. Malheureusement, Wilma, sa bien-aimée, lui a réservé d'autres plans. De la peinture au tournoi de bowling, relevez les défis proposés et incarnez Fred pour un week-end qui s'annonce mouvementé.

locale.title: The Incredible Crash Dummies
locale.synopsis:
At a time when computer games were being blamed for violence, bad language, epilepsy and everything else the moral majority needed a scapegoat for, Virgin gave us: The Road Safety Game. Or not, as this is a standard platform game with a twist of questionable taste and purpose.
You play a crash test dummy, trying to progress through levels filled with hazards such as cars and fireballs, within the time limits. Contact with each of these loses you a limb, and once you have none left, contact means game over. Since the character isnt handicapped by missing limbs in any way, in practical terms you can think of these as hit points especially as there are screwdrivers to pick up which restore one limb.

¡Te vas a destornillar con este divertido juego de choque! Con avalanchas de risas en la pista de esquí, en el bulevar rebotante después de un salto mortal o con el humor explosivo de las bolsas de aire comprimido. ¡The Incredible Crash Dummies? es un juego loco y divertido! Puede que a los Dummies les falte algún tomillo ... pero The Incredible Crash Dummies? no dudarán en hacerse pedazos para que te partas de risa.

The Incredible Crash Dummies sur Master System vous propose d'incarner deux mannequins de crash-test dans des missions loufoques où le but est d'infliger à votre mannequin un maximum de coups et de dégâts. Les missions vont de la conduite de véhicules, au classique jeu de plates-formes.

Alô, moçada! Eu sou Slick e esse é meu amigo Spin. Nós somos dublês, caras que se matam nos filmes para fazer as cenas mais arriscadas, enquanto o mocinho leva toda a glória. Não é o trabalho mais bem pago do mundo, mas mesmo assim nós aceitamos qualquer tarefa onde o perigo é constante. Você vai nos ajudar a sairmos vivos de cinco emocionantes tarefas. Eu disse ajudar... não vá fazer besteira! A primeira é a queda livre de um edifício. Já se imaginou olhando para baixo e tendo que pular? A segunda é testar pára- choques de ar: vai ser batida para tudo quanto é lado! Temos ainda que descer uma pista de esqui desviando de árvores e acertando alguns bonecos de neve. Depois vem o controle de qualidade de um produto. Simples? Trata-se de bombas! Se nós sobrevivermos, teremos ainda que guiar misseis espaciais entre asteróides e misseis inimigos. A gente vive rodeado pelo perigo e por isso sabe o quanto é importante a segurança. Usem sempre o cinto de segurança no carro e não se coloquem em situação de perigo. Bom, depois disso tudo, o minimo que nós merecemos são longas e tranquilas férias! Você conhece alguém que queira nos substituir?

locale.title: The Incredible Hulk
locale.synopsis:
In this side-scrolling action game you fight against your arch-enemy The Leader and his forces (Rhino, Absorbing Man, Abomination and Tyrannus)
Take control of the Hulk/Dr. Banner through five levels of action. City and Construction Site, Tyrannus' Labyrinth, Leader's Fortress, Leader's Interior, and the Final Confrontation.

En el papel de The Incredible Hulk? tendrás que derrotar a las malvadas fuerzas de The Leader?. Se está organizando un destructivo ejército bioquimico y The Leader? ha reclutado a tus a más mortiferos enemigos: Tyrannus?, Absorbing Man?, Abomination? y Rhino?. ¡Es una empresa por la conquista del mundo! ¡The Leader? te aguarda!

Prenez le contrôle de Hulk et du Dr.Banner dans The Incredible Hulk, un jeu d'action où vous devez exploiter la force incroyable du géant vert pour vous débarrasser de vos assaillants. Lorsque vous êtes trop affaibli par les attaques, vous redevenez Bruce Banner, faiblement armé, et donc vulnérable. Cependant cette transformation sera nécessaire pour emprunter certains passages, trop étroits pour Hulk.

game.name: Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck, The

locale.title: The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis:
The Lucky Dime Caper is a 2D platform game featuring Donald Duck in search of Uncle Scrooge's lucky dime, stolen by Magica De Spell.
The game is the 8-bit counterpart for Quack Shot (released only for Sega Genesis), which also features Donald Duck, but the story and gameplay are totally different.

¡La perversa Magica De Spell ha robado las monedas de la suerte, ha capturado a Huey, Dewey, y Louie! ¡Aventúrese a través de seis peligrosas etapas con Donald para salvar a sus sobrinos y recuperar las monedas de la suerte!

The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donnald Duck sur Master System vous propose d'incarner le canard facétieux à la recherche de Riri, Fifi et Loulou qui ont été enlevés. Vous traverserez la forêt canadienne, l'Amérique Centrale ou encore le Pôle Sud et l'Egypte dans ce jeu de plates-formes où les "continues" sont illimités.

locale.title: The Maze of Galious - Knightmare II
locale.synopsis: Kidnapping Aphrodite in Knightmare was actually a diversion by an evil priest Galious. While Popolon was away saving her Galious took over the Castle Greek and kidnapped their yet unborn baby Pampas. Popolon and Aphrodite must defeat Galious and his demons to free their castle and rescue Pampas.

El secuestro de Aphrodite en Knightmare fue en realidad una distracción por parte del malvado sacerdote Galious. Mientras Popolon conseguía salvarla, Galious se apoderó de Castle Greek y secuestró a su bebé aún no nacido Pampas. Popolon y Aphrodite deben derrotar a Galious y a sus demonios para liberar su castillo y rescatar a Pampas.

L'enlèvement d'Aphrodite dans Knightmare était en fait un détournement par Galious. Alors que Popolon était loin pour la sauver Galious a repris le Château grec et a enlevé Pampas. Popolon et Aphrodite doivent vaincre Galious et ses démons pour libérer leur château et sauver Pampas.

locale.title: The New Zealand Story
locale.synopsis:
One day, a kiwi tribe was having fun and games outside the zoo, only to be kidnapped by the evil-minded Leopard Seal, who plans to sell them at the black market. Fortunately, during the kidnapping process, Tiki, leader of the tribe, managed to escape the sack, and her job is to rescue Phee-Phee and the other kiwis scattered around New Zealand, and are held in cages in various locations that include Auckland, Rotorua, Waitomo Caves, Strait Cook, and Mt. Cook.
If Tiki doesn't rescue a kiwi in a limited amount of time, the devil will appear and try to kill her. When Tiki reaches the outskirts of each city, except Strait Cook, there is a boss waiting to meet Tiki, and kill her by using their own choice of weapons. Also making the rescue mission difficult are several nasties that attempt to throw their own weapons, like bombs and arrows, at her. To defeat these enemies, Tiki shoots at them using her crossbow and arrows. More often than not, when Tiki shoots at enemies, they will leave behind pieces of fruit that she can pick up for points. However, it is likely that Tiki may get other weapons or the letters E, X, T, E, N, and D. Collecting all these letters will result in an extra life, and as for the weapons, they include laser shots, bombs, and fireballs.
In some levels, a few areas are located further up than just left or right, and the only way that Tiki can go up is by snatching something off the enemy that gives her the ability to fly up. Other areas are underwater, and when Tiki goes underwater, her oxygen meter decreases, so she has to rise up to the surface again to restore her oxygen levels. Apart from her own weapons, Tiki is able to squirt water at enemies if she gets to the top of the water.

Tiki el kiwi empieza la aventura de su vida en este juego que es el éxito número 1. Observe las plumas en la medida en que guía a Tiki a través de las islas de NuevaZelanda, solucionando laberintos, desafiando los diabólicos enemigos, rescatando sus amigos y enfrentando finalmente al demonio Wally Walrus en la última batalla. Quién será el próximo en el menú de kiwi fresco? únicamente el tiempo lo dirá y está corriendo muy rápido.

The New Zealand Story sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes. Le joueur contrôle Tiki, un kiwi dont l'objectif est de secourir ses amis kidnappés par un léopard de mer. Chaque niveau achevé permet de sauver l'un des siens. Pour se défendre, le joueur peut user de flèches comme arme de base, puis acquérir des bombes, des lasers, ou encore des boules de feu.

Um dia, uma tribo kiwi se divertia e brincava fora do zoológico, apenas para ser sequestrada pelo malvado Leopard Seal, que planeja vendê-los no mercado negro. Felizmente, durante o processo de seqüestro, Tiki, líder da tribo, conseguiu escapar do saco, e seu trabalho é resgatar o Phee-Phee e os outros kiwis espalhados pela Nova Zelândia, e são mantidos em gaiolas em vários locais que incluem Auckland, Rotorua, Waitomo Caves, cozinheiro do estreito, e Mt. Cozinhar.nnnnSe Tiki não resgatar um kiwi em um período limitado de tempo, o diabo aparecerá e tentará matá-la. Quando Tiki chega à periferia de cada cidade, exceto Estreito Cook, há um chefe esperando para encontrar Tiki, e matá-la usando sua própria escolha de armas. Também dificultando a missão de resgate estão vários inimigos que tentam atirar suas próprias armas, como bombas e flechas, contra ela. Para derrotar esses inimigos, Tiki atira neles usando sua besta e flechas. Na maioria das vezes, quando Tiki atira nos inimigos, eles deixam para trás pedaços de fruta que ela pode pegar por pontos. No entanto, é provável que o Tiki consiga outras armas ou as letras E, X, T, E, N e D. Coletar todas essas letras resultará em uma vida extra, e quanto às armas, elas incluem tiros a laser, bombas e bolas de fogo.nnnnEm alguns níveis, algumas áreas estão localizadas mais acima do que apenas à esquerda ou à direita, e a única maneira pela qual o Tiki pode subir é arrebatando algo do inimigo que lhe dá a habilidade de voar para cima. Outras áreas estão debaixo d'água, e quando Tiki vai para a água, seu medidor de oxigênio diminui, então ela precisa se levantar novamente para restaurar seus níveis de oxigênio. Além de suas próprias armas, Tiki é capaz de esguichar água em inimigos se ela chegar ao topo da água.

locale.title: The Ninja
locale.synopsis:
Early in Japan's edo era, circa 1630, peace had continued in the western province of Ohkami until the feudal lord passed away. Gyokuro, an evil emperor, gained power and his oppressive rule caused great hardship to the people, and the princess who opposed him was confined to a dungeon somewhere in the Ohkami castle. Gyokuro has the Ohkami ninja under control at his command. Utilizing various ninjitsu techniques, in addition to the one that transforms them into a wolf, they protect him from the people who are his enemies.
You play Kazamuru, a great warrior who challenges the clan to a fight in order to rescue the princess. However, he can't rescue the princess unless he finds the five scrolls in the thirteen areas of Ohkami. On his quest, he must defeat various ninjas such as Kuno-ichi and Ninniku, as well as fire-blowing ninjas, slashing ninjas, and footloose ninjas. You'll explore grassy fields, shrines, river banks, towns, and the castle itself. Some of the steps have varied gameplay. For example, you must avoid boulders in Step 2, must use logs in order to cross a river in Step 5, avoid being trampled on by horses in Step 7, and scale a cliff in Step 9.

A través de su viaje al castillo Ohkami, tendrá que pelear con los perversos soldados Ninja. Una vez allí, tendrá que destruir a su jefe, Gyokuro. Solamente entonces podrá salvar a la princesa prisionera en el interior del castillo.

Dans The Ninja sur Master System, incarnez un guerrier et sauvez une princesse faite prisonnière dans le château Okhami par le terrible Gyokuro. Votre avatar peut se défendre au corps-à-corps grâce à ses techniques de combat, mais aussi à distance en jetant des étoiles sur ses ennemis.

locale.title: The Ottifants
locale.synopsis:
Bruno is a baby Ottifant. It's an ordinary evening, and Bruno's dad is working late at office. Reason enough for Bruno's vivid imagination to run riot, thinking that his dad has been kidnapped by aliens! Jelly babies, that fell from his father's pocket on the way to work, blaze a trail to the office. Now it's up to Bruno to fight his way through hordes of terrorizing toys, Ottifant-eating plants, tear through gloomy caverns of doom and cut across a perilous jungle - workaday objects and boringly normal settings as seen through kids' eyes - and rescue his dad!
The Ottifants for the SEGA Game Gear is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player controls Bruno through five worlds: starting with the house and the basement, through to the building site, the office and finally the jungle, whereas each world is in turn divided into three stages. Bruno's primary weapon is his trunk, which gives him the ability to blast enemies by firing sweets at them, or suck in objects like out-of-reach platforms or boxes by holding down the Fire-button. Furthermore, yellow, green and red lollies are spread throughout the stages. Gathering three of them activate one of Bruno's special skills and can - depending on the colour combination - transform the baby Ottifant into Superfant with the ability to fly, boost his speed with Speedy Shoes, give an extra Continue and more.
Picking up jelly babies, blasting enemies and collecting papers gives points and raises Bruno's score up to a fixed value of 9,999 pts. There are several entrances to secret rooms hidden in the five worlds. But, unlike the Genesis-version, the rooms are quite small and basic and there is no 1,000 point reward by completing them. On the whole there are two different tunes backing your journey through the game: one for the stages and one for the boss enemies. The varied background music and sound effects of the Genesis-game are completely missing, as is one entire world: The Garden.

No todo es bueno para Bruno, el pequeño Ottifant. Su padre ha sido capturado por seres extraños. O por lo menos eso imagina nuestro pequeño Otti mientras sigue el rastro de dulces que le conducirá hasta el lugar donde está su padre secuestrado. Es una senda de peligro y aventura: juguetes espantosos, un sótano que pone los pelos de punta y una oficina de horrores de alta tecnología.

Rien ne va plus pour Bruno, le bébé Ottifant. Un papa kidnappé par des étrangers ! Ou tout comme, puisque c'est ce que notre petit Otti s'imagine tandis qu'il suit la trace des sucreries qui devrait le mener à son papa enlevé. C'est un chemin périlleux et aventureux, parsemé de jouets terrifiants, d'un sous-sol à vous glacer le sang et d'un bureau HiTech dans toute son horreur.

game.name: Simpsons - Bart vs the Space Mutants, The

locale.title: The Simpsons : Bart vs the Space Mutants
locale.synopsis:
Bart vs. The Space Mutants is a platform game where the player goes into the role of Bart Simpson (from the TV show The Simpsons) and must stop the Space Mutants from invading Springfield.
On each of the five levels, Bart must collect (or get rid of) the ingredients that the Space Mutants are planning to use to build their machine, such as purple objects or balloons. He also has to collect enough "proof" of the aliens existence (brown coins left behind when they are jumped on), so his family members will help him when he meets a boss (characters such as Nelson and Sideshow Bob). This won't be easy since the Space Mutants are "using" human bodies as disguise. In order to discover who are the real Space Mutants, Bart must use his X-ray Specs.
The ways Bart can get rid of those objects sought by the Space Mutants are numerous. For instance, in the first stage, Bart must get rid of purple objects. He can dye them red, cover them, wash them, etc. Some even involve a little puzzle solving, like playing a trick on Moe to make him get out of the bar.
Bart also has some coins that can be used in many ways throughout the game, like buying things, getting devices operating, etc. Those coins are essential to solve some puzzles in the game.

Hola humanos, aqui Bartolomeo J. Simpson, con un secreto muy importante: ¿LOS MUTANTES DEL ESPACIO ESTAN INVADIENDO SPRINGFIELD! Un grupo de delgados y putrefactos monstruos están invadiendo los cuerpos de la gente y quieren construir un arma para esclavizar al planeta entero. De todos modos este servdor es el único que los puede ver gracias a mis gafas de rayos X.

The Simpsons : Bart vs the Space Mutants sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez Bart Simpson qui part en croisade contre les mutants envahisseurs venus de l'espace. Pour faire la part des choses entre les mutants et les simples autochtones, Bart utilise des lunettes à Rayons X. Sauvez Springfield et enrayez la conspiration visant à détruire la ville avec une arme secrète.

game.name: Simpsons - Bart vs the World, The

locale.title: The Simpsons : Bart vs the World
locale.synopsis: This game is actually a compilation of smaller games belonging to different genres. Krusty the clown appears in the beginning of the game and presents a menu with five games to play (one of which is not available from the start): A jump-and-run game, where Bart must find an exit on a ship, while enemies fire at him and try to prevent him from reaching the exit; a card game, where you have five tries to find hidden cards on a board; a simple jigsaw puzzle; a series of trivia questions concerning the Simpsons; and finally, a platform-skateboard game (available only after you have completed the ship level). Needless to say all games are connected to the famous TV series "The Simpsons".

¡Eh! Te propongo un trato. Yo gané el concurso artístico del Payaso Krusty por eso mi familia y yo recorrimos a bordo de esta búsqueda super güay del tesoro universal China, Egipto, el Polo Norte y Hollywood. Pero necesito tu ayuda para recoger caras y productos Krusty si quiero llegar a mi último destino: ¡considérate invitado al Show de Itchy y Scratchy!nn¿Alguna pregunta? Bueno, pues me largo.nnTu amigo,nnBart Simpson.

The Simpsons : Bart vs the World sur NES, est une compilation de mini-jeux où vous incarnez le turbulent Bart Simpson. Vous avez le choix entre 5 jeux, dont 1 est à débloquer. Dans l'1 d'entre eux, qui s'apparente à 1 jeu de plates-formes, vous devrez aider Bart à s'échapper d'un bateau. Il y a également 1 jeu de cartes, 1 puzzle, 1 questionnaire sur les Simpsons, et enfin, 1 jeu dans lequel vous ferez du skateboard sur la Muraille de Chine.

locale.title: The Terminator
locale.synopsis:
The Terminator licensed game for the Sega consoles was a fairly standard side-scrolling platform game. However, the game's six levels mirror the story-line of The Terminator movie very closely as you take on the role of Kyle Reese and his quest to save Sarah Connor from termination.
Because the game follows the movie so closely, the first mission which involves blowing up the SkyNet computer and escaping through time is one of the hardest and something that most players remember with love/hate.

Kyle Reese, guerrero solitario del futuro, regresa al pasado para proteger a la única mujer cuya existencia resulta clave para la supervivencia de la raza humana. Juntos deberán enfrentar no sólo todas las sorpresas que les depara la ciudad de Los Angeles, sino también los aterradores poderes de un ente cibernético conocido con el nombre de Terminator, quien no se detendrá ante nada hasta lograr matarlos.

The Terminator sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes respectant fidèlement la trame du film. Vous incarnez Kyle Reese et devez sauver Sarah Connor du robot exterminateur. Chacun des six niveaux retrace l'une des scènes les plus mémorables du film, en commençant par le combat contre l'ordinateur Skynet.

locale.title: The Three Dragon Story
locale.synopsis: The Three Dragon Story is an Action game, developed and published by Zemina, which was released in Korea in 1989.

Shoot-'em-up coreano no oficial. Deberemos avanzar por distintos tipos de fases, enemigos y jefes finales. Disponemos de una barra de vida que nos va restando si nos tocan y de una barra de energía que sirve para mejorar las armas

Il y a différents types d'ennemis, de boss et de niveaux. Le joueur a une barre de vie qui lui permet d'encaisser à environ quatre ou cinq coups. Il y a aussi une barre de puissance qui peut être améliorée pour augmenter la puissance des armes.

locale.title: Thunder Blade
locale.synopsis:
Aboard the lethal Gunship Gladiator helicopter, it is your job to ensure that a coup fails to install a dictator as leader.
The game features 12 levels split into three distinct styles. First of all you'll be flying over a city in your helicopter, shooting out tanks by ducking low enough to target them, but also climbing to avoid the skyscrapers in the area. The third section is viewed similarly, but sees you attempting to wipe out the planes mounted on an aircraft carrier.
The second section is viewed behind your helicopter in full 3D, and adds helicopters and planes to be shot, with dodging their bullets as you duck down to shoot the tanks being the main challenge.

Su misión: ¡Salvar a su país destruyendo las gigantecas fortalezas móviles enemigas! Es una batalla sin cuartel por tierra y mar ... en ciudades, cavernas y refinerías.nn¡Se trata esta vez de usted contra todos!

Thunder Blade sur Master System est un shoot'em up dans lequel vous prenez les commandes d'un hélicoptère de combat. Deux types de niveaux sont proposés, classiques en vue de haut, ou plus novateurs en vue à la troisième personne. Si l'angle de caméra change, l'objectif reste le même, réduire en miettes tout ce qui se met sur votre passage.

locale.title: Time Soldiers
locale.synopsis: You are a Time Soldier, who is asked to rescue five warriors from different time periods: Sirius in the "Primitive Age", Laplace in the "Age of Rome", Dymos in "The World Wars", Alpha in the "Age of Rome", and Altair in "Future World". Each one of them is guarded by one of Gylend's henchmen, but to get to them, you must fight off other enemies that are specific to each time era. Some of these enemies will drop weapons that you can pick up and use. You can use several teleports scattered in each time era to travel to another.
Abrase camino por los horrores del pasado y del futuro para rescatar a sus amigos y salvar al mundo en este emocionante viaje a través del tiempo de Sega.

Disponible sur Master System, Time Soldiers est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez un soldat du temps qui a pour mission de retrouver 5 guerriers venus d'âges différents, capturés par le maléfique Gylend. De l'ère primitive au monde du futur, vous serez amené à vous défaire de hordes d'ennemis typiques de chaque zone, dont certains lâcheront des armes que vous pourrez utiliser.

locale.title: Tom and Jerry : The Movie
locale.synopsis:
As in the popular cartoon series, Tom the cat is once again after that little mouse Jerry. The player plays as Tom, a curious cat who will do anything to get his paws on that trouble-maker mouse, Jerry. Tom tries to catch Jerry as he runs through six different levels. Starting in the Kitchen, Jerry will lead Tom through the Garden, Down Town, the Forest, Rock Mountain, and finally ending up in the Nursery.
Jerry will do anything he can to keep Tom from snagging him. Even if that means running through dangerous areas. Tom must try and dodge tail-scorching stoves, dropping flower pots, falling boulders, and even climb skyscrapers and swim underwater all while trying to nab that rascally rodent. Not only that, Jerry will also throw bombs and leave land mines in Tom's path.
Be careful, if Jerry gets too far ahead and out of site, the game is lost. But, if Tom is able to get close enough, he can pounce on Jerry resulting in an advance the next level. The next level can also be reached to by chasing Jerry to the end of the round where he will be cornered. There are also damage points that are taken away from Tom as he is hit by the number of dangerous environments around him. Too many hits will also result in a game over. It is just another hard days work for Tom the cat!

¡Ahí va ese ratón! Tom no soporta a ese pícaro roedor de nombre Jerry. Si ese ratón no anda con cuidado, es muy posible que Jerry termine en las zarpas de Tom. Pero Jerry sabe muchas trampas. Así que Tom ya puede prepararse porque en la casa ha entrado un peligroso ratoncito.

Tom & Jerry est un jeu de plates-formes sur Master System. Vous y incarnez Jerry qui tente encore une fois d'éviter de se faire croquer par Tom. Vous allez devoir éviter tous les pièges tendus par ce dernier si vous voulez rester en vie.

locale.title: Toto World 3
locale.synopsis:
Toto World 3, also known as Cave Dude is an unlicensed platform game developed by Open Corp. for the Sega Master System, released only in South Korea.
The game steals much of its graphics from other games, namely Super Mario Bros. 2 and Super Mario World. Some enemies resemble Tiki from The New Zealand Story.
Juego sin licencia oficial que apareció en Corea del Sur. Es un juego de plataformas cuyos gráficos recuerdan a Super Mario Bros 2 y Super Mario World.
jeu sans licence officielle sorti uniquement en Corée du sud.Ce jeu de plateforme reprends beaucoup de graphismes des jeux Super Mario Bros. 2 et Super Mario World.

locale.title: Transbot
locale.synopsis: Back in the solar year 2000 there was a nuclear war, and people are finally now emerging from underground to build a new society. But something is still wrong. DALAUS, a leftover computer from the old world is creating its own empire, and it is up to you to stop it. To complete this mission you will pilot a CA-214 (the TransBot), a new experimental astro-plane. TransBot is a side scrolling shooter for one or two players. There are a wide variety of enemies you will need to get past to be victorious throughout the many locations. The CA-214 can have different types of weapons to help out. You start out with a basic, default gun, but after collection a ? symbol you can choose a new weapon to use. There are six choices which will scroll past at the top of the screen, and your TransBot will be powered with whatever selection you make. Powered up weapons will only last for a limited amount of time before the TransBot reverts back to the basic weapon.
Rechace una invasion infernal computarizada con su armamento transformable.

Transbot sur Master System est un jeu de tir. Après une guerre nucléaire, l'humanité décide de relever la tête et de reconstruire une nouvelle civilisation. Mais Dalaus, intelligence artificielle de cette période a ses propres plans pour le monde. A vous de le stopper. Pour cela, vous pilotez le CA-214 plus connu sous le nom de Transbot, un avion de chasse ultra-performant, équipé des dernières technologies.

game.name: Trap Shooting + Marksman Shooting + Safari Hunt

locale.title: Trap Shooting + Marksman Shooting + Safari Hunt
locale.synopsis: Try your hand at three different shooting styles; an FBI firing range, Clay pigeons, and Hunting. A three-in-one game guaranteed to test your overall sharpshooting ability to the utmost.

Marksman Shooting / Trap Shooting / Safari Hunt para Master System es una compilación de juegos de disparos para jugar sólo a través de la pistola Sega Light Phaser. El objetivo es disparar a los diversos objetivos antes de que desaparezcan de la pantalla.

Marksman Shooting / Trap Shooting / Safari Hunt sur Master System est une compilation de jeux de tirs jouables uniquement via le pistolet laser Sega connu sous le nom de Light Phaser. L'objectif est d'abattre les différentes cibles avant qu'elles ne disparaissent de l'écran.

locale.title: Treinamento Do Guerreiro Lobo
locale.synopsis: This game is a hack of Wonder Boy in MW.

Treinamento do Guerreiro Lobo Lobo es un hack brasileño hecho sobre el prototipo de Wonder Boy in Monster World, por lo que no funciona bien. Es protagonizado por Eddy Lobo, que tiene cola y orejas de lobo.
Hack Brésilien du jeu WonderBoy in Miracle World.
Hack brasileño del juego "Psycho Fox"
Hack Brésilien du jeu Psycho Fox.

locale.title: Trivial Pursuit : Genius Edition
locale.synopsis:
This is the earliest home computer incarnation of Horn Abbot International Ltd's classic board game, Trivial Pursuit. The game involves answering questions on one of six subject categories to gain moves, and answering questions on special squares to gain one of the six 'Wedges' you need to gain the right to take on the final winning question. Questions are aimed at British players - many entertainment questions are based on British TV, and sport questions relate to popular British sports.
Two game modes are available:- single player (which involves answering questions against the clock) and multiplayer (where you can take on up to five human-controlled players). The computer reveals the answer, and you select 'yes' or 'no' to tell it whether you got it right.
The question categories are exactly the same as the board game, however two different question styles are added to take advantage of computer technology - some questions relate to a picture or diagram and some relate to a piece of music.
One additional feature not available in the board game is a statistical analysis of the number and type of questions answered correctly. This can be split into the performances of all the players, or the performance of an individual player within the six categories. It is especially useful at the end of the game, when choosing which category a player must answer to win the game.

Trivial Pursuit es el mejor y más vendido de los juegos de mesa. Esta versión de Sega incorpora todo lo que le ha convertido en lo que es. Además, Russell tu animado y simpático maestro de preguntas, con color y sonido extraordinario, fantástica pantalla de fondo y más de 2.000 preguntas para devanarse los sesos.

Trivial Pursuit est un jeu de société sur Master System. Vous devez répondre à des questions basées sur 6 catégories différentes afin de gagner les 6 "camemberts" qui vous permettront de répondre à la dernière et ultime question, celle qui vous fera gagner la partie.

game.name: Turma Da Mônica Em - O Resgate

locale.title: Turma Da Mônica Em - O Resgate
locale.synopsis:
After defeating the Dragão Gospe Fogo (in Mônica no Castelo do Dragão), Mônica was kidnapped by Capitão Feio, but before disappearing, she called her friends to rescue her!
