Turma da Mônica em: O Resgate (which translates to "Mônica's Gang in: The Rescue") is a modified version of Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap, with Wonder Boy's hero, Tom-Tom, replaced by Mônica, a famous Brazilian comic character.
In Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap, Tom-Tom was cursed by the Dragon and turned into a Lizard-Man. In order to regain his original human form, he would have to find the Salamander Cross. Through his way, he would find Dragons which, when defeated, would curse Tom-Tom again, turning him into other animal forms. In Turma da Mônica em: O Resgate, when Mônica disappears, Chico Bento (Lizard-Man in Wonder Boy III) shows up and starts the gang's quest. After defeating each dragon, a new friend takes place in the quest. The other friends are Bidu (formerly Mouse-Man), Cebolinha (formerly Piranha-Man), Magali (formerly Lion-Man) and Anjinho (formerly Hawk-Man).
Each of Mônica's friends has different abilities and weapons, such as:
1. Chico Bento - Shotgun 2. Bidu - Bone and shield, can walk on walls 3. Cebolinha - Sword and shield 4. Magali - Rolling pin, attacks by swinging it in an arc. 5. Anjinho - Fire sword and shield, flies
Other characters from the comic books also appear in this game, such as Cascão (as the shop keeper), Franjinha (as the Doctor) and the great villain, Capitão Feio (formerly Vampire Dragon).
Mônica's friends can side-scroll to any place of Terra dos Monstros (Monster Land), but some places will be reachable only by a certain member of the gang, due to their specific abilities or weapons. They can attack (button 1) or jump (button 2), and you can access their statistics screen by pressing the PAUSE button. There you can equip items and weapons, as well as special attacks, such as fire balls, tornadoes, arrows, boomerangs and thunder strikes (all released by pressing down and 2 together). Enemies defeated will drop gold and keys, allowing access to new areas. Collecting stones will raise the characters' Charisma, bettering the odds of getting items and gold. At each town you reach you'll receive a password, allowing you to continue the game from that point.
All the text in game is in Portuguese.

Después de derrotar al Dragón Cospe Fogo (en Mónica en el Castillo del Dragón), Mónica fue secuestrada por el Capitán Feio, pero antes de desaparecer, ella llamó a sus amigos para rescatarla! Turma da Mônica em: O Resgate es una versión brasileña modificada del Wonder Boy III
Version retravaillée spécialement pour le Brésil de Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap.

Depois de derrotar o Dragão Cospe Fogo (em Mônica no Castelo do Dragão), Mônica foi sequestrada pelo Capitão Feio, mas antes de desaparecer, ela chamou seus amigos para resgatá-la!nnnnTurma da Mônica em: O Resgate é uma versão modificada do Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap, com o herói Wonder Boy, Tom-Tom, substituído pela Mônica, personagem famosa dos quadrinhos brasileiros.nnnnEm Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap, Tom-Tom foi amaldiçoado pelo Dragon e transformado em Lizard-Man. Para recuperar sua forma humana original, ele teria que encontrar a Salamander Cross. Através de seu caminho, ele encontraria dragões que, quando derrotados, iriam amaldiçoar Tom-Tom novamente, transformando-o em outras formas animais. Em Turma da Mônica em: O Resgate, quando Mônica desaparece, Chico Bento (Lizard-Man em Wonder Boy III) aparece e começa a busca da gangue. Depois de derrotar cada dragão, um novo amigo substitui na busca. Os outros amigos são Bidu (anteriormente Mouse-Man), Cebolinha (anteriormente Piranha-Man), Magali (anteriormente Lion-Man) e Anjinho (anteriormente Hawk-Man).nnnnCada um dos amigos da Mônica tem diferentes habilidades e armas, tais como:nnChico Bento - EspingardannBidu - Osso e escudo, pode andar nas paredesnnCebolinha - Espada e escudo, pode nadarnnMagali - Rolo de massa e escudo, pode atacar por cima e por baixo.nnAnjinho - Espada de fogo e escudo, voa.nnnnOutros personagens dos quadrinhos também aparecem neste jogo, como Cascão (como shop keeper), Franjinha (como o Doctor) e o grande vilão, Capitão Feio (anteriormente Vampire Dragon).nnnnOs amigos da Mônica podem se deslocar lateralmente para qualquer lugar da Terra dos Monstros, mas alguns lugares só poderão ser alcançados por um certo membro da turma, devido às suas habilidades específicas ou armas. Eles podem atacar (botão 1) ou pular (botão 2) e você pode acessar sua tela de estatísticas apertando o botão PAUSE. Lá você pode equipar itens e armas, bem como ataques especiais, tais como bolas de fogo, tornados, flechas, bumerangues e trovões (todos liberados apertando para baixo e 2 juntos). Inimigos derrotados liberam ouro e chaves, permitindo o acesso a novas áreas. Coletar pedras irá aumentar o Carisma dos personagens, melhorando as chances de obter itens e ouro. Em cada cidade que você chegar, você receberá uma senha, permitindo que você continue o jogo a partir desse ponto.

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Ultima III
locale.synopsis: Homebrew game adaptation of Ultima III.
Adaptación casera del juego Ultima III para Master System
Portage Homebrew de Ultima III sur master system.

locale.title: Ultima IV : Quest of the Avatar
locale.synopsis:
The fourth game in the now well-established Ultima series featured an improved game engine, with color graphics and better character interaction (you could now have actual conversations with NPCs). But what really makes Ultima IV shine is its radical departure from any other RPG made before or since in terms of the story and goal.
Instead of building up your character by any means possible in order to face the Ultimate Evil in a big bang up showdown, in Ultima IV you were trying to become the Avatar, a role model of sorts for the people of the land. This meant upholding the "eight virtues" and basically trying to become a better person. In most RPGs you chose to be a just/nice hero because the people you'd help would usually provide you with some nice equipment for your services, but in Ultima IV you helped people not for a reward or to advance the plot but simply because it was the "right thing to do". The game actually frowns on behavior that was typical of most other RPGs, such as backstabbing fleeing monsters or picking up everything that wasn't nailed down even if it didn't belong to you. The game keeps track of all your actions, so if you went about killing and looting like in most RPGs, you'd never finish the game.
This VERY different approach to the game's ultimate goal is what makes Ultima IV famous so many years later, and became the sort of design philosophy that made all the following Ultimas so unique in their genre.
Of course, the game still has plenty of traditional RPG elements such as dungeons to explore and hostile monsters to kill, as well as a typical final "Holy Grail" type quest where you had to find the Codex of Ultimate Wisdom to complete your transformation into Avatarhood.

Ultima IV: Quest of the Avatar, es el cuarto juego de rol en la serie fundada por Richard Garriott. El objetivo es llegar a ser un profeta (un "avatar") de una nueva religión (una "filosofía de la vida"). Para ello, el jugador debe ejercer las virtudes de 8 avatares y encontrar un libro llamado "Códice de la Suprema Sabiduría".

Ultima IV : Quest of the Avatar sur Master System est le quatrième jeu de rôle de la série fondée par Richard Garriott. Le but est de devenir prophète (un "avatar") d'une nouvelle religion (une "philosophie de vie"). Pour ce faire, le joueur doit exercer les 8 vertus de l'avatar et trouver un ouvrage nommé Codex de la sagesse ultime.

locale.title: Ultimate Soccer
locale.synopsis:
Ultimate Soccer is a football (European) game composed by 64 (unlicensed) international teams, each with it's own values for running, ball control and strength. There are five game modes (friendly, penalty shootout, tournament, playoff and league), but the lack of password or built-in battery means each one of them must be completed in one sitting.
The gameplay can be tweaked for the players' preference by changing several key aspects of the physics engine, such as wind strength and direction, ball weight (lighter balls travel higher, faster and farther but are more prone to be deflected by winds than heavy balls, who barely lift of the ground and are slowed down by wet grass), tightness of ball control and players speed and momentum. A five-a-side mode, where the ball is never out of play is also included. Thanks to the many options regarding the physics, the game allows a lot of flexibility in playmaking, from building up the play with small passes from the midfield to belting the ball upwards in hope of a goalmouth deflection.
Graphically, the game is similar to EA's Madden NFL series, with pseudo-3D effects allowing the view to be tilted up to show more detail up front or tilted down to show more of the field.
The series later continued with Striker on the same console and Striker' 96 on PC, Saturn and PlayStation.

Usted está en la cancha, listo para empezar el partido. Las multitudes están enloquecidas. La temporada ha sido larga y llena de desafios. Usted se ha enfrentado a muchos equipos y ha llegado a las finales y hoy es el día en que probará que tiene la técnica y la determinación para transformarse en el ¡más invencible de los campeones de fútbol!

Ultimate Soccer est un jeu de football sur Master System. Le soft vous propose de choisir une formation au sein de nombreuses équipes internationales fantaisistes. Cinq modes de jeu sont disponibles : Match Amical, Penalty, Tournois, Exhibition et Ligue.

locale.title: Vigilante
locale.synopsis:
Vigilante is a side-scrolling beat-em-up, based on the popular coin-up. It features an anonymous tough hero that roams the streets to beat up The Rogues gang that kidnapped his girlfriend Maria.
The game offers five distinct locations, such as city streets and a junkyard, with many different thugs with different strengths. You fight with your fists, feet and a chain. Each level features an end boss which requires a special tactic in order to progress.

Los gemidos de María te llegarán al corazón a medida que se escapa la camioneta. Es peor que la muerte. La hermosa María ha sido raptada por la pandilla de gamberros más temible de la ciudad: Los Rogues. ¡Sólo tú podrás salvarla! ¡Defiéndete y rescata a tu novia en esta aventura tan emocionante que te brinda Sega!

Vigilante sur Master System est un beat'em all adapté du jeu d'arcade du même nom. Le joueur commande un héros anonyme en guerre contre le gang qui a kidnappé Maria, sa petite amie. A mains nues ou armé d'une chaîne, combattez les gangsters dans les rues de la ville.
Jogo de briga de rua, bem ao estilo de salvar a cidade e a mocinha, saia espancando os inúmeros bandidos que surgem de todos os lados para te pegar.

game.name: Virtua Fighter Animation

locale.title: Virtua Fighter Animation
locale.synopsis:
Virtua Fighter Animation is an one-on-one 2D fighting game based on the Virtua Fighter anime series. It has two game modes: story and versus.
In the story mode, the player follows the anime's plot, with anime style cutscenes before and after each fight. The story is divided in acts, each one of them corresponding to one fight. The player starts controlling Akira Yuki, as as he beats his opponents, each one of them joins his party, so they can be chosen in the next fights. Besides Akira, the other characters which become available are Pai Chan, Jacky Bryant, Wolf Hawkfield, Kage-Maru, Sarah Bryant and Lau Chan. In the final act, the player must fight against Dural.
The versus mode allows players to choose any of the seven available characters to fight against the CPU. In the two player versus game, Kage-Maru is removed from the character selection.
The Game Gear version has 3 different viewing modes: Normal, Large and Real-Time. The Normal viewing mode shows the fighters from a more distant position (smaller sprites) than the Large mode (larger sprites). The Real-Time mode simulates the zooming camera effects from the other Virtua Fighter games, alternating between the Normal and Large modes. It also has an extended intro sequence, with anime style cutscenes.
In regards to gameplay, the game doesn't differ much from any other 2D fighting game, as the player can perform punches (button 1), kicks (button 2) and jumps (up), as well as some special maneuvers. The Game Gear version has also a block function (START button), absent in the Master System version. The fights are regular best of 3 round matches, and players will loose a round if one of this three possibilities happen: their energy is depleted, they fall out of the ring or they have less energy than the opponent if the time runs out.

Virtua Fighter Animation es un un juego de lucha 2D basado en la serie de anime de Virtua Fighter. Tiene dos modos de juego:. Historia y Versus.
En el modo historia, el jugador sigue la trama del anime, con escenas cinemáticas estilo anime antes y después de cada pelea. La historia se divide en actos, cada uno de ellos correspondiente a una pelea. El jugador comienza el control de Akira Yuki, y a medida que el derrota a sus oponentes, cada uno de ellos se une a su equipo, por lo que se pueden elegir en las próximas peleas. Además de Akira, el resto de personajes que se convierten en disponibles son Pai Chan, Jacky Bryant, Wolf Hawkfield, Kage-Maru, Sarah Bryant y Lau Chan. En el acto final, el jugador debe luchar contra Dural.
El modo versus permite a los jugadores elegir cualquiera de los siete personajes disponibles para luchar contra la CPU. En el modo versus de dos jugadores, Kage-Maru es retirado de la selección de personaje.

Une curiosité... sortie sur la fin de vie de cette console ; un de ces jeux bizarres, que je découvre aujourd'hui avec étonnement.
Et en plus, c'est pas une daube de caricature de Virtua Fighter... non, il faut bien admettre que c'est bien jouable et franchement beau (pour la console... bien sûr ).
Evidemment, ça ne vaut pas le vrai Virtua Fighter qui apparait alors sur les premières bornes d'arcade 3D; mais c'est certainement un des meilleurs jeux de baston de la console... Un des rares dignes d'intérêt en fait, à part peut-être... non, en fait ça doit être le seul !

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Walter Payton Football
locale.synopsis:
It's the snap! You sweep to the right. The quarterback hands you the ball. You head for daylight as the linemen open a hole. Suddenly, 250 lbs. of screaming tackle is heading your way. He wants to make you splat city. What will you do?
This game gives you the chance to find out. With Walter Payton Football you can play against the computer, or against a friend, in a Monday Night Game or in a series on the Road to The Superbowl. Choose from 28 west, central and eastern teams. Offense and defense. Should you run or pass? Will a reverse throw 'em off guard?
In the middle of a hot series, you can save your standings with a Password save. If you like football, then Sega's Walter Payton Football is the game for you!
Tú te sientas en tu sitio, las gradas chillan llenándote los oídos. Un millon de ojos observan tus movimientos. La tensión te hace soplar a traves de tu casco. ¡Listos! Se lanza la pelota.

American Pro Football sur Master System est une simulation de football américain. Deux modes de jeu sont proposés, un mode exhibition nommé "Monday night game" et "road to the superbowl" qui vous entraîne au coeur du championnat national avec tous les matchs d'une saison régulière s'achevant par les traditionnels play-offs. Seul ou à 2, choisissez la stratégie adéquate à la situation de jeu et emmenez votre équipe favorite de la NFL vers la victoire.

Ein betäubendes Getöse im Stadion ? und gleich geht es los. Millionen Augenpaare verfolgen jede Deiner Bewegungen. Du spürst Deinen heißen Atem durch die Schutzmaske und rufst die letzten Anweisungen. Der Ball ist im Spiel.
O American Pro Football, conhecido como Walter Payton Football nos EUA, é um jogo esportivo desenvolvido e publicado pela Sega para o Sistema Master da Sega.

locale.title: Wanted
locale.synopsis:
Get ready for an adventure in Sega's wild, wild west! Become the Sheriff of the western territories. You've got a silver star and a trusty Sega Light Phaser. Your gunfighting skills are about to be put to the test by the meanest bunch of desperadoes ever to ride the outlaw trail.
In towns. Across country. Down dusty streets. Your job is to clean them up! When you find the outlaws, shoot fast...or they'll plug you first! To make matters worse, the townspeople are walking the streets. Hit them and you'll lose part of your life meter!
In between rounds you'll find challenge scenes to help you improve your shooting and make some more gold! Fight your way to the seventh round and you'll face the big boss in a sunset battle. But go down in a cloud of gunsmoke and it's Boot Hill for you. What are you waiting for? Go get 'em, pardner!
El peligroso viaje del sabio profeta Miguel Chen comienza en el cielo en algún sitio del corazón de la China. Ayúdele a encontrar el camino de la sabiduría con este emocionante juego de Sega.

Wanted sur Master System est un jeu de tir se déroulant au temps du Far West. Si tirer plus vite que son ombre n'est pas impératif, il faut au moins être plus rapide que les nombreux guérilleros qui pointent leur arme sur vous. Le jeu est agrémenté de stages bonus tels que le tir de bouteilles dans le saloon ou sur des capsules de bière en vol.

Die gefährliche Reise des großen, weisen Propheten Michael Chen beginnt im Himmel irgendwo weit mitten in China. Helfen Sie ihm bei diesem tollen Abenteuer von Sega, den Weg zur Erleuchtung zu finden.

Os renegados estão de volta! É hora de você colocar a sua insígnia de xerife, apertar o cinturão com a pistola Ligth Phaser e fazer com que a paz volte a reinar nas pacatas cidadezinha do oeste. Não será nada fácil... pois desta vez os bandidos estão atirando em você!

locale.title: Wimbledon
locale.synopsis: The oldest of the four Grand Slam tournaments, held in London on grass every July, is the basis for this tennis game. The ball comes off the grass surface fast and low, reflecting the surface's reputation for providing the most exciting tennis. It's viewed in the typical third person perspective, although with quite a distinct 3D effect and with shadows. You can play standard 1 or 2 player matches, or play the full tournament from the quarter-final stages onwards. You can play standard shots as well as lobs and drop shots, and full service rules are featured. You can select your character and build up their skills as the game progresses.

Controle uno de los mejores jugadores del mundo, o entre usted en el Tour y ponga a prueba su habilidad. "Singles" (Individuales), "Doubles" (Parejas), práctica, cuatro excitantes campeonatos, ¡acción rápida que le acelerara el corazón desde el comienzo hasta el fin!

Disputez le plus vieux des quatre tournois du Grand Chelem dans Wimbledon sur Master System. Vous avez la possibilité de jouer en simple et en double, pour un match d'exhibition, ou pour l'ensemble du tournoi. Vous disposez alors d'un capital de points à distribuer entre quatre capacités, vous permettant de personnaliser à votre aise le sportif incarné.

Steuern Sie einen Tennisstar, oder stellen Sie Ihre Fähigkeiten im Turnier auf die probe. Ob Einzel- oder Doppel-Match, trainingsmodus oder eines der vier aufregende Turniere - dieses Spiel bietet stets rasante Action von Anfang bis Ende!

Pisar nas quadras de Wimbledon é o sonho de todo jogador de tênis. Mas não nada fácil chegar lá: você terá que suar muito a camisa para poder pensar em disputar o maior campeonato de tênis do mundo. Mas agora poderá ser difernte. Neste jogo você tem a chance de entrar mais rápido para o mundo das feras do tênis. Mas não pense que vencer será moleza. Esqueça da boa vida que você levava e comece a jogar... muito. Quadra rápida, de saibro ou de grama... você quem sabe. Se quiser treinar antes do jogo, tudo bem. Descansar no meio do campeonato? Use sua senha. Paralelas, lobs, smashs, subidas de rede, bolas sem peso... você pode tudo neste jogo! Chegou o grande dia. Pronto para a partida? Estamos que sim, pois não dá mais para voltar atrás: milhares de torcedores estão olhando para você e aplaudindo. Nervoso? Controle-se! Para sentir o gostinho da vitória vale tudo!!

locale.title: Wimbledon II
locale.synopsis: You started out at the bottom, an unknown name in a field of highly talented players. You worked your way up the ranks, playing in America, Australia and France. And now, the big day... the day you take on the best tennis players in the world for the Wimbledon Open Cup!

Usted empezó desde abajo, era un nombre desconocido en una cantera de jugadores con auténtico talento. Fue escalando posiciones y jugó en América, Australia y Francia. Y ahora le espera el gran día . . . ¡el día en que se enfrenta a los mejores jugadores de tenis del mundo en la Copa del Abierto de Wimbledon!

Vous débutez en fin de liste, un nom inconnu parmi une armée de joueurs talentueux. Mais vous améliorez votre classement en Amérique, en Australie et finalement en France. Aujourd'hui, c'est le jour décisif... le jour où vous allez affronter les meilleurs joueurs de tennis dans la Coupe de l'Open de Wimbledon!

Sie haben ganz unten angefangen - ein unbekannter Name unter den zahlreichen talentierten Spielern. Doch mittlerweile haben Sie sich bei Spielen in Amerika, Australien und Frankreich hochgearbeitet. Und jetzt ist es soweit: der große Tag ist gekommen. . . der Tag, an dem Sie im Wimbledon Open Cup gegen die internationalen Tennis-Spitzenstars antreten!

locale.title: Winter Olympics : Lillehammer '94
locale.synopsis:
This is the official license of Winter Olympics tournament in 1994 at Lillehammer, Norway. You can practice in any event before the tournament. The game offers two modes - Full Olympics and Mini Olympics, which vary in the number of events.
It includes 5 different types of sports - biathlon, alpine skiing (downhill, slalom, giant slalom and Super-G), ski jumping (90 m, 120 m), bobsleigh (2/4 men bob, 1/2 men luge) and skating (elimination, pursuit, time trial). The events use 3D views

WINTER OLYMPICS te ofrece la máxima experiencia en simulación de deportes. Correrás contra los mejores del mundo ... y el reloj ... luchando para ganar la MEDALLA DE ORO en un certamen en el que harás frente a 10 ACONTECIMIENTOS ESPECTACULARES en los que someterás a prueba tu velocidad, fuerza, destreza y resistencia, hasta el limite. Es tu oportunidad de ganar la MEDALLA DE ORO en el ESPECTACULO DE DEPORTES DE INVIERNO MAS MAGNIFICO DEL MUNDO.nn? MOGULS - Necesitarás una técnica dura y agresiva, así como gracia y estilo en el aire, para ser ganador.nn? SALTO EN ESQUI - No es para los de nervios delicados. Arrójate por una e rampa - no hay modo de retroceder - ¡sólo una via hacia abajo!nn? BOBSLEIGH - El empuje, la gravedad y el equilibrio propulsan el trineo cuesta abajo por un recorrido de 1.000 metros de hielo blanco y mortal.nn? ACONTECIMIENTOS ALPINOS - Reflejos rápidos - equilibrio - estilo - valor y energía, a más de 80 km/h.nn? BIATLON - Dominar el esqui de fondo y las pruebas de tiro al blanco a ponen a prueba tu resistencia y precisión, hasta el límite.nn? PATINAJE VELOZ EN PISTAS CORTAS - Cuchillas de acero y nervios de acero transforman la velocidad y el ritmo en un borrón a más de 40 km/hnn? LUGE - Un tobogán ligero - una pista de puro hielo. Hacia lo desconocido.

Winter Olympics : Lillehammer 94 est comme son nom l'indique, l'adaptation sur Master System des Jeux Olympiques d'Hiver de 1994, disputés à Lillehammer en Norvège. Le jeu inclut cinq sports : le biathlon, le ski alpin, le saut à ski, le bobsleigh et le patinage de vitesse. Chacun d'entre eux comporte différentes disciplines et catégories, fidèle aux règles olympiques officielles. Le mode d'entraînement vous permet d'ajuster vos skis avant de tenter de décrocher la médaille d'or.

WINTER OLYMPICS - die ultimative Simulation der spannendsten Wintersport-Disziplinen! Treten Sie gegen die Besten der Welt an ... und gegen die Zeit! Gewinnen Sie GOLD in 10 spektakulären Disziplinen, die Ihre volle Leistungsfähigkeit, Schnelligkeit, Ausdauer und Konzentration fordern. Sie sind dabei! Sie haben die Chance, im weltgrößten Wintersport-Ereignis GOLD zu gewinnen!nnnnBUCKELPISTE - Kraft und Technik sowie Anmut und Präzision bei den Sprüngen sind erforderlich, um sich hier ganz vorn zu plazieren.nnSKISPRINGEN - Nur wer Mut hat, kann hier gewinnen. Sind Sie erstmal in der Spur, gibt es kein Zurück mehr!nnZWEIER-BOB - Erleben Sie die Faszination von Beschleunigung und Schwerkraft beim Bobfahren im 1.000 Meter langen Eiskanal.nnALPINE SKIRENNEN - Nur die Besten erreichen Geschwindigkeiten von 80km/h und mehr. Je nach Disziplin sind Geschick, Technik, Kraft und besonders Mut gefordert.nnBIATHLON - Höchste Ausdauerbelastung im Langlauf, gepaart mit absoluter Präzision beim Schießen verlangen von den Athleten maximalen Einsatz und volle Konzentration.nnEISSCHNELLAUF - Bei der Geschwindigkeit ist absolute Körperbeherrschung Voraussetzung für eine schnelle Zeit.nnRODELN - Sie, Ihr Rodelschlitten und eine Eisbahn! Eine Zerreißprobe für die Nerven, die Ihnen alles abverlangt!

Quem disse que não se pode andar trenó ou esquiar no Brasil? Certamente foi algum desavisado que não conhece Winter Olympics, o cartucho dos Jogos Olímpicos de 94, realizados este ano na pequena cidade de Lillehammer, na Noruega.nnAqui você vai enfrentar o Downhill, o Super G, o Slalom e o Slalom Gigante, emocionantes provas de esqui na montanha com barreitas, vai praticar saltos de esqui nas maiores rampas do planeta e ainda se exibir no estilo livre.nnÉ só? Longe disso!! Você ainda vai participar de um Biatlo (com esqui e tiro ao alvo), da Patinaç@ao em Velocidade, embarcar em corridas de trenós nas modalidades Luge e Bobsleigh e, se bobear, ainda pega o Papai Noel exibindo seus anos de experiência.nnAo final disso tudo você vai mostrar se o que esta neve toda lhe rendeu foram várias medalhas ou um mero resfriado.

locale.title: Wolfchild
locale.synopsis:
Dr. Kal Morrow, expert in genetic research and creation of human-animal hybrids, has been kidnapped and his family brutally murdered by the terrorist organization CHIMERA. His surviving son Saul takes it upon himself to avenge his family. Using his father's research, he turns into a man-wolf and sets out to find CHIMERA's base and defeat their leader Karl Draxx.
As Saul, it is your job to traverse five different areas on your way to Draxx. When Saul collects enough power-ups, he turns into his wolf form and gains a special psychic shot attack, which can be improved by collecting futher power-ups. However, if Saul loses health, he turns back into his human form and only has his fists to fight the numerous enemies.

Los terroristas de Chimera ban secuestrado al padre de Saul Morrow y han asesinado a su madre y hermano. ¿Será suficiente su capacidad metamórfica para liberar a su padre? ¿Bastarán los poderes psíquicos de un hombre-lobo para derrotar a un ejército?

Wolfchild est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Master System qui vous met dans la peau de Saul Morrow, à la recherche de son père, un expert en génétique récemment enlevé. En exploitant les recherches de ce dernier, vous pouvez vous transformer en loup-garou à condition d'avoir trouvé suffisamment de capsules d'énergie dans le niveau. Cette transformation vous confère des pouvoirs spéciaux.

Chimara-Terroristen haben Saul Morrows Vater entführt und seine Mutter und seinen Bruder getötet. Kann er mit Hilfe seiner Fähigkeit, sich in einen werwolfähnlichen Krieger zu verwandeln - einen Wolfsmenschen mit übernatürlichen Kräften - eine gesamte Armee besiegen?

Wolfchild é a história de um atleta olímpico que, motivado pelo seqüestro e assassinato de seus pais por agentes da Chimera - a pior organização criminosa do mundo - resolveu enfrentar o medo de não ser mais um humano.nnnnSaul Morrow, sabendo do enorme poder da Chimera, dirigiu-se ao laboratório de seu pai e pôs em prática uma experiência genética que aquele grande cientista preferiu esconder do mundo. Num golpe de coragem ele entrou na cabine de transformação, ativou o programa e iniciou uma viagem sem fim.nnnnAgora ele será para sempre um Homem-Lobo! Sua batalha começa na Nave-Lobo, um gigantesco cruzador de batalha que está voando para a Chimera. A segunda fase é na Floresta, onde tropas da Chimera, lagartos mutantes e plantas hostis o esperam.nnnnNosso herói irá passar ainda pelo Templo Antigo e pelo Laboratório, encarando guerreiros de uma civilização perdida e peixes mutantes, antes de chegar ao Núcleo Interno e enfrentar o mortífero Draxx. Saul conta com grandes armas - como seus poderes psíquicos - mas você, sem dúvida, é seu principal aliado na destruição da Chimera!

locale.title: Wonder Boy
locale.synopsis:
Just when things were going great with Tom-Tom and his girlfriend Tanya, some thug of a woodland king had to kidnap her and hide her away, and Tom-Tom doesn't have a clue where. That's why he has to explore deep dark forests, cross endless oceans, climb treacherous slopes, survive endless volcanoes, and even walk through clouds. But Tom-Tom will never be totally alone. You see, when he goes through the exotic locations, he has to come face to face with its inhabitants, like bees, spiders, snakes, coal-kids, frogs, bats, snails, coyotes, and octopuses, to name a few. The hatchet is Tom-Tom's only line of defense against these menaces.
There are ten areas, each containing four rounds each, but the tenth area can't be accessed unless Tom-Tom collects all the dolls during his rescue mission. During his journey, he can break open different eggs that will reveal hatchets, skateboards, mushrooms, milk, and even guardian angels. You can ride the skateboard through each round, as long as you don't collide with an inhabitant. When you complete each round while still riding the skateboard, you'll start the next round still riding it. As you progress through each round, your vitality will start to get low, but it can be increased by getting milk, mushrooms, potato chips,or fruit that appear everywhere you go. As well as the normal eggs, there are also speckled eggs that must be avoided, otherwise the God of Death will be released, and once he follows you, you'll lose vitality much quickly. At the end of every fourth round, there is a king waiting to destroy you with his fireballs or lightning bolts.
There are also warp-gates, but you don't find them, they find you. You see, warp-gates appear in rounds 1-4 of each area. If you happen to get one fruit, a special item will appear. These special items include handbags, wrist watches, a pair of shoes, a teddy bear, and a bottle of perfume. Another girl will appear and take you up to the clouds where the object is to collect as many hearts as you can without falling down or getting the item again. Once you have collected all the hearts, you can get the item to return to the surface, and more often than not, you'll get further in the round.
Oscuras selvas virgenes. Océanos sin fin. Aridos desiertos. Introducete en ellos desafiando a horribles criaturas y desastres naturales para rescatar a Tanya de las garras de un rey brutal.

Wonder Boy sur Master System est un jeu de plates-formes mettant en scène Tom-Tom, un sympathique cavernicole dont la compagne Tanya a été kidnappée. Armé d'un marteau de pierre, en équilibre sur un skateboard ou aidé d'une petite fée, il va devoir traverser 9 niveaux pour récupérer sa dulcinée.

Durchstreifen Sie tiefe dunkle Wälder. Überqueren Sie endlose Meere. Ziehen Sie durch unendliche Wüsten. Und während der ganzen Zeit kämpfen Sie gegen bösartige Kreaturen - bis Sie sie finden. Bis Sie Ihre Freundin gerettet haben. Tanya, aus den Klauen eines grausamen Königs.

Justamente quando tudo ia bem entre você e sua bela namorada, Tanya, ela foi seqüestrada pelos lacaios de um Rei dos Bosques. E onde está ela agora, presa e incomunicável? Você não tem a mínima pista. Por isso, terá que embrenhar-se em florestas escuras, cruzar oceanos sem fim, escalar encostas traiçoeiras. Terá de explorar vulcões em erupção, perigosas geleiras e até mesmo caminhar sobre nuvens. Mas você não estará completamente sozinho, o seu anjo da guarda estará ao seu lado.

locale.title: Wonder Boy III : The Dragon's Trap
locale.synopsis:
Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap is a direct sequel to Wonder Boy in Monster Land. When Tom-Tom defeats the MEKA dragon, the wounded beast casts a spell on him, turning him into a Lizard-Man. To regain your original human form, you have to find the Salamander Cross, hidden by the Vampire Dragon in Monster Land.
In this side-scrolling platform game, you can still buy equipment and items, but unlike its predecessor, it is not divided in sequences of levels. You are allowed to go anywhere, as long as you have the right shape or equipment. During his quest, Tom-Tom has to defeat various dragon bosses. Each win will give you a new shape with new abilities such as flying, swimming, walking on ceilings or clinging to walls, which also give you to access new parts of the world. The possible shapes are Lizard-Man, Mouse-Man, Piranha-Man, Lion-Man and Hawk-Man and the main abilities are defined by attacking power, defense points and charm points (needed for equipment by collecting charm stones). Also, certain blocks can only be destroyed by specific weapons or are only accessible to certain shapes.
The basic actions consist of attacking and jumping, and in the status screen you can equip swords, shields and armour. Special attacks include fire balls, tornadoes, arrows, boomerangs and thunder strikes. Along the way, you collect keys (only one at all times) and gold left behind by defeated creatures, and you often have to revisit places to access new areas. A password is given at the beginning of each town to continue from there.

Sobre Wonder Boy ha caído una maldición. Ha herido mortalmente a ala horrible bestia, pero el aliento de ésta ha convertido a nuestro héroe en un humbre-lagarto. El joven luchador tiene que buscar ahora la Cruz de la Salamandra, lo único que puede dovolverle su forma original... ¿podrá encontrarla?

Wonder Boy III : The Dragon's Trap sur Master System vous place dans la peau de Wonder Boy, victime d'une malédiction l'ayant transformé en dragon. Vous devez retrouver la Salamander Cross pour inverser le sort. Vous prenez la forme de diverses créatures tout au long du jeu, et avez la possibilité d'acheter de quoi améliorer votre équipement.

Wonder Boy ist verflucht worden! Wonder Boy hat das häßliche Biest tödlich verwundet, aber der letzte Atem des MEKA-Drachens hat Wonder Boy in einen Eidechsenmann verwandelt! Der junge Recks muß nun das Salamanderkreuz suchen, da dies die einzige Möglichkeit bietet, wieder zu einem normalen Menschen zu werden. Zuerst muß er es aber finden...

O jogo começa na última fase de Wonder Boy in Monster Land, o Labirinto do Dragão, em uma espécie de prólogo. O jogador deve conduzir Wonder Boy até o calabouço do Dragão onde o enfrenta. Após derrotá-lo, Wonder Boy é transformado em um Homem-Lagarto e foge do castelo, que desmorona. Na sequência, um breve vídeo não-jogável resume os acontecimentos e anuncia o começo do jogo, com a frase And now... Wonder Boy III. The Dragon's Trap. O jogo então continua em Alsedo, uma cidade em Monster Land. Seguindo o roteiro do game, o jogador se transformará em vários personagens diferentes, em busca da Cruz de Salamadra para reverter o feitiço e voltar a ser Wonder Boy.

locale.title: Monster World II: Dragon no Wana
Wonder Boy in Monster Land
locale.synopsis:
Eleven years have gone by since Tom-Tom rescued his girlfriend Tanya from the clutches of the evil King. Word of Tom-Tom's dangerous adventure soon spread throughout Wonder Land. The people were very proud of him and gave Tom-Tom the highest honor of all - the legendary name of Wonder Boy. With the evil King defeated, Wonder Land returned to its peaceful state, and for over one decade, the kingdom was a paradise, and everything and everyone lived happily together.
Eventually, the peace was broken when a ferocious fire-breathing dragon appeared out of nowhere and took over Wonder Land with an army of evil, monsterous henchmen, causing Wonder Land was immediately thrown into utter chaos. Defenseless that they were, the people were quickly taken over and the tranquil and serene kingdom was transformed into a land of demons and devils. Wonder Land was now a Monster Land. Tom-Tom was summoned to set out on a journey, destroy this dragon, and restore peace once again. Tom-Tom is Wonder Land's last hope.
There are twelve locations in which Tom-Tom must venture through, including (but not limited to): the city of Wonder Land, Valley of Peace, The Coastal Town of Baraboro, The Mam Desert, and Pororo Islands. During his journey, he must defeat monsters with the sword that he got at the beginning of his adventure. These monsters will leave either gold coins or bags of cash, which he can use to buy better weapons, shields, armors, and boots. At the end of each location, there is usually a boss that Tom-Tom must defeat in order to obtain a gold key that will unlock the exit gate, as well as plenty of gold coins or bags of cash. If he touches any enemies, or is shot at, he will lose health. During his travels, Tom-Tom must take note of the hourglass; if the hourglass display sands at the bottom, he must get another one that appears out of nowhere, or he'll also lose health. There are two ways in which he can restore it. He can either go into bars to have a drink that will restore it and get a hint about what lies ahead as well, or go into hospitals and heal himself to restore the lost health.

¡El Muchacho Fantástico está de vuelta! Pero esta vez va por todas.nnNo más lindas muñecas, frutas o leche.nnAhora son espadas, armaduras, escudos, laberintos y dragones que escupen fuego.nnAyuda al Muchacho Fantástico a través de 12 peligrosos niveles, llenos de monstruos y de desafiante aventura.

Wonder Boy in Monster Land sur Master System est un jeu d'action/plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez Wonder Boy dont la tâche principale est d'éliminer le dragon Meka qui terrorise les habitants de Monster Land. Ce jeu introduit la notion de pièces d'or qui peuvent être ramassées sur les monstres. Ces dernières vous permettront d'acheter de l'équipement aux marchands, rendant votre personnage plus efficace.

Der Wunderknabe ist zurück! Dieses Mal meint er es aber im Ernst. Keine niedlichen Puppen, Früchte oder Milch mehr.nnJetzt geht es um Schwerter, Rüstungen, Schilder, Labyrinthe und feuerspeiende Drachen.nnHelfen Sie dem Wunderknaben durch 12 gefährliche, mit Ungeheuern gefüllte Etappen des herausfordernden Abenteuers!

locale.title: Super Wonder Boy : Super Monster Land
Wonder Boy in Monster World
locale.synopsis:
"Monster World was once a peaceful region. Then, the peace was shattered by an invading army of monsters. A young man named Shion vowed to defeat them and make his land peaceful again."
Wonder Boy In Monster World puts you in control of Shion in his quest to save Monster World from the evil hands of BioMeka. It controls like your standard platform game - run, jump, and kill enemies. The game is filled with RPG elements such as talking to townsfolk, collecting money to buy items, upgrading your life, and equipping a variety of armor and weapons - staying very close to the "Zelda format". You can save your game to continue your quest at a later time.
Wonder Boy In Monster World is the third game in the Monster World spin-off series. In Japan the game is called Wonder Boy 5: Monster World 3.

En calidad de héroe Wonder Boy, de usted depende liberar el Monster World (Mundo de Monstruos) de las ternbles criaturas que se han adueñado de él. Hágase con un armadura, armas y hechizos, y embárquese en una búsqueda a través de tierras fantásticas en pos de la fuente de los monstruos malignos.

Dans Wonder Boy in Monster World sur Master System, vous incarnez Shion et devez sauver votre monde de l'invasion des monstres. Ce jeu de plates-formes intègre des éléments de jeu de rôle tels que la possibilité de communiquer avec les habitants, le fait d'acheter des équipements et d'améliorer les caractéristiques de votre personnage.

Als der legendäre Held Wonder Boy haben Sie die Aufgabe, die Monsterwelt von den schrecklichen Kreaturen zu befreien, die die Macht ergriffen haben. Kaufen Sie Ihre Rüstung, Waffen und Zaubersprüche, und begeben Sie sich auf eine Reise durch phantastische Länder, um den Ursprung der bösen Monstren zu suchen!

locale.title: Wonsiin
locale.synopsis: A port of the Famicom game Shin Jinrui: The New Type (Adventures of Dino Riki in the US), which apparently gave Zemina opportunity to exploit their vertical shmup code even once more. Typically, the scrolling is choppy here, too. There have been several other small compromises, but overall Wonsiin is a decent port of the Knightmare inspired game. Especially some elements that one would think would have been sacrificed on the MSX, most impressively the attacking dinosaur skeletons, are intact. Still, Wonsiin ends after three stages, leaving out the final challenges.
Port no oficial del juego de aventuras de MSX llamado "Dino Riki". Exclusivo del mercado coreano.
Adaptation non officielle du jeux MSX Adventures of Dino Riki. Sortie exclusivement en Corée

locale.title: Woody Pop
locale.synopsis:
Every system must have a Breakout clone, and every self-respecting developer must have one, especially in the mid-eighties, following the success of Taito's Arkanoid. Sega's answer was called Woody Pop.
With a wooden paddle, which in fact is Woody the tree spirit, you bounce your ball against bricks laid out in a big house filled with toys. The toys will come out to disturb you. When you hit "mystery bricks", wind-up toy soldiers or robots come out, obstructing your ball. On some levels, a toy train will cross your path as well. Speaking of wells, the bottom of the screen is not a big black hole as in most other games of this kind  instead the whole covers only a part of the wall, so that even if you miss the ball, it might bounce back in the corners.
Once a room is cleared, you can choose freely between up to three adjacent rooms to progress to, making this game less linear than usual.
Like any post-Arkanoid game, there is a range of powerups released from special blocks. Most are known from other games such as the double-ball, the growing bat or the "diamond ball", which destroys all blocks in its path without ricocheting. Some invented by Sega are the fire ball, which sets blocks on fire, allowing them to destroy even neighbouring blocks, and the big ball, which hits bricks with more power, thereby destroying brick with one hit that would otherwise have required several.

Tras el éxito de Taito Arkanoid, la respuesta de Sega fue Woody Pop.nnEl objetivo del juego es el de siempre, acabar con todos los bloques golpeándolos con una pelota que tenemos que hacer rebotar con ayuda de una especie de nave que está en la parte inferior de la pantalla, siempre evitando que la bola caiga al vacío. Al ir rompiendo bloques, estos soltarán items y power-ups que nos ayudarán en la misión, tales como bolas de fuego, calaveras, un martillo y pociones mágicas. Pero también nos vamos a encontrar con unos bloques misteriosos que activan trampas en forma de soldados de juguete o robots que invocan viento y que lanzan la bola de nuevo hacia nuestra nave. Otro detalle de mucho interés es que al finalizar un nivel se nos da la posibilidad de elegir diferentes rutas que llevan a niveles diferentes, lo que asegura la rejugabilidad.

Un Arcanoid like. La jouabilité est pas mal du tout, les niveaux sont assez diversifiés. Graphismes un peu trop banals à mon goût. Ne pas y jouer plus d'une heure (temps moyen pour finir le jeu d'ailleurs) car il devient vite... lassant.

locale.title: Woody Pop : Shinjinrui no Block Kuzushi
World Class Leader Board
locale.synopsis:
Before the long-running Links series, Access produced the Leader Board lineage, which concludes here. Wind, snap and power are the main considerations as you dodge the bunkers, water and rough which make for more complex courses than the 8-bit versions of the original.
A course editor is provided. The courses provided include real courses like St. Andrews, a fictional designs such as The Gauntlet, which as the name suggests is designed to push your skills to the maximum.
The PC version revolutionized the use of the PC speaker to reproduce voice samples via their patented "RealSound" process. Quips like "No doubt about it, he's deep in the sandtrap", "Straight onto the fairway", and "Looks like he hit the tree, Jim." are used to provide running commentary on the gameplay.

"World Class" Leaderboard simula el desafio que presentan los campos de golf más difíciles del mundo y ofrece el Gauntlet Country Club, un campo de golf especialmente diseñado que constituye el ùltimo test de habilidad para el golfista.

World Class Leader Board est un jeu de golf sur Master System. Testez vos compétences de golfeur sur des parcours aussi variés que techniques tels que Cypress Creek ou Saint-Andrews. Les effets et voix digitalisées contribuent à donner l'impression d'assister à une retransmission télévisée.
"World Class" Leaderboard simuliert die schwierigsten Golfplätze der Welt und bietet den speziell entworfenen Gauntlet Country Club - derhärteste Test für Ihr Golfspiel!

locale.title: World Cup Italia '90
locale.synopsis: Go head to head with the most skilled teams in the world! Prove your mettle in a Test Match, show off your sharpshooting prowess in a Penalty Kick Contest, or go for the gold in the World Cup competition! Fast-paced and realistic - video soccer at its heart-stopping finest!

¡Enfréntese con los mejores equipos del mundo! ¡Demuestre su valía en un partido de prueba, haga alarde de su puntería en una competición de penalties, o trate de ganar el campeonato de la Copa Mundial! ¡Videojuego de fútbol rápido, realista, y de lo más emocionante!

World Cup Italia '90 sur Master System est un jeu de football permettant de prendre les commandes des équipes ayant participé à la phase finale de la Coupe du Monde 1990 en Italie. En match amical, en poules ou lors de matchs à élimination directe, mettez-vous dans la peau des plus grands.

Starten Sie zu einem Spiel mit den Superstars des Fußballs. Stellen Sie Ihre Angriffsstärke in einem Testspiel auf die Probe, demonstrieren Sie Ihre Schußkraft in einem Straftstoßwettkampf, oder holen Sie sich das Gold bei den Weltmeisterschaftsspielen! Rasant und realistisch: Video-Fußball mit atemberaubender Spannung!

Vai começar o mais sensacional campeonato de futebol.nn30 dos melhores times do mundo estão fazendo tudo para vencer. Escolha um deles e entre em campo com muita garra, pois desta vez você pode levar a taça para casa.nnnnA perspectiva é tão real que você vai sentir todas as emoções de estar dentro do estádio.nnnnOs passes são rápidos e certeiros, com grandes lançamentos que percorrerão todo o campo tornando o desafio ainda mais vibrante. Participe da disputa de pênaltis, tentando defender os poderosos chutes dos adversários. Ajude seu time a ser o grande campeão.

locale.title: World Cup USA 94
locale.synopsis: For the third World Cup in succession, US Gold had the license to produce the official game. They entrusted Tiertex with the task, who produced a top-down game recreating the full tournament. As well as the 24 teams who qualified for the tournament, other significant footballing nations like England, France and Denmark could be drafted in. The presentation of the menus is largely icon-based, with the official mascot featuring prominently. Tackling is difficult and passing is easy, making for a flowing end-to-end style of play.

World Cup USA '94 es un videojuego de fútbol que fue desarrollado por U.S. Gold en 1994. Cuenta con la licencia de la FIFA como producto oficial de la Copa Mundial de Fútbol de 1994 de Estados Unidos.
Le jeu officiel de la Coupe du monde de football de 1994 qui se déroula aux États-Unis, regroupant les 24 équipes qui participèrent à la compétition, ainsi que 8 équipes supplémentaires.

Realistisches Spiel mit über 15 vershiedenen SpieleraktionennnFlugkopfballnnVolleyschußnnFallrückziehernnShießennnHebernnHackentricknnTorwartparadennTorjubelnnnnGestalten Sie das Spiel vor dem Anstoß mit zahlreichen Optionen Ihren Vorlieben entsprechendRückpaßregel ein/ausnnBallbeherrschung (klebefaktor) niedrig/mittel/hoch/supernnAbseitregel ein/ausnnSpieldauer 3 bis 45 Minuten lange HalbzeitennnTempo niedrig/mittel/hochnnBallstoppen ein/ausnnWitterung ein/ausnnnnFreistoß !nnStrategie Bestimmen Sie Ihre SpieltaktiknnEckstoßnnÜber 3000 Frames Animation

Se você mora neste planeta, já deve estar sabendo que nos EUA, em 1994, estará acontecendo o maior evento do futebol mundial: a Copa do Mundo.nnnnE para que você não fique se divertindo apenas durante os jogos, foi feito um jogo - o único oficial da Copa do Mundo - que vai refletir tudo que está rolando nos gramados norte-americanos.nnnnWorld Cup USA 94 é o mais completo jogo de futebol já desenvolvido para Master System. Você vai poder dar passes incríveis, colocando na bola o efeito que desejar, mudar as regras oficiais, alterar as velocidades dos jogadores e até alterar a formação dos grupos da Copa do Mundo.nnnnAcabou? Claro que não! Há ainda a escolha das estratégias do seu time em campo, duração das partidas, password para gravar um campeonato e reiniciar quando quiser e 8 opções de idiomas.nnnnCom World Cup USA 94 você vai entrar para a galeria dos grandes campeões!

locale.title: World Games
locale.synopsis: Olympics style sports game. Compete in several events including: Skiing, Weight Lifting, Barrel Jumping, Sumo Wrestling, Bull Riding, Cliff Diving, Log Rolling, Caber Toss, Pole Vault, Platform Diving.

Ha llegado el momento de hacer algo interesante, deportes internacionales, de lo que posiblemente haya oído hablar, pero que nunca ha jugado. Deportes rudos, que requieren músculos, como el salto de bidones en una hermosa pista de hielo en Alemania. Equilibrio sobre troncos en un escarpado campo de leñadores de Canadá. La monta de toros en un rodeo caluroso y polvoriento del Oeste americano. Y el lanzamiento de troncos en las frías montañas de Escocia.

World Games sur Master System est une compilation de jeux supposés représenter le sport national d'une pléthore de nations. Sorti à l'origine sur Nes, il vous faudra passer par des épreuves désopilantes comme le saut de tonneaux, le slalom ou encore les plongeons.

Jahuuuuuuuuuu! Es ist Zeit, ein paar spannende Sportarten als aller Welt kennenzulernen, von denen Sie wahrscheinlich schon mal gehört, die Sie aber sicher noch nie probiert haben. Harte, kernige Sachen, wie Faßspringen auf dem Eis in Deutschland. Baumstämmerollen in einem kanadischen Holzfällerlager. Bullenreiten bei einem heißen und staubigen Rodeo im amerikanischen Westen. Oder Caber-Werfen in den schottischen Highlands.

É chegado o momento de presenciarnos uma competiçaão muito divertida e de esportes pouco comuns, dos quais você pode até já ter ouvido falar, mas com certeza nunca praticou. Salte obstáculos em uma bonita pista de gelo na Alemanha; equilibre-se sobre troncos em um campo de lenhadores no Canadá; monte um touro bravo em um rodeio quente e sujo no oeste Americano; participe de um lançamento de troncos nas montanhas frias da Escócia! Estes são os World Games, os jogos mais excêntricos do planeta. Mas você não precisa ser excêntrico para participar, basta gostar de desafios e muita diversão! Não fique fora desta!

locale.title: World Grand Prix
locale.synopsis: The premise is simple, race against the clock and computer-controlled F-1 opponents in a series of races. Along the way, earn points to upgrade various aspects of your machine, including acceleration, top speed and handling. It also includes a track editor, so you can create your own courses as well.
Conduzca los más extraordinarios automóviles del mundo. En las mejores pistas del mundo.nnY si todavía no siente bastante emoción, construya y corra por su propia pista.

World Grand Prix sur Master System est un jeu de courses de formule 1 dans lequel il faut se battre contre-la-montre et ses adversaires. De bonnes performances en course permettent d'améliorer ses équipements, notamment la tenue de route, l'accélération et la vitesse de pointe.

Entwerfen Sie sich die heissesten Grand Prix-Pisten der Welt, bevor Sie selbst als Pilot Ihres Formel I Rennwagens starten.
Geschicklichkeit sowie die Geschwindigkeit werden das Rennen entscheiden. Der Sieger wird sein Fahrzeug mit der Gewinnprämie aufrüsten und damit noch schneller und rasanter in das nächste Rennen gehen.
Eigentlich könnte Sie niemand am Sieg der Weltmeisterschaft hindern. Es sei denn, Sie lassen sich überholen...
Für 1 Spieler

locale.title: WWF WrestleMania : Steel Cage Challenge
locale.synopsis:
The game features several famous WWF stars, such as "Macho Man" Randy Savage, Bret "Hitman" Hart, The Mountie, The Undertaker, Irwin R. Schyster, "Million Dollar Man" Ted DiBiase, Sid Justice, "Rowdy" Roddy Piper, Jake "The Snake" Roberts and of course wrestling legend Hulk Hogan.
All wrestlers can perform their famous signature moves and have individual strengths and weaknesses. Game modes include a career mode and several modes for two players, including the name giving steel cage challenge.

Acepta el reto más duro de la lucha libre: el reto de la jaula de acero ¡WWF* WrestleMania* Steel Cage Challenge*! Controla cada uno de los estupendos movimientos y maniobras llenas de acción - Lanzamiento contra las cuerdas, Codazos, Aplastamientos, Patadones. Cuando estés preparado para el reto final de la lucha libre, la jaula de acero estará lista para ti.

WWF WrestleMania : Steel Cage Challenge sur Master System est un jeu de catch vous mettant aux prises avec des combattants officiels tels que Randy Savage, Shawn Michaels et bien d'autres. Seul ou en équipe, réduisez votre adversaire en poussière grâce aux techniques et coups spéciaux. Le jeu propose divers modes de combat dont un duel en cage, le vainqueur étant le premier parvenant à s'échapper.

game.name: X-men - Mojo World

locale.title: X-Men: Mojo World
locale.synopsis:
In a dark future, Mojo has his own TV show where the participants fight to death. He has imprisoned some X-Men from the past to recreate their greatest battles. Wolverine and Rogue have to enter the game and rescue their friends, then defeating Mojo to return back home.
In this platform game, the player starts choosing either Wolverine or Rogue. At each new level beaten, a new X-Men will be available: first Gambit, then Cyclops, Havoc and finally Shard. If one of the X-Men dies, the player has to start the level again, choosing among the remaining X-Men the one to play. After all the X-Men have died, the game is over.
Each character can activate his/her power at will. Wolverine can use his claws, Rogue can fly, Gambit can throw explosive cards, Cyclops will fire optic blasts, Havoc fires plasma blasts and Shard fires energy blasts. The characters have an energy meter and a power meter, which will worn out as they are hit or use their powers, respectively. They can find items to restore their energy and power.
Gameplay consists basically in finding the way out of each of the six levels. Once finding it, the character will face a boss, usually known characters from the comics like Magneto, Fitzroy, a Sentinel, etc. The last boss is Mojo himself.

Los X-Men se enfrentan a su más brutal episodio. Spiral, una hermosa productora de televisión de seis brazos (y cómo será todavía ella bella?), Está programando un combate final de los X-Men contra sus peores enemigos, con transmisión en vivo para los telespectadores. Si este plan funciona, los ciudadanos de Mojo World conectarán su aparato de TV para asistir a la disputa y ella se convertirá entonces en su nueva gobernante!nnX-Men directamente del pasado, del presente y del futuro.nn¡Aventúrese en Nueva Orleans, en la ciudad futurista de Nueva York y en el Mojo World!nnCuidado con Mojo, el Magneto, los Centinelas y los Agentes. ¡Ellos quieren destruirlo!

Dans un sombre futur, Mojo possède son propre show télévisé dans lequel deux concurrents doivent se battre jusqu'à la mort et il a malheureusement enfermé quelques X-Men pour recréer leurs grandes batailles. Dans X-Men : Mojo World, vous devez aider Wolverine et Rogue à libérer leurs amis. Chaque niveau terminé libérera un X-Men qui sera aussitôt jouable. Lorsque vous mourez, vous devez choisir parmi ceux restants. Vous affronterez des boss tirés du comics tels que Magneto, Fitzroy..

Os X-Men enfrentam seu mais brutal episódio. Spiral, uma bela produtora de televisão munida de seis braços (e como será que ela ainda pode ser bela?), está programando um combate final dos X-Men contra seus piores inimigos, com transmissão ao vivo para os telespectadores. Se este plano funcionar, os cidadãos de Mojo World ligarão seu aparelho de TV para assistirem à disputa e ela se tornará, então, sua nova governante!nnnnX-Men diretamente do passado, do presente e do futuro.nnAventure-se em New Orleans, na cidade futurista de Nova York e no Mojo World!nnCuidado com Mojo, o Magneto, as Sentinelas e os Agentes. Eles querem destrui-lo!

game.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

locale.title: Xenon 2 : Megablast
locale.synopsis:
Xenon 2: Megablast is vertically scrolling space shooter, in which you have to pass several levels, filled with waves of enemies, that all end with a level boss creature. Each group of enemies you destroy grants you a cash reward and every once in a while you enter Colin's Bargain Basement, where you can use this cash to purchase upgrades for your ship like better weapons, speed & health upgrades etc. Some upgrades can also be picked up during the levels.
The first part of the game has an organic feel to it, while the second part of the game features mechanical enemies. As there are some maze-like sections with dead-ends in the game, your spaceship scrolls backwards when you keep pressing the down key.
A typical Bitmap Brothers smash, the game is also famous for its soundtrack by British electronica group Bomb The Bass.
XENON 2: Diffcíl, rápido, de la misma calidad que las maquinitas de juegos de acción destructora con sonido vivo adaptado. XENON 2: Es increíble. XENON 2: Es Superchachi.

Xenon 2 : Megablast sur Master System est un shoot'em up spatial dans lequel vous affrontez deux catégories d'ennemis : organiques et mécaniques. Le jeu encourage l'esprit conquérant en récompensant le joueur par de l'argent convertible entre chaque mission en des équipements pour améliorer le vaisseau.
XENON 2: hartes, rasantes, verheerendes Ballern: Spielhallen-Qualität mit heißem Sound. XENON 2: Das absolute Erlebnis XENON 2: Ein "Megablast"!

locale.title: Xyzolog
locale.synopsis: An action puzzle game released for the MSX in 1985. It was brought to the Sega Master System without a license in South Korea.

XYZOLOG es un juego de estilo arcade de vista cenital. La pantalla principal se divide en pequeñas zonas que tienen diferentes niveles de elevación con obstáculos. Cada área contiene uno o más puntos intermitentes rojos. Tu objetivo es hacer rodar la pelota en los puntos intermitentes y si lo haces ese punto deja de parpadear. Vas a entrar al siguiente nivel cuando todos los puntos se hayan apagado. Pero cuidado con la persecución de objetos en forma de estrella, si te tocan se acabó el juego ...
Un jeu d'esquive dans la veine de Madness Marble, des visuels aiguisés et un mécanicien rare de suicide en dernier recours.

locale.title: Ys : The Vanished Omens
locale.synopsis: Once long ago, the Kingdom of Y's fell under a reign of evil. But the Goddesses of Y's saved the Kingdom from ruin. Their feats were written in six magical books and hidden until the time the Goddesses would be needed again. A thousand years later, that time has come. You are Aron, a wanderer. An evil sorcerer named Dark Dekt is planning diabolical magic. And the Seer Sara is desperately looking for a swordsman to help her find the vanished six books of Y's. Now arm yourself and prepare for an adventure into the unknown. Where caverns and towers are filled with creatures and hoards of treasure. Where the strangest people have clues to tell you. Where your skill in combat depends on your reflexes. If you succeed, you'll have the power to call down the Goddesses. Fail, and Dark Dekt will rule the Kingdom under a reign of terror forever!

Una vez, hace mucho tiempo, el Reino de Y cayó bajo el dominio del mal. Pero las Diosas de Y salvó al Reino de la ruina. Sus hazañas fueron escritas en seis libros mágicos y escondidas hasta el momento en que las Diosas serían necesarias de nuevo.nnMil años después, ese momento ha llegado. Eres Aron, un vagabundo. Un malvado hechicero llamado Dark Dekt planea la magia diabólica. Y la Vidente Sara está buscando desesperádamente un espadachín que la ayude a encontrar los seis libros desaparecidos de Y.nnAhora ármate y prepárate para una aventura hacia lo desconocido. Donde las cavernas y torres están llenas de criaturas y tesoros. Donde las personas más extrañas tienen pistas para decirte. Donde tu habilidad en combate depende de tus reflejos.nnSi lo logras, tendrás el poder de llamar a las Diosas. ¡Falla, y Dark Dekt gobernará el Reino bajo un reino de terror para siempre!

Ys : The Vanished Omens sur Master System est un jeu de rôle dans lequel vous incarnez Aron, un aventurier expert en maniement d'épées. La quête à accomplir consiste à retrouver les six livres d'Ys et de découvrir le secret qu'ils renferment avant que Dull Dekt ne s'en serve à des fins personnelles.

locale.title: Zaxxon 3D
locale.synopsis: The enemy has built battle fortresses in the farthest reaches of space. There's only one way in... and one way out. Your Mission: Infiltrate the enemy's defenses and destroy their motherships!
El enemigo ha construido terribles fortalezas en los confines del espacio. Sólo existe una entrada . . . y una salida. SU MISÍÓN: Infiltrarse en las defensas del enemigo y destruir sus naves nodriza.

Zaxxon 3D sur Master System est un jeu de tir spatial. Le joueur pilote un vaisseau dans lequel il devra se débarrasser de légions d'ennemis. Le jeu se divise en deux phases. La première consiste à récupérer le maximum d'armes, munitions et armures, alors que dans la seconde vous devez récupérer du carburant qui s'épuise petit à petit.

locale.title: Zillion
locale.synopsis: Are you ready for the ultimate danger? You're alone, outnumbered and there's no guarantee you'll make it alive. You're J.J. Your objective: secretly infiltrate the underground labyrinth of The Norsa Empire and steal their plans for domination. Armed with the ultra speed and power of the Zillion Laser, your mission is complex. And sheer strength will not win this one alone. You'll need more brains than brawn in this sophisticated operation. So, how will you think your way to victory? With cunning strategy and memory to guide you successfully through the maze which awaits. Where once inside, you'll find the information needed to destroy the Norsas and restore peace forever.
Infíltrese en el peligroso laberinto Norsa a fin de llegar al computador principal y rescatar a sus amigos. Este juego requiere tanto cerebro como músculos.

Etes-vous prêt pour le danger ultime ? Zillion sur Master System vous propose d'incarner JJ l'agent secret. Votre objectif étant d'infiltrer secrètement les bâtiments de l'empire Norsa et de voler leurs plans avant qu'ils ne dominent le monde. Pour ce faire, vous partez équipé d'un kit ultra speed qui accélère temporairement la vitesse de votre avatar et d'un pistolet laser, précieux en cas d'embuscade.

locale.title: Zillion II : The Tri Formation
locale.synopsis: They're at it again. The dreaded Norsa Empire is back... and stronger than ever before. This time they won't make any mistakes. Others have tried to stop them and all have failed. The evil Baron Ricks knows you are coming. And it's a trap! But you're the galaxy's last hope. Can you do what's never been done before?

¡ Ya están aquí otra vez! El temible Imperio Norsa ha regresado. . .y más fuerte que nunca. Esta vez no cometerán errores. Otros han tratado de derrotarles y todos han fallado. El malvado Baron Ricks sabe que usted se acerca y le ha preparado una trampa.¡ Pero qué puede hacer! Usted es la última esperanza de la galaxia. ¿Puede usted hacer lo que nadie ha hecho hasta ahora?

locale.title: Zillion II : The Tri Formation
locale.synopsis: Dans le jeu d'action/plates-formes Zillion II : The Tri Formation sur Master System, le redoutable empire Norva attaque de nouveau, plus menaçant que jamais. Repartez à l'assaut mais cette fois-ci, le baron Ricks vous attend de pied ferme. Serez-vous à la hauteur une seconde fois ?

game.name: Zool - Ninja Of The Nth Dimension

locale.title: Zool : Ninja of the Nth Dimension
locale.synopsis: Once every year, the games world is rocked by a game so stunning, so fast, so colorful, so big, so demanding, so mega, so awesome, so varied, so incredible, and so full of fabulous features and unexpected treats, that everybody just looks at it and says "THAT'S IT!" This year, Zool, The Ninja From the Nth Dimension, is definitely "IT!"

Cada año el mundo de los juegos se ve sa cudido por un juego tan maravilloso, rápido, lleno de color, total, absorbente, 'mega', imponente, variado, increíble, y lleno de fabulosas características e inesperadas sorpresas, que todos se quedan pasma dos y dicen: ¡ESTE ES!; este año 'ZOOL, THE NINJA FROM THE Nth DIMENSION' es ¡EL JUEGO!

Vous incarnez Zool dans ce jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Master System, un ninja de la "Nième Dimension" qui a la capacité de se déplacer très rapidement et de grimper aux parois. Le jeu vous offre la possibilité (originale pour l'époque), de choisir votre musique (Rock ou Funk) ainsi que la vitesse du jeu, qui est une composante essentielle.

Uma vez por ano, o mundo dos jogos é embalado por um jogo tão deslumbrante, tão rápido, tão colorido, tão grande, tão exigente, tão mega, tão incrível, tão variado, tão incrível e cheio de características fabulosas e surpresas inesperadas, que todo mundo apenas olha para ele e diz "É isso!" Este ano, Zool, The Ninja da Nth Dimension, é definitivamente "O JOGO!"
